name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000001
text: Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000002
text: I came here since I was worried, but I won't dare to go in there by myself.{nl}That's why I am asking you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000003
text: I can't just wonder into places like that you know.{nl}There are monsters just sitting there...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000004
text: There's rumors of the Alembique Legend among the refugees.{nl}I wanted to know the truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000005
text: {nl}There might be products that the Alliance is looking for...{nl}Since you were going to explore the cave anyways, it's like hitting two Popolions with one stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000006
text: {nl}I'll give you this book as payment.{nl}It'll be better than going in blind will it not?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000007
text: Priest Lintas is correcting the contents of the monument.{nl}The process is taking some time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000008
text: Thanks to you, the monument has been corrected.{nl}We need to check up on the status of Priest Kidas and Brunas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000009
text: Even with the help, a flechette is nowhere to be found.{nl}I should go back to my master after sorting things out a bit in here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000010
text: Aquilas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000011
text: I came here to learn archery but am just running errands finding that blasted arrow...{nl}If I knew that I had to look for arrows. I would not have started this journey...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000012
text: I mean, this is all because of Lydia Schaffen.{nl}She should have taken her Flechette or whatever if she had used it to kill Ziburynas!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000013
text: {nl}Who cares if she is a legendary person.{nl}She doesn't know how to look after her things.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000014
text: {nl}I can't understand my master.{nl}I don't know how I can be forgiven if I find that Flechette or whatever.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000015
text: {nl}Even if I do somehow agree that it is important... I don't get how reporting on the vegetation is supposed to be important.{nl}Ugh... Not my kind of work.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000016
text: I'd be really grateful if you'd offer any type of help.{nl}First of all, could you get me some Poppy Bracken, Aily Grass and Pria Flowers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000017
text: {nl}What do they have to do with the legendary arrow?{nl}I have no idea either.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000018
text: Stupid Flechette or whatever it's called...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000019
text: Mechen

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000020
text: I thought that Aquilas had come to report...{nl}This place is dangerous due to all of the monsters and demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000021
text: {nl}How about leaving if you don't have any important business.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000022
text: {nl}Oh?{nl}Ah, you're a Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000023
text: {nl}It seems as if you are curious as to what my apprentices and I are doing here.{nl}Have you heard anything from Aquilas?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000024
text: {nl}Oh, I am a member of the Astral Tower and sibling to the former leader.{nl}I made a big mistake while Ignas was trying to take control of the Astral Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000025
text: {nl}Ignas didn't miss out on the opportunity and took over the Astral Tower.{nl}Of course, the rest of the members don't look upon me so kindly.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000026
text: {nl}No matter how I tell them that it was a mistake, they refuse to listen.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000027
text: {nl}That's why I have decided to try and find Lydia Schaffen's Flechette to try and undo my wrongdoings.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000028
text: {nl}They'll at least pretend to listen if I bring back the Flechette.{nl}I've come to this place as I am almost certain that her Flechette must be in Ziburynas Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000029
text: {nl}My apprentices and I have been trying to look for the Flechette but there's been no progress.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000030
text: I see you've gathered it all.{nl}Thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000031
text: {nl}Go to the camp and ask my master if you're wondering why we had to do this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000032
text: {nl}Well, I'd better start looking at these unremarkable things to find something different.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000033
text: Hmm... I thank you for your eagerness, but this place is much too dangerous with all of the demons roaming around. {nl}I would appreciate it if you would simply ask my apprentices how they are doing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000034
text: {nl}Woognis is at the Vilkas Nest, Jenonhas is at Kainen Crossing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000035
text: Whoa, you scared me! Who are you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000036
text: {nl}The current situation?{nl}I haven't even gone anywhere near the area since I'm too afraid.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000037
text: {nl}That over there is the Vilkas nest, but how am I supposed to get in there.{nl}I don't know, maybe I'll be able to get there if I cover myself with Vilkas fur...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000038
text: We'll be put in danger if we go and fight Vilkas near their nest.{nl}There are a lot of Vilkas at Kyrba Lot as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000039
text: {nl}Why don't we try gathering Vilkas fur over there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000040
text: There's a lot of Vilkas at Kyrba Lot, so it should be easy enough to get their fur there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000041
text: I think we'll be able to fool them into thinking we're one of their friends with this amount of fur.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000042
text: I'm thinking of going to search their nest with this fur all over me.{nl}It's quite large so I don't know how long it will take but...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000043
text: There's no reason for me to decline your offer of help.{nl}Let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000044
text: There doesn't seem to be a Flechette where I checked.{nl}Did you find anything?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000045
text: {nl}Ah yes...{nl}Nothing...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000046
text: So my search has resulted in nothing.{nl}You said that you were gathering reports?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000047
text: {nl}There are two other apprentices.{nl}One is Aquilas and the other is Jenonhas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000048
text: {nl}Aquilas is on the road to Phamer Forest and Jenonhas is at Kainen Crossing.{nl}You said that you've already met Aquilas, so try looking for Jenonhas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000049
text: I'll return after wrapping things up here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000050
text: Jenonhas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000051
text: Thank you so much.{nl}I wouldn't have made it if you hadn't come here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000052
text: Yes, that is correct.{nl}I am looking for the Flechette.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000053
text: {nl}If it was something that could have been found so easily, people would have already taken it, don't you think?{nl}This is pointless.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000054
text: {nl}There are even demons here.{nl}I can't understand my orders this time round.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000055
text: {nl}I'm going to have to talk about this later.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000056
text: Everyone is exhausted since they're searching for an arrow that seems to be non-existant.{nl}Especially where there are so many demons roaming around...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000057
text: {nl}It's all because I am not skilled enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000058
text: The first Fletcher Master crafted the Flechette for Lydia Schaffen.{nl}Of course I thought about asking the Fletcher Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000059
text: {nl}But the Fletcher Master and the other members of the Astral Tower... They won't talk to me because they think I am a traitor.{nl}That's why I am not even thinking about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000060
text: Of course I would appreciate the help but...{nl}I'm sure that it won't make a difference.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000061
text: {nl}Don't be too disappointed though.{nl}The Fletcher Master is at the Goddess' Ancient Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000062
text: Fletcher Master

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000063
text: You said that Mechen asked you to find the Flechette?{nl}You still came to me knowing what kind of person he is correct?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000064
text: {nl}Of course I might think of helping him if he agrees to return the Flechette after finding it.{nl}However, he'll show his true colors as soon as we find the Flechette.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000065
text: If you say that, I'll agree to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000066
text: {nl}This is a recipe for detecting the Flechette.{nl}Take this to Mechen.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000067
text: The Goddess' Ancient Garden...{nl}It will be a long trip.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000068
text: He gave you a recipe that will allow us to craft equipment that will help us detect the Flechette?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000069
text: {nl}How did he decide to help us?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000070
text: {nl}Ah...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000071
text: {nl}I see.{nl}He agreed to help us under the condition of having my life if I do not give the Flechette.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000072
text: {nl}I don't think that will be necessary.{nl}I'll take a look at this recipe then...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000073
text: Mechen is the person who allowed the previous leader for the Astral Tower, his brother, to be taken down.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000074
text: {nl}How can I trust such a person.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000075
text: The Flechette is said to be crafted from the divine energy of the Goddess.{nl}It says that we have to get the energy of a powerful demon since it will react to their energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000076
text: I'm worried that he might make us go and find capture a demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000077
text: You've collected a lot.{nl}Now what we need is...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000078
text: The recipe says that we need Vilkas essence in order to control the demon's energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000079
text: My apprentices have gone to different locations to gather Vilkas essence.{nl}Could you please go to Kyrba Lot?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000080
text: All you have to do is gather Vilkas essence from Kyrba Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000081
text: We have gathered all of the materials needed to create the detector.{nl}I'll start crafting it then.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000082
text: I've finished crafting the detector.{nl}I'm going to give it to my apprentices to try and find the Flechette.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000083
text: {nl}I guess it will make it easier to find the Flechette.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000084
text: If you wish to participate in finding the Flechette, please start at Taylie Lot.{nl}The other places will be covered by my apprentices.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000085
text: {nl}Try using the detector at Taylie Lot at places you think the Flechette might be.{nl}It will react if the Flechette is nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000086
text: Go to Taylie Lot and look for the Flechette.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000087
text: Ah, have you found the Flechette?{nl}It feels a bit abrupt after all that fruitless time we spent searching for it...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000088
text: {nl}Of course, none of us are Revelators...{nl}Good job.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000089
text: {nl}Now it's time to take the Flechette to the Fletcher Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000090
text: Please be careful.{nl}I wish that this would help resolve the misunderstanding between us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000091
text: This... it is the Flechette that was created by my elders.{nl}I didn't think that Mechen would give it this easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000092
text: {nl}Hmm...{nl}Take this.{nl}Tell him that this is a sort of reward for finding me the Flechette.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000093
text: {nl}I don't know how much good it will do for his honor...{nl}But people will at least know how much he went through to find the Flechette.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000094
text: A promise is a promise, so I'll hand it over.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000095
text: This... it's an Arrow of Proof crafted by the Fletcher Master...{nl}I hope people will listen to me a bit more if I have this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000096
text: This will help Mechen recover some of his honor.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000097
text: Hello there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000098
text: {nl}We are apprentices of Maven.{nl}We are rewriting the misinformation that has been spread about the Ruklys incident on this Monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000099
text: {nl}These were almost destroyed because of the actions for King Kadumel.{nl}However, King Barynwell decided to cast magic on them to make them unreadable instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000100
text: {nl}We are preparing to undo the magic and make the corrections.{nl}The monsters are stopping us from doing anything though.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000101
text: We will gladly accept any help you can offer us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000102
text: {nl}First of all, we need to find the documents.{nl}These documents contain instructions on how to dispell transfiguration magic, but they've been scattered due to monster attacks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000103
text: {nl}We were careful in making any further moves since we don't want to provoke any more monster attacks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000104
text: {nl}Please try looking at Othorove Lot first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000105
text: We need those documents to dispell the magic and correct the information on this Monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000106
text: I see that they've all been scattered like this.{nl}Thank you for gathering all of the pages.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000107
text: {nl}Now...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000108
text: We'll have to find an orb in order to dispell the magic.{nl}The orb will quickly be depleted so we also had a recharging orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000109
text: The orb will absorb the energy from the recharging orb.{nl}Therefore, you should be able to find where the orb is if you carry this around with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000110
text: The recharging orb will emmit magic when activated.{nl}The magic will go towards the orb since it will try to absorb it and will glow when it does so.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000111
text: {nl}All you have to do is to find the orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000112
text: Magic will come out of the recharging orb when it is activated.{nl}You'll be able to find the orb if you follow it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000113
text: Oh, thank you so much!{nl}Now that we have the orbs...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000114
text: We have finished all of the preparations required to dispel the magic on King Kadumel's Monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000115
text: You've dealt with the Gosal?{nl}I can't believe that you took that thing on single handed when the three of us...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000116
text: {nl}You don't seem to be just another traveler for some reason...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000117
text: Whatever the case may be, the Gosal is gone, so we'll be able to go there.{nl}We'll have to check Tarkha Lot to see what the object is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000118
text: This thing that looks like a tree is actually an monument.{nl}This is all because of the spell.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000119
text: {nl}We'll dispell it with the orb you've recovered for us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000120
text: The monument has now returned to it's original shape.{nl}We'll now find any pieces of misinformation and correct them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000121
text: We've finished correcting this one, so we'll have to search for other monuments.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000122
text: {nl}Please, follow me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000123
text: Here it is.{nl}I will dispell the magic that is cast on the monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000124
text: I think that the spores from this bracken have caused the paralysis.{nl}I can't dispell the magic in this state.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000125
text: {nl}We'll have to wait for me to be able to move again.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000126
text: {nl}You can find Mittelly Herbs near Ausne Lot.{nl}Mittelly Herbs are known to cure such issues.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000127
text: There should be plenty of Mittelly Herbs near Ausne Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000128
text: {nl}I'm sorry for being so dependant when you simply volunteered to help...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000129
text: There are people that have started to deny the existance of the Goddesses after they have all disappeared.{nl}I want to help them believe once more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000130
text: {nl}However...{nl}I lost my faith in people... as well as the Seed...{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000131
text: At this rate...{nl}I am afraid that I might lose all faith in humanity...{nl}Not a good thing for a priest...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000132
text: Ah, that feels much better.{nl}I don't think it has completely healed me, but it is enough to allow me to dispell the magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000133
text: All Vaivora's Koru is able to tell us is that Goddess Ausrine is in a mysterious place.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000134
text: What do you think that the mysterious place will look like?{nl}We have more questions than answers...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000135
text: Goddess Lada is said to be at Seir Rainforest.{nl}The closest place is most likely Arcus Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000136
text: I suppose I'll be able to meet her if I go to Seir Rainforest?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000137
text: Will you be so kind as to remove the bracken from the Monument?{nl}I'll be paralyzed once more if you don't do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000138
text: {nl}I doubt it will burn because of all the humidity in this area.{nl}Maybe using the dry skin of the Vilkas would be enough to light a proper fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000139
text: If the plague rears it's ugly head once more the people of Kiren Province won't stand a chance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000140
text: I never even imagined that there would be bracken with paralyzing spores.{nl}Thank you so much for helping me out.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000141
text: {nl}However... I can't imagine that you are just a simple traveler.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000142
text: I see that all the bracken has burned.{nl}I'll dispell the magic on the Monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000143
text: Hmm... I've checked the Monument, but it seems as if this one doesn't need to be corrected.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000144
text: Ah, you have gathered quite a lot.{nl}I'm sure that they'll burn nicely even in this humidity.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000145
text: The paralysis doesn't seem to be getting any better.{nl}What should I do...?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000146
text: Thank you so much.{nl}I'll give you the detector that had allowed me to find the Monuments.{nl}All you need to do is to use it near an object you think might be a Monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000147
text: Use the detector near anything you think might be a Monument.{nl}The detector will let you know it's a Monument by creating a circle around it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000148
text: You've found a Monument.{nl}I think I am well enough to move now, so let's head over there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000149
text: I've dispelled the magic and checked what is written on the Monument.{nl}However, it is hard to see what is on it since it has been badly damaged.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000150
text: There might be fragments nearby.{nl}Could you please check the surrounding area?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000151
text: There should be fragments from the Monument nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000152
text: Ah, I see that you've collected quite a few fragments.{nl}Let me check those.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000153
text: I've checked all of the fragments you brought back.{nl}There's a few that have misinformation on them, so please give me a second to correct them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000154
text: Priest Kidas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000155
text: Have you come all this way to help?{nl}May you be blessed by the Goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000156
text: {nl}Checking the contents of this Monument will be difficult.{nl}As you can see, there are too many vines surrounding it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000157
text: {nl}Brunas and myself were trying to get rid of the vegetation here, but we couldn't find any useful materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000158
text: {nl}We'd like to use Vilkas salivary glands since they have strong abrasive properties, but getting them is a problem since they won't just give them to us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000159
text: Getting them to give us the salivary glands is quite hard...{nl}We'll have to wait for them to become weak after attacking them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000160
text: {nl}You will have to feed them Mytiharyn Grass when they're weakened. This will make them salivate abrasive saliva.{nl}You will have to finish them off now and get the salivary glands.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000161
text: Of course, they might attack you and resist eating the Mytiharyn Grass, so please be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000162
text: The salivary glands you brought should be enough.{nl}However...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000163
text: We need water to dilute the poison from the salivary glands you brought.{nl}Brunas went to Putas Lot to get the water, but hasn't come back for a while...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000164
text: I hope everything is okay...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000165
text: Priest Brunas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000166
text: Thank you. You saved my life.{nl}Ah, you've collected all of the salivary glands needed?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000167
text: {nl}We'll be able to get rid of the vegetation once I take this water there then.{nl}I'll hurry back to Kidas then.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000168
text: I've heard that you helped Kidas and Brunas a lot.{nl}Thank you for allowing us to finish our work. It had been stalled for a long time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000169
text: {nl}I knew I was right in thinking you're not just a normal traveler.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000170
text: {nl}Whomever you may really be, may you be blessed by the Goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000171
text: We are planning on publishing a book with the corrections made to these Monuments in order to allow more people to know about the truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000172
text: {nl}Please make sure to take a look at the book if you have a chance to do so.{nl}Thank you for all the helped you gave us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000173
text: This is an area where a plague that caused fevers in people before leading them to their death.{nl}It's a bit quiet at the moment, but we don't know when it'll become worse again.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000174
text: {nl}I'm in the middle of researching that plague.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000175
text: I might die before I get anywhere near completing a cure if you don't help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000176
text: I am going to send the cure to the Plague Doctor Master when it is complete.{nl}I will try strengthening it just in case.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000177
text: Go and see how Woognis is doing at the Vilkas Nest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000178
text: Something must have happened to Priest Lintas who was dispelling the magic from the monument. Approach him to see what is wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000179
text: Kidas has removed the vegetation from the Monument and is taking a closer look.{nl}It seems to be taking much longer than expected.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000180
text: You've come back.{nl}I heard that you saved Brunas from monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000181
text: {nl}I thank you for helping us gather all of the ingredients and saving Brunas.{nl}We finished diluting the poison while you were coming back.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000182
text: {nl}We'll correct any misinformation on the Monument after removing the vegetation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000183
text: There was misinformation on the Monument, so we corrected it.{nl}We're going to go back and report to Lintas about our success here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000184
text: {nl}Thank you for helping us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000185
text: I am grateful to all of my apprentices who followed me all the way here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000186
text: I feel sorry that I haven't been able to teach them properly because of my mistakes and poor decisions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000187
text: I followed him to learn archery, not about shrubs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000188
text: Here I am ripping weeds out instead of at the archery range.{nl}I am seriously considering just going back home.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000189
text: I told him that I don't want to pick at weeds anymore and he told me to wait here.{nl}I hope he won't tell me to go and gather leaves next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000190
text: I feel like I'll forget how to lose how to hold a bow.{nl}I should go and ask him to teach me archery instead of how to get rid of weeds.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000191
text: I always picked on Jenonhas because of his direct way of communication.{nl}It seems like that we won't have to pick any more weeds thanks to him though.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000192
text: They say that a person called Ignas became the leader of the Astral Tower because of a mistake he made.{nl}What sort of mistake gets the leader of the Astral Tower changed?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000193
text: We followed him because we wished to learn archery.{nl}However, all he is doing is trying to find the Flechette.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000194
text: It is pretty much impossible to find an arrow in this large area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000195
text: Jenonhas and Aquilas have a lot of resentment at the moment.{nl}Of course, Aquilas would rather keep his complaints under wraps.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000196
text: Jenonhas on the other hand, is much more direct and forthcoming.{nl}I'm actually sort of amazed that he didn't say anything up to this point.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000197
text: Jenonhas and Aquilas are as tired out as I am with this fruitless search.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000198
text: There was a time when I asked him about what mistake he made to buy the wrath of the Astral Tower members.{nl}He didn't answer me at the time and looked into the distance while sighing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000199
text: It is said that Lydia Schaffen had defeated the Demon King Ziburynas in this forest with the Flechette.{nl}However, Lydia Schaffen hadn't retrieved that fantastic arrow after that feat.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000200
text: {nl}Why didn't Lydia Schaffen retrieve her arrow?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000201
text: I tried my best to find the Flechette thinking that it would help him recover his honor.{nl}However, I was threatened by monsters and demons the whole time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000202
text: {nl}I thought that I might lose my life while trying to regain his honor.{nl}That's why I went to talk about the current situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000203
text: {nl}I don't care if this will reflect poorly on me.{nl}It is better than watching my colleagues die trying to find an arrow.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000204
text: I don't understand the Astral Tower's reaction to him either.{nl}Of course, I don't know what his mistake was but...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000205
text: {nl}They are said to have gone through a lot together...{nl}I think that the members of the Astral Tower should forgive him now...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000206
text: How sad do you think a Master would be if one of his apprentices lost their honor.{nl}Maven must have been extremely sad watching on as Ruklys lost his honor.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000207
text: I am going to continue Maven's work by letting the people know the truth about Ruklys.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000208
text: I will correct the misunderstandings that have been plaguing the Kingdom since King Kadumel's time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000209
text: This must be done no matter how hard it is to make people take another look at Ruklys.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000210
text: Rewriting the history regarding Ruklys is needed in order to correct the misinformation that is included in our history.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000211
text: Kidas and myself would have done our part once we check and correct this Monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000212
text: We will correct the misinformation about Ruklys by correcting this Monument.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000213
text: Ohla

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000214
text: Hello there!{nl}Have you seen my daughter by any chance?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000215
text: {nl}She has twin-tails and is wearing a hood.{nl}Her name's Liel.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000216
text: {nl}She disappeared without saying anything...{nl}I thought she had gone to a friend's house and checked there but there was no trace of her there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000217
text: {nl}I think she may have gone out of the Refugee Camp.{nl}I've tried asking people to help, but nobody seem to be willing to help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000218
text: {nl}I know that it's asking a lot with the monsters threatening everyone but...{nl}I've come out since I was so worried but there doesn't seem to be anything I can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000219
text: If there was anywhere I thought she might be, I would have gone there already...{nl}I guess we should try looking for places nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000220
text: {nl}Could you please try looking at Preivhengikas Felled Area?{nl}Where could she have gone with all of these monsters crawling around...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000221
text: She's my only daughter and family since I lost my husband during Medzio Diena.{nl}She's all I have in this world now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000222
text: {nl}Please, find Liel for me...{nl}Please...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000223
text: I don't know what my mother is thinking...{nl}Not even knowing that I left to get her some wool so she won't catch any more colds...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000224
text: {nl}The fact that I couldn't do anything for her and that she had to go to...{nl}I am so sorry...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000225
text: Thank the Goddess...{nl}I already don't know how to repay you for saving my daughter...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000226
text: {nl}But you're offering to even get the wool...{nl}I don't know how I am to repay you for your generousity...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000227
text: There's an insect called the White Tree Forest Moth...{nl}It's cacoons are known to be around here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000228
text: {nl}Liel used to go and gather them to use as silk.{nl}I don't know where she hears these things...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000229
text: {nl}I know she's my daughter, but isn't she resourceful?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000230
text: I'm just sorry that I can't offer her more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000231
text: We're searching this area for a Flechette.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000232
text: I think that this should be enough to stitch the tent back up.{nl}Thank you so much for helping me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000233
text: Curtis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000234
text: Ah, you must be the person who saved that girl, Liel.{nl}The way you simply dealed with the monsters that several young men weren't able to tackle...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000235
text: {nl}Ah, look at me... I've forgetten to introduce myself.{nl}My name's Curtis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000236
text: {nl}I'm just another refugee who lost his family and home during Medzio Diena and is trying to get by.{nl}I don't think that coming here helped matters at all.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000237
text: {nl}It's difficult getting things that are needed for basic survival.{nl}That means there are more conflicts between the refugees as well as theives...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000238
text: {nl}We've tried to make some rules and set up defences against the monsters that keep attacking us but...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000239
text: We were in dire need of help.{nl}If you're capable of saving Liel, I'm sure you're more than able to help us a bit more!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000240
text: {nl}I know we might seem a tad ungrateful, but please...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000241
text: {nl}There are many who haven't had a proper meal for a long time.{nl}We've lost the farmland that we took so much care of...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000242
text: {nl}We need something to settle that hunger more than anything.{nl}Could you please get us some Flowlevi head flower?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000243
text: {nl}When dried the seeds come out.{nl}We can cook them

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000244
text: The monsters in this area are a bit more fierce since they are all starving.{nl}Please don't try to bite off more than you can chew and just run if you think it's a bit too much.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000245
text: Many people will have full stomaches today thanks to the food you've brought back.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000246
text: Monsters have been attacking us much more frequently.{nl}That's why we've put up those walls and distributed any weapons we could find to the young men.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000247
text: {nl}The walls keep the monsters at bay, but we're worried that they aren't strong enough.{nl}They seem to break whenever monsters decide to start rampaging.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000248
text: {nl}We're repairing them with wood each time.{nl}What I'm saying is that we use a lot of wood just repairing the walls.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000249
text: Go to Saughus Lot with the tools I gave you.{nl}You'll be able to get a lot of good materials there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000250
text: {nl}After gathering some wood there, you'll be able to make some repair kits for the walls.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000251
text: The problem was that the walls were weak since nobody had any knowledge on how to make them.{nl}They break down every time monsters decide to attack us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000252
text: {nl}That's why we have to keep repairing them every day.{nl}Of course that means we need a lot of wood as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000253
text: This should be enough for one repair session.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000254
text: I'll distribute the wood you've gathered to allow the repairs to start.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000255
text: I know we've asked a lot, but please...{nl}All you need to do is to repair the wall in front of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000256
text: The rest will be repaired by the other people.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000257
text: We could have scraped by and repaired the walls but...{nl}I had no idea that you would help us so generously.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000258
text: Mishekan Forest is extremely cold at night.{nl}You'll catch frostbites if you don't wrap up tightly enough at night.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000259
text: {nl}That's why we need a lot of clothes or covers that use Flowlon leathers.{nl}Of course it isn't easy for us to deal with the monsters in the first place...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000260
text: This place is cold enough at night to make you shiver non-stop.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000261
text: I think this will be enough for all the people here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000262
text: The worst part of this place is the lack of water.{nl}We did manage to set up a few wells here and there...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000263
text: {nl}We haven't been able to drink it after the poison from the White Trees managed to trickle into the water supply.{nl}We've had to purify the water in one way or another.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000264
text: {nl}We are using a grass called Randulin.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000265
text: I'll give you a bottle of water.{nl}The problem is that Randulin usually is well hidden beneath the earth.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000266
text: {nl}However, it will turn yellow when touched by the un-purified water here.{nl}You'll be able to see where the Randulin is by sprinkling the ground with this water.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000267
text: A lot of people suffered greatly when we didn't know about the issues with the water.{nl}Aurlelse who is good with herbs, taught people how to purify the water.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000268
text: Yes.{nl}What you have brought is indeed Randulin.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000269
text: {nl}I think that will allow us to drink purified water for quite some time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000270
text: Did I tell you about the farmland that we had worked on?{nl}We had used the cable-car here in order to create arable land over at Lacetti Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000271
text: {nl}Even if it's a bit far from here, there's a lot of sunlight as well as soft soil.{nl}But we always had to be prepared to fix the old and worn cable-car since it was the only way for use to get there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000272
text: {nl}That's why we prepared tools to fix it at a moments notice in a pouch and place it somewhere we could find easily.{nl}The monsters mistook them for food bags and stole them all.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000273
text: Monsters must have been starving too.{nl}Taking something they cannot eat...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000274
text: Ah, yes.{nl}Those are the pouches.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000275
text: There's still a problem left even if we are able to repair the cable-car again.{nl}As soon as we tilled the soil at Phavegheliai, monsters started attacking us there as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000276
text: {nl}This is a matter of our survival.{nl}People will start starving if monsters are allowed to control that land for too long.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000277
text: {nl}That's why I'm gathering young men to go and drive them off.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000278
text: I knew that it wouldn't be something that a handful of people could accomplish...{nl}I believe that you'll manage to tip things in our favor even more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000279
text: Phavegheliai Farm will be on the other end of the cable-car that you get on at Lacetti Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000280
text: Liel...Are you there Liel?{nl}Where could she have gone to...{nl}I told her to not go out of the Refugee Camp...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000281
text: If you see a girl with a hood that has twin-tails, please bring her here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000282
text: I'm looking for a girl with a hood and twin-tails.{nl}Her name is Liel. Have you seen her?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000283
text: If you do find her, please bring her back to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000284
text: Phavegheliai Farm was nothing but grasslands.{nl}It seemed perfect since there wasn't too many monsters and the sunlight was good here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000285
text: {nl}That's why we started to farm here and the crops made it well.{nl}Then, the monsters came after the crops and we lost control of the farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000286
text: It seems like we'll be able to farm again thanks to you.{nl}I suppose it would be too much to ask you to stay with us?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000287
text: {nl}Why don't you meet the people before you leave...{nl}I'm sure they'll have plenty to say to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000288
text: You've listened to all of the worries of the people here?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000289
text: {nl}I'm sure there wasn't one story that wasn't heartbreaking.{nl}Some feel like life here is nothing but trouble.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000290
text: {nl}Some people say that I don't know about the severity of this situation, but I assure you that I do.{nl}This type of life will not be sustainable without material help from someone else.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000291
text: {nl}I am sorry for the children as they will not be able to see the outside world.{nl}I have of course considered moving somehwere else.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000292
text: {nl}However, we don't know exactly where we are in the Great Woodlands so we can't simply pick a direction either.{nl}We don't have enough food or supplies and the monsters are a never ending threat.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000293
text: Really?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000294
text: {nl}Thank you.{nl}We would appreciate it if you could go to a major city for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000295
text: I see that there are refugees that haven't been able to receive proper assistance.{nl}I shall ask the lords near Mishekan if they can't offer some help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000296
text: How did it go?{nl}Is there a city willing to help us?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000297
text: The Knight Commander at Klaipeda said that he'd request help from the other lords?{nl}That's just what I wanted to hear.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000298
text: {nl}Thank you so much for going the extra bit for us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000299
text: I shall ask the lords near Mishekan Forest to aid the refugees.{nl}I'll try to make them hurry a bit as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000300
text: Aurlelse

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000301
text: I think of the peaceful days before Medzio Diena every day.{nl}The Potato Dumplings I used to have with my wife were the best...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000302
text: I lost my wife to a large branch that crashed on top of the house that day.{nl}I am regretful that I wasn't even able to properly bury her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000303
text: Alex

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000304
text: I am also afraid that I'll be attacked like Mr. Curtis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000305
text: {nl}He was attacked by monsters a while ago when trying to drive them out of town.{nl}I can still see him in pain because of the wounds.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000306
text: If it wasn't for Medzio Diena, I would have married my love and be living a happy life...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000307
text: Wickens

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000308
text: It wasn't too long after I came here.{nl}Waltas was stealing for his wife and baby.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000309
text: {nl}He used to be someone that always looked out for other people...{nl}I realized that people change in harsh circumstances after seeing that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000310
text: I do somewhat understand why Waltas was stealing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000311
text: {nl}His wife had just given birth to their baby.{nl}But she wasn't able to feed the baby as she had been starving as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000312
text: {nl}Waltas needed to get food for his wife and baby.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000313
text: Myuse

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000314
text: Everyone at the refugee camp is grateful to Curtis, Aurlelse and Nagles.{nl}We wouldn't even be able to live like this if it wasn't for their help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000315
text: Although we have gotten it better, it is still a harsh life.{nl}It won't get any better if we don't get any help from the lords.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000316
text: Liel

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000317
text: My mother... she gave me all of her blankets because she thought I would be cold.{nl}That's why she always has the cold and can't stop coughing...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000318
text: {nl}I thought that less wind would come through the tent if I managed to stitch it and went to get some twine.{nl}There wasn't anything worth using in the refugee camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000319
text: {nl}Curtis said that there were moths that made their cocoons up there.{nl}He said that they would be extremely good for strong twine.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000320
text: I cannot tell my mother about it.{nl}She would forbid me from going out. No doubt about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000321
text: {nl}I should have done this.{nl}My mother would be saddened if anything happens to me..

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000322
text: My mother always has nightmares ever since we came here.{nl}She always calls out to my father asking him to not go.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000323
text: {nl}Then she wakes up crying.{nl}It is so painful to watch.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000324
text: I remember eating Potato Dumplings with my parents.{nl}They tasted so good...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000325
text: {nl}The sound of parents calling their children to dinner...{nl}The hard yet comfortable chairs...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000326
text: Everything seemed impossible when we got here.{nl}Everyone was overwhelmed by the circumstances and there was nothing needed for survival... Not to mention the threat of monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000327
text: {nl}Despite all that, we were able to make it this far thanks to Aurlelse.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000328
text: {nl}There had been a case of theft when food was scarce.{nl}I was one of the victims at the time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000329
text: {nl}People where incredibly angry at the time, including myself.{nl}When Waltas was discovered to be the criminal, we were just about to beat him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000330
text: {nl}However, Aurlelse gave him his food and defended him.{nl}Saying that he would have done the same if his baby was starving...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000331
text: {nl}He also persuaded us that we should stick together even when times were tough.{nl}We all felt so embarrassed by his deeds...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000332
text: {nl}We realized that simply protecting my own would not make matters better.{nl}That's when we started to collect our strength in order to overcome the situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000333
text: {nl}As a result of the actions that day, things are getting a bit better.{nl}If Aurlelse hadn't stepped forward that day, there may not be anyone left alive here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000334
text: If there wasn't someone as brave as Nagles, there may have been nobody here willing to fight the monsters.{nl}Nagles was the one that raised the walls and found the weapons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000335
text: Nagles

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000336
text: We were able to live here this long thanks to Curtis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000337
text: I thought of what I could do after seeing Curtis working so hard for the people here.{nl}That's why I thought about protecting them from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000338
text: {nl}I also looked for anything that could be used as weapons around here.{nl}Surprisingly there was a worn down shack here with spears inside...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000339
text: {nl}I gave the spears to young people like me and we started protecting the people.{nl}Then we raised the walls to make it harder for monsters to get in.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000340
text: {nl}We didn't have enough materials or experience to build proper walls so their quite shabby.{nl}They're still worth their weight in Talt though!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000341
text: Heres

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000342
text: Even if life here has gotten better, it's still unsafe.{nl}A time will come when it will become impossible for life to continue here without outside help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000343
text: Even if we wish to go and ask for help, we can't do so.{nl}Monsters are a threat of course, but the real issue is about the food.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000344
text: {nl}We have no idea of telling how far deep we have gotten ourselves into the Great Woodlands.{nl}We don't know how much food we'll need to take to get to the next town.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000345
text: Dreis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000346
text: We are unable to distribute food because we lost the farms to the monsters.{nl}We are unable of taking the farms back from them as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000347
text: There will be conflicts because of the lack of food soon if we don't do something about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000348
text: Phadia

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000349
text: Monsters keep coming in even with the wall.{nl}They will continue to come here even if the people are standing guard with their weapons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000350
text: {nl}We all of our farmland to the monsters.{nl}Even if we manage to get it back, it won't be enough to feed us all.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000351
text: {nl}It will only demoralize us even further.{nl}We won't be able to make it much more without the help from someone else.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000352
text: You can't simply drink water from Mishekan Forest because of the toxins.{nl}You'll suffer from stomache troubles if you do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000353
text: {nl}You have to drink it after purifying it with Randulin, but that's not easy to obtain either.{nl}You have to find it outside of the refugee camp where monsters are roaming around.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000354
text: {nl}Nothing is easy here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000355
text: Wyatt

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000356
text: I did think that he was bringing more food than the others.{nl}I asked Waltas, but he simply said that he had found food at an empty shelter.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000357
text: {nl}I didn't know anything back then.{nl}I never dreamed that he would be stealing for our baby...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000358
text: {nl}Aurlelse defended my husband when he was discovered to be the theif.{nl}We would have been thrown out if it wasn't for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000359
text: {nl}I am still thankful for Aurlelse and his actions.{nl}I am also sorry for all the people that were victims back then...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000360
text: Waltas became a theif for our baby.{nl}I am not ashamed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000361
text: {nl}Aren't we in a situation where he had no other choice?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000362
text: Waltas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000363
text: Wyatt had to become a refugee late into her pregnancy, and had our baby as soon as we arrived here.{nl}There was only enough food to barely stave off starvation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000364
text: {nl}We managed to scrape by, but the baby was unable to be fed since Wyatt wasn't getting enough nutrition.{nl}The baby kept crying for food but there was none to give...I didn't know what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000365
text: {nl}That's why I stole food for my family...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000366
text: {nl}However, my crimes were soon discovered by the rest of the people.{nl}Aurlelse defended me and my family just before I was beaten.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000367
text: {nl}I am participating even more in order to right any wrongs and make up for my crimes.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000368
text: We thought the food situation might get better since we managed to set up some farms but...{nl}We lost all of that to the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000369
text: {nl}I'm worried that life might get even worse.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000370
text: Ciatas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000371
text: We've been able to manage until now, but we don't know when we'll meet our limits.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000372
text: Of course I want to go and ask for help.{nl}But we don't know where we are and the monsters are crawling all over the place...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000373
text: Rhupas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000374
text: This place becomes really cold at night.{nl}You might even get frostbite if you don't wrap yourself up.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000375
text: I don't know how we'll survive if we lose the farms.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000376
text: Ohdette

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000377
text: Some people think that all we have to do is retake the farms but that's not true.{nl}We can't survive on the food from tha farms alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000378
text: {nl}Monsters will keep raiding us since they know there's food in the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000379
text: We can't drive them out even if we arm everyone with weapons.{nl}They haven't been professionally trained.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000380
text: Salewya

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000381
text: The people are getting worried.{nl}We somehow managed to get this far by sticking together, but there will be a time when that won't be enough...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000382
text: {nl}That doesn't mean we have a way to survive if we leave this place.{nl}We don't have enough food to sustain the large population here moving at once either.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000383
text: There are times when I wish this was all a dream.{nl}However, it feels more realistic every time I seem to wish that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000384
text: Daniels

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000385
text: Salewya wasn't always so dark.{nl}That happened after coming here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000386
text: {nl}It doesn't matter how much we tell her that we can overcome the difficulties here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000387
text: Salewya sometimes says that this whole life seems to be like a dream.{nl}That she'll wake up in a warm and comfortable bed...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000388
text: {nl}I'm afraid she'll keep denying reality.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000389
text: Hello there, are you trying to go in there?{nl}If so, could you please help me? It's a matter of life and death.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000390
text: {nl}Please help!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000391
text: Thank you so much for agreeing to help...{nl}I sent in a group of refugees that I organized into a group.{nl}None of them have been able to make it out even if it has been a few days.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000392
text: I don't think that the legends written in that book are works of pure fiction.{nl}I don't know what we'll find but I will be able to solidify my position in the Merchant Alliance...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000393
text: Mercenary Heranda

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000394
text: No! {nl}No!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000395
text: {nl}No...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000396
text: Who are you!{nl}Have you come to kill me as well?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000397
text: {nl}It's a person...{nl}I don't recognize you though...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000398
text: {nl}You have to be careful too!{nl}They're coming to get us!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000399
text: {nl}Please deal with those monsters...{nl}Please!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000400
text: No, no, it's over...{nl}We've all gone insane...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000401
text: {nl}Why has this...{nl}Captain... Edeline...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000402
text: You've dealt with all of the monsters?{nl}What are you talking about!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000403
text: {nl}You're another illusion made from this curse as well...{nl}Of course...There couldn't be a person in this place could there...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000404
text: {nl}Just leave me alone and go away...{nl}Please...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000405
text: Who are you?{nl}You don't seem to be one of the Gigho Mercenaries...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000406
text: {nl}Has Alta sent you to die in this cave as well?{nl}How did you get all the way in here?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000407
text: Please find Heranda!{nl}She'll be taken by them if we don't hurry!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000408
text: {nl}I'll explain to you later.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000409
text: Oh no... Where could she have gone?{nl}What's that in your hands though?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000410
text: These are records left by Heranda{nl}She must have fallen unconscious after suffering from illusions and fear.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000411
text: {nl}I suppose it's lucky that Heranda left these here before she was cursed.{nl}I think I'll be able to make out where the others are after reading these.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000412
text: {nl}She also mentions a creature that is hunting the people that have scattered due to the curse.{nl}We thought that we were save since we avoided the curse but...It seem we aren't out of the woods yet...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000413
text: {nl}So they call this Ravinelarva outside of here.{nl}Could you deal with it to keep our people safe?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000414
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll have to look for the location of the other members after reading Heranda's records a bit more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000415
text: My lover, Edeline, is the second in command of the Gigho Mercenaries.{nl}I was accompanying them because I was a bit worried about them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000416
text: {nl}I never thought that things would go so wrong...{nl}I am going to report Alta to the Merchant Alliance Headquarters when I get out of here with Edeline!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000417
text: {nl}Alta drove people to die without telling them anything.{nl}It's not something that can be forgiven even if he didn't know about it...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000418
text: I've been waiting with baited breath for you to return safely.{nl}I was worried that we'd be discovered.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000419
text: I've been able to find where Heranda last saw the head of the Gigho Mercenaries from the records.{nl}After looking at their records... I think it's near the Novan Stone Pole Platform.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000420
text: {nl}I'm sure that a lot of people will be there since he is the head of the Gigho Mercenaries!{nl}Edeline might be there as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000421
text: {nl}Please find them and bring them back.{nl}I beg of you!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000422
text: Commanding Officer Gigho

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000423
text: Who... are you...{nl}I've never seen you before...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000424
text: {nl}Please help me...{nl}I've been badly wounded...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000425
text: Have you found him?{nl}Please find them before they're all hunted down...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000426
text: {nl}We're out of time!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000427
text: Please... Please... I beg of you...{nl}Find my antidotes...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000428
text: {nl}The others...They've all been captured and taken to the Vankas Stone Pole Platform...{nl}The same as Edeline...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000429
text: {nl}Forget about those people... Save me instead...monster{nl}The antidotes...Monsters should be holding them...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000430
text: Please... Please...{nl}At least save me...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000431
text: Why have you returned by yourself?{nl}What about Edeline and the others?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000432
text: {nl}It seems as if Gigho has gone just like Heranda...{nl}But I get that Edeline is at Vankas Stone Pole Platform.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000433
text: Edeline...{nl}I can't believe that he could be thrown away like that after following Gigho for so long...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000434
text: Why have you come back alone...Why!{nl}This necklace was my present to Edeline...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000435
text: {nl}Ah...{nl}I'm sorry...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000436
text: {nl}I didn't know that you've put your life at risk like that...{nl}I took my anger out on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000437
text: I can't wait here for someone that won't return.{nl}Alta... We have to punish him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000438
text: {nl}Don't stop me!{nl}I'll go even if you try and stop me!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000439
text: How did it come to this...{nl}How...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000440
text: {nl}I'm finished if that priest reports me to headquarters!{nl}I feel sorry for my people but I have to make preparations...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000441
text: {nl}Listen to me, we can't allow something similar to happen can we?{nl}Listen to me!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000442
text: If what Celvica and you are saying is true, there must be some other record.{nl}We'd better find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000443
text: {nl}It might be dangerous for you a bit but we need to uncover the truth. People's lives are at stake.{nl}Please, I beg of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000444
text: Perhaps this is the legendary Alembique?{nl}What does that mean for me though...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000445
text: This... will be extremely useful.{nl}It might be good enough to cover all of my mistakes...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000446
text: {nl}I'll be able to explain everything if I fit everything to the legends of Alembique.{nl}Don't  you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000447
text: It doesn't matter if the Kedora Merchant Alliance is meant to search for the Goddess's arrangements...{nl}Their still merchants at heart so they'll listen to me if they know what they can get here...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000448
text: {nl}Nobody has been here before so there will be research that can be performed on the monsters found here...{nl}That's why I want to ask if you'd be willing to deal with some of the monsters and get some of their remains for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000449
text: Do I look like a capitalist and opportunist to you as well?{nl}If so, there isn't much that I can say...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000450
text: {nl}Think of all of this as measures to keep any more people from getting hurt...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000451
text: These stalactites seem to be harboring some sort of magical powers.{nl}The Alliance's researchers will have a field day with these.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000452
text: {nl}I'm sure that they will be important materials that can be used to prevent any further loss of life!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000453
text: I've been thinking after hearing from you and Celvica...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000454
text: {nl}I can't stop but think that there's something in this cave that emits the strange aura.{nl}Maybe getting rid of those might be able to allow the surviving members to return?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000455
text: {nl}I beleive that only you are capable of finishing this job.{nl}Since you don't seem to be affected by the curse at all.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000456
text: I would like to help you but...{nl}You saw what happened to Heranda and Gigho right?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000457
text: {nl}I might mistake you for a monster and start attacking you if I go in there...{nl}Of course I'm sure that I won't be a match for you but...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000458
text: I feel like the aura has lessened a bit...{nl}What do you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000459
text: Heranda! Is Heranda alive?{nl}Is Heranda okay?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000460
text: {nl}This cave is cursed.{nl}People will go crazy if they aren't protected by divine energy like I am.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000461
text: {nl}I have no idea why you're unaffected...{nl}There doesn't seem to be anything else that wants to attack us except the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000462
text: {nl}Look at me, I've kept talking for too long.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000463
text: {nl}People's lives depend on it.{nl}Please bring Heranda back here since you seem to be unaffected by the curse!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000464
text: Celvica?{nl}Why?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000465
text: {nl}Either way, she still hasn't come here...{nl}I'm glad you've made it though.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000466
text: I assure you that this is not simply for my own benefit...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000467
text: Leave me... alone...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000468
text: The Cave of Legends : Revised Edition Volume 1

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000469
text: There have been many tales{nl}of mysterious locations{nl}long before written history.{nl}This book contains three{nl}of those wonderous locations.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000470
text: The reasoning behind selecting{nl}the particular locations is as follows.{nl}{nl}The masses are only a little less interested{nl}about riches such as treasure and gold{nl}than they are about the Goddesses.{nl}{nl}We will start with the legends of Alembique.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000471
text: Chapter 1 Legends of Alembique{nl}-{nl}There are tales of a cave named Alembique{nl}in the southern province of Kiren.{nl}{nl}It is said that a brilliant alchemist{nl}created many invaluable goods{nl}and occasionally invited people{nl}to show off to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000472
text: Nobody seems to know the location{nl}of the mysterious Alembique Cave.{nl}{nl}However, older people in several villages{nl}tell their descendants of being invited to the cave,{nl}and not wanting to leave the place{nl}as they had experienced never before seen luxuries.{nl}{nl}Therefore, people from these villages{nl}have a habit of congratulating any people that have gone missing{nl}and hope that they will also be invited one day.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000473
text: The Cave of Legends : Revised Edition Volume 2

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000474
text: The reasoning behind selecting{nl}the particular locations is as follows.{nl}{nl}The masses are only a little less interested{nl}about riches such as treasure and gold{nl}than they are about the Goddesses.{nl}{nl}We will now go on to the hidden Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000475
text: Chapter 2 : Legends of the Hidden Royal Mausoleum{nl}-{nl}The Great Woodlands have been used by the nobles and public alike{nl}as hunting grounds or refuge thanks to their lush vegetation.{nl}As such, it is an inevitability that people have experience.{nl}However, the funny thing is{nl}there is no account related to the royal family.{nl}According to some rumors,{nl}the reason for lack of accounts is because after Taniel II era.{nl}Many offerings were buried in the secret mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000476
text: What I am saying is that{nl}the Royalty seemed to leave this place alone{nl}as there was a secret place here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000477
text: To be frank, record of Taniel the Second's funeral{nl}are extremely sparse{nl}which lends extra credibility to these claims.{nl}That is because the other funerals{nl}had some sort of records{nl}no matter how small.{nl}However, even if these claims are true{nl}the Mausoleum will never see the light of day.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000478
text: The location of the secret mausoleum remains hidden{nl}for it is almost impossible to avoid{nl}the gaze of  Goddess Medeina.{nl}That is why even if the rumors are true, it is likely that it will remain just a legend.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000479
text: The Cave of Legends : Revised Edition Volume 3

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000480
text: The reasoning behind selecting{nl}the particular locations is as follows.{nl}{nl}The masses are only a little less interested{nl}about riches such as treasure and gold{nl}than they are about the Goddesses.{nl}{nl}We will continue with the legends of the Golden Veins of Barconsi.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000481
text: Chapter 3 : The Golden Veins of Barconsi{nl}-{nl}There are tales that there is a legendary gold vein{nl}in the rural mountains of the Kingdom.{nl}It is said that a demon had found this vein{nl}and a hero defeated the demon before claiming it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000482
text: It is also said that the hero{nl}only took the vein to prevent the demon from using it{nl}and had no interest in using it for himself.{nl}That is why he buried the location forever.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000483
text: The hero eventually passed away from old age{nl}and left no children leaving the gold{nl}up for anyone to take if they could find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000484
text: However, there is something suspicious{nl}about this legend.{nl}There is no record of Barconsi,{nl}the hero who supposedly took the gold from the demon{nl}in any of the Kingdom's records.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000485
text: As such, many people believe that{nl}this legend is fictional{nl}as there is no record of Barconsi.{nl}However, they do not try to explain{nl}why Barconsi's name is involved.{nl}Of course, there are also many people{nl}that keep searching for the gold.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000486
text: Refugee Brandon

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000487
text: I should have listened when everyone was telling me off!{nl}This forest is dangerous!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000488
text: I don't understand why that hunter would want to keep this forest for himself.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000489
text: Umm, could you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000490
text: {nl}I barely managed to get out of a trap, but I hurt my leg and can't go any further.{nl}Please help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000491
text: There's some Whitetailed Grass at Turas Lot... They say it will relieve pain.{nl}I think I'll manage to walk if I'm chewing on that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000492
text: There should be some in the surrounding area.{nl}Could you get some for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000493
text: Thank you so much.{nl}I'm going to get out of here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000494
text: {nl}There seems to be a violent hunter that wants to claim this land as his own.{nl}I doubted that until I got caught in one of his traps.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000495
text: {nl}From what I've heard, he's known to have tamed a beast in order to chase people off...{nl}You should avoid getting any deeper into the forest as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000496
text: I thought you were simply a nosy adventurer, but you seem to be a cut above the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000497
text: Let me introduce myself.{nl}My name is Vilhelmas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000498
text: {nl}I used to be a member... Actually, let's forget about the past since it's not important.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000499
text: {nl}Emmet Forest has only been recently discovered.{nl}It seems like a good place for refugees, so I was getting rid of the troublesome monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000500
text: {nl}There's also a beast here...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000501
text: {nl}You know, the rumors are mostly true... Apart from those about me of course.{nl}I am on my way to get rid of that beast.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000502
text: I appreciate the thought but... I'll have to see your skill before I'll allow it.{nl}I don't want there to be your blood on my hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000503
text: Their saying that I tamed the beast to chase people off?{nl}That's really disheartening...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000504
text: I never thought you would be a Revelator...{nl}Maybe the fact that you came here was also a plan of a Goddess or two.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000505
text: I thought that you were skilled, but never thought that you were a Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000506
text: As I told you before, this is a good place for people to live.{nl}This means that this is a good place for the refugees from the Old Capital.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000507
text: {nl}First of all, the Kugheri must be removed in order for people to settle here.{nl}But we'll have to deal with the beast before we can tackle the Kugheri.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000508
text: {nl}I was getting tired of tracking him because of the curse anyways.{nl}I'd appreciate it if you could help me a bit...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000509
text: {nl}Of course, the beast is more than capable, which means that there will be casualties if you're not strong enough.{nl}Would you mind if I test your skills?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000510
text: It wasn't long after I started dealing with the Kugheri.{nl}One of the demons came crashing through Emmet Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000511
text: {nl}I don't care what a demon would come here for.{nl}I simply took care of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000512
text: {nl}It was relatively easy defeating it.{nl}But there were complications.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000513
text: {nl}He cursed me when he was cornered.{nl}My sight is severely hindered due to that stupid curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000514
text: {nl}Anyways, he put a red gem through himself after that.{nl}He started to transform after that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000515
text: {nl}I'm sure you might have guessed from listening up to this point, but the beast is the demon.{nl}I realized at once that the demon was much more dangerous than before.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000516
text: {nl}Of course, he had a bit of fear left for me and ran as well.{nl}The long and boring fight between the two of us has been dragging on ever since then.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000517
text: {nl}Tracking that thing with this curse wasn't easy.{nl}Having limited vision as a hunter is  almost a death sentance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000518
text: {nl}I put up warnings to ward people away but refugees kept coming in despite of my efforts.{nl}I think I'll be able to settle this fight once and for all with your help though.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000519
text: {nl}Please, lend me your strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000520
text: Very good.{nl}Try dealing with the Kugheri of this forest.{nl}If you are able to deal with them, you might be good enough to take on the beast with me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000521
text: Please prove your skills by dealing with the Kugheri.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000522
text: Hmm... You are definitely skilled.{nl}I think I'll be able to defeat the beast if I fight with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000523
text: {nl}You're a bit too good...{nl}You're not just the average traveler are you? What are you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000524
text: So you're the...!{nl}Now I understand your skill.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000525
text: {nl}Well then Revelator, you should help me out with a problem I have here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000526
text: I think we'll give that idea a try since I have someone to help me now.{nl}I think we'll be able to critically injure the beast.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000527
text: {nl}The plan is to plant a trap where he normally travels and then for me to hit the beast with a poison arrow.{nl}I'll have to gather ingredients for the poison, but I can't do this alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000528
text: {nl}The first ingredient for the poison can be taken from the Kugheri.{nl}I can't see them until I get near them, but they run if I get too close.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000529
text: {nl}Could you gather the ingredients for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000530
text: Thank you.{nl}You'll be able to get the poison from Kugheri Tots.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000531
text: {nl}They seem to have poison for protection purposes when they're young, but simply taking that poison won't be enough.{nl}The poison will become much more potent if you spray them with this stimulant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000532
text: {nl}Defeat them and bring me the enhanced poison sacks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000533
text: Approach the Kugheri Tots and defeat them after spraying them with stimulant.{nl}Take the poison sacks from them after defeating them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000534
text: Good job.{nl}You'll have to move with me for the next ingredient.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000535
text: The next ingredient is the Yellow Wolfsbane.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000536
text: {nl}However, we can't use any flower.{nl}Only a professional will be able to see which flower can be used.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000537
text: {nl}I'll decide which flowers can be used since you won't be able to tell the difference.{nl}All you have to do is lead me to the flowers since I can't see where they are.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000538
text: They should be growing near Saalmas Falls.{nl}We should get moving at once.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000539
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll start mixing the poison.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000540
text: We have enough ingredients for the poison now.{nl}However...{nl}I seem to be fresh out of materials for the traps.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000541
text: {nl}The Kugheri Sommi always carry paralysis poison to use on small animals.{nl}It can be used on larger targets if you have enough of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000542
text: {nl}Could you gather the poison from them?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000543
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll be making other preparations.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000544
text: Bring me paralysis poison gathered from the Kugheri Sommi.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000545
text: That took longer than expected.{nl}Let's go and finish the trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000546
text: We're all set to go.{nl}I just have to install this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000547
text: I tracked the beast and mixed the poison while you were gathering the poison for the trap.{nl}He leaves a red trail behind him. It may be a bit faint for you to see.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000548
text: {nl}I think it's because of the red gem he put through himself.{nl}Anyways, I found a small trail where he frequently goes by.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000549
text: {nl}I think we should install the trap on the way up to Saalmas Falls from Tredhalai Stream.{nl}I'll be hiding at Visuobene Falls and hit him with the poison arrow as soon as he is trapped.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000550
text: {nl}It should be enough to critically injure the beast.{nl}All you have to do is install the trap where I just described.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000551
text: Make sure to install it exactly where I described.{nl}I won't be able to hit him if it's not in the correct place.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000552
