text: Go and install the trap before the beast goes through.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000553
text: I'll have to rest here for a bit.{nl}Vaighe Hill is a dead end so we won't have to worry too much.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000554
text: {nl}You'll have to end it by yourself.{nl}It should have been weakened considerably because of the poison arrow.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000555
text: Don't worry about me and go after it!{nl}Before it can recover!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000556
text: He's gone to a dead end.{nl}This is the opportune moment to finish it!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000557
text: We should recover all of the traps we set to catch the beast.{nl}We can't have people like you stepping on them now can we?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000558
text: May the Goddess bless your journey.{nl}I hope you will be able to succeed in your mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000559
text: I won't be caught out by the Kugheri even if I am wounded.{nl}Hurry after him and finish the job.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000560
text: Yes...{nl}The long fight has finally come to an end.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000561
text: {nl}I don't know when this would have ended if it wasn't for you.{nl}I think my eyesight is returning now that the beast is gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000562
text: {nl}I owe you.{nl}I would appreciate it if you could stay behind and help me clean this place up...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000563
text: {nl}I'm sure you have your mission as Revelator.{nl}I don't know how I'll repay you for the help you gave.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000564
text: {nl}Farewell then.{nl}I wish you the best on your journey.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000565
text: Anyone who goes beyond this point will put their life at risk.{nl}Go back while you still can.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000566
text: I advise you to be careful as there are violent Kugheri and armed traps.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000567
text: Refugee Mylija

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000568
text: I came here after hearing that it was okay, but I think it was a bad decision on my part.{nl}Monsters are crawling everywhere... People are fighting amongst each other...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000569
text: I can't beliece that it's been four years since Medzio Diena and they're still fighting over stupid land.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000570
text: At least they're talking to each other instead of simply fighting.{nl}I wish we could know who to rely on soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000571
text: I hope that everything will be finished without bloodshed.{nl}I'm a bit worried that there may be complications since they don't exactly have a good history together.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000572
text: I am thankful that the argument is over since they've decided to help us even if they haven't decided the winner.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000573
text: Thank you for your help Traveler.{nl}This was all thanks to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000574
text: Ah, it's you...{nl}Could you help us out?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000575
text: {nl}The food we've brought with us is long gone...{nl}We've asked the lords supposed to be ruling this region, but they are too busy squabbling between themselves to help us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000576
text: {nl}Since you seem to be capable of dealing with some monsters, we have no choice but to ask you...{nl}Could you please gather some tailfruit from the Yellow Leafnuts after dealing with them?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000577
text: Thank you.{nl}I think all that's left to eat around these parts are the tailfruits from the Leafnuts.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000578
text: Please gather some tailfruit from the Yellow Leafnuts in the surrounding area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000579
text: Thank you so much.{nl}We'll manage for a while with these but... I hope that they'll decide who will rule this region as soon as possible...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000580
text: Refugee Greg

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000581
text: We came all the way here for help but have to fend for ourselves...{nl}This makes this place exactly like anywhere else.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000582
text: How could they be squabbling over land in such situations...{nl}I guess I can't expect any better from nobles can I...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000583
text: Well, at least they're better than the average noble.{nl}It seems like they've caught on to the situation after being attacked by monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000584
text: I heard that you were the reason behind their sudden agreement.{nl}I don't know how I will repay you for this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000585
text: Monsters are attacking us refugees a few times every single day.{nl}What's the use of having a lot of soldiers nearby.{nl}They're all busy protecting their lords.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000586
text: {nl}Even worse, they don't care if the refugees here die or not.{nl}All they seem to care about is getting more land under their boots.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000587
text: {nl}That's why we have to look for ways to look after ourselves.{nl}I'm sorry, but could you please get us some strong branches from the nearby area?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000588
text: {nl}We're planning on having them as weapons.{nl}I will have to stay here in order to carve their points to use as weapons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000589
text: Thank you so much for offering your help.{nl}We've already taken this much from the surrounding area, so you'll have to look over at Collegia Crossing for more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000590
text: {nl}There's always monsters near branches, so please be careful out there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000591
text: Be wary of monsters when collecting branches.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000592
text: Thank you.{nl}They all look very sturdy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000593
text: {nl}However, they are still just tree branches... We won't last long with these.{nl}We need the fighting between the two lords to end soon...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000594
text: {nl}Only the Goddess will know if they'll care about us even if it does end soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000595
text: I saw you helping Greg.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000596
text: {nl}I've seen you helping us out and dealing with monsters with ease...{nl}You don't seem to be just an ordinary traveler.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000597
text: {nl}We... we'll have to leave this place if the lords don't stop arguing soon.{nl}However, we are afraid of going into Emmet Forest because of the warnings and strange rumors about the place.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000598
text: {nl}In other words, we don't have anywhere to go.{nl}So, please, could you find it in your heart to go and mediate?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000599
text: You'll help us right?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000600
text: {nl}Ah, thank the Goddesses...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000601
text: {nl}I'm sure that you'll manage to persuade them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000602
text: {nl}Lord Ryudhas is ruling over the land in place of his sick brother.{nl}He is a very stubborn man.{nl}He's staying at Dhuvus Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000603
text: {nl}Lord Joquvas is a young lad who has recently come into power.{nl}He is at Nevhrandi Crossroads with his tutor.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000604
text: {nl}We always get turned away every time we go near them.{nl}Please go and talk some sense into them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000605
text: Lord Ryudhas is at Dhuvus Lot,{nl}Lord Joquvas is at Nevhrandi Crossroads.{nl}Please convince them to stop arguing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000606
text: That was incredible!{nl}I didn't think that you'd be able to convince both of them...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000607
text: Lord Ryudhas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000608
text: Not anyone can simply go and talk to a lord.{nl}That has not changed despite how the rest of the world has changed since Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000609
text: I am currently running my family's business in my brother's place as he is ill.{nl}I will not ignore anyone who is threatening my family's rule.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000610
text: You have my word since you have dutifully carried out the tasks I have set for you.{nl}I will attempt to talk to Joquvas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000611
text: All I promise is to attempt to talk.{nl}The fact that this is my family's land is not something that can be compromised.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000612
text: Who are you to stand in front of me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000613
text: {nl}You are all as useless as a Kepa.{nl}How dare you allow this outsider to come near me...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000614
text: {nl}I suppose you have a reason why you've decided to interrupt me?{nl}What business do you have with me, the representative for Lord Ryudhas?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000615
text: The reason I am fighting with the Joquvas lad?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000616
text: {nl}It's not even really a fight.{nl}I am simply notifying him of my family's right.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000617
text: {nl}I have in my possession an official document that proves my right to the land here.{nl}That miserable lad is merely being a nuisance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000618
text: {nl}I am not as compromising as my brother.{nl}This is the rightful land of the Ryudhas family.{nl}I will not back down.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000619
text: I was wondering what sort of nonsense you would tell me.{nl}Why do I need to talk to the lad about my rightful land?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000620
text: {nl}You've been asked by the refugees...?{nl}The refugees over there?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000621
text: {nl}Well, I suppose I cannot simply ignore the requests of my people as lord of this land.{nl}I might consider your request if you complete some tasks I set for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000622
text: {nl}A few of my men seem to have caught a plague.{nl}They must be cured before it can spread so go and fetch me some roots from the Pysis plant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000623
text: Go and fetch me some Pystis roots from nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000624
text: Good.{nl}However, we need more to craft the medicine we need.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000625
text: Ryudhas Guard

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000626
text: Get back from our lord!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000627
text: You are standing in front of Lord Ryudhas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000628
text: Another ingredient is needed to craft the medicine. The legs of the Orange Grummer.{nl}Of course, you'll need to forcefully take it from them, so it may be too much for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000629
text: {nl}Of course, I can simply give this task to another person if you don't want to do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000630
text: Hmm... I am surprised.{nl}I don't know who you are, but why are you working so hard for the refugees?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000631
text: {nl}Well, whatever the case, fine.{nl}If you have decided to accept the task, go fetch me the Orange Grummer legs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000632
text: My men will be able to be treated if you get me those Orange Grummer legs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000633
text: You seem to be more efficient than you look.{nl}If you keep up the good work, I may consider making more personal requests.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000634
text: This is not only my family's land but also land that I have many found memories about.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000635
text: {nl}There is a tree at Atmintis Lot where my brother and I used to see how tall we were.{nl}I wish to retrieve a toy box buried under it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000636
text: {nl}However, it's located where the lad from Joquvas is claiming as his own, so my soldiers cannot go.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000637
text: {nl}I doubt he will be alarmed at you rummaging around.{nl}Could you get that box for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000638
text: {nl}I wish to take it to my ill brother.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000639
text: Good.{nl}I will consider talking to the lad if you get me that box.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000640
text: {nl}I suppose that the tree will still have the marks from when we were young but...{nl}From the state of the trees nearby, I think that it will also be covered in moss.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000641
text: {nl}The fluid of the Red Colimen has strong acidic properties so gather that first.{nl}After that, go and liquidify the moss on the trees and check for any marks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000642
text: {nl}It you find a tree with marks, dig underneath it for a box.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000643
text: Go and get rid of the moss on trees at Atmintis Lot for a tree with marks.{nl}Dig under it to get a box.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000644
text: This brings up memories.{nl}It is the same as I remember it even if it is a bit worn.{nl}I will listen to your request since you have kept your end of the deal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000645
text: {nl}I will send a person to Joquvas.{nl}I will not press any harder if the Joquvas lad refuses to talk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000646
text: Lord Joquvas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000647
text: You lowly thing!{nl}How dare you speak to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000648
text: If you have business worthy of my time, tell it to Roberta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000649
text: Roberta says that it is fine to listen even if it does not effect my decision.{nl}Therefore, I shall listen to what you have to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000650
text: If the refugees wish to receive my help, isn't it correct to recognize me as the rightful owner of this land first?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000651
text: You must go through me if you have anything to say to Lord Joquvas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000652
text: I have taught our lord since he was young.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000653
text: {nl}As such, I have his absolute trust.{nl}You will have to convince me in order to convince our lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000654
text: I keep my promises.{nl}I will convince our lord in order to have a conversation with the other side.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000655
text: However, I don't understand.{nl}Why is a simple traveler so interested in the requests of mere refugees?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000656
text: {nl}It's not like you're a Savior or anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000657
text: Of course, there would have been no doubt about this land belonging to the Joquvas family...{nl}But I suppose there is no choice but to change along with the times.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000658
text: I will convince our lord to be more mindful of the refugees once the new boundaries are settled.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000659
text: Joquvas Guard

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000660
text: Talk to Robertas if you have any business.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000661
text: Don't you dare approach Lord Joquvas!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000662
text: What is this man?{nl}Get back I tell you!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000663
text: Please calm yourself.{nl}Traveler, you must go through me if you have any business with our lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000664
text: I am our lords most humble servant, Roberta.{nl}What is your business?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000665
text: Who do you think you to speak to the lord?{nl}Talk to Roberta if you have any business!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000666
text: Not anyone can simply come to speak to our lord.{nl}You must be seen as worthy of his attention before I consider telling him your business.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000667
text: {nl}It is not too difficult.{nl}Simply go and deal with some pesky Red Colimen and I will consider your request.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000668
text: Go and deal with the Red Colimen.{nl}I shall listen to you after that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000669
text: Good.{nl}Now, shall we listen to what you have to speak of?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000670
text: Negotiations with the representative of Lord Ryudhas... You have brought me an annoying task.{nl}Our lord is embarrassed by the fact that he is facing a man that isn't even an actual lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000671
text: {nl}However, I don't think we can simply ignore this.{nl}I don't think that the refugees recognize the true lord either...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000672
text: {nl}I suppose that we will need to show more solid evidence.{nl}If you bring me what I ask of you, I will consider convincing our lord to listen to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000673
text: You'll be able to see some wreckage near Arcmnys Lake.{nl}It used to be the residence of our grounds keeper.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000674
text: {nl}There should be objects around there with the seal of the Joquvas family there.{nl}We can't go there because of the Ryudhas soldiers, so you'll have to go and retrieve them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000675
text: Look for objects belonging to the Joquvas family near the wreckage at Arcmnys Lake.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000676
text: That is... a shield.{nl}I can confirm that there is a seal of the Joquvas family on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000677
text: {nl}Very good, but this will not be enough.{nl}I believe that you must help with another task before I recognize you as worthy of audience.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000678
text: The Joquvas family always set up Monument made of stone.{nl}We will be able to make the refugees accept the Joquvas family as the rightful rulers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000679
text: {nl}We've found a few places that the monuments might be, but we can't go there.{nl}We can't remove any of the soldiers from guarding our lord because of all the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000680
text: {nl}We don't know when the soldiers from Ryudhas might attack either...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000681
text: {nl}From the look of things, you are skilled enough to protect me if you accompany me while I investigate the Monuments.{nl}Would you mind accompanying me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000682
text: Good. We'll have to check Paccituche Trail, Skalda Road and Lyfetie Cliffs.{nl}Shall we go then?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000683
text: Good work.{nl}The refugees will now know who the rightful owner of this land is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000684
text: {nl}Ah... I will try and talk to our lord about what you have told me.{nl}A promise is a promise.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000685
text: {nl}However, we will only agree to simple conversation.{nl}There is no doubt in the fact that this land belongs to the Joquvas family.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000686
text: There's a slight issue.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000687
text: {nl}Before you came back, the lords started negotiations in the lot just over there.{nl}The atmosphere isn't friendly though...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000688
text: {nl}I think you may want to go and take a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000689
text: The lords are meeting in the lot nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000690
text: I think I had been forgetting something very important while I focused on the land.{nl}We, the Ryudhas family, will support the refugees here with all available resources.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000691
text: I never thought the monsters would be so strong.{nl}Did they not attack us properly the entire time?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000692
text: I don't like it, but I suppose I don't have a choice since we decided on the new boundaries.{nl}There will be no more fighting with the Ryudhas family.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000693
text: Roberta should now how to take care of the refugees.{nl}I will listen to Roberta's advice as always.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000694
text: My men... All of them have perished!{nl}I owe my life to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000695
text: {nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000696
text: I never thought the monsters would be so strong!{nl}Thank the goddesses I didn't bring Roberta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000697
text: Yes... This is not the time for us to argue over the land.{nl}We must stand together and fight back the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000698
text: It is as you have told me.{nl}We will be able to focus on ruling our land since the boundaries have been set.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000699
text: While I do think that this is my family's land...{nl}I suppose one should know how to take a step back under such circumstances.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000700
text: {nl}Ah well.{nl}I will negotiate with the Ryudhas about the new boundaries.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000701
text: The negotiations are over.{nl}We have decided to use this road as the boundary.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000702
text: {nl}We have decided to take care of the refugees now that the conflict has been settled.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000703
text: The lad is more agreeable than I thought he would be.{nl}We have decided to care for the refugees since the new boundary has been set.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000704
text: We will install notifications on the new boundary.{nl}I think that setting one at Pastoghe Bend, Collegia Crossing and Paccituche Trail should be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000705
text: {nl}You have done well as mediator.{nl}I give my word that I will take care of the refugees.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000706
text: I don't like the results, but what can be done?{nl}The Ryudhas also had some good points in their arguements.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000707
text: The Kugheri Tribe and demons...{nl}Investigating Syla Forest has become much more dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000708
text: What I am attempting to do has the lives of many people on the line.{nl}However, it is... extremely difficult. I would appreciate it if I could get some help but...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000709
text: I can't believe I am receiving the help of a Revelator here. It seems as if the Goddesses have not forsaken the Kingdom yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000710
text: I think that the ancient knowledge from the Royal Mausoleum of Taniel the Second will help the reconstruction of the Kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000711
text: Vhalterris was a powerful and tenacious demon.{nl}I doubt that anyone other than the Revelators would have been able to take Vhalterris down.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000712
text: There shouldn't be anything in Taniel the Second's Royal Mausoleum fit for demons to go after...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000713
text: {nl}I can't fathom what they wanted from that place...{nl}Simply the interferance of the Kingdom's reconstruction? The assumption that a Revelator would be there?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000714
text: Hmm?{nl}You must be quite skilled to make it this far.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000715
text: {nl}My name is Indraja, an adventurer.{nl}I have received a request to go and investigate places where the refugees might stay while the Kingdom is being reconstructed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000716
text: {nl}I never thought that I would run into demons here.{nl}My bodyguard, Marcus, was wounded while protecting me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000717
text: {nl}I would like to prevent the monsters from getting closer.{nl}Could you please help us a bit?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000718
text: Thank you.{nl}We sprinkled liquid that the Kugheri Tribe dislikes, but it doesn't seem to be enough.{nl}We have the ingredients to make more, but we are out of water.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000719
text: {nl}It is said that the Syla Dandelion holds dew in it's flowers.{nl}Could you please gather the dew from the flowers?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000720
text: Please bring me the dew from Syla Dandelions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000721
text: Thank you.{nl}We'll be able to rest a bit easier thanks to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000722
text: While I realize that this may be rude... I must ask... {nl}Looking at your skill and appearance... Are you a Revelator?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000723
text: I thought you might be.{nl}I have heard many stories.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000724
text: {nl}This is an honor.{nl}If you are a Revelator, I should tell you my real mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000725
text: Marcus

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000726
text: Do not approach...!{nl}This person is on an important mission!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000727
text: The Kugheri Tribe...{nl}They have become much stronger in such short time...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000728
text: I have heard many rumors...{nl}I hope that you will find it in your heart to help...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000729
text: You are already being trusted by many people...{nl}You will be able to earn the trust of Royalty if you help with this mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000730
text: Let me introduce myself once more.{nl}I am not an adventurer.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000731
text: {nl}I am here on the orders of General Lhamin who is attempting to reconstruct the Kingdom.{nl}It is to find Taniel the Second's Royal Mausoleum which is rumored to be in Syla Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000732
text: {nl}Marcus is an officer here to protect me but he has been wounded.{nl}Please, could you help me finish my mission?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000733
text: Thank you.{nl}We were attacked by the Kugheri on behalf of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000734
text: We knew that they didn't like humans, but we didn't know that they would attack us with such numbers.{nl}They must have made an agreement with the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000735
text: {nl}They are sure to be searching for us nearby.{nl}Please reduce their numbers a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000736
text: General Lhamin is trying to reconstruct the Kingdom.{nl}He wishes to utilize anything possible to do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000737
text: {nl}He had come across a legend that had been passed down by Royalty.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000738
text: {nl}It is said that Taniel the Second had created another Royal Mausoleum.{nl}It is said that much information was stored there to prepare for some sort of catastrophe.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000739
text: {nl}The General firmly believes that the information stored there will be of great help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000740
text: {nl}It is said that you must be of Royal descent in order to find the Royal Mausoleum's entrance.{nl}That's why I have been honorably chosen as a far relative of the Royalty.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000741
text: {nl}However, I never thought that the demons would be searching for the Royal Mausoleum as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000742
text: {nl}There were two demons, but I spread misinformation and made one to to Emmet Forest.{nl}The other followed us here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000743
text: {nl}We wouldn't have been able to continue on our mission if we hadn't met you here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000744
text: Please deal with the Kugheri Zeuni and Kugheri Zabbi that are after us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000745
text: Thank you.{nl}However, we won't be able to rest easy until we deal with the demon behind them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000746
text: You have something for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000747
text: {nl}...{nl}These are the orders from the demon!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000748
text: {nl}I don't know how the Kugheri were able to read this.{nl}I have learned of their language, so let me take a look and try to make something of it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000749
text: I wasn't able to decipher the orders you brought me.{nl}I am sure that there are more orders...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000750
text: {nl}Maybe I'll be able to make sense of them if I am able to compare and contrast the letters.{nl}I'm sorry, but could you please get me more of the demon's orders?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000751
text: Thank you. You said that you gathered them from the Kugheri Zabbi?{nl}Please get me more of them from the Kugheri Zabbi on the road to Stabhas Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000752
text: The Kugheri Zabbi should have more orders.{nl}I might be able to make some sense of it with more references.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000753
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll try to figure out what the demon was scheming.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000754
text: I've looked at all of the material you brought me.{nl}Where to begin...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000755
text: {nl}It is said that the demon going after the Royal Mausoleum is called Vhalterris.{nl}Unlike his colleague, he has been chasing us quite cleverly.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000756
text: {nl}Marcus allowed us to both escape but...{nl}We lost a chest related to the Royal Mausoleum's secret.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000757
text: {nl}According to these orders, it seems as if he has yet to unravel the secret held within that chest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000758
text: {nl}Revelator.{nl}I know that this is a difficult request, but could you please retrieve that chest for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000759
text: Thank you.{nl}He seems to be wondering around Apeighos Altar since he was unable to unravel the secret.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000760
text: Please retrieve the chest after defeating Vhalterris.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000761
text: Thank you.{nl}We've been able to get the chest back and remove the demon at the same time thanks to you!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000762
text: Now we'll be able to focus on searching for the entrance.{nl}However, there is something more I should tell you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000763
text: {nl}We will only be able to find the entrance if we solve various puzzles.{nl}The chest you brought back is the start of the puzzles.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000764
text: {nl}An important clue is stored in the chest you retrieved, but it will not simply open.{nl}We will have to learn how to open it with the five colors on this lock.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000765
text: {nl}According to legend, there are five trees near the hidden entrance of the Royal Mausoleum, and those trees will indicate different colors.{nl}I can't leave Marcus behind, so could you please survey the trees instead?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000766
text: Here, take this engraving and map.{nl}This engraving, which has the Royal Seal, is said to have magic infused on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000767
text: {nl}It is said to be part of a set with the box and will react to the trees there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000768
text: {nl}The map is supposed to have the location of the trees marked on it.{nl}Go to each tree marked on the map and see which colors it reacts to.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000769
text: Go to the trees marked on the map and use the Royal Seal to see how they react to each tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000770
text: I sent Marcus back to Fedimian since he recovered enough to travel by himself.{nl}How is your investigation going?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000771
text: {nl}Red... and blue...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000772
text: {nl}Ah...!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000773
text: {nl}Of course!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000774
text: {nl}I think I know how to open it!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000775
text: The chest has opened!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000776
text: {nl}Let's see here... There's a stone slate.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000777
text: {nl}Let me see what it says.{nl}Hmm...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000778
text: Grasp the time at which you are granted audience with the King.{nl}The guardian will appear as the King looks down upon your last light.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000779
text: {nl}Ah... This seems to be another riddle.{nl}We should go to Lykhas Crossroads since it's mentioned in the records and go see what can be found.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000780
text: There was a bit more content on the slate...{nl}It seems as if it requires the blood from royalty to be read.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000781
text: {nl}I suppose this was the reason they needed royalty to find the entrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000782
text: {nl}However, the seal seems to be damaged since it has been passed down for generations.{nl}It seems to have consumed all of it's magic when you where investigating the trees.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000783
text: {nl}We'll have to look for a way to recharge the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000784
text: All that's left is to find the Royal Mausoleum's entrance since we've seen the guardian.{nl}Please stick around a little bit more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000785
text: I don't know too much about how it's working, but I do think that it's impressive they created such seals a few hundred years ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000786
text: I was able to finish General Lhamin's mission thanks to you.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000787
text: We'll need to reseal this Royal Mausoleum to prevent it from falling into the wrong hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000788
text: I have no idea on how to recharge the magic though...{nl}Do you have any good ideas?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000789
text: Will that work?{nl}I somehow feel as if this isn't your first time doing this...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000790
text: {nl}Well, let's try your idea then.{nl}Please fill the seal with Kugheri Tribe souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000791
text: Please fill the seal with Kugheri Tribe souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000792
text: However, we can't go into the Royal Mausoleum like this.{nl}We'll need to report back to the General and get a proper survey team here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000793
text: {nl}Leaving the entrance open like this won't do though...{nl}We shoul reseal the entrance now that we know where it's exact location is now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000794
text: {nl}Could you help me a bit more?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000795
text: We can't use the Royal Seal to reseal the entrance...{nl}Especially since there's a risk of it being destroyed...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000796
text: {nl}We'll have to find something to replace it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000797
text: {nl}The Kugheri Numani carry staffs adorned with bells that they use for their rituals.{nl}I'm sure that the bells have some sort of power that allows them to use their magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000798
text: {nl}I'll look for a way to reseal the entrance while you gather the staffs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000799
text: Please gather me the staffs from the Kugheri Numani from the surrounding area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000800
text: Good job.{nl}I hope this works...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000801
text: {nl}I hope the staffs you gathered will contain enough magic...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000802
text: It worked!{nl}The Royal Mausoleum entrance has been resealed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000803
text: {nl}I wasn't sure if this would work.{nl}I'll be able to return and report without worrying too much now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000804
text: The entrance has been resealed.{nl}However, there are still a few of the Kugheri Tribe that know where the entrance is located.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000805
text: {nl}We need to make sure that the location doesn't get into the hands of any demons.{nl}Please make sure there aren't any loose ends.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000806
text: There will still be some Kugheri that followed Vhalterris.{nl}Please deal with them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000807
text: It seems as if most of the Kugheri that had followed Vhalterris have been dealt with.{nl}Please make sure that there are no more loose ends and deal with the rest of the Kugheri Tribe.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000808
text: This information must be kept from getting into the hands of the demons.{nl}Please prevent the Kugheri Tribe from talking.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000809
text: Good job.{nl}However, there are still some Kugheri that had followed Vhalterris.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000810
text: It may seem a bit extreme, but they brought this upon themselves when they decided to cooperate with the demons.{nl}Anyhow, this should be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000811
text: {nl}The Kugheri Tribe here will not be able to talk so easily now...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000812
text: {nl}It seems as if I keep owing you.{nl}If you ever get the chance to see General Lhamin, please remember to stop by and say hello.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000813
text: Investigation Team Leader Ella

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000814
text: What... what is a traveler doing here?{nl}I don't know how you came here but this place is too dangerous. Please leave at once.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000815
text: I don't know if what my men and I are doing here mean anything...{nl}There are many more important things but... I'm following orders here but...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000816
text: I suppose there's no choice but to quickly retrieve what we've came for before heading back.{nl}I'll happily accept any help you can offer.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000817
text: I don't have the faintest clue as to why goblins might want parchment.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000818
text: I had no idea that there would be such a monster threatening the goblins.{nl}Whatever the case may be, we were able to finish up quickly thanks to your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000819
text: I think the end of this mission is in sight.{nl}We'll start preparing to head back as soon as all of my men get back.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000820
text: Investigator Gasper

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000821
text: Shh...! Quiet!{nl}Do you want to be found by the goblins?!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000822
text: I don't know how I got into this situation...{nl}How am I supposed to retrieve anything from that mess of monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000823
text: I'll at least have something to show Ellas thanks to you.{nl}I appreciate the help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000824
text: Now all we have to figure out is how to get out of here with these books...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000825
text: Investigator Horatio

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000826
text: I'm sure that there are a lot of books just waiting under this roof...{nl}All of this will mean nothing if we aren't able to take a look at what is there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000827
text: Are you sure you're where you should be?{nl}Those green goblins are dangerous. Please be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000828
text: I was able to investigate the building thanks to your help.{nl}Thank you once again.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000829
text: It appears that the goblins don't wander around inside too much.{nl}Of course, that is what allowed me to do some actual investigating...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000830
text: I need to... protect... Dalia...{nl}But I can't move properly...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000831
text: This cursed engraving on my right arm will keep evil energy flowing into my body{nl}unless I decide to give up my current form.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000832
text: Gesti may have been defeated, but the power of chaos will return to obscure me.{nl}When it does, Giltine will seek me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000833
text: That decision was made because I could not bear to place this place and the Kupoles protecting me in danger.{nl}Please do not be sad on my behalf...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000834
text: I am sure that Goddess Dalia is thankful for your actions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000835
text: No... Dalia... Dalia...!!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000836
text: Alembique Tales(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000837
text: Tell me what happened and I will help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000838
text: What is it?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000839
text: Why was the mercenary group formed?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000840
text: Alembique Tales(2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000841
text: I will help you. Just calm down.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000842
text: No more talk can be done with Heranda, it seems.{nl}Find other people heading Engoa Stalactite Cave.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000843
text: Alembique Tales(3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000844
text: I have heard it from Heranda.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000845
text: Alembique Tales(4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000846
text: Mercenary Heranda has disappeared.{nl}Search the vicinity for his trace.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000847
text: Alembique Tales(5)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000848
text: It's not a good idea to spread out.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000849
text: Alembique Tales(6)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000850
text: I will find it. Just hold on.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000851
text: There must be some other way.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000852
text: Commanding Officer Gigho has disappeared.{nl}Report to Priest Celvica.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000853
text: Alembique Tales(7)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000854
text: I will find Edeline.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000855
text: Alembique Tales(8)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000856
text: Priest Celvica has left to find Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta.{nl}Find Alta before something happens.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000857
text: A Legend's Reality

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000858
text: I need an indulgence!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000859
text: The price of life

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000860
text: I will check it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000861
text: Legs must work properly

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000862
text: Say that it will be safe enough

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000863
text: Giving herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000864
text: There is something suspicious about the mysterious hunter.{nl}Go and ask him about what really happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000865
text: Trap after trap(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000866
text: Trap after trap(2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000867
text: Poison will be strong enough

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000868
text: I don't know if it will be useful

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000869
text: Say that you are prepared to face any challenge

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000870
text: Say that you do not want to be involved in anything complicated

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000871
text: Ask about the beast's identity

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000872
text: Complicated Preparations(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000873
text: Ask what ingredients are needed

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000874
text: Complicated Preparations(2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000875
text: Say that you will be fine on your own

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000876
text: Complicated Preparations(3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000877
text: To trap a beast(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000878
text: To trap a beast(2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000879
text: Beast's End(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_000880
text: Beast's End(2)

text: Missing Child

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001009
text: So, where should I search?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001010
text: There surely must be someone else you could ask for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001011
text: Things needed to repair the tent

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001012
text: How could I get the thread?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001013
text: Well, sorry I cannot help you on that. How asking about someone else?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001014
text: Thank me later. Just tell me how to find the threads.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001015
text: Refugees of Mishekan Forest(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001016
text: What can I do for you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001017
text: It's your problem, isn't it?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001018
text: Refugees of Mishekan Forest(2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001019
text: How do I secure the lumbers for fences?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001020
text: You are on your own now.

text: Refugees of Mishekan Forest(3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001022
text: I will help you repair Stake Stockades.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001023
text: Well, good luck.

text: Refugees of Mishekan Forest(4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001025

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001026
text: How do I get Randulin Grass.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001027
text: Good to know.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001028
text: Refugees of Mishekan Forest(6)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001029
text: I will bring them back.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001030
text: Refugees of Mishekan Forest(7)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001031
text: I give you my word on driving the monsters off of the farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001032
text: Perhaps, that farm was not meant for you. How about starting anew?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001033
text: Forgotten Refugees

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001034
text: I will go get some help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001035
text: Explaining the situation of Mishekan Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001036
text: Informing news was delivered to Uska

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001037
text: Alembique Tales

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001038
text: Talk to Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001039
text: Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta is looking some help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001040
text: Find the Gigho Mercenaries

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001041
text: Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta asked you to find the Gigho Mercenaries in Alembique Cave.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001042
text: Talk to Mercenary Heranda

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001043
text: Talk to nervous Mercenary Heranda

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001044
text: The monsters are chasing after Mercenary Heranda. You cannot see such monsters but defeat monsters to comfort Mercenary Heranda.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001045
text: You've defeated the nearby monsters enough. Go and comfort Mercenary Heranda.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001046
text: Defeat nearby monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001047
text: Go to Priest Celvica

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001048
text: Find Priest Celvica in the area told by Mercenary Heranda

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001049
text: Return to Mercenary Heranda

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001050
text: Priest Celvica says Mercenary Heranda must not be left alone. Bring Heranda back here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001051
text: Find Traces of Mercenary Heranda

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001052
text: You've brought Heranda as Priest Celvica asked you to but Heranda vanished. Find traces of Heranda.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001053
text: Talk with Priest Celvica

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001054
text: You have not found Mercenary Heranda but found the traces. Return to Priest Celvica.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001055
text: Priest Celvica is waiting for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001056
text: Defeat Cave Ravinelarva

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001057
text: Based on the note of Heranda, Priest Celvica has figured out a way to survive the mysterious living thing. For everyone's safety, defeat Cave Ravinelarva.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001058
text: You've successfully defeated Cave Ravinelarva like Priest Celvica. Return to Celvica.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001059
text: Find the officer group

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001060
text: Priest Celvica figured out the location of the mercenaries based on Heranda's note. Go to the place told by Celvica.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001061
text: Talk to Commanding Officer Gigho

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001062
text: Commanding Officer Gigho ins great peril.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001063
text: Retrieve Mecenary Company Antidote

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001064
text: Commanding Officer Gigho is unable to move due to the injury sustained by Ravinepede. He asks you to retrieve the antidotes lost in the heat of battle from the nearby monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001065
text: Return to Commanding Officer Gigho

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001066
text: You've retrieved Mecenary Company Antidote from Commanding Officer Gigho. Return to Gigho.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001067
text: Retrieve %s from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001068
text: Return to Priest Celvica

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001069
text: Gigho has disappeared. Tell this fact to Priest Celvica.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001070
text: Find Traces of Edeline

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001071
text: Priest Celvica begs you to find Edeline in the area told by Commanding Officer Gigho

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001072
text: You've defeated Ravinepede. A necklace, presumably belong to Edeline, has been found. Return to Priest Celvica.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001073
text: Talk to Priest Celvica

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001074
text: Find Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001075
text: Priest Celvica cannot accept the fate of the loved one. Celvica says Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta has something to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001076
text: Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta is looking for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001077
text: Find the Alembique Cave Scriptures

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001078
text: Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta wants to prevent any further casualties and investigate what happened in Alembique Cave thoroughly. Go to Alembique Cave and find something like records

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001079
text: You've found enough info about Alembique Cave. Report the findings to Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001080
text: Collect Stalactite Chunks

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001081
text: Alembique CaveKedora Alliance Merchant Alta says the Stalactite chunks obtained from Alembique Cave can reveal the mystery behind this area. Collect Stalactite chunks from Alembique Cave by defeating the monsters there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001082
text: You've obtained enough stalactite chucks by defeating monsters. Return to Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001083
text: Obtain %s by defeating monsters in Alembique Cave

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001084
text: Remove the mysterious demon device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001085
text: Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta wants you to remove the mysterious Demon Device that is thought to be the magic medium in Alembique Cave.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001086
text: You've destroyed the mysterious Demon Device enough. Return to Alta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001087
text: Talk to Refugee Brandon

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001088
text: Brandon is injured and cannot move. Ask how you can help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001089
text: Collect Whitetailed Grass from Turas Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001090
text: Brandon seems to have injured his leg by getting it stuck on a trap. Collect Whitetailed Grass from Turas Lot which will help relieve his pain.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001091
text: You have collected enough Whitetailed Grass. Go and give it to Brandon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001092
text: Collect %s from the surrounding area

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001093
text: Traps and more traps

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001094
text: Deal with the trapped monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001095
text: You have been caught in a trap. You must deal with the monsters that are in the trap with you as they have become violent.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001096
text: Deal with the violent monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001097
text: Getting out of the trap

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001098
text: You have dealed with all of the monsters but are still trapped. Wait until the mysterious hunter disarms the trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001099
text: Track the mysterious hunter

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001100
text: According to Refugee Brandon, the mysterious hunter is planning something in the forest. Track him in order to find out the truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001101
text: Track the mysterious hunter

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001102
text: You have received treatment from the mysterious hunter. He told you to follow him if you wish to learn the truth behind the rumors. Follow him to his hideout.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001103
text: Talk with the mysterious hunter

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001104
text: You have succeeded in following the mysterious hunter to his hideout. Listen to his side of the story.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001105
text: Talk to Vilhelmas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001106
text: Vilhelmas seems to require help in defeating the beast. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001107
text: Defeat the monsters indicated by Vilhelmas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001108
text: Vilhelmas wishes to test your skills in order to prevent any unnecessary casualties. Show your skills by defeating the Kugheri in the surrounding area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001109
text: You have completed all the tasks Vilhelmas set you. Return and report back to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001110
text: Defeat the Kugheri in the surrounding area

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001111
text: Complicated Preparations

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001112
text: It seems like Vilhelmas is looking for a good way to deal with the beast. Ask if you can help him with preparations.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001113
text: Collect stimulated poison sacks from Kugheri Tots

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001114
text: Vilhelmas is trying to prepare poison arrows to deal a devastating blow to the beast. Collect the stimulated poison sacks he has requested.{nl}You will be able to collect them from Vilhelmas Tots after spraying them with stimulant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001115
text: You have collected enough poison sacks. Hand them over to Vilhelmas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001116
text: Vilhelmas seems to need some more ingredients to craft the poison. Ask him what else he requires.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001117
text: Lead Vilhelmas to the Yellow Wolfsbane

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001118
text: Vilhelmas says that he has to collect the Yellow Wolfsbane himself. Lead him to where the Yellow Wolfsbane has bloomed near Saalmas Falls.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001119
text: You have collected all the required ingredients. Go and talk to Vilhelmas at his hideout.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001120
text: You don't have enough materials to craft the traps. Ask Vilhelmas what he needs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001121
text: Collect paralysis poison from Kugheri Somys

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001122
text: He requires paralysis poison for the trap. Defeat Kugheri Somy in order to take their paralysis poison.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001123
text: You have collected enough paralysis poison. Give it to Vilhelmas in order to craft a trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001124
text: Collect %s from Kugheri Somy

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001125
text: To trap a beast

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001126
text: Vilhelmas seems to have crafted the trap. Ask him how he plans to use it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001127
text: Setting the trap

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001128
text: Vilhelmas has asked you to set the trap on the way to Saalmas Falls from Tredhalai Stream. Hide after setting all three traps.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001129
text: Waiting for the beast

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001130
text: You have set all of the traps. Wait for the beast to come.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001131
text: Pursuing the beast

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001132
text: The beast has run away from Vilhelmas to Absuptas Plateau. Follow Vilhelmas who is in pursuit of the beast.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001133
text: The Beast's Final Stand

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001134
text: Critically Wounding the Beast

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001135
text: The cornered beast has begun to attack. Critically wound the beast with Vilhelmas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001136
text: Vilhelmas seems to have been wounded. Ask him about his wounds.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001137
text: Vilhelmas is unable to pursue the beast any further. Try talking to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001138
text: Defeat the beast

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001139
text: The beast seems to have run towards Vaighe Hill after being critically wounded. Go and finish the fight.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001140
text: You have defeated the beast. Go and tell this to Vilhelmas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001141
text: Defeat the beast of Emmet Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001142
text: Talk to Refugee Mylija

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001143
text: Refugee Mylija is worrying about where to go for help. Ask her what the problem may be.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001144
text: Obtain Leafnut Tailfruits

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001145
text: Mylija has asked you to gather Leafnut Tailfruits to use as temporary food. Defeat the Yellow Leafnuts and gather their Tailfruits.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001146
text: You have gathered enough to feed the refugees. Give the food to Mylija.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001147
text: Defeat the Yellow Leafnuts and collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001148
text: Talk to Refugee Greg

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001149
text: Refugee Greg seems to be very concerned about the monsters in the surrounding area. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001150
text: Collect Hard Wooden Sticks

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001151
text: Greg says that they must find a way to protect themselves as they cannot expect any help from the lords. Collect Hard Wooden Sticks to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001152
text: This should be good enough to use as a weapon against weak monsters. Give them to Greg.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001153
text: Refugee Mylija seems that this will not be enough. Ask her how she plans to deal with the problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001154
text: Getting the two lords to agree to talk

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001155
text: Mylija seems to think that the only way the forest will become safe is for the two lords to stop bickering. Persuade both Lord Ryudhas and Joquvas to agree to have a conversation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001156
text: You have succeeded in pursuading both lords. Tell Mylija the good news.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001157
text: Persuading Lord Ryudhas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001158
text: Talk to Lord Ryudhas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001159
text: Lord Ryudhas seems to dislike the fact that there is a stranger walking about. Tell him why you have come.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001160
text: Dig up Pystis Grass Roots

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001161
text: Ryudhas has requested that in return for him agreeing to listen to you, you must gather Pystis Grass Roots to help his poisoned men. Dig up Pystis Grass Roots from the surrounding area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001162
text: You have gathered enough Roots for Ryudhas's men. Give him the Roots.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001163
text: It seems as if more is needed to stop the plague from spreading. Ask Lord Ryudhas what else you will have to bring.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001164
text: Collect Orange Grummer legs

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001165
text: It seems as if you will need to grind and mix the Orange Grummer legs to the roots in order to craft the antidote. Collect Orange Grummer legs from the surrounding area and hand them over to Lord Ryudhas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001166
text: You have obtained an ample amount of legs. Give them to Lord Ryudhas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001167
text: Collect %s by defeating Orange Grummer

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001168
text: Lord Ryudhas seems to have one final task to ask of you. Listen to what he has to request and get him to agree to have a conversation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001169
text: Dig up the Toy Box from beneath the marked tree

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001170
text: Ryudhas wishes to retrieve a Toy Box from his youth. He said that it was beneath a marked tree, but you must remove the moss from the trees in order to find the marked tree. Gather Red Colimen fluid from the surrounding area in order to get rid of the moss and find the marked tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001171
text: You have found the Toy Box that Lord Ryudhas was looking for. Give it to him and make him agree to having a conversation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001172
text: Dig up %s from beneath the marked tree

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001173
text: Persuade Lord Joquvas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001174
text: Talk to Lord Joquvas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001175
text: Talk to Lord Joquvas as the refugees have requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001176
text: Talk to Roberta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001177
text: Roberta will listen to what you have to say instead of Lord Joquvas who is raging. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001178
text: It seems as if everything must go through Roberta to get to Lord Joquvas. Listen to what she has to request first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001179
text: Defeat the Red Colimen

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001180
text: Roberta has requested that you defeat the Red Colimen in the surrounding area if you wish to make a request to Lord Joquvas. Defeat the Red Colimen in the surrounding area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001181
text: You have succeeded in defeating the requested number of Red Colimen. Now go and talk to Roberta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001182
text: Defeat %s as Roberta requested

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001183
text: Roberta seems to care more about the refugees recognizing Lord Joquvas as the owner of the land than their well being. Ask her what she wants.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001184
text: Search the ruins at Arcmnys Lake for the shield

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001185
text: Roberta says that there is a building at Arcmnys Lake where the groundkeeper hired by the Joquvas family used to stay. Look for objects with the seal of the Joquvas family.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001186
text: You have found a shield with the seal of the Joquvas family. Take it back to Roberta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001187
text: Roberta seems to think that the shield will not be enough to convince the refugees. Ask Roberta what else needs to be found.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001188
text: Go and check the Monument with Roberta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001189
text: Roberta says that monuments raised by the Joquvas family in the area will be good enough to prove that they are the rightful owners. Go and check the monuments at Paccituche Trail, Skalda Road and Lyfetie Cliffs with her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001190
text: You have checked all of the monuments. Now ask Roberta to make Lord Joquvas agree to a conversation between the two lords.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001191
text: It looks as if the conversation isn't going too well. Ask Refugee Mylija about what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001192
text: Go to where the two lords are having a conversation

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001193
text: Mylija says that the two lords have started talking but doesn't think that it is going well. Go and see what is happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001194
text: Follow the two lords

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001195
text: The two lords have led their men to where the monsters are attacking. Go and follow them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001196
text: Save the two lords from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001197
text: The two lords are in danger after losing all of their men. Defeat all of the monsters attacking them and save them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001198
text: The two lords have managed to survive. Talk to Lord Ryudhas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001199
text: Defeat the monsters attacking the two lords

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001200
text: Lord Ryudhas seems to have had a change of heart. Try persuading him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001201
text: Lord Ryudhas has agreed to make a settlement if Lord Joquvas is willing to cooperate. Ask Lord Joquvas about his intentions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001202
text: The two lords have agreed to set a new boundary. Listen to Lord Ryudhas about the details.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001203
text: Talk to Indraja

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001204
text: Adventurer Indraja seems to be hiding from the monsters with an injured colleague. Ask her if there is anything you can do to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001205
text: Collect dew from Slya Dandelions

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001206
text: Indraja says that she requires water to craft a potion to ward off the monsters. Gather dew from the Syla Dandelions for her to use instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001207
text: This should be enough water for her to craft a potion. Give the dew to Indraja.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001208
text: Collect %s from the surrounding area

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001209
text: Indraja has figured out that you are a Revelator and is asking you to help her and the Kingdom. Listen to what she has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001210
text: Defeat Kugheri Zeuni and Kugheri Zabbi in the surrounding area

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001211
text: Indraja has asked you to defeat the Kugheri Tribe chasing after her on the orders of the demons. Defeat the Kugheri Zabbi and Zeuni in the surrounding area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001212
text: You have defeated all of the Kugheri Tribe in the immediate vicinity. Go back to Indraja.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001213
text: Defeat the Kugheri Zabbi and Zeuni

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001214
text: You have found orders written by demons on the body of a Kugheri Zabbi. Indraja might know what it is about so take try to take it to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001215
text: Indraja seems to have failed at interpretting the orders you brought her. However, she seems to have an idea of what to do next. Try talking to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001216
text: Obtain more demon orders from the Kugheri Zabbi

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001217
text: Indraja thinks she will be able to interpret the orders if she has more reference material. Go and gather her more orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001218
text: You have gathered enough orders for Indraja. Give them to her for her to interpret.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001219
text: Obtain %s from the Kugheri Zabbi

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001220
text: Indraja seems to have been able to figure out what the demons were after. Ask her what the next step of the plan is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001221
text: Defeat Vhalterris and retrieve the Royal Mausoleum's chest

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001222
text: Indraja says that you must defeat Vhalterris and retrieve the Royal Mausoleum's chest in order to continue the search for the entrance. Find Vhalterris at Apeighos Altar and defeat him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001223
text: You have succeeded in defeating Vhalterris and retrieving the Royal Mausoleum's chest. Return to Indraja and give her the chest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001224
text: Indraja is trying to open the chest you retrieved. Ask if you can help her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001225
text: Find the trees and see how the seal reacts

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001226
text: Indraja says that she requires hints regarding the colors. Go to the trees marked on the map she gave you and check how the Royal Seal reacts.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001227
text: You have seen the trees shining in five different colors. Tell Indraja what you have seen.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001228
text: Indraja seems to have found another clue thanks to the stone slate that was in the chest. Ask her what she has learned.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001229
text: Investigate Lykhas Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001230
text: Indraja says that the slate had the a location marked on it as well as unreadable letters. Go with her to Lykhas Crossroads in order to make sense of what the letters mean. You will be able to check what the letters are by reading her note.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001231
text: Observe the device's reaction

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001232
text: The King's statue is reacting to something. Continue observing it to see what will happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001233
text: You have found the pillar which was mentioned as the guardian. Talk to Indraja who is in front of the pillar.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001234
text: Indraja seems to be pondering on how to prove she is part of the royal family. Try talking with her to see if there is a good method to do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001235
text: Absorb Kugheri souls with the Royal Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001236
text: Indraja has asked you to charge the Royal Seal with magic. Defeat the Kugheri and use the Royal Seal to absorb their souls to recharge it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001237
text: It seems as if the Royal Seal has been recharged. Return the Royal Seal to Indraja.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001238
text: You have successfully found the Royal Mausoleum's entrance but cannot go any further. Ask Indraja what the next part in her plan is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001239
text: Collect Kugheri Numani Staffs

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001240
text: Indraja wishes to reseal the Royal Mausoleum's entrance. Go and gather Kugheri Numani Staffs as it is too risky to use the Royal Seal any further.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001241
text: You have collected enough staffs to reseal the Royal Mausoleum's entrance. Give her the staffs so that she can reseal the entrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001242
text: Obtain %s from the Kugheri Numani

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001243
text: Indraja has resealed the Royal Mausoleum's entrance but is worried about the fact that there are still those that know about it's location. Talk to her to see what should be done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001244
text: Deal with the Kugheri Tribe

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001245
text: Indraja says that leaving Kugheri that know about the entrance's location is a loose end. Deal with the Kugheri Tribe as she requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001246
text: You have dealed with enough Kugheri. Return to Indraja and tell her that she doesn't need to worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001247
text: Deal with the Kugheri Tribe

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001248
text: Marks of a Legend

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001249
text: Talk to Aquilas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001250
text: Talk to Aquilas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001251
text: Gather vegetation from the surrounding area

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001252
text: Help Aquilas by gathering vegetation from the surrounding area

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001253
text: Talk to Mechen

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001254
text: Talk to Mechen

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001255
text: Talk to Woognis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001256
text: Talk to Woognis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001257
text: Gather foul smelling Vilkas fur

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001258
text: Woognis is having difficulties searching for the Flechette as there is a Vilkas nest in the way. Woognis believes that it will be safer if he is covered in foul smelling Vilkas fur. Gather foul smelling Vilkas fur for Woognis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001259
text: Gather %s by defeating Vilkas Archers

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001260
text: Search the Vilkas nest

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001261
text: Searching the Vilkas nest is proving to be difficult as the monsters are wary. Use the foul smelling Vilkas fur to fool the monsters and search for the Flechette.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001262
text: Find Jenonhas at Kainen Crossing

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001263
text: Woognis says that Jenonhas is at Kainen Crossing. Go to Kainen Crossing and ask Jenonhas about how the search is going.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001264
text: Talk to Jenonhas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001265
text: Talk to Jenonhas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001266
text: Return to Mechen's camp

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001267
text: Return to Mechen's camp and stop Jenonhas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001268
text: Talk to the Fletcher Master

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001269
text: Obtain Romplenuka magic essence

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001270
text: Romplenuka magic essence is required to craft the Flechette Detection Device. Defeat Romplenuka in order to obtain their magic essence

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001271
text: Defeat Romplenuka and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001272
text: Obtain Vilkas essence

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001273
text: It is said that Vilkas essence is required to control the Romplenuka essence. Defeat Vilkas in order to obtain their essence

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001274
text: Defeat Vilkas and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001275
text: Find the Flechette by using the Flechette Detection Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001276
text: Find the Flechette with the Flechette Detection Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001277
text: Maven's Wishes

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001278
text: Talk to Priest Lintas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001279
text: Talk to Priest Lintas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001280
text: Find the documents on dispelling transformation magic

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001281
text: Retrieve the documents that have been scattered due to the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001282
text: Find %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001283
text: Find the Orb by using the Orb of Vigor

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001284
text: The Orb required to disarm the seal has been taken by the monsters. Priest Lintas suggests using the Orb of Vigor in order to find the Orb. Magic will flow towards the Orb from the Orb of Vigor when used. Follow the magic from the Orb of Vigor.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001285
text: Follow Priest Lintas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001286
text: Priest Lintas has found King Kadumel's Monument. Follow Priest Lintas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001287
text: Find King Kadumel's Monument with Priest Lintas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001288
text: Priest Lintas wishes to search for King Kadumel's second Monument. Go and search for the monument with him. Priest Lintas will search for the monument if you take him to Ackatin Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001289
text: Gather Mittelly Herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001290
text: Priest Lintas is showing paralysis symptoms because of the spores from the bracken covering the monument. You will have to gather Mittelly Herbs in order to reduce the symptoms. Gather Mittelly Herbs from Ausne Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001291
text: Obtain Vilkas's dry skin

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001292
text: You must burn the braken from near the Monument because of the spores. Burn the braken with Vilkas's dry skin.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001293
text: Burn the bracken

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001294
text: Burn the bracken by using Vilkas's dry skin.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001295
text: Find King Kadumel's Monument with the detector

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001296
text: Priest Lintas seems to still be suffering from the effects of the bracken spore. Go and find King Kadumel's Monument with the detector in his place.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001297
text: You have found something that looks like a Monument. Return to Priest Lintas and tell him about your findings.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001298
text: Talk to Priest Lintas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001299
text: Find fragmenst from King Kadumel's third Monument

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001300
text: You have found King Kadumel's third Monument, but it is too damaged to read what is on it. You must find it's fragments in order to make sense of what is written on it. Search the surrounding area in order to find it's fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001301
text: Weeding

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001302
text: Talk to Priest Kidas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001303
text: Talk to Priest Kidas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001304
text: Gather Vilkas salivary glands

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001305
text: It is difficult to see what is written on King Kadumel's Monument as it is covered in vegetation. Try removing the vegetation by using a potion. You will be able to obtain Vilkas salivary glands by feeding them Mytiharyn Grass. Feed Mytiharyn Grass to the Vilkas once they have been weakened.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001306
text: Find Priest Brunas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001307
text: Priest Kidas is worried about Priest Brunas since it has been a long time since he went to Putas Lot. Go to Putas Lot and find Priest Brunas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001308
text: Talk to Priest Brunas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001309
text: Talk to Priest Brunas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001310
text: Retrieve the Flechette

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001311
text: Retrieve the Flechette

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001312
text: Talk to Ohla

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001313
text: Talk to Ohla

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001314
text: Find Liel

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001315
text: Ohla says Liel has snuck out of the refuge camp. Find Liel for the outside is infested with monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001316
text: Find White Tree Forest Moth Cacoons

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001317
text: Liel says Forest Moth Cacoons in White Tree forest are needed to repair the tent. Collect Forest Moth cocoons instead of Ohla and Liel who cannot defend themselves from monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001318
text: Hand the Forest Moth Cocoons to Ohla

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001319
text: You have gathered the Forest Moth Cocoons. Return to Ohla and hand them in.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001320
text: Search the grass nearby and find %s.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001321
text: Talk to Curtis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001322
text: Talk to Curtis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001323
text: Find edible objects

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001324
text: Curtis says that the refugees are running short of food. Defeat Flowlevi and gather their flowers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001325
text: That seems to be enough. Hand them to Curtis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001326
text: Obtain %s from Flowlevis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001327
text: Make the lumbers to reapir the stack stockades

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001328
text: Curtis says that in order to protect the refugees, the stockades were set up. But they were far too hastily made, they are in need of repair. Find the good wood and lumber crafting tools and produce fence repairing lumber.
