name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001329
text: Repairing the barricade

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001330
text: Use the lumber to repair the barricades.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001331
text: You have repaired all of the barricades. Ask Curtis if there is anything else you can help with.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001332
text: Gather Flowlon Leather

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001333
text: The night in Mishekan Forest is cold. So, the refugees made clothes and blankets from Flowlon leather. Flowlons are not ferocious. Retrieve leather from Flowlons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001334
text: You've obtained leathers. Now take them to Curtis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001335
text: Gather Randulin Grass

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001336
text: Curtis says that there is poison from the White Trees. It makes any ground water impossible to drink. Randulin Grass can be used to purify the poison. Spray poisoned water on the ground to find Randulin Grass which turns yellow.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001337
text: Return to Curtis now that you have enough Randulin Grass.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001338
text: Talk to Curtis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001339
text: Retrieve the Sacks of Cable Car Spare Parts

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001340
text: The cable car is far too old and is subject to numerous breakdowns. The repair kit is in the sack stolen by the monsters. Defeat the monsters and retrieve them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001341
text: You have retrieved all of the Cable Car Spare Parts sacks. Return to Curtis to hand them in.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001342
text: Retrieve %s after defeating monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001343
text: Defeat monsters in the farm

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001344
text: Curtis says that the monster infestation in the farm is the biggest problem he faces. Reclaim the farm from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001345
text: Defeat %s in Phavegheliai Farm

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001346
text: Curtis has asked you to alert the major cities of the refugee problem. Go to Klaipeda and ask Knight Commander Uska for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001347
text: Retrieve the scattered documents

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161005_001348
text: You have retrieved some documents

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001349
text: Jugrinas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001350
text: Uh...? Are you here because of the warning...?{nl}No, let us talk later.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001351
text: {nl}First, take this medicine, quick.{nl}This area is being affected by the dangerous Nobreer epidemic!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001352
text: {nl}Even the Plague Doctor Master has been unable to identify the source of the epidemic.{nl}It was discovered in the residents of Nobreer Forest after Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001353
text: {nl}Falling ill means you can end in a slow, torturous death.{nl}Take it before it's too late, hurry!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001354
text: I hope it won't be too late.{nl}The medicine is not yet complete, you see.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001355
text: As of now it is more of a preventative drug, rather than a cure.{nl}It won't have any effect if you are already ill, so please hurry and take it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001356
text: If you feel feverish or dizzy, even a little... Please, let me know.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001357
text: I'm glad you seem to be safe.{nl}My name is Jugrinas.{nl}I'm a Plague Doctor and I'm researching the Nobreer epidemic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001358
text: {nl}As I mentioned earlier, the epidemic was first found in refugee groups.{nl}The Plague Doctor Master was only able to stop it from spreading, but no more than that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001359
text: {nl}After progress slowed down, Cicas and I were sent here by the Master to research the disease.{nl}Unfortunately, we missed the right time to take the medicine and fell ill.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001360
text: {nl}Someone should be replacing us soon, as we find it too difficult to move the patients.{nl}I simply regret having to go back with no results.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001361
text: {nl}Thinking about all the patients still suffering from horrible pain, I...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001362
text: Will you really?{nl}I'm terribly sorry to ask since it's our first time meeting but...{nl}I will accept your favor, for the good of the patients.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001363
text: I left a few containers near the entrance of Emmet Forest with a solution that absorbs airborne substances.{nl}If any are connected to the disease, they'll have been absorbed by it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001364
text: Will you bring me some of that testing solution?{nl}I left a few spread around the area, so you may collect a little from each container.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001365
text: I just hope there'll be substances worth analyzing in the testing solution...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001366
text: You're back.{nl}Let me have a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001367
text: Hmm... I don't see anything worthy of note.{nl}It seems the disease isn't caused by any airborne substances...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001368
text: It's a bit time-consuming, but I'm afraid I have no choice but to use the Pandemic Detectors.{nl}It's a device created by the Plague Doctor Master to detect the disease's energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001369
text: It was meant to be used to find patients but... I figure we can use it to find the source of the disease as well.{nl}I'll hand you the detectors; you may install them at the Nobreer Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001370
text: Around three detectors should be enough to cover the intersection.{nl}After some time you should be able to see a reaction.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001371
text: This is surest way to know, but there's no telling how long it could take.{nl}It could be days before there's any visible reaction.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001372
text: Did you install the detectors?{nl}Now we simply need to wait for a reaction.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001373
text: While we wait for the detectors to react, it would be best to carry on with other research.{nl}As I said, there's no telling when it will happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001374
text: I say we should collect some samples from the forest plants.{nl}I believe there are some sample collecting tools among the things we left at the Lower Shipping Station.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001375
text: Cicas was too ill to get them organized.{nl}Please find the sample collecting tools and gather a few plant samples.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001376
text: After you find the tools, head to the Nobreer Falls and collect the samples.{nl}We will need samples of plants like herbs and roots.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001377
text: If we're unable to find anything from the plants, we'll have to investigate the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001378
text: Did you bring the plant samples?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001379
text: Let's have a look then...{nl}There doesn't seem to be anything worthy of note here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001380
text: I'm afraid we're going to need some samples from the monsters.{nl}That is, if you will help me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001381
text: Collecting monster samples requires a specific chemical.{nl}I believe Cicas had it, but due to his condition he had to leave it at the site we were investigating.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001382
text: If you go to Big Tree Footbridge, you'll find the special solution Cicas was using, along with some sample containers.{nl}I can't be sure where exactly he left them, however.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001383
text: After you find the solution and the containers, go to the Upper Shipping Station.{nl}Spray the solution over a few monsters there, then defeat them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001384
text: If a monster dies, its cells will break down, meaning the data will be inaccurate.{nl}The solution is needed to stop the cells from breaking down.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001385
text: Let us hope the pandemic detectors react meanwhile.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001386
text: Oh, these are very well preserved.{nl}Let's have a look...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001387
text: Hmm... There's certainly a type of energy here...{nl}But I'm afraid it's not enough to be sure...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001388
text: I can't tell if there's a connection with the Nobreer Epidemic.{nl}I need to go back and investigate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001389
text: For now I suppose we can check the detectors for a reaction.{nl}Would you bring back the epidemic detectors installed at the Nobreer Intersection?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001390
text: I sure hope there's been a reaction...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001391
text: If the detectors haven't reacted, I'll be going home empty-handed.{nl}I'm worried for the patients of the disease...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001392
text: What? {nl}You saw something surrounded by an ominous energy head towards the Evac Route?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001393
text: I can feel a very strong energy from the detectors your brought back, too.{nl}It does feel similar to the energy of the disease... Although slightly different.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001394
text: It's certainly very strong and evil.{nl}Whatever you saw at the Nobreer Intersection could very well be the source of the epidemic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001395
text: Come to think of it, I have heard talks of a Demonic Plague before.{nl}A dark demon that brings misery and despair unto humans.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001396
text: If what you saw was this demon... It could mean grave danger.{nl}We ought to be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001397
text: Remember to be careful.{nl}If it really is the Demonic Plague, it will be very dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001398
text: In any case, we may just get some clues about the cure from this demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001399
text: Did you really defeat the Demonic Plague?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001400
text: And you brought its core.{nl}I'm certain this is the source of the epidemic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001401
text: If I bring this back to the Plague Doctor Master, he'll be able to produce a cure.{nl}Thank you so much.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001402
text: The person who's here to replace us has just arrived.{nl}Cicas isn't feeling very well either, so we should be on our way now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001403
text: Your precious help will always be remembered.{nl}After all, you are the one who saved all those suffering from the epidemic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001404
text: There's a disease spreading around here.{nl}You should leave while you still can.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001405
text: I must think of those suffering from the Nobreer Epidemic and find a clue.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001406
text: Kupole Lenja

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001407
text: I am a Kupole at the service of Goddess Laima.{nl}I'm waiting for the right time here under Her orders.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001408
text: The treaty that goddesses and demons signed many, many eras ago is more than a simple agreement.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001409
text: One of my tasks is soon to be completed, it seems.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001410
text: I do regret not paying closer attention to Laima's words, but we mustn't stop.{nl}The world is not quite over yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001411
text: I'm certain there will be other many actions to take, I believe Her words.{nl}Surely She still has hope.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001412
text: Welcome.{nl}I was waiting for you, Savior.{nl}My name is Kupole Lenja, I serve Goddess Laima.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001413
text: {nl}A time longer than 1000 years ago, Goddess Laima foresaw that you would arrive.{nl}She said there would be something here that must be passed unto you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001414
text: {nl}The truth of a distant era... A story of goddesses and demons.{nl}For a long, long time, I have waited here for you to arrive and face this truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001415
text: {nl}Savior, follow Her words. Retrieve the ancient treaty here kept and confirm this truth.{nl}For the world, for you, and for those foolish enough to have doubted Her words four years in the past...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001416
text: Goddess Laima did not tell me how to retrieve the treaty.{nl}She must have not wanted anyone but the Savior to access it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001417
text: {nl}She wrote the instructions to obtaining the treaty on a book called the Prophecy Tome.{nl}She made sure only the Savior would be allowed to acquire the Tome.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001418
text: {nl}To receive the Prophecy Tome, you must prove that you are the Savior.{nl}You may attest your status to the three stone pagodas of Pranasyste Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001419
text: {nl}Prove to them that you are the Savior and the Prophecy Tome will appear to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001420
text: Everything must be done by the Savior, and the Savior alone.{nl}My task is merely to deliver to you the instructions and wait.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001421
text: Did you find the Prophecy Tome?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001422
text: The Tome was made by the power of Goddess Laima.{nl}Therefore, it can only be seen through the power of fate.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001423
text: Her power is imbued in the Orb of Fate located in Rechimas Way.{nl}You must first receive the power of the Orb in order to read the Prophecy Tome.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001424
text: All I can do from here is wait for you to acquire the treaty and return.{nl}Everything you need to know will be written in the Prophecy Tome. I will be waiting at the Yudejan Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001425
text: The demons have started to wander around Yudejan Forest.{nl}They covet the treaty that's hidden here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001426
text: {nl}They must not want the Savior to obtain it.{nl}Goddess Laima did make provisions for this moment, but still...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001427
text: {nl}If you cross paths with a demon, eliminating it would be the wisest thing to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001428
text: My role is to merely relay unto you the words of Goddess Laima and look over the developments.{nl}All else is dependent on you alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001429
text: I can only tell you to beware of the demons that covet the treaty.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001430
text: You have obtained the treaties and the slate.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001431
text: Now you must read the contents of the treaty.{nl}You can do so at the Yudejan Altar.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001432
text: Place the treaty slate in the Yudejan Altar, then set the goddess treaty and the demon treaty.{nl}The contents of the treaty should then be revealed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001433
text: I know neither its contents nor what they will mean to you.{nl}But if it was Laima's will to pass onto you this message through Her prophecy, surely they are important.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001434
text: The treaty was signed a thousand... No, more than a thousand years ago, by both demons and goddesses.{nl}Perhaps you already knew this, or perhaps you're surprised to hear it for the first time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001435
text: All I'm certain of is that you must know the contents of the treaty.{nl}That is what Goddess Laima prepared for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001436
text: I wonder if things would have been different had we listened to Laima.{nl}It's too late for that, I suppose.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001437
text: Did you read the treaty?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001438
text: I know not what meaning the treaty will have to you.{nl}I was simply told that it was meant for the eyes of the Savior.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001439
text: The future depends on you now.{nl}Every choice you make shall be a step towards the salvation of our world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001440
text: May your path be blessed, Savior...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001443
text: The Nobreer Epidemic

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001444
text: Alright, I'll take your medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001445
text: That's absolute nonsense.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001446
text: Finding a Cure for the Epidemic (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001447
text: I'll help you in place of Cicas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001448
text: That's too bad.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001449
text: Finding a Cure for the Epidemic (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001450
text: Let's do something else instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001451
text: Finding a Cure for the Epidemic (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001452
text: I'll collect the plant samples.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001453
text: We should get some rest first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001454
text: You have found the sample collecting tools.{nl}Go to Nobreer Falls and collect plant samples.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001455
text: Finding a Cure for the Epidemic (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001456
text: Finding a Cure for the Epidemic (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001457
text: I'll collect the monster samples.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001458
text: Are you completely out of your mind?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001459
text: You have found the tools for collecting monster samples.{nl}Go to the Upper Shipping Station and spray the monsters with the special solution before collecting samples.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001460
text: Finding a Cure for the Epidemic (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001461
text: The Truth Behind the Epidemic (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001462
text: I'll go get the epidemic detectors.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001463
text: I'm afraid it's time for me to say goodbye.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001464
text: The Truth Behind the Epidemic (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001465
text: Nobreer Demonic Plague

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001466
text: I'll go and check, don't worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001467
text: I say we keep our hands off the situation now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001468
text: Laima's Prophecy Tome (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001469
text: I'll find the treaty.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001470
text: We should focus on the present instead of dwelling on the past.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001471
text: Laima's Prophecy Tome (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001472
text: That sounds like too much for me already.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001473
text: Demon Treaty (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001474
text: Using the power of fate...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001475
text: The magic barrier was disabled and the treaty revealed itself.{nl}To obtain the demon treaty, collect the Impure Blood of Yudejan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001476
text: Demon Treaty (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001477
text: You have collected the Impure Blood of Yudejan.{nl}Go to the Red Magic Circle in Tamsus Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001478
text: Demon Treaty (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001479
text: The evil energy became stronger with the impure Blood of Yudejan.{nl}Go to Tamsus Ikeitimas and find the token of the Demon Treaty.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001480
text: Demon Treaty (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001481
text: Adding evil energy...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001482
text: Acquiring the Demon Treaty...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001483
text: The Demon Treaty is now in your hands.{nl}Return to the site of the treaty seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001484
text: Goddess Treaty (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001485
text: Opening the demon seal...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001486
text: You have released the demon seal.{nl}As told by the Prophecy Tome, go to Sviesos Way and find the Goddess' Stone of Faith.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001487
text: You have found the Goddess' Stone of Faith.{nl}Go to Tamsus Ikeitimas and obtain the token of the Goddess Treaty.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001488
text: Goddess Treaty (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001489
text: Acquiring the goddess treaty...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001490
text: The goddess treaty is now in your hands.{nl}Return to the site of the treaty seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001491
text: A Story of Demons and Goddesses (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001492
text: Opening the treaty seal...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001493
text: You have released the treaty seal and obtained the key.{nl}Find the box in the Yudejan Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001494
text: A Story of Demons and Goddesses (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001495
text: A Story of Demons and Goddesses (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001496
text: I will go and see the treaty now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001497
text: Reading the treaty...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001498
text: Talk to Plague Doctor Jugrinas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001499
text: Plague Doctor Jugrinas is looking after patients. Ask him about what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001500
text: Take the Medicine Against the Nobreer Epidemic

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001501
text: Take the medicine against the Nobreer epidemic Jugrinas has given you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001502
text: Talk to Jugrinas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001503
text: You have taken the medicine. Talk to Jugrinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001504
text: Finding a Cure for the Epidemic

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001505
text: Ask Jugrinas about what happened at Nobreer Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001506
text: Retrieve Jugrinas' Testing Solution

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001507
text: Collect some testing solution from the containers Jugrinas left at the entrance of Emmet Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001508
text: Deliver to Jugrinas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001509
text: You have collected the testing solution. Bring it to Jugrinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001510
text: Ask Jugrinas if he found something from the testing solution you brought.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001511
text: Set the Epidemic Detectors on Nobreer Intersection

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001512
text: Jugrinas wants to obtain clues from the epidemic detectors. Go to Nobreer Intersection and set up the epidemic detectors.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001513
text: Report to Jugrinas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001514
text: You have set up the epidemic detectors. Report back to Jugrinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001515
text: Now that the detectors are set up, ask Jugrinas about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001516
text: Find the Sample Collecting Tools at the Lower Shipping Station

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001517
text: Jugrinas wants to get started on something else while he waits for the detectors to react. Go to the Lower Shipping Station and find the sample collecting tools.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001518
text: Collect Plant Samples at Nobreer Falls

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001519
text: Go to Nobreer Falls and collect a few samples from local plants.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001520
text: You have collected the plant samples. Bring them to Jugrinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001521
text: Talk to Jugrinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001522
text: Find Cicas' Tools at Big Tree Footbridge

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001523
text: Jugrinas wants you to collect monster samples while he analyses the plant samples. Go to Big Tree Footbridge and find Jugrinas' special solution and sample containers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001524
text: Spray Monsters with the Special Solution and Defeat Them

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001525
text: Use Jugrinas' special solution on the monsters and defeat them to collect samples.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001526
text: You have collected sufficient monster samples. Return to Jugrinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001527
text: Use the Special Solution and Defeat %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001528
text: The Truth Behind the Epidemic

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001529
text: Now that you've collected enough samples, ask Jugrinas about what he wants to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001530
text: Check the Epidemic Detectors in Nobreer Intersection

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001531
text: Go to Nobreer Intersection and check the epidemic detectors installed there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001532
text: Collect the Epidemic Detectors at Nobreer Intersection

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001533
text: Retrieve all the epidemic detectors installed at Nobreer Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001534
text: The epidemic detectors give out an ominous energy. Bring them to Jugrinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001535
text: Jugrinas is looking at the detectors with a serious expression. Hear what he has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001536
text: Check the Evac Route for Ominous Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001537
text: Jugrinas believes the ominous energy is the source of the Nobreer epidemic. Go to the Evac Route and check for sources of ominous energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001538
text: The source of the ominous energy was a Grim Reaper. Bring the Core obtained from the Grim Reaper to Jugrinas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001539
text: Defeat the Grim Reaper

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001540
text: Laima's Prophecy Tome

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001541
text: Talk to Kupole Lenja

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001542
text: Talk to Kupole Lenja.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001543
text: Attest to the Prophecy Pagodas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001544
text: According to Kupole Lenja, to prove that you are the Savior, you need to attest your status to the pagodas in Pranasyste Way. Prove yourself to the three stone pagodas and obtain the Prophecy Tome.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001545
text: You attested your status to the pagodas and received the Prophecy Tome. Return to Kupole Lenja.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001546
text: Attest to the Prophecy Pagodas and Obtain the %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001547
text: There doesn't seem to be anything written on the Prophecy Tome. Ask Kupole Lenja about what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001548
text: Receive the Power of Fate from the Orb of Fate

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001549
text: To read the Prophecy Tome, you need Laima's power of fate. Obtain the power of fate from the Orb of Fate located in Rechimas Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001550
text: Demon Treaty

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001551
text: Check the Treaty Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001552
text: Prophecy Tome: go to the treaty seal at the site where it is kept.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001553
text: Change the Colors of the Treaty Lights

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001554
text: Prophecy Tome: first, you must disable the magic protecting the treaty seal. Find the lights around the treaty seal and make each one shine in a different color to disable the magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001555
text: Disable the Magic Protecting the Treaty Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001556
text: Prophecy Tome: once every light is shining in a different color, you can disable the magic protecting the treaty seal. Use the power of fate on the treaty seal to disable its protective magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001557
text: Defeat Monsters to Obtain the Impure Blood of Yudejan

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001558
text: Prophecy Tome: an evil offering is required to obtain the demon treaty. Of course, I don't expect you to be carrying around any evil objects. It may not be the best option, but I believe you can get some evil energy from monster blood. First, hunt the monsters to collect their blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001559
text: Imbue the Impure Blood of Yudejan with Demon Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001560
text: Prophecy Tome: the Yudejan blood is not enough. You need more demon energy to have a truly evil offering. The demons left behind some red magic circles in Tamsorce Way. The demons left behind some red magic circles in Tamsorce Way. Take the offering and step on the magic circles to infuse it with their evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001561
text: Retrieve the Demon Treaty in Tamsus Ikeitimas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001562
text: Prophecy Tome: only after the offering is complete can you obtain the demon treaty. The treaty is in Tamsus Ikeitimas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001563
text: Retrieve the Demon Treaty

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001564
text: You have defeated the demon coveting the treaty. Use the impure blood of Yudejan again to obtain the demon treaty.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001565
text: Defeat the %s Coveting the Treaty

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001566
text: Goddess Treaty

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001567
text: Release the Demon Seal Connected to the Treaty Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001568
text: Prophecy Tome: the treaty was sealed by both demons and goddesses. If you have a token of the demon treaty, you can release the seal made by the demons. Use the token on the demon treaty seal to release it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001569
text: Find the Goddess' Stone of Faith

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001570
text: Prophecy Tome: to obtain a token of the goddess treaty, you need the Goddess' Stone of Faith. I left the stone in Sviesos Way. However, according to my prophecy, the altar where I left it was destroyed during Medzio Diena. But it should still be in Sviesos Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001571
text: Use the Goddess' Stone of Faith to Read the Tombstone and Release the Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001572
text: Prophecy Tome: use the Stone of Faith to read the hidden writings carved on the seal. Speak the name of the goddess written on the seal to open it. The goddesses mentioned in the seal tombstone are Gabija, Vakarine and Zemyna.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001573
text: Obtain the Goddess Treaty

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001574
text: You have read the tombstones and released the seals. Acquire the goddess treaty.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001575
text: A Story of Demons and Goddesses

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001576
text: Release the Treaty Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001577
text: Prophecy Tome: once you have the token, you can open the seal and obtain the key to the treaty. The key opens the box that contains the slate with the contents of the treaty.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001578
text: Find the Box Containing the Treaty Slate

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001579
text: Prophecy Tome: if you have the key, now you need to find the slate with the treaty. Go to the Yudejan Altar and find the box that opens with the key; you'll find the treaty slate inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001580
text: You have obtained the tokens of both demon and goddess treaties and the treaty slate. Return to Kupole Lenja.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001581
text: Ask Kupole Lenja about how to read the contents of the treaty.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001582
text: Use the Yudejan Altar to Read the Treaty

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001583
text: Place the treaty slate onto the Yudejan Altar and use the tokens of the demon and goddess treaties to read the contents of the main treaty. Go to the Yudejan Altar and read the treaty.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20161214_001584
text: You have read the contents of the treaty. Return to Kupole Lenja.QUEST_LV_0400_20161221_001585

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20170313_001591
text: You have found the Goddess' Stone of Faith.{nl}Go to Tamsus Ikeitimas and obtain the token of the goddess treaty.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20170313_001592
text: Remove the Mysterious Demon Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20170313_001593
text: Kedora Alliance Merchant Alta has asked you to remove the demon devices affecting the area of Alembique Cave.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20170313_001594
text: You have removed all mysterious demon devices as requested. Report back to Alta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20170313_001595
text: You have dealed with all of the monsters but are still trapped. Wait until the mysterious hunter disarms the trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20170313_001596
text: You have dealed with all of the monsters but are still trapped. See if there is a way to escape the trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20170313_001597
text: Talk to the Mysterious Hunter

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20170313_001598
text: The owner of the trap has appeared. Wait until the mysterious hunter disarms the trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20170330_001605
text: Thank you. The Kugheri Zabbis were hiding something...{nl}They could be hiding the orders.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20170330_001606
text: Please bring me the orders from the Kugheri Zabbis on the road to Stabhas Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20170330_001607
text: You have found orders written by demons on the body of a Kugheri Zabbi. Indraja might know what it is about so take it to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001608
text: Let's follow them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001609
text: It's unpleasant but I'll go pollute the holy water with the demon's blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001610
text: Let's go to Ziureti Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001611
text: Really...I can hear music!{nl}It's putting my mind at ease...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001612
text: Oh...Goddess Medeina!{nl}You are always by my side.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001613
text: Goddess Medeina used the trees to sow a song that she could pass on to the priests.{nl}The priests would then break down the metaphorical lyrics to grasp the Goddess' true meaning.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001614
text: We also need to think about the message behind these lyrics.{nl}Yet, the red pollen from these blooming flowers is so calming...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001615
text: Ah! I understand the meaning.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001616
text: I heard people living in Teresh Forest used Teresh Pollen to purify blood.{nl}When the pollen was needed, rather than waiting for it to bloom, they would sprinkle Atti Yellow Juice on it to quickly collect the pollen. Because of this, the flowers appear yellow.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001617
text: Maybe the Goddess is telling us to sprinkle Atti Yellow Juice on Teresh flowers to collect their pollen.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001618
text: Atti appear a lot in Skausmas Crossroads and Gydymo Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001619
text: If you defeat the monsters inhabiting Teresh Forest, you'll be able to find the Yellow Juice.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001620
text: You've returned with the Atti Yellow Juice.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001621
text: After spraying the Teresh flower with the Atti Yellow Juice the pollen can be collected.{nl}The flower will die shortly after being sprayed so you must collect it quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001622
text: In the meantime, I'll collect some Teresh Pollen from Valta Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001623
text: You've collected the Teresh Pollen.{nl}But there's no reaction. We must be missing something.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001624
text: That's it!{nl}There may be a response if we sprinkle the pollen around the tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001625
text: The white apple...? I'm not sure of the meaning, but the number of trees humming seems to be growing.{nl}Maybe the trees are all singing the same song.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001626
text: Let's go examine the trees in Skauda Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001627
text: The nightly glimmer carried out through to daytime, now my heart is open wide...?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001628
text: Ah! During the day, people of the Great Woodlands would crush raspberries and sprinkled them around the forest.{nl} This would cause the Starlight to appear.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001629
text: Like this, they could gather the Starlight together and predict people's fortunes.{nl}So, if we use the raspberry scent to direct the Starlight to the singing trees, we'll be able to receive a response like before.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001630
text: Wait.{nl}Take this with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001631
text: It'll be easier to collect Raspberry Juice if you use this bottle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001632
text: I, on the other hand, will look for branches to use to help spread the raspberry smell.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001633
text: You've collected enough Raspberry Juice. Now just wait one moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001634
text: I've spread the juice evenly on the branches.{nl}If we just fan the branches to spread the raspberry smell, we can direct the starlight to the singing trees and get a response.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001635
text: Slowly seeing evidence of Goddess Medeina makes me feel like we are getting closer to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001636
text: We've attracted enough starlight, I think...{nl}But still I don't see anything...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001637
text: Still, no response...{nl}There must be more to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001638
text: Yellow apple...{nl}I still don't understand the meaning.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001639
text: Maybe we can learn more from the humming trees in Paslepti Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001640
text: Goddess Medeina must be talking about the butterflies that come to the flower as the preachers of love.{nl}But "Half of my heart" and "stone"?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001641
text: This meaning isn't clear.{nl}Is it really talking about a stone? "Half of my heart" must be about the Goddess's heart...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001642
text: Is the stone really just a stone with no other meaning?{nl}If that's true, is the Goddess' heart written on stone?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001643
text: I really can't think of the meaning.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001644
text: The stone, really is just a stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001645
text: It seems I was thinking too deeply.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001646
text: Ah! You came.{nl}Well, shall we listen to the song?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001647
text: We need to collect the different colored apples from the trees and place them on the matching pillars.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001648
text: It'll be fine if we just place the colored apple on the matching pillar.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001649
text: The ailing Goddess Medeina is recovering in Parias Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001650
text: If it wasn't for you, Traveler, I wouldn't have known where Goddess Medeina disappeared to.{nl} I'm very grateful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001651
text: Well, I'll be going to Parias Forest.{nl}It may be a difficult path but it's where I'll be able to meet the Goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001652
text: A Dog with no Owner

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001653
text: The dog appears to be looking this way.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001654
text: Riko why are you back?{nl}Go. I told you to go away...I've already messed up.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001655
text: A person coming here...{nl}Leave this place. And tell others that Narvas Temple was attacked.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001656
text: Narvas Temple was made by Agailla Flurry to seal the three divided parts of Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001657
text: The temple's equipment broken down after Medzio Diena, weakening the seal and leaving a small space for Hauberk's energy to escape.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001658
text: Hauberk's scouts, who felt the energy, and also those who came to destroy him found themselves at the temple.{nl}{nl}In order to protect it, we went searching for the items needed to repair the temple's equipment.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001659
text: But after being attacked we were left like this.{nl}I want to carry out my mission but there's no chance now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001660
text: If it stays like this, Hauberk will return.{nl} Please, in my stead, prevent this. I beg you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001661
text: Right now, the way to Narvas Temple is blocked by Hauberk's scouts and hunters.{nl}Going directly through would be dangerous therefore you'll have to distract them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001662
text: There is a flower called Sporgimo at Tekel Shelter. When burned it creates a huge blast that will help you distract the demon's attention.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001663
text: First, set fire to the Hauberk's hunters' camp to lure them away.{nl}Then if you set a fire near where Hauberk's scouts are guarding, after awhile, they will move to that location.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001664
text: Doing it this way will open up a path to Narvas Temple.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001665
text: Make your escape. This place, Izoliacjia Plateau, is overrun with demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001666
text: I was looking for parts when I was attacked by demons.{nl}Yet, despite the current situation, you have come alone to this place? That is truly amazing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001667
text: {nl}Not too long after my friend left to search for parts, Hauberk's seal broke.{nl}He is currently gathering his scouts and recovering his strength.{nl}Before Hauberk regains his full power I was planning to restore the temple device that prevents the demons from invading Narvas Temple.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001668
text: That is why, despite the risk, I am working to restore the defensive system.{nl}But the damage to the system is so great that I do not have time to fix them all.{nl}My plan is to alter the ones that were not badly damaged.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001669
text: The defensive systems in Izoliacjia Plateau received the least amount of damage.{nl}I was planning to fix and alter the system, but there is not enough time to go about it alone.{nl}Would you be able to help?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001670
text: It is not an easy decision.But it cannot be helped.{nl}I feel like I must ask something difficult of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001671
text: I would be grateful if you helped.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001672
text: Even if we alter the defensive system here it does not have enough energy to protect the temple.{nl}But, we can use Demon Essence as a source of energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001673
text: Please collect the Demon Essence.{nl}While you do that, I will alter the system.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001674
text: While you are collecting the Demon Essence, I will alter the defensive system.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001675
text: Is that Demon Essence? Please give it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001676
text: I have completed altering the system.{nl}It is time to move on to the defensive system in Ispejimas Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001677
text: We need at least 4 defensive systems to protect Narvas Temple.{nl}But, and this is including what we already altered, there are only 3 system that we can alter and use.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001678
text: Therefore, we must alter the detector systems here to defensive ones.{nl}{nl}But Agailla Flurry, to ensure the system ran correctly, also installed auxiliary detector systems.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001679
text: To change the detectors, the detector and its auxiliary systems must be shut down.{nl}Yet, there are numerous systems. If even one turns back on, the remaining ones will also turn on. Making the task difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001680
text: As I will shut down energy to the detector systems, I ask that you, Traveler, turn off all the auxiliary systems.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001681
text: I will shut down energy to the detector systems, so I ask that you, Traveler, turn off energy to the auxiliary systems.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001682
text: It is completed. We must now alter the defensive systems in Kapetan Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001683
text: I need to fix some defenses before they can be remodeled, but I need some spare parts.{nl}I can get the parts from a destroyed defensive system, but it's been taken over by demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001684
text: Traveler, are you saying I can leave the demons to you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001685
text: If so, then I will quickly retrieve the parts and return.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001686
text: Traveler, thanks to you, I have recovered the necessary parts.{nl}I will now go to repair and alter the defensive system in Kapetan Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001687
text: I was just repairing the system when I saw some energy leaving the area around the defensive system.{nl}If all the energy disappears from the defensive system, it will not operate correctly.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001688
text: I will alter the defensive system, so during that time please retrieve the escaping energy using the Energy Storing Globe.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001689
text: While I alter the defensive system, please retrieve the escaping energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001690
text: You have returned.{nl}I will now insert the energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001691
text: Good.{nl}Now we must go to the defensive system located on the way to Narvas Temple.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001692
text: This is bad.{nl}This one is overloaded.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001693
text: If it continues like this, this defensive system will be completed destroyed.{nl}To cool it down, we need to remove all the energy and turn it off.{nl}If we do not, we will lose the whole system.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001694
text: I have a request for you.{nl}When I remove the energy it will escape out.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001695
text: At this time, please collect the energy into the Energy Storing Globe.{nl}Then use that energy to reactivate the defensive system.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001696
text: I will now turn off the system.{nl}Please wait until I have altered it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001697
text: Monk Aistis is currently altering the defensive system.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001698
text: Defensive system alterations are complete.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001699
text: To reactive the defensive system we will need to slowly increase the output.{nl}And to increase the output, we will need a lot of energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001700
text: As I increase the output, I will need you to continually insert all the energy you previously collected.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001701
text: Each time the defensive system requires it, insert the energy you just collected.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001702
text: The defensive system has activated.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001703
text: After checking that the defensive system is working properly, we can leave.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001704
text: We nearly left Narvas Temple open to the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001705
text: The defensive system seems to be working well. We can make our way back inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001706
text: Agailla Flurry created various demon suppressing, demon weakening, and defensive systems in Narvas Temple.{nl}This was done to defend against invading demons and those trying to release Hauberk's seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001707
text: However, after Medzio Diena these systems were weakened and unable to function properly.{nl}To make matters worse, the demons came and destroyed a few of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001708
text: We need to prevent other systems from being destroyed while also repairing them to stop Hauberk's return.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001709
text: Good.{nl}Let us move on to the demon weakening systems in Atsargus Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001710
text: This is good. It seems we have prevented the demons from destroying this system.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001711
text: This one can weaken the demon's strength.{nl}If we just alter its functions and reinforce it a bit we can use it to limit their power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001712
text: It will be okay.{nl}The demons will have no idea that their strength has been weakened.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001713
text: I will handle altering the system. Traveler, I need you to collect Strong Essence of Demon that we can use as energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001714
text: It feels like the demons would notice, but trust him and go collect the Strong Essence of Demon

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001715
text: Please do not worry yourself, the demons will pay us no mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001716
text: Reinforcing is complete.{nl} Now on to the systems in Atsargus Hallway.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001717
text: Hauberk's scouts have already broken this device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001718
text: Luckily, since the core of the device has not taken too much damage, I will be able to fix and alter it.{nl}However, would you be willing to help me with one part?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001719
text: This system, in order to locate unholy beings, runs only on clean essence.{nl}This was to prevent not only demons from coming into the temple but heretics as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001720
text: However, since the area is now overrun with demons, it will be more effective if I alter the system to focus simply on them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001721
text: For it to properly track demons, we will need to mix Demon's Blood and Essence together and insert it into the device.{nl}Please collect some tainted essence mixed with Demon's Blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001722
text: I do understand the unpleasantness of this task.{nl}But this is all to prevent Hauberk's return.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001723
text: It will be fine if you just return with Essence mixed with Demon's Blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001724
text: Please put in the Essence you collected.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001725
text: Wait a minute. Hauberk is over there.{nl}If you run in hastily, he will capture you and do the same thing he did to the others.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001726
text: There are too many demons.{nl}It would be better if we first go to Ziureti Hall and check on the system there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001727
text: We do not have time to waste.{nl}We should go now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001728
text: It is extremely dangerous.{nl}They have already passed on.{nl}We must retreat.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001729
text: Do you now understand how dangerous this is?{nl}Hauberk could have easily have caught us as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001730
text: Sigh...{nl}Luckily, you successfully interrupted whatever Hauberk was doing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001731
text: However, if you were caught, I too would be in danger.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001732
text: Let us not argue and focus on examining the system that is on the way to Ziureti Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001733
text: Unidentified Facility

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001734
text: Speak with you...I am Agailla Flurry...apparition...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001735
text: Deception Hauberk...monk...hypnotize...his side...use you...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001736
text: As he wishes...Hauberk...tired...follow...what I say...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001737
text: First...better talk with me...this device...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001738
text: ...to fix...in Tiesa Hall...Apparition Generator...need...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001739
text: The system password...in Agailla Flurry Chronicles...the completed year...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001740
text: Narvas Temple...enter locked system password...bring it...put in device...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001741
text: The system password...in Agailla Flurry Chronicles...is...Narvas Temple...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001742
text: ...completed year...enter locked system password...bring it...put in device...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001743
text: Agailla Flurry's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001744
text: I wasn't able to convey myself fully, however you still knew to unlock the system, bring the Apparition Generator, and fix the device. I'm impressed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001745
text: You are talking with me, Agailla Flurry's Apparition, also known as the manager of Narvas Temple.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001746
text: I left most of the tasks to the monks, but since the three Hauberks woke up and you have arrived, I've decided to intervene.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001747
text: Monk Aistis' fear of dying at the hands of Ambition Hauberk left his mind weak.{nl}This made it easier for Deception Hauberk to hypnotize Aistis and gain the upper hand.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001748
text: Deception Hauberk did not anticipate your arrival.{nl}However, after you met Monk Aistis in Izoliacjia Plateau, Deception Hauberk decided to use you aswell.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001749
text: You were fooled by Deception Hauberk, but the tables have turned.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001750
text: In this temple is the ruthless, highly ambitions, but non-resourceful, Ambition Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001751
text: The constantly suspicious, concerned with preservation and always careful, is Suspicion Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001752
text: For thousands of years, preparing but not revealing his true intentions to the others, is Deception Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001753
text: To become whole they are keeping each other in check, under contact that they will not involve themselves in each others work.{nl}However, little by little Deception Hauberk is shifting the balance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001754
text: The problem is Deception Hauberk is taking the lead to return to his former self, Demon Lord Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001755
text: If this happens we will not be able to stop Demon Lord Hauberk's return.{nl}You and I will use the current imbalance to defeat Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001756
text: Help Monk Aistis and, to completely break the balance of power, take my staff to Deception Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001757
text: I awaited your return.{nl}If you hand over the magic crystal you collected, I will improve the system.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001758
text: In Ziureti Hall, the weapon that can defy Hauberk, Agailla Flurry's Staff is protected by a device..{nl}We should there and collect the staff.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001759
text: Return to Monk Aistis and follow what he says.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001760
text: Able to defy Hauberk, Agailla Flurry's Staff contains an enormous amount power.{nl}Thus, if demons are around, the device protecting the staff will not open.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001761
text: When there are no demons around, you'll be able to open it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001762
text: You can open the device now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001763
text: Agailla Flurry Apparition

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001764
text: With that, the balance of power has been shattered.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001765
text: Use this imbalance of power ignite a fight amongst themselves.{nl}I will explain more in Narvas Temple Annex.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001766
text: Deception Hauberk has acquired Agailla Flurry's staff but to become whole he must absorb Ambition Hauberk and Suspicion Hauberk.{nl}And to explain to the other two Hauberks, without any misunderstand, the events that have occurred here will be difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001767
text: However, Deception Hauberk has not concerned himself with how he will go about absorbing the remaining two.{nl}This we will take advantage of.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001768
text: We will make it obvious to the other two Hauberks that Deception Hauberk is planning an attack.{nl}Plant the idea that Deception Hauberk is weakening them in order to easily absorb them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001769
text: Now, if you say that the system in Deception Hauberk's Sealed Hall has been altered, Monk Aistis will say otherwise.{nl}His response will be obvious.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001770
text: This is because he does not know what goes on here.{nl}Do not worry about the systems. Instead go to Deception Hauberk and do as I have said.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001771
text: Do not concern yourself with the connection between this and the systems.{nl}If you trust me and follow what I say, we will stop Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001772
text: I will consider what needs to be done and tell you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001773
text: If you wish to fix this system, I will need parts from Flurry's device.{nl}These parts are small making them hard to find.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001774
text: Please use this Absorbing Stone.{nl}When you use it it will  attract the small parts and pull them towards you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001775
text: Please use the Absorbing Stone and bring Flurry's Device Parts to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001776
text: Agailla Flurry Apparition

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001777
text: Just as I wanted, you have conveyed the message to Deception Hauberk.{nl}You did well in such a dangerous situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001778
text: Now, we must make Suspicion Hauberk and Ambition Hauberk aware of Deception Hauberk's actions.{nl}Once they are aware, they will begin to fight.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001779
text: We will start by informing Suspicion Hauberk.{nl}However, seeing as he is a filled with suspicion, if we do not prepare correctly, he will not fall into our trap. Rather he will simply become more suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001780
text: You must ransform into the trusted King Hammer and inform him of Deception Hauberk's plan.{nl}Suspicion Hauberk believes himself to be the weakest of the Hauberks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001781
text: Therefore, he will concern himself with how to become whole.{nl}At that point, you most reveal the Contract Token you are carrying.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001782
text: He and the other Hauberks have searched madly for this item that, when he sees it, it will increase his trust in you.{nl}And, tell Hauberk that the Token needs to be changed before use or it will inflict great harm.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001783
text: If Suspicion Hauberk is of sound mind, he will say to do this right away.{nl}Then leave Suspicion Hauberk's Sealed Hall and come to Ketinimas Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001784
text: Agailla Flurry left preparations in case Hauberk was awakened and turned his attacks on the monks.{nl}It's the device right next to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001785
text: So that the monks could safety evacuate, this device creates scrolls that change the appearance of the user into a monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001786
text: To create a King Hammer transformation scroll you will need a body essence.{nl}If you collect the Flesh of Black Hohen Olben, you can use that in the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001787
text: First go and collect the Flesh of Black Hohen Olben.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001788
text: You have done well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001789
text: Now we need King Hammer's Blood.{nl}In time, the King Hammers searching for the Contract Token will be passing this way.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001790
text: Defeat them and insert the King Hammer's Blood into the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001791
text: The transformation scroll is complete.{nl}Now, use this scroll to transform into King Hammer and approach Suspicion Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001792
text: You made that look too easy. Well done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001793
text: Now, changing the power within the Contract Token is not easy.{nl}While you were away, I changed the function of the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001794
text: It took time, but it turned out well.{nl}However, the device still does not have the energy it needs to change the power within the Contract Token.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001795
text: Replacing the energy with condensed magic will be suitable.{nl}Yes, strengthening it with condensed magic will do the trick.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001796
text: To gain strength, each of Hauberk's Drooper Scouts are in possession of one.{nl}If you defeat them you'll be able to obtain the condensed magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001797
text: Gather it and insert it into the device.{nl}When you have inserted enough, insert the Contract Token and I will transform its power.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001798
text: You think it's easy changing the Token's power?{nl}Well, in case it was necessary, Agailla Flurry did prepare changeable functions for the devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001799
text: I have changed the power within the Contract Token.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001800
text: Please inform Suspicion Hauberk of the Contract Token's change.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001801
text: Suspicion Hauberk has been taken in by your wonderful acting.{nl}We are a little pressed for time, so I will relay the next stage of the plan at Ambition Hauberk's Sealed Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001802
text: You have arrived.{nl}Now we must reel in Ambition Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001803
text: Ambition Hauberk's Elite Banshee King has died by your hand, correct?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001804
text: When you defeated the Banshee King, the tortured monks we released.{nl}Due to that, reeling Ambition Hauberk in will not be difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001805
text: Instead, it will be easier.{nl}You'll be able to brainwash the Black Harugal residing under Ambition Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001806
text: There is one device created by the monks.{nl}It was created by the High Monk in order for them to not forget the important matters at hand.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001807
text: That device is right here.{nl}If you record the matter into the device it prints it on the Registry Orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001808
text: For a short period of time, one will not forget the demands contained in the Orb.{nl}To make it simple, you can think of it as a type of suggestive brainwashing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001809
text: To create this Registry Orb we only need to record two sentences into the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001810
text: First

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001811
text: Deception Hauberk secretly discarded the monk need to transform the spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001812
text: {nl}Second

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001813
text: To attack Ambition Hauberk, the Monastery's systems were altered.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001814
text: Maybe there will not be enough words to choose from.{nl}Combine what you can and I will perfect the sentences.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001815
text: Rememebr, you only need to record two sentences into the Registry Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001816
text: Selecting the words must have been difficult, yet you did well and created the perfect Registry Orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001817
text: Among the Black Harugal are Ambition Hauberk's elite servants. They are marked with a special essence.{nl}This essence is difficult for the human eye to spot.{nl}However, there is a way around this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001818
text: Collect the essence of the Black Harugal and we can use it to create an orb that will be able to determine which of the Harugal are Ambition Hauberk's elite servants.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001819
text: Good.{nl}I will now make an orb that will be able to differentiate Ambition Hauberk's elite servants from amongst the Black Harugal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001820
text: Just insert the Black Harugal's essence into the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001821
text: Using the Black Harugal essence for comparison, I have made a Mark of Identification that can spot the elite servant.{nl}Use the Mark of Identification to single out Ambition Hauberk's elite servant and then use the Registry Orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001822
text: But I must deliver a warning before you go.{nl}The suggestive power of the Registry Orb does not last long.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001823
text: And if there is resistance, the effects of the Registry Orb will not be seen.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001824
text: You must work to weaken the Black Harugal before using the Orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001825
text: And when you use the Mark of Identification, a red glow will appear over the head of Ambition Hauberk's elite servant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001826
text: Ambition Hauberk will definitely go to Deception Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001827
text: Wait one moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001828
text: Since Elite King Hammer has not returned, distrust has grown inside Suspicion Hauberk. He is on his way to Deception Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001829
text: Give Monk Aistis Flurry's Device Parts and alter the equipment.{nl}When that is completed, Ambition Hauberk and Suspicion Hauberk will draw near.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001830
text: If Suspicion Hauberk and Ambition Hauberk see Deception Hauberk with humans, they will not stand idly by.{nl}Especially Ambition Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001831
text: When it appears that they will start to fight, Revelator, turn on the altered system.{nl}The Hauberks will back off when it reacts.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001832
text: Well then, take the portal device besides me and be on your way.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001833
text: What took you so long?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001834
text: It took you this long to find the parts? Well let me see the parts.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001835
text: You did not falter in this situation at all. Well done.{nl}Just as we prepared, the Hauberks will fight amongst themselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001836
text: There is great power in the Contract Token that will inflict both damage and sap one's energy.{nl}However, you cannot be careless.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001837
text: Hauberk will sustain a great amount of damage, but he will be stronger and will recover quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001838
text: Before Hauberk completely retains his power, all of Narvas Temple's energy will be directed to one location in order to defeat him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001839
text: I am speaking of the systems Aistis altered.{nl}In the Temple's control system is the Central Control Terminal. The Central Control Terminal will change the system's function set up.{nl}I can change the system myself but I cannot make the final decision.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001840
text: What I need, Revelator, is for you to make that decision.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001841
text: Good.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001842
text: Suspicion Hauberk's elite servants damaged the Central Control Terminal and carried away parts of it.{nl}I need you to find these parts and repair the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001843
text: Once the functions have been set, press the button and the temple's systems will stop running.{nl}This will also affect the systems outside of Narvas Temple.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001844
text: Right when the systems reboot use the portal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001845
text: Take the portal back to Deception Hauberk's Sealed Hall and battle Hauberk.{nl}I will power up the systems altered by Monk Aistis and when they reach the same level of power as Hauberk's I will inform you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001846
text: Use the system and attack him.{nl}And I know what I am asking of you is unreasonable.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001847
text: But I am not asking because you are the Revelator.{nl}I am asking because of the courage, will, and power I saw from you today.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001848
text: So, I ask that you help me see this to the end.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001849
text: Of the possible functions, some cannot be used.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001850
text: You we able to defeat Demon Lord Hauberk with your courage and powerful will.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001851
text: Since all of the temple system's energy was used while fighting Demon Lord Hauberk, it cannot function anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001852
text: I am also a part of the temple's system.{nl}This means that if all of its equipment ceases to function, so do I.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001853
text: That being said, I am honored that, together, we were able to defeat Demon Lord Hauberk.{nl}In your future is a blessing from the Goddess...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001854
text: If it's "stone" does it mean the tombstones by the trees?{nl}Let's go check the tombstones.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001855
text: This time too, will an apple grow from the singing trees?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001856
text: This time it's a blue apple.{nl}It's like the apples are saying something...but the message isn't clear.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001857
text: Parts of the song I understand and others I don't.{nl}However, I know of a place that has pillars with those three colors.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001858
text: Let's go straight to Tacasz Stream.{nl}We may learn something from there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001859
text: The perfect place to hide

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001860
text: It's the perfect place to hide.{nl}Will you hide here?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001861
text: As Suspicion Hauberk and Ambition Hauberk draw near, Deception Hauberk's plan will go down the drain.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001862
text: Be careful so that you are not discovered by either Suspicion Hauberk nor Ambition Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001863
text: It's time to make the Hauberks fight amongst themselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001864
text: I am working to stabilize the systems that were altered by Monk Aistis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001865
text: This forest carries with it an unidentifiable sound.{nl}Everyone says the forest is either cursed or haunted, but I think there is another reason.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001866
text: People avoid the forest because they can hear sounds coming from it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001869
text: Demon Goddess Giltine came to this place in search of Goddess Laima's revelation.{nl}That revelation should have been for you, Revelator.{nl}Goddess Vaivora believed that Demon Goddess Giltine was looking for a particular book.{nl}One that contained knowledge about her.{nl}But Goddess Laima did not want you to know this much about the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001870
text: This revelation contains truths meant for Giltine.{nl}You must do your best to lose it.{nl}Neringa will tell you Goddess Laima's predictions at the time when you are meant to know.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001871
text: Put your faith in Goddess Laima and Neringa shall work with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001872
text: Outside of us, no one else must learn of Goddess Laima's prediction.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001873
text: This is Goddess Vaivora's Fantasy Library, which has on record all of the world's knowledge and history.{nl}In this place, you can only view the information meant for you.{nl}You will not be able to see the books that do not.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001874
text: This place has history and wisdom about humanity that even the Goddesses themselves do not know about.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001875
text: In the far future, when you are ready to learn of it, you will be able to view it too.{nl}But now is not that time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001876
text: Neringa knew you would accept the invitation.{nl}And there is much that needs to be said.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001877
text: You and Neringa will go together to Goddess Vaivora's domain.{nl}Humans are meant to approach the location primarily by invitation.{nl}But this is still not the case.{nl}There is something you need to know.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001878
text: Starting from Neringa...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001879
text: Revelator, you must have some concerns about this current situation.{nl}Neringa will convey Goddess Laima's will to you.{nl}Yet only at the times deemed right.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001880
text: Together with Neringa, you will go to Fantasy Library.{nl}There you will meet with Goddess Vaivora and her Kupole helper.{nl}They will not welcome a human to the Fantasy Library.{nl}Please do not forget this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001881
text: Neringa recommended you for an invitation.{nl}You are here because Neringa helped you to gain the Goddess' trust.{nl}Please continue to build her trust in you.{nl}Focus on listening to her and completing her requests.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001882
text: Neringa will go first and wait for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001883
text: So, you are the Revelator.{nl}I have heard about you from Neringa.{nl}Where you come from and where you are being pulled towards...I have heard it all.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001884
text: {nl}Yet, I still have reservations about Neringa's judgement in inviting you here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001885
text: {nl}I assume you have already heard from Neringa what it that we do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001886
text: {nl}I asked Neringa as well.{nl}What can a human do for us here?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001887
text: You will have to prove yourself through sacrifice to answer that question.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001888
text: I strive to prevent humans like you from interrupting the Goddesses' work.{nl}Go help Neringa.{nl}That is something you can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001889
text: As you can see, at the moment there is no opportunity for you to join Goddess Vaivora's plans.{nl}So, solve her smaller issues to gain her trust.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001890
text: The defensive system in Sausis Room 9 is weak, allowing demons to trespass easily.{nl}But Goddess Vaivora's Kupole cannot stop them alone.{nl}It would be good to take her place.{nl}Defeat a few of the demons and you will gain a lot of her trust.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001891
text: Your ability is already known.{nl}How much you can do is also already known.{nl}Meaning, what you need to know is already known.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001892
text: You did well.{nl}Right now Goddess Vaivora is in Valandis Room 3 preparing a trap to capture Demon Goddess Giltine.{nl}She thinks that Giltine wants to get her hands on the book that's about her.{nl}It's not proper work for a goddess, but Giltine won't fall for just any trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001893
text: You will have to work hard to gain Goddess Vaivora's trust.{nl}But the time, and the work that you have to do, has already been decided.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001894
text: Set your mind towards protecting the Goddess' very precious records.{nl}Everywhere is flooded with demons destroying them.{nl}Please go and collect these Scattered Records.{nl}Doing something as simple as this will surely attract the Goddess' attention.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001895
text: It would be a great honor for a human to be involved in the fate of the Goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001896
text: Doing this much will draw the Goddess' attention.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001897
text: Goddess Vaivora believes that if Giltine is removed everything will be solved.{nl}This means isolating her from the rest of the world.{nl}But everything that happens is influenced by the demons themselves.{nl}Even if Demon Goddess Giltine disappears other, more uncontrollable versions of her will take her place.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001898
text: {nl}Sadly, Goddess Vaivora does not have faith in Goddess Laima's predictions.{nl}She also does not have faith in you, who was selected by Laima.{nl}Therefore, here, together with the hand of faith, you must match Goddess Laima's prediction.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001899
text: Kupole Rugile is alone in Sausis Room 9 dealing with the demons.{nl}Despite being Vaivora's Kupole, she will not be able to handle them all alone.{nl}You must help Kupole Rugile.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001900
text: {nl}However, Vaivora's Kupole will be weary of you since you are a human.{nl}Before approaching her, remove the Kupole trap set by the demons.{nl}Rugile will show interest in you after this.{nl}And,of course, this interest will be conveyed to Goddess Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001901
text: We must be aware of the situation.{nl}Observe everything and tell Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001902
text: Kupole Rugile

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001903
text: You are the human Neringa invited.{nl}There is something a human can do to to help us...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001904
text: You seem strong enough and ready to serve the goddess.{nl}If there is no other place you must be, can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001905
text: It's a difficult situation.{nl}Vaivora and I sealed off all of the passages used by the demons.{nl}But how are they still able to enter?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001906
text: {nl}Certainly, by someone's help they are entering.{nl}This scroll can detect the small gaps in which the demons are using to invade.{nl}With this scroll, find the point of invasion and remove it.{nl}I will not be able to hold out for long if this continues.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001907
text: This place has been run by Goddess Vaivora and the Kupoles for a long time.{nl}This place is unbeknownst even to the followers of Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001908
text: Well done.{nl}Maybe you will be able to help Goddess Vaivora just like us Kupoles.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001909
text: It's more than just a few demons that have entered.{nl}And they are ruining the library.{nl}I do not know what it is they seek, but I cannot allow them to touch the records at will.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001910
text: {nl}Please get rid of the demons you see in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001911
text: Possibly the records of the great and unnamed kings have already disappeared. {nl}As time passes, so will more and more records.{nl}Please stop the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001912
text: Thank you so much.{nl}Thanks to you we can protect the records that are under our care.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001913
text: After seeing your actions here, it seems you would be an even greater help to the Goddess.{nl}We will tell the Goddess of your courage and sacrifice.{nl}Now return to Neringa and tell her of your accomplishments.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001914
text: And, by all means, please use your power in the correct place.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001915
