text: You have returned.{nl}The news of you helping Rugile has been passed on to Goddess Vaivora.{nl}We can now move on to the next stage.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001916
text: You with Neringa will meet someone you have had a long ill-fated relationship with.{nl}Let's go to Sausis Room 10.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001917
text: You are the first to be invited here.{nl}In the past, there was commotion because of those who were not invited.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001918
text: Not yet.{nl}I will call you when it is time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001919
text: Slowly more and more demons are invading.{nl}It's hard for me to figure out alone how they are coming here.{nl}I've done all I've could but it's not enough.{nl}However, if you can help me, I will be able to gather some time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001920
text: Suspicious magic gathering demons have been found.{nl}If you can defeat them, it will decrease the amount of demons coming this way.{nl}Please do this for us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001921
text: Although I know a great scale of the Fantasy Library, there are thousands of areas.{nl}If the demons enter through another location this will cause huge problems.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001922
text: At least I have one less nuisance to deal with.{nl}I appreciate your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001923
text: The invading demons are damaging the books.{nl}They do not hesitate with their meaningless plundering.{nl}Maybe their leader said to destroy whatever they could get their hands on.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001924
text: If you want to help the Goddess don't allow them to run away with the records.{nl}Please recover the unidentified records that the demon's stole.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001925
text: We still have not found a place for all that is contained in the Fantasy Library.{nl}The records that Vaivora and us, the Kupole, still need to classify are slowly coming in.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001926
text: I see the damaged records.{nl}Those demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001927
text: After this is done, Vaivora will punish those demons.{nl} Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001928
text: Everything has been decided.{nl}Even if you try to fight your destiny, the end will be the same.{nl}You are on the right track.{nl}You are doing well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001929
text: Vaivora will help solve everything.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001930
text: Goddess Vaivora has almost completed her plan.{nl}But we cannot have the Beholder interfere.{nl}Your work here should stand out.{nl}Therefore, Vaivora will have a request for you in the next District.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001931
text: This place is overrun with the Beholder's plans.{nl}Everywhere the Kupole are falling into its traps and getting into trouble.{nl}We must rid Sausis Room 10 of the Beholder's shadow.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001932
text: Destroy the first corrupted crystal.{nl}If you leave the corrupted crystal alone, the Beholder and the demons will continue to harass the Kupole.{nl}And, remember, the fact that Neringa is here must not be revealed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001933
text: The Beholder thinks the situation will go according to plan.{nl}But everything will go as predicted.{nl}Focus on your role.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001934
text: Destroying that many will be enough.{nl}It will be troublesome if the Beholder becomes aware of us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001935
text: There should be an easy way to get rid of the corrupted crystals.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001936
text: Kupole Saya is dealing with the invading demons here.{nl}But there were so many, she went into hiding to replenish her energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001937
text: {nl}You will present a good impression if you defeat the demons that are near her.{nl}Defeat the demons and then go to Kupole Saya.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001938
text: There is no better way.{nl}Follow the chosen path.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001939
text: Kupole Saya

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001940
text: You are the human traveling with Neringa.{nl}I'm surprised that a human can defeat these demons.{nl}You could be a powerful asset to Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001941
text: As the demons invaded they destroyed most of the protection crystals.{nl}If they are not restored the demons will treat this place like their house.{nl}If you want to help Vaivora, first help to restore the protection crystals.{nl}Please lend a hand.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001942
text: The protection crystals were shattered into Trasium Pieces. {nl}Please collect as many Trasium Pieces as possible and return to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001943
text: I do not know how far you will accomplish..{nl}but I will not refuse you even if you fail.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001944
text: {nl}Whereever you go, you are still just human.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001945
text: I'm surprised!{nl}You have completely changed my thoughts about humans.{nl}Have all humans become as strong as you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001946
text: While you were away Neringa contacted me.{nl}I told her about your skillfulness.{nl}But Neringa's thinking seem a little different.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001947
text: You did well.{nl}Saya has praised you.{nl}Now there is only one more Kupole to save.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001948
text: I'm planning to collect Trasium Pieces in order to restore the protection crystals.{nl}I hope we can use your strength when the time comes.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001949
text: The Beholder has installed a magic prison to keep the Kupole trapped.{nl}Goddess Vaivora's main helper, Kupole Ouida is there as well.{nl}If you save her, Goddess Vaivora's expectations of you will rise.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001950
text: {nl}Destroy the magic prison and save Kupole Ouida.{nl}She will then have a request for you.{nl}After that we will meet the Beholder.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001951
text: I trust and follow you in accordance with the prediction.{nl}Refrain from unnecessary actions and concentrate on your role.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001952
text: Kupole Ouida

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001953
text: And you are?{nl}A human I see...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001954
text: I thought I would be saved by Vaivora..{nl}It's not what I expected but thank you for rescuing me.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001955
text: The Beholder has installed magical prisons everywhere.{nl}The Kupole are in a state of confusion allowing the Beholder to rummage through the library.{nl}But we cannot allow this to continue.{nl}Will you allow them to roam around Vaivora's library?{nl}Open your eyes.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001956
text: {nl}The reason they can roam here is because the protection crystals were destroyed.{nl}The remaining one is being attacked by the demons now.{nl}Ride this transportation device to the crystal.{nl}Defeat them all with your power.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001957
text: You do not need to return to Ouida.{nl}Time is short. We must go to Goddess Vaivora after facing him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001958
text: The Beholder must be growing aware that their plan is falling apart.{nl}Soon the Beholder will be here.{nl}Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001959
text: The Beholder follows Demon Goddess Giltine but shows no interest in her safety.{nl}We must leave here.{nl}With Neringa, you will need to go to Valandis Room 2.{nl}When you are ready, follow.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001960
text: {nl}Neringa will go first and wait for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001961
text: The Beholder still does not know you and Neringa are here.{nl}Neringa will stay out of the way until the Beholder thinks the task is done.{nl}If Neringa is discovered here, Giltine will be alerted.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001962
text: {nl}Now we have to let them destroy the Fantasy Library.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001963
text: Why did they come here at this time?{nl}This is troublesome.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001964
text: Talk of you helping Vaivora's Kupoles is circulating amongst them.{nl}Goddess Vaivora will come to look for you soon.{nl}She will trust in you and tell you her plans.{nl}But you and Neringa's plans differ from the Goddess Vaivora's.{nl}Don't forget this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001965
text: {nl}Listen politely to all the Goddess has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001966
text: {nl}Goddess is coming.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001967
text: In fact, Goddess Vaivora has more conviction than Neringa thought.{nl}Neringa will need to execute this plan more precisely.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001968
text: Kupole Litae and Danute are in charge of this area.{nl}Kupole Danute will still be unsure about you.{nl}But defeat the demons and she will come you way.{nl}Please listen to her request.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001969
text: {nl}For Neringa's role, Neringa will leave first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001970
text: Kupole Litae

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001971
text: I can't believe you came here, but even more so, I can't believe your skills.{nl}I've heard of your courage and sacrifice from the other Kupole.{nl}Thank you very much for coming to help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001972
text: You've arrived.{nl}Did Kupole Litae greet you well?{nl}The Kupole are also different in their thinking and personalities.{nl}Some listen better than others.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001973
text: Goddess Vaivora will come to find you again.{nl}But before that, there is something you need to prepare.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001974
text: You and Neringa will face Giltine in Valandis Room 91.{nl}The Demon Goddess can take your life with just one finger.{nl}So please find some Nobrenal Blueprints so that Neringa may use them to protect you.{nl}With Neringa's divine energy and that item, it will be possible to hold back her power.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001975
text: Unfortunately, Goddess Laima cannot protect you.{nl}However, Neringa will tell you how to protect yourself.{nl}Believe Neringa and follow what Neringa says.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001976
text: That should be enough.{nl}Neringa will tell you when it is time to use it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001977
text: Now go to Goddess Vaivora.{nl}There are still parts Neringa needs to prepare for the plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001978
text: Your help is making the final preparations much easier.{nl}Now, please help us one last time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001979
text: {nl}I must leave this place to examine Giltine's actions more closely.{nl}Kupole Danute is coming so please lend a hand.{nl}I hope that you help her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001980
text: Kupole Danute

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001981
text: As Vaivora predicted, the demons are gathering her to make it easier for Giltine to enter.{nl}There is no time to waste so I must ask you for two items.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001982
text: The first is Dimensional Essence.{nl}That will be easy to find around here.{nl}The last one will be a problem...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001983
text: Defeat the demons and gather their magic source.{nl}After collecting both, come back here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001984
text: Now with this you can defend the protection crystals.{nl}I will combine this and make you a tool.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001985
text: The protection crystals are under attack!{nl}Since all of the library's energy is directed towards the trap,{nl}there is only one protection crystal guarding this area.{nl}If the protection crystals are not working,{nl}Giltine will still be able to escape even if we seal her within our trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001986
text: Take this tool and until the protection crystals are recharged, fend off the demons!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001987
text: Thank you!{nl}And Neringa has returned as well.{nl}I will go and help with Vaivora's seal.{nl}I'm grateful for your help!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001988
text: Vaivora has finished her seal for Giltine.{nl}Unfortunately, Giltine will not appear this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001989
text: Please remain calm and do as Vaivora instructed.{nl}Come back to Neringa when the work there is done.{nl}Neringa is preparing for the next plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001990
text: That is a record.{nl}Neringa will give it back to Vaivora.{nl}Right now you must deal with the embarrased Goddess of Knowledge.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001991
text: Goddess Vaivora knows much more than you or Neringa, expect for the future.{nl}Therefore it is impossible to convince Vaivora

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001992
text: Vaivora will now make an extreme choice.{nl}Give up the revelation and remove Giltine from this world.{nl}She still thinks that is correct.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001993
text: In the meantime, let's move to Valandis Room 3.{nl}There you and Neringa will listen to the Goddess plans and follow.{nl}Neringa will go first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001994
text: Goddess Vaivora has instructed you to collect all the magical energy that can be used on the Sealing Altar.{nl}There are devices around the library that you can collect the magic from.{nl}Please activate them.{nl}The activated magic devices will go where they are needed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001995
text: There was a human who came here without an invitation.{nl}But you are the first to be formally invited.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001996
text: That looks like enough.{nl}Also, Neringa is looking for you.{nl}It would be good if you go.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001997
text: {nl}I will finish the rest of the work here.{nl} I will be off.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001998
text: I'm surprised by your work.{nl}Human potential seems to know no bounds.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_001999
text: To play a part in continuing human history, I will tell you something.{nl}Several hundred years ago, Demon Goddess Giltine had already invaded this place.{nl}She was looking for a record of herself.{nl}But at the time she could not obtain it.{nl}So she comes again today.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002000
text: I do not know where she will use it.{nl}But she is coming to this place soon to get her hands on that record.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002001
text: We have taken advantage of her greed by preparing a trap.{nl}As she becomes overcome with joy for finally getting her hands on the record, she will disappear from this world.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002002
text: If she disappears from this world, every problem will be solved.{nl}All of the Goddesses will return to their rightful places and you too may go home.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002003
text: For this I need your help.{nl}My Kupole are in the final stages of perfecting the trap.{nl}Please help them.{nl}I also have last minute preparations.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002004
text: Once again, thank you for your courage and you sacrifice.{nl}For the sake of the world, please endure just a little bt longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002005
text: Please collect them quickly!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002006
text: How's the protection crystal?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002007
text: Danute is still unfocused.{nl}This may be a handful for a human such as yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002008
text: But if you have nothing else to do...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002009
text: Vaivora wants to destroy part of the Fantasy Library in order to prevent others from entering.{nl}But it will not go according to the Goddess' wish.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002010
text: It's quite unfortunate.{nl}To ensure that the prediction comes true, you must artfully disrupt the Goddess's plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002011
text: And the Goddess must not know that you and Neringa are the ones to blame.{nl}So follow the Goddess's plans for awhile.{nl}When it is time to execute our own plan, Neringa will call you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002012
text: To sacrifice a part of the district to capture Giltine.{nl}Vaivora's plan seems reckless.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002013
text: Vaivora will ask you to activate the sealing device set up in Valandis Room 3.{nl}Go about the task.{nl}Neringa will also do as such.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002014
text: {nl}Go to Vaivora.{nl}Neringa will call you when it is time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002015
text: Time is running out and there are not many Kupoles remaining that I can call...{nl}You will be able to help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002016
text: {nl}Here Skywa is helping me to operate the Bluenode Collapsing Device.{nl}But the energy from this device is calling demons to it.{nl}Please go there and protect the device for me.{nl}If we lose even one, Giltine will slip away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002017
text: It hurts me as well to make such a decision.{nl}And I will bear this crime for eternity.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002018
text: {nl}But to save the world from Giltine's grip...{nl}It's an expensive sacrifice that must be done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002019
text: Amazing!{nl}The activated collapsing device will conceal its magic, and will not face attack again.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002020
text: {nl}Now Skywa will activate the collapsing device remotely.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002021
text: Next we need to activate the second collapsing device.{nl}However, it does not have enough energy to run.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002022
text: Gather the Monumental Magic Source around the area of the second collapsing device.{nl}After that, listen to Neringa about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002023
text: {nl}I will return after surveilling Valandis Room 91.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002024
text: I will not be gone long.{nl}However, while I am away please consult Neringa if you need help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002025
text: Our goal is to cause the Balanorth Collapsing Device to overload.{nl}Until then we will continue to follow Vaivora's plan, so as to not alert suspicion.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002026
text: Skywa is walking around and managing the collapsing devices.{nl}Operating them is simple enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002027
text: Insert the Monumental Magic Source that you have in your possession into the device.{nl}As the device re-energizes, protect it until it can conceal its magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002028
text: Right now the Goddess is checking on Demon Goddess Giltine's rampage in Valandis Room 91.{nl}As pressing as the matter is, the Goddess will not use the Fantasy Library as a burial ground for Giltine.{nl}Please follow the plan thoughtfully and reliably.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002029
text: You have successfully energized the device.{nl}It's good to know the plan is right on schedule.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002030
text: {nl}Giltine is currently in Valandis Room 91 searching frankly for the revelation.{nl}Let us finally finish the task before us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002031
text: Now, there are only a few devices left to run.{nl}But is there enough time to leave everything to Skywa...{nl}And it would be difficult to protect.{nl}Would you be willing to help Skywa?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002032
text: {nl}Make your way to Ballandans collapsing device.{nl}Skywa will be waiting for you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002033
text: Kupole Skywa

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002034
text: The human helping Vaivora is you?{nl}This is my first time seeing one, but you seem particularly strong.{nl}I have a job for you..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002035
text: Skywa cannot complete this work alone.{nl}Make sure to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002036
text: Not too long ago, I set the Ballandans Collapsing Device.{nl}I was going to activate another device here as well, but the demons swarmed me.{nl}If I waste my time on them, I won't be able to finish the work Vaivora gave me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002037
text: {nl}How about clearing out those demons from around the Ballandans collapsing device?{nl}You just need to protect it until the device is set and conceals itself..{nl}While you deal with this, I'll be able to go and finish my other remaining tasks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002038
text: Thank you so much!{nl}Humans are so kind, no?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002039
text: {nl}Alright, I'm going to go finish my other preparations.{nl}I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002040
text: Your help is appreciated.{nl}Thanks to you, Skywa was able to complete the rest of the preparations.{nl}Now only Balanorth collapsing device is left.{nl}Shall I give this remaining task to you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002041
text: {nl}When all is ready, just turn on the device.{nl}Oh, right Neringa was looking for you.{nl}It seems she also needs your help.{nl}I'll wait here for your successful return.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002042
text: Everything has been prepared.{nl}And Vaivora has no reason to distrust you.{nl}You received the request to handle the Balanorth collapsing device, no?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002043
text: When activating that device, the demon leaders will appear and interrupt you.{nl}When the demon leaders are defeated they will release great amounts of energy.{nl}We will use that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002044
text: Please lure the head monsters closer to the Balanorth device and defeat them there.{nl}Their released energy will overheat the device and destroy it.{nl}Then Vaivora's mission will fail in its final step.{nl}Once you have completed this task, you and Neringa will go together to Valandis Room 91.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002045
text: {nl}Please do not forget.{nl}You must defeat the head monsters when they are nearest to the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002046
text: All of history is recorded in Fantasy Library.{nl}Of course, records about you are also here.{nl}This is a situation where a human is involved in both Goddess and demon history.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002047
text: {nl}But, sadly, it will not be recorded.{nl}Neringa has destroyed all records of your involvement.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002048
text: Vaivora has sensed that something has gone wrong.{nl}She believed all to be finished.{nl}But right now there is no reason to care about her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002049
text: {nl}Neringa will head towards Valandis Room 91 first.{nl}I will inform Vaivora that the plan has failed.{nl}Then you must come straight to Valandis Room 91.{nl}Neringa will wait for you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002050
text: How did it turn out like this?{nl}The device isn't responding.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002051
text: You've failed me.{nl}Now I see the human limits.{nl}I was stupid...{nl}But it's not your fault.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002052
text: It was my fault for giving such an important task to a human.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002053
text: I...{nl}The next plan is...{nl}To stop Giltine I could...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002054
text: Everywhere has become polluted and ruined by Demon Goddess Giltine.{nl}Vaivora, before she destroys everything, us included, you must take action.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002055
text: At this point...{nl}All we can do is collapse the Fantasy Library and trap Giltine...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002056
text: It's no use.{nl}There is a no way a human can complete against a Demon Goddess...{nl}However, a human chosen by Laima may be different.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002057
text: {nl}I wish not to put you harm's way.{nl}But I need you to buy us some time until the Kupole and I can figure out how to trap Giltine.{nl}Right now, this is our best plan...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002058
text: Demon Goddess Giltine is summoning her demons to Valandis Room 91.{nl}Neringa is sure she is residing there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002059
text: {nl}You need to stop Giltine before she gets her hands on the revelation and escapes.{nl}To do this you must destroy the dimensional doors used to summon the demons.{nl}Then, you and Neringa will need to prepare a way to keep you safe from Giltine.{nl}But first, destroy the doors.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002060
text: This incident is coming to and end just as the Goddess predicted.{nl}And your role has become more important.{nl}Neringa will make the necessary preparations and, during this time,{nl}destroy as many Dimensional Doors as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002061
text: We have almost reached where Demon Goddess Giltine is residing.{nl}Nearby is the revelation Goddess Laima prepared for Giltine.{nl}Giltine has already burned her way through the library to reach that one revelation.{nl}And Goddess Laima has said that you also must be there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002062
text: {nl}Stay near Neringa.{nl}Neringa will keep you safe.{nl}But you must also keep Neringa safe from the demon minions.{nl}Now let us follow Giltine.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002063
text: {nl}Now we only need to follow Giltine.{nl}Stay close. If you get too far away from Neringa, you will be struck by Giltine's power.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002064
text: The time has come to end this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002065
text: Goddess Laima spoke of a day where Giltine's black wings will be broken.{nl}But this is not that day.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002066
text: {nl}From here forward, you will face Giltine alone.{nl}Neringa did not appear in the final scene of Goddess Laima's prediction.{nl}Under the black wing's shadow is the future.{nl}Suppress your fear and continue forward.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002067
text: Fate, itself, will protect you.{nl}Go forth.{nl}You are the Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002068
text: You have successfully fulfilled Goddess Laima's prediction.{nl}Then, Neringa's role here is done.{nl}But the journey for you has not come to an end.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002069
text: Now that this is over, Goddess Laima wishes to guide you to Astral Tower.{nl}At the tower will be a revelation for you to find.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002070
text: At Astral Tower there will be new hardships and revelations waiting for you.{nl}However, all of this follows from Goddess Laima. You will be safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002071
text: Before leaving, report to Vaivora that the revelation was not retrieved.{nl}And that Neringa has also left.{nl}She will not ask you why.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002072
text: I see.. this is how things turned out..{nl}I appreciate your courage and sacrifice.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002073
text: This is the second time I have missed Giltine is my own library.{nl}It seems Laima and my sisters will berate me for this...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002074
text: I knew that Neringa would leave eventually.{nl}She was always around but her presence was never imposing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002075
text: If we ever meet again, there is much I want to ask.{nl}But it will have to wait until the world is freed from Giltine's grasp.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002076
text: Once again thank you for your sacrifice.{nl}And my apologies.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002077
text: Please take this with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002078
text: This power was something given to me by Laima through Neringa.{nl}And it was Neringa who told me to pass this on to you, once everything was finished.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002079
text: Resistor Skirgaila

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002080
text: I'm sorry to suddenly stop you, but could you lend me a hand.{nl}We, as part of the resistance, are doing recon in this area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002081
text: But as were going about this task, the Beholder came and kidnapped our Lieutenant.{nl}There is no one else who can help.Please, please rescue our Lieutenant..

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002082
text: Sorry, I'm really sorry.If we were more focused, this never would have happened..{nl}To push this request on you so suddenly..but a person's life hangs in the balance. Please, I beg you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002083
text: Our relationship is in the gutter, but I'm willing to make a deal with you here.{nl}And of course, our intentions are none of your concern.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002084
text: But you want to save the so-called Lieutenant, and I want to make a simple deal with you that involves Demon Lord Solcomm.{nl}Think before answering.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002085
text: Alright, here it is. Nearby, Solcomm has installed a Crystal Stone to supply himself with magic power.{nl}Your task is to use this Orb to absorb the magic from the stone and return it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002086
text: Oh, and I was told that the Crystal Stone is protected by something or another.{nl}You can just investigate that by yourself. You got this, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002087
text: Alright, good.The Crystal Stone we need to work on is the one in Prieblanda Rest Place.{nl}There are pillars near the stone, so maybe that's the defense systems.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002088
text: If you activate them in order, the defense field rotating around the crystal will disappear. That will be your cue to absorb the energy.{nl}If you mess up, it won't be a huge problem. But it'll be incredibly annoying.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002089
text: You still haven't absorbed the Crystal Stone's energy, yet you show no fear. Why is that?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002090
text: I'll say it again. Activate each of the pillars in Prieblanda Rest Place in order and when the defense field disappears,{nl}absorb the energy from the Crystal Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002091
text: There will come a time where you will need my help. Alright, let's move on.{nl}Did you really think doing one task would be enough? Of course not.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002092
text: The Crystal Stone I knew the most about was the one in Prieblanda. I only know the location of the others.{nl}The next one is at Lemtis Lot. I'll leave investigating the defense systems and absorbing the magic to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002093
text: Why do I want to get rid of Solcomm?{nl}Do you really think that I, the bearer of concepts that existed before humans, will share them with someone such as yourself?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002094
text: Looks like you succeeded again. Yet, I'm getting a suspicious vibe.{nl}Hm, well, right now the Crystal Stones are most important.{nl}Let's move on.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002095
text: The next Crystal Stone is in Zibukas Crossroad.{nl}Go ahead first to investigate and I'll follow soon after.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002096
text: You would think that guy would have appeared by now...Of course, the intelligence was correct.{nl}Don't question things you haven't heard. Now stop staring and let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002097
text: You sense a strange energy around the Crystal?{nl}It seems that Crystal Stone is protected by a different type of magic. You'll just have to neutralize its effects.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002098
text: I gave you a magic nullifying tool, no? The time has come for you to use it.{nl}Right now it has no power, but defeat a few of Solcomm's minions and monsters and fill it up with their spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002099
text: Fill the tool magic by defeating the monsters and Solcomm's minions in the area.{nl}When it's fully charged, go and remove the magic around the Crystal Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002100
text: And like that, the Stone in this area has been handled...But still...{nl}There should have been some sort of appearance when that human broke the first Crystal Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002101
text: Are you acting more cautious than before, or are you scared?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002102
text: The human I brought along ended up breaking the Crystal Stone that was here.{nl}Trying to make my life difficult, I see.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002103
text: But despite all this, Solcomm has yet to appear.{nl}And now that I think about it, outside Zibukas Crossroad hasn't been checked. I'll have to inspect there as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002104
text: If Solcomm isn't found, then this whole process has been meaningless.{nl}This doesn't bode well for you either. Go check the location I mentioned.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002105
text: Since there was a trap in place, there was no use. That's how he kept his Demon Lord status. Pretty arrogant, no?{nl}One can understand Pbeta's interest. Anyway, since there was a trap there, that means he's in this area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002106
text: Well, even if it's not necessarily a trap, I think Solcomm is hiding in this area looking for his chance.{nl}Don't be a chicken. Look carefully and smoke him out.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002107
text: It's disappointing that Solcomm escaped this time, but he won't be free of me so easily.{nl}There are very few places where he can run off too, so it's only a matter of time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002108
text: I'm completely grateful that you completed my request, despite its unreasonableness.{nl}And now I know it's shameless to ask you for another, but I do have a favor to ask.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002109
text: Our task here is to do recon on the area but certain circumstances have made it difficult.{nl}I trust your strength and I ask for your help. With it, we can safely complete our work here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002110
text: Really thank you! The first task is to burn the demon's supply chests.{nl}Before you arrived, I had investigated the area and found a few of them here and there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002111
text: The supplies have yet to be arranged.{nl}We cannot miss this opportunity to cause some confusion. I'll provide the materials needed to start a fire, so please help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002112
text: What's happening here... It was quite a lucky chance to come here and see Solcomm's movements.{nl}And the Crystal Stone to be broken... the Lieutenant should have been more careful...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002113
text: Thank you. The demons will also face some confusion over their disappearing supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002114
text: Seeing as how strong you are, I hope that you can help with another task.{nl}Zibukas Crossroad is always overrun with demons that it makes recon incredibly difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002115
text: What I'm saying is: our information is a bit outdated. Please take this Parchment and{nl}record the overall layout of the area in that direction. Would this be possible?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002116
text: For a long time we have been unable to investigate Zibukas Crossroad due to the number of demons.{nl}The resistance would greatly benefit from your help in this matter.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002117
text: Thanks to you we can finally update our information.{nl}This will surely help the resistance's future plans. Thank you very much.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002118
text: You mentioned some wagons in the record you wrote. The demons must be using them to move their supplies.{nl}I'll give you the tools necessary to burn down those wagons. Then, the demons will also face some hardships.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002119
text: If it wasn't for you, we would have missed these small details.{nl}The information you have recorded for us, will help the resistance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002120
text: Well done! For the time being, the supply line to this direction has been cut.{nl}You did us a great favor. Really, thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002121
text: Thanks to you, our task has become a bit easier but those demons still weigh on my mind...{nl}To help our recon work run more smoothly, could you please get rid of the demons in the area?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002122
text: I am forever indebted to you. And I'm sure the Goddess will also hear of the work you have done for us

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002123
text: Just amazing! Work will go on a bit more smoothly now.{nl}Of course, completely eliminating the demons will be difficult, but you are free to try.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002124
text: Resistor Abraomas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002125
text: If it's okay with you, I have a small request. Actually a new recruit who went looking for the Lieutenant went missing.{nl}I went searching for him myself but its a bit hard for me to keep moving.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002126
text: Any kind of information would be good..{nl}In this vicinity, if you find a clue about the new recruit will you please inform me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002127
text: Please... let him be safe. I worry so much. He is full of guts but has so much to learn...Hah.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002128
text: T-This...belonged to out new recruit! Then this means something did happen.{nl} Ohhh...if only he was more careful...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002129
text: If... he's really gone... M-maybe across there...? But that would be dangerous!{nl}The number of demons there... I'm sorry but could you please go across there and look for him?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002130
text: Thank you. I want to go myself but... as you can see, Officer Skirgaila said it is dangerous...{nl}Please go in my stead...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002131
text: Any kind of trace of him would be good. No matter what you come across, please tell me.{nl}This person is very important to me...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002132
text: That... belonged to him. That was the extra dragger he carried with him.{nl}Ohh, after gathering all these clues, is it still okay to believe he is still alive?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002133
text: The last place is Lanko 22 Waters.. that's the demon's post. Which makes me more worried.{nl}Could you please check this final location? Ah, his name

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002134
text: Leonardas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002135
text: Leonardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002136
text: Although we are not blood relatives, this recruit is like a brother to me.{nl}He always looked up to me and followed me into the army...If he disappears I...Ohhh...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002137
text: Resistor Leonardas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002138
text: Wh-Who are you? You? Abraomas asked you to come find me? Ha, haha...thank you.{nl}I really though...I would die...really...I've caused so much trouble...Ah, again, thank you for coming.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002139
text: I have something to do so, you, go to Lanko 22 Waters. Find Solcomm and kill him.{nl}If you try to pull anything funny, just remember that I have the person you're looking for.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002140
text: ...You've arrived. You've received a request from the Beholder to kill me, no?{nl}Before you do, I have a question. What did the Beholder say about me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002141
text: So that's what he thinks... and you are forced to work with him. I understand everything now.{nl}I'll tell you this. The energy that the Beholder has asked you to gather is not mine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002142
text: The true purpose of the Crystal Stones is to record information about the area. In other words, what you collected was information.{nl}Now image if this fell into the Beholder's hands..Where will he use it, I wonder.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002143
text: You understand quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002144
text: Killing me

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002145
text: was the request, but there was none for destroying the Crystal Stone.{nl}That's the key. I would recommend interrupting his little plan by destroying them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002146
text: I wouldn't say anything bad to a person who was taken advantage of. Now, tell me your thoughts.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002147
text: Your task is to destroy the two Crystal Stones here and the remaining ones in Lanko 26 Waters.{nl}The ones here and the ones there are connected so using the self-destruction device will work fine. It won't be dangerous.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002148
text: Start with the ones over here. Negilus Inner Court is the closest so check that Crystal Stone first.{nl}The security devices are running, so destroy them all. If you do, the Crystal Stone will follow.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002149
text: Not only that one, but other Crystal Stones are protected in various ways.{nl}This is protect the records from others. What? This information isn't exclusive.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002150
text: Well... you can also see it from your view.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002151
text: Hm... fascinating. Next, the Crystal Stone in the garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002152
text: The Stone in the garden is protected by magic, just like the ones you saw in the crossroads in Lanko 26 Waters.{nl}The easiest way to destroy it is to use a bomb that can penetrate and remove magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002153
text: You will have to make this bomb yourself. Here is the recipe and the materials.{nl} The rest are roots that you will have to gather from Lily Velly and Jelly Velly. Once the bomb is made, use it to destroy the Crystal Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002154
text: Until now the Beholder has only sent his minions and has not appeared himself.{nl}What is he planning...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002155
text: Very good. Now to address the Crystal Stone in Lanko 26 Waters.{nl}We can overlook what type of plan he is devising, but we cannot allow the Beholder to have his way.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002156
text: The self-destruction device is hidden between the rocks in Dregnas Lot. Find it and activate it.{nl}But it will take some time, so I recommend keeping a lookout.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002157
text: Based on what you told me, I've realized that changing the Beholder's mind won't be possible.{nl}Instead, I'm going to thwart his plans. This is the conclusion I've come to.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002158
text: Now all of the Crystal Stone's are gone. The Beholder must be pulling hairs since his plan had been interrupted.{nl}And he will be on his way. Before all is revealed, I have another request for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002159
text: This request may be difficult for you to accept.{nl}But if you think of your future, this could be profitable. What do you think? Here me out.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002160
text: Although the result was different from intended, it was acceptable.{nl}I've already returned the Lieutenant you were looking for.He's possibly on his way back to the other resistance members by now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002161
text: Well then, we'll part ways here. Stay alive, at least until we meet again.{nl}That will be my reward, no?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002162
text: I would like to return, but I've hurt myself here and there, making it hard for me to move.{nl}Would you mind lending me a hand?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002163
text: Thank you. Could you collect the materials I need?{nl}First you need to water the Lily Velly and Jelly Velly that live here with lake water and then gather their leaves.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002164
text: Have you heard? The water from Star Struck Lake Water is fatal to demons.{nl}What I'm making now will not be as effective, but I'm trying to make it as close to the level of Star Struck Lake as I can.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002165
text: Thank you. Now let's move on to the next stage.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002166
text: I'm trying to craft magical sap that has the effect of Star Struck Lake. However, we need something more than just the leaf.{nl}There are catalysts that promote magical reactions in the demons' storage nearby. Could you bring those to me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002167
text: I found that storage in the past while trying to hide from demons.{nl}After going inside, I found a box, and saw the catalyst inside. I wanted to make something like this with the catalyst ever since.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002168
text: Thank you! All that's left to do is to make the sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002169
text: We're almost done! Can you craft some sap with the ingredients and the bottle I gave you?{nl}Here is the recipe for the sap. I'm sure you're much better at doing things like this than I am...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002170
text: I really hope this works like I hope it does. Everyone must be worried sick about me.{nl}I've even disobeyed orders to come here??I know I'll be in trouble, but I still want to go back soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002171
text: You're back! We'll be done after testing this sap on a demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002172
text: Here is a bottle of the sap we've made. Find a demon to test this on.{nl}If it works, you'll see its effects immediately. After that, please make sure to deal with the affected demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002173
text: How did it go? Did you have any trouble dealing with the demons?{nl}This is the first time I've actually made the sap, so I hope it worked.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002174
text: Thank you! I think I've mostly recovered while you were making the sap.{nl}All I have to do now is go back with the sap!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002175
text: Wait! I'm sorry to bother you, but I need to get back to my friends. However, I'm hurt...{nl}If you can, will you get rid of the demons around here to help me get back to my friends?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002176
text: There are lots of demons scattered around the way back to my friends.{nl}Would you get rid of these demons for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002177
text: Everyone must be worried about me... I disobeyed orders to find my lieutenant...{nl}I hope Adjutant General and everyone else is okay...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002178
text: Thank you. There are still some demons left in the area, but the situation has gotten much better.{nl}If possible, come back anytime to help me a bit more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002179
text: This is troubling... I guess when it rains, it pours...{nl}Hey! Here! Ahh... Never mind. Sorry to bother you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002180
text: My heart goes to you for helping us.{nl}Without you, we would still be regretting what we've done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002181
text: Ah, it's you. Welcome. I've just heard that our lieutenant has returned. I truly appreciate your help!{nl}For now, we'll stay here a bit longer to assess the situation. We still need to carry on with our mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002182
text: I should have stopped him when I had the chance... If I have, this would not have happened...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002183
text: Huh? Is Leonardas still alive? The goddess must be watching over us...{nl}Thank you! And thank the goddess...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002184
text: Leonardas is getting ready to come back? With his injuries? Oh, goodness...{nl}We need to do something to help him. Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002185
text: Is there anything left to do? If you're worried about what I'm doing,{nl}don't bother. You wouldn't even understand. Just keep walking.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002186
text: Ughh... I need to go back... But my legs won't move the way I want... I hope everyone is okay...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002187
text: I need to go back to my comrades as soon as I can, but my injuries...{nl}Will you please help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002188
text: Thanks to you, I feel much better. I better get going.{nl}I've come this far, so I'll remain here for a bit to record the area. Thanks for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002189
text: All right. I'll be brief and to the point.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002190
text: Ugh... Monsters took off with our supplies.{nl}We were preoccupied with demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002191
text: We need to repair the altar...{nl}No one expected demons to come here and destroy the altar...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002192
text: Following Jurate's words is becoming harder and harder.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002193
text: The demons' attacks are growing fiercer by the day.{nl}We need to do something about this...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002194
text: Emmanuelis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002195
text: The demons' plan has failed, but there is still much to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002196
text: This was a beautiful land blessed by the Goddess Jurate. But now, it's all ruined.

text: We need more experts.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002442
text: Suspiciously Secretive (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002443
text: Approach Suspicion Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002444
text: Suspiciously Secretive (7)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002445
text: How would you like to do this?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002446
text: Leave the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002447
text: Suspiciously Secretive (8)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002448
text: I'll go and retrieve the essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002449
text: Never mind that. Let's just use the Registry Orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002450
text: Placing essence of Black Harugal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002451
text: Placed essence of Black Harugal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002452
text: Suspiciously Secretive (9)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002453
text: Leave and use the Registry Orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002454
text: I need a moment to prepare.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002455
text: Ambition Hauberk's minions are brainwashed.{nl}Closely watch the minions give a false report to Ambition Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002456
text: Suspiciously Secretive (10)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002457
text: Suspiciously Secretive (11)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002458
text: Go to Monk Aistis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002459
text: I'm getting nervous...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002460
text: Reactivating Narvas Temple

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002461
text: We can defeat all three Hauberks without using it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002462
text: Narvas Temple is being reactivated.{nl}Use the portal device to go to Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002463
text: Long Dreams Are Dreamt at Narvas Temple (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002464
text: Using the portal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002465
text: Long Dreams Are Dreamt at Narvas Temple (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002466
text: What will happen, then?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002467
text: Good work. I'll get going now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002468
text: I Can Hear You Singing (9)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002469
text: Follow Indrea to Dainuoti Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002470
text: First Guest's Role

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002471
text: Talk to Neringa

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002472
text: Someone is waiting to meet you from deep inside Nobreer Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002473
text: Neringa needs the savior's help to realize what Laima has foreseen. Let's hear what Neringa has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002474
text: Neringa has told you of the savior's role in all this. Talk to her and proceed with the plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002475
text: Neringa is waiting for you to finish the preparations.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002476
text: Enter Fantasy Library

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002477
text: You told Neringa that you will follow Goddess Laima's forecast and act with her. Enter Fantastic Library: Sausis Room 9 through the portal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002478
text: Talk to Goddess Vaivora

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002479
text: You've entered Sausis Room 9. You are waiting for Goddess Vaivora to give instructions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002480
text: Neringa is waiting for you in Sausis Room 9.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002481
text: Defeat the demons who have infiltrated the place

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002482
text: Neringa instructed you to defeat demons who have intruded Sausis Room 9. By doing this, you might gain Goddess Vaivora's trust.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002483
text: You have defeated enough demons. Talk to Neringa and ask for further instructions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002484
text: Defeat the demons in the area

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002485
text: Collect Scattered Records

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002486
text: Neringa has asked you to collect Scattered Records that were scattered by demons. Goddess Vaivora wants her records to be properly organized.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002487
text: You've collected enough Scattered Records. Return to Neringa to ask what her next plan is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002488
text: Nailed Down Destiny

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002489
text: Remove demons' Kupole traps

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002490
text: Neringa has asked you to destroy the traps that demons have set to stop Vaivora's Kupoles. It will be dangerous, but if you help her Kupoles, you will definitely gain her trust.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002491
text: Talk to Kupole Rugile

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002492
text: You've removed enough Kupole traps that were set by demons. Neringa has asked you to tell Kupole Rugile of your success and provide further assistance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002493
text: Kupole Rugile is waiting for you in Sausis Room 9.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002494
text: Remove the demons' points of invasion

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002495
text: Kupole Rugile has asked you to remove the demons' points of invasion by using a Dimensional Search Scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002496
text: You've removed enough points of invasion. Return to Kupole Rugile and report.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002497
text: Kupole Rugile needs your help in dealing with demons in Sausis Room 9. Defeat demons around the area to help Kupole Rugile.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002498
text: You've defeated enough demons. Return to Kupole Rugile and report.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002499
text: You've finished all of Kupole Rulgile's requests as Neringa has instructed. Return to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002500
text: Going Below the Shadow

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002501
text: Neringa is waiting for you in Sausis Room 10.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002502
text: Destroy the corrupted crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002503
text: Neringa has instructed you to destroy the corrupted crystals, which are planted by demons to incapacitate Fantasy Library's defenses. If these crystals aren't destroyed, Kupoles will be neutralized, which will reveal Neringa's location to the Beholder.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002504
text: You've destroyed enough corrupted crystals. Return to Neringa and report.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002505
text: Neringa has instructed you to defeat the demons who are threatening Kupole Saya. Defeat the demons around Kupole Saya.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002506
text: Talk to Kupole Saya

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002507
text: You've defeated enough demons as Neringa has instructed. Go to Kupole Saya.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002508
text: Kupole Saya is waiting for you in Sausis Room 10

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002509
text: Collect Trasium Pieces

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002510
text: Kupole Saya has asked you to collect Trasium Pieces to repair the holy relic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002511
text: You've collected enough Trasium Pieces. Hand them over to Kupole Saya.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002512
text: Kupole Saya has told you that Neringa is looking for you. Return to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002513
text: Deactivate the Magic Prison

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002514
text: Neringa has told you that Kupole Ouida, Vaivora's right hand, is locked inside a magic prison. Deactivate the magic prison and rescue Kupole Ouida.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002515
text: Talk to Kupole Ouida

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002516
text: You have rescued Kupole Ouida from the magic prison. Talk to Kupole Ouida.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002517
text: Kupole Ouida is waiting for you in Sausis Room 10.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002518
text: Protect the Protection Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002519
text: Defeat all the demons who are trying to destroy the Protection Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002520
text: You've defeated all the demons who were trying to destroy the Protection Crystal. Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002521
text: Face to Face with the Beholder

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002522
text: The Beholder has arrived, just like Neringa said. Listen to what he has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002523
text: The Beholder is gone. Ask Neringa about her next plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002524
text: Necessary Mistake

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002525
text: Neringa is waiting for you in Valandis Room 2.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002526
text: You have finally caught Goddess Vaivora's attention. Talk to Goddess Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002527
text: Goddess Vaivora has left after giving instructions. Discuss the details with Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002528
text: Neringa has informed you that killing demons will force Litae to come out and ask for more help. Go defeat some demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002529
text: Talk to Kupole Litae

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002530
text: Kupole Litae has appeared, and is looking for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002531
text: Kupole Litae is waiting for you in Valandis Room 2.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002532
text: Recharge the Magic Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002533
text: Kupole Litae has told you that you must recharge the magic device for Goddess Vaivora to seal Giltine away. The recharged device will then appear where it's needed. Recharge the magic device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002534
text: You have recharged the magic device. Report to Kupole Litae.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002535
text: Collect Nobrenal Powers

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002536
text: Neringa has asked you to collect Nobrenal Powers to protect yourself when facing Giltine. Collect Nobrenal Powers in Valandis Room 2.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002537
text: You have collected enough Nobrenal Powers. Give them to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002538
text: Neringa has instructed you to meet with Goddess Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002539
text: Talk to Kupole Danute

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002540
text: Kupole Danute is waiting for you in Valandis Room 2.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002541
text: Collect the necessary tools for maintaining the magic device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002542
text: Kupole Danute has mentioned that maintaining magic devices is crucial in carrying out Vaivora's plans. However, more Dimensional Essences are needed for that. You've been asked to defeat demons and take their magic sources.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002543
text: You've collected enough magic sources. Give them to Kupole Danute.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002544
text: Protect the Protection Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002545
text: Kupole Danute has asked you to protect the Protection Crystal in Valandis Room 2. This will help Vaivora's plan. Eliminate the demons around the Protection Crystal to protect it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002546
text: You have protected the Protection Crystal. Report to Kupole Danute.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002547
text: Sealing Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002548
text: Giltine hasn't fallen for Goddess Vaivora's trap. Defeat the Templeshooters and retrieve Record: Giltine from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002549
text: You've retrieved Record: Giltine by defeating Templeshooters. Discuss with Neringa about the next plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002550
text: The History that Will Not Be Recorded

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002551
text: Neringa is waiting for you in Valandis Room 3.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002552
text: Neringa has told you to listen to Goddess Vaivora's plans from her, and follow further instructions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002553
text: You have listened to Goddess Vaivora's plans. Before carrying out her plans, discuss with Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002554
text: Goddess Vaivora is waiting for you in Valandis Room 3.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002555
text: Protect the Bluenode Collapsing Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002556
text: Goddess Vaivora has asked you to protect the Bluenode Collapsing Device for it to run in a stable state.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002557
text: You have defeated all demons who have been attacking the Bluenode Collapsing Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002558
text: Collect Monumental Magic Sources

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002559
text: Goddess Vaivora has asked you to collect Monumental Magic Source to recharge the Flicid Collapsing Device. She has also told you to go to Neringa for instructions after collecting the sources.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002560
text: You have collected enough Monumental Magic Source. Go to Neringa for further instructions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002561
text: Activate the Flicid Collapsing Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002562
text: Neringa has instructed you on the final plan and how to activate the Flicid Collapsing Device. Activate the Flicid Collapsing Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002563
text: The Flicid Collapsing Device has been activated. Report to Goddess Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002564
text: Talk to Kupole Scaia

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002565
text: Goddess Vaivora has asked you to help Kupole Scaia and activate the Ballandans Collapsing Device. First, go find Kupole Scaia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002566
text: Kupole Scaia is waiting for you in Valandis Room 3.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002567
text: Kupole Scaia has asked you to defeat the demons in the area to activate the collapsing device. Defeat the demons and activate the Ballandans Collapsing Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002568
text: Activate the Ballandans Collapsing Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002569
text: Kupole Scaia has asked you to activate the Ballandans Collapsing Device. Activate the device and protect it from the demons' attacks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002570
text: You have activated the Ballandans Collapsing Device. Return to Goddess Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002571
text: Defeat Demon Lord Lucy

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002572
text: Neringa has instructed you to make it look as if demons have destroyed the Ballanorth Collapsing Device. After activating the device, defeat Demon Lord Lucy near the device. After defeating Demon Lord Lucy, the magic explosion will overload the collapsing device and destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002573
text: As planned, Demon Lord Lucy has been defeated, and the Ballanorth Collapsing Device has been destroyed due to overload. Report to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002574
text: Neringa is waiting for you in Valandis Room 91.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002575
text: Shadow of the Black Wing

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002576
text: Destroy Demon Dimensional Door

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002577
text: Before fighting Giltine, Neringa has told you to destroy the Dimensional Doors that the demons have been using for their invasions. Destroy all the Dimensional Doors before meeting with Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002578
text: Track down Giltine

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002579
text: Neringa has told you that Giltine has approached the Revelation. Protect and follow Neringa to track down Giltine.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002580
text: Confront Demon Goddess Giltine

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002581
text: Demon Goddess Giltine has finally reached the Revelation. Neringa has told you to follow Laima's prophecy and put on end to the plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002582
text: You have followed Laima's prophecy. Report to Goddess Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002583
text: Defeat the demons carrying Magic Signals

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002584
text: Kupole Rugile has asked you to eliminate demons who have been creating points of invasions. Defeat the demons who are carrying Magic Signals.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002585
text: You have defeated enough demons carrying Magic Signals. Report to Kupole Rugile.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002586
text: Kupole Rugile has told you that the demons have stolen unidentified records. Defeat the demons to retrieve the records.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002587
text: You have retrieved enough unidentified records. Give them to Kupole Rugile.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002588
text: Talk to Skirgaila

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002589
text: Something has happened to Skirgaila, who is a member of the resistance scouts.{nl}Go talk to Skirgaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002590
text: Talk to the Beholder

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002591
text: A lieutenant of the search squad has been captured by the Beholder.{nl}Find the Beholder and ask what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002592
text: You'll have to help the Beholder to save the lieutenant.{nl}Talk to the Beholder.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002593
text: Absorb magic from a Crystal stone in Prieblanda Rest Place

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002594
text: In order to remove the protection wall surrounding a Crystal Stone in Prieblanda Rest Place, find the deactivation procedure to deactivate its protection. After the protection has been removed, absorb magic from the Crystal Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002595
text: You have deactivated the Crystal Stone and filled the orb with magic.{nl}Give the orb to the Beholder.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002596
text: Ask the Beholder where the next crystal is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002597
text: Absorb magic from a Crystal Stone in Lemtis Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002598
text: The Beholder has asked you to absorb magic from a Crystal Stone in the Lot.{nl}Investigate the Crystal Stone to find the deactivation procedure and deactivate its protection. After the protection has been removed, absorb magic from the Crystal Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002599
text: You have absorbed magic from the Crystal Stone in the lot.{nl}Talk to the Beholder to hand over the absorbed magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002600
text: Investigate the Crystal Stone in Lemtis Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002601
text: Crystal Stone in the crossroad

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002602
text: You have absorbed magic from the Crystal Stone in the lot. Hand over the orb to the Beholder and ask where to find next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002603
text: Absorb magic from the Crystal Stone in Zibukas Crossroad

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002604
text: The Beholder has asked you to check the Crystal Stone in Zibukas Crossroad.{nl}Go to the crossroad to investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002605
text: The Crystal Stone in Zibukas Crossroad seems to be protected with strong magic.{nl}Inform the Beholder about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002606
text: The Beholder might have some ideas on how to remove the protection.{nl}Talk to the Beholder.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002607
text: Absorb magic with a Magic Nullifying Tool

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002608
text: The Beholder has given you a tool to nullify magic, and told you to fill the tool with magic.{nl}Defeat the demons in the area to absorb their souls into the tool.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002609
text: You have filled the tool with magic.{nl}Use the tool to nullify the protection and absorb the Crystal Stone's magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002610
text: You have nullified the protection and absorbed its magic into an orb.{nl}Take it to the Beholder.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002611
text: You have given the Beholder the orb, but the Beholder doesn't seem to be satisfied.{nl}Listen to what the Beholder has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002612
text: Investigate the area around the crossroad

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002613
text: The Beholder has asked you to investigate the area around the crossroad.{nl}Go investigate where the Beholder has mentioned.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002614
text: You have defeated all demons who have ambushed you.{nl}Tell the Beholder what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002615
text: Defeat ambushing demons

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002616
text: The Beholder thinks the vanished light has a suspicious quality to it.{nl}Talk to the Beholder.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002617
text: Battle with Demon Lord Solcomm

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002618
text: It was Demon Lord Solcomm who sent out the light.{nl}In order to save the lieutenant from the Beholder, you must defeat Solcomm.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002619
text: Injured Solcomm has run away from the battle.{nl}Go to the Beholder and ask what the next plan is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002620
text: Skirgaila seems to have more requests.{nl}Go talk to Skirgaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002621
text: Burn the Supply Boxes

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002622
text: Skirgaila says they have found some supply boxes that are owned by demons.{nl} Go to Menua Crossroad and burn the supply boxes in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002623
text: You have burned all the supply boxes in the area.{nl}Go back to Skirgaila and report.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002624
text: Skirgaila is impressed with your capabilities, and have more favors to ask.{nl}Talk to Skirgaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002625
text: Investigate Zibukas Crossroad

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002626
text: Skirgaila has asked you to examine and record the ecosystem of Zibukas Crossroad.{nl}Go to the crossroad and record what you've found.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002627
text: You have recorded all the necessary information.{nl}Bring the recorded document and hand it over to Skirgaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002628
text: Skirgaila has found something from the record you've made.{nl}Talk to Skirgaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002629
text: Burn the supplies wagon at the crossroad

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002630
text: Pour oil over the demons' supply wagon and use a match to burn it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002631
text: You have burned all the supply wagons.{nl}Report to Skirgaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002632
text: Skirgaila needs more help for the investigation.{nl}Talk to Skirgaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002633
text: Defeat demons around Lanko 26 Waters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002634
text: Defeat demons around Lanko 26 Waters for the resistance and their investigations.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002635
text: You have defeated all demons around Lanko 26 Waters.{nl}Report to Skirgaila.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002636
text: Where is the Recruit?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002637
text: Talk to Abraomas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002638
text: Abraomas is worried about a recruit who has ignored orders and went out alone to look for the missing lieutenant.{nl}Listen to what Abraomas has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002639
text: Track down the recruit

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002640
text: Search for clues on the whereabouts of the recruit.{nl}Gather everything you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002641
text: You have gathered enough clues.{nl}Go to Abraomas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002642
text: Abraomas is getting restless after hearing what you've found.{nl}Talk to Abraomas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002643
text: Look for the recruit

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002644
text: Abraomas isn't ready to give up yet. He has asked you to go to the other side to look for the recruit.{nl}Go over the other side to look for the recruit.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002645
text: You have learned some clues to whereabouts of the recruit from a demon you defeated.{nl}Pass the information to Abraomas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002646
text: Looking for clues on the recruit

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002647
text: Defeated %

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002648
text: Abraomas seems to be relieved to hear about the recruit.{nl}Talk to Abraomas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002649
text: Talk to Leonardas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002650
text: Abraomas has asked you to help the recruit who is in danger.{nl}Go to Lanko 22 Waters and find Leonardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002651
text: The Beholder wants you to follow Solcomm.{nl}Talk to the Beholder.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002652
text: Find Solcomm

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002653
text: Go to Lanko 22 Waters and track down Solcomm.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002654
text: Talk to Demon Lord Solcomm

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002655
text: By following the blue light, you were able to find Solcomm, who seems to be injured.{nl}Solcomm wants to tell you something.{nl}Listen to what he has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002656
text: Solcomm has a proposition for you.{nl}Talk to Solcomm.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002657
text: Solcomm is offering you a deal.{nl}Take the deal, and ask for details.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002658
text: Solcomm wants to destroy the crystal stones nearby.{nl}Ask Solcomm for details.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002659
text: Destroy the crystal stone in Negilus Inner Court

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002660
text: Solcomm has told you that the crystal stone in Negilus Inner Court can be destroyed by blowing up its protection devices.{nl}Go to Negilus Inner Court and activate the crystal stone's protection devices by touching them. After that, destroy the devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002661
text: You have destroyed the crystal stone in the inner court.{nl}Go back to Solcomm.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002662
text: Crystal stone in the garden

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002663
text: There is another crystal stone that needs to be destroyed. Go talk to Solcomm.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002664
text: Craft a Magic Nullification Bomb

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002665
text: Solcomm wants you to destroy the crystal and its protection magic located in Oro Garden.{nl}With the recipe Solcomm gave you, craft a

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002666
text: Magic Nullification Bomb

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002667
text: The root can be collected from Lily Velly and Jelly Velly.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002668
text: Craft %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002669
text: Destroy the crystal stone in Oro Garden

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002670
text: You have crafted a Magic Nullification Bomb.{nl}Use the bomb to destroy the crystal stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002671
text: Talk to Solcomm

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002672
text: You have destroyed the crystal stone in the garden.{nl}Go back to Solcomm.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002673
text: Solcomm wants to tell you how to destroy the crystal stone on the other side.{nl}Go and talk to Solcomm.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002674
text: Activate the self-destruction device in Dregnas Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002675
text: Solcomm has hidden a self-destruction device in Dregnas Lot.{nl}Inspect the rocks in the lot to find the device and activate it.{nl}Some demons might appear to attack you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002676
text: You can feel the ground trembling. It seems that the crystal stone was destroyed.{nl}Go back to Solcomm.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002677
text: After all the crystal stones have been destroyed, Solcomm is deep in thought.{nl}Talk to Solcomm.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002678
text: Battle with Solcomm

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002679
text: Solcomm wants you to help him to defeat the Beholder. However, in order to save the Lieutenant, you need to defeat Solcomm.{nl}Defeat Solcomm in a battle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002680
text: You have defeated Solcomm.{nl}Go talk to the Beholder to save the Lieutenant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002681
text: Leonardas wants you to do something for him to safely return to his peers.{nl}Talk to Leonardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002682
text: Collect ingredients

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002683
text: Leonardas wants to craft a special sap. Collect leaves from Lily Velly and Jelly Velly.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002684
text: You have collected the leaves for Leonardas.{nl}Give them to Leonardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002685
text: Talk to Leonardas to hear what his next plans are.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002686
text: Find catalysts from the storage

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002687
text: Search boxes in a storage near Sviesus Crossroad to find magic catalysts.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002688
text: You have gathered enough catalysts.{nl}Give them to Leonardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002689
text: Found a Magic Catalyst inside the box

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002690
text: Leonardas has begun crafting the sap.{nl}Receive instructions from Leonardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002691
text: Combine the Sap with the Lakeland Spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002692
text: Leonardas has asked you to create the sap by using collected ingredients, his tools, and essence of the lake.{nl}Combine the sap by following his instructions.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002693
text: You have combined the sap.{nl}Go back to Leonardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002694
text: Leonardas wants to test the combined sap.{nl}Talk to Leonardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002695
text: Testing the sap on monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002696
text: Leonardas has asked you to run tests with the combined sap.{nl}Use the sap on demons to check its effectiveness.{nl}After that, defeat the weakened demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002697
text: You have confirmed the sap's effectiveness.{nl}Go to Leonardas and report.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002698
text: Leonardas is having troubles due to his injuries.{nl}Go talk to Leonardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002699
text: Defeat the surrounding demons and monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002700
text: Defeat the demons and monsters around the area for Leonardas to return safely back to his peers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002701
text: You have defeated enough demons and monsters.{nl}Go back to Leonardas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002702
text: I Can Hear You Singing

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002703
text: Follow the faint sound

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002704
text: You can hear a faint, comforting sound. Go find the source of the sound.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002705
text: Find someone who knows the song

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002706
text: It seems that the song is coming from the trees. Ask the residents of Teresh Forest and passersby about the song.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002707
text: Follow Indrea

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002708
