text: Indrea, who is a priestess of Goddess Medeina, went to the singing tree. Follow her to learn about the song.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002709
text: Talk to Indrea

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002710
text: Indrea has heard the song. Go talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002711
text: Collect Atti Yellow Juice

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002712
text: Indrea has instructed you to follow the lyrics of the song. By sprinkling Atti Yellow Juice on flowers in Teresh, you can gain red stamen from them. Defeat Atties and collect their Yellow Juice.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002713
text: You've gathered enough Yellow Juice. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002714
text: Use Yellow Juice to gather Teresh Pollen

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002715
text: Indrea mentioned that the flowers will soon wither away if sprinkled with the juice. Collect Teresh Pollen right after sprinkling Yellow Juice.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002716
text: You have gathered enough Teresh stamen. Go to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002717
text: Indrea is planning to sprinkle red stamen near the tree. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002718
text: Listen to the sound from the tree

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002719
text: After Indrea has sprinkled red stamen, and the tree started singing again. Listen to the song.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002720
text: A peculiar white apple has grown out of the tree. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002721
text: Follow Indrea

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002722
text: Follow Indrea and listen to the song coming from the tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002723
text: Craft Raspberry Juice

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002724
text: Indrea has told you that people of Teresh Forest have been using the scent from crushed raspberries to attract star fireflies. Its light and direction were used to foresee the future. Indrea wants to do the same. Collect Raspberry Juice from the forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002725
text: You've gathered enough Raspberry Juice. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002726
text: Indrea has applied the juice on branches. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002727
text: Attract Starlights to the branches with the raspberry scent

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002728
text: Indrea has instructed you to shake the branch to spread the scent. Use the branch to attract Starlights to the singing tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002729
text: You have attracted a Starlight. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002730
text: You have attracted enough Starlights. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002731
text: After attracting enough Starlights, the tree started singing again. Listen to the song.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002732
text: A peculiar yellow apple has grown out of the tree. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002733
text: Listen to the song with Indrea

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002734
text: Listen to the song's lyrics and find the meaning behind them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002735
text: Do as the lyrics say

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002736
text: Based on what Indrea has told you, Goddess Medeina called butterflies "The Preachers of Love" due to their nature of helping flowers mate. However, Indrea isn't sure what "Half of my heart" means. Find out what the goddess meant by the phrase, and act it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002737
text: Something is happening to the tree. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002738
text: Defeat Rocktortuga

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002739
text: Rocktortuga has appeared when you were listening to the song with Indrea. Defeat Rocktortuga.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002740
text: You have defeated Rocktortuga. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002741
text: You have reached the place mentioned in the song. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002742
text: Follow the song's lyrics

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002743
text: There are three pillars at Tacasz Stream. Indrea thinks that something will happen by placing the apples in these pillars. Do as she asks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002744
text: Talk to Indrea

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002745
text: Talk to the dog with no owner

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002746
text: The dog with no owner seems to be asking you to follow him. Follow the dog.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002747
text: Follow the dog

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002748
text: The dog is going somewhere. Keep following.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002749
text: The dog has lead you to a monk who seems tired. Talk to the monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002750
text: The monk seems to be in a hurry. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002751
text: Go to Narvas Temple

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002752
text: The monk told you that Arch Mage Agailla Flurry divided Hauberk into three parts and sealed them inside Narvas Temple. However, after Medzio Diena, the seal was cracked and some essence of Hauberk has leaked out. Nearby demons have noticed this, and have been attacking the temple to fully awaken Hauberk. The monk wants you to stop this in his stead. Some demons will be fighting amongst themselves along the way, so the monk has given you instructions on how to go through them. Read the instruction to avoid the demons and reach Narvas Temple.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002753
text: The monk told you that Arch Mage Agailla Flurry divided Hauberk into three parts and sealed them inside Narvas Temple. However, after Medzio Diena, the seal was cracked and some essence of Hauberk has leaked out. Nearby demons have noticed this, and have been attacking the temple to fully awaken Hauberk. The monk wants you to stop this in his stead. Some demons will be fighting amongst themselves along the way, so the monk has given you instructions on how to go through them. Read the instruction to avoid the demons and reach Narvas Temple.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002754
text: Creating Distractions

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002755
text: Read the instruction

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002756
text: Find out how to avoid the demons by reading the instructions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002757
text: You've learned that going straight through them isn't viable. Burn their camp first to create distractions. Defeat the demons in the base to burn the place down.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002758
text: Defeat the demons in the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002759
text: Collect Sporgimo flowers

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002760
text: You've learned that going straight through the demons isn't a viable plan. Instead, burn their camp first to create a distraction. Gather Sporgimo flowers, which are highly inflammable, to burn the place down.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002761
text: Place Sporgimo flowers

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002762
text: You've learned that going straight through the demons isn't a viable plan. Instead, burn their camp first to create a distraction. You have gathered enough Sporgimo flowers. Place them near the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002763
text: Burn the placed Sporgimo flowers

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002764
text: You've learned that going straight through demons isn't a viable plan. Instead, burn their camp first to create a distraction. You have placed some Sporgimo flowers around their camp. Light the flowers with fire to create an explosion.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002765
text: Go find a place to hide

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002766
text: The flowers are on fire. These will soon explode, and it will attract demons. Go find a place to hide.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002767
text: The flowers are on fire. These will soon explode, and it will attract demons. Go find a place to hide.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002768
text: Go to Narvas Temple

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002769
text: You have set fire on the demons' camp. When the right moment comes, go to Narvas Temple.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002770
text: Go to Narvas Temple.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002771
text: Go through the demons' defense line

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002772
text: On the way to the temple, you've found a defense line created by demons. Fight through the line to reach the temple.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002773
text: Go to Narvas Temple.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002774
text: Defeat monsters who are on your way

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002775
text: Narvas Temple's barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002776
text: Talk to Monk Aistis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002777
text: Go talk to Monk Aistis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002778
text: Gather Demonic Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002779
text: Monk Aistis has told you that the barrier's energy is about to run out. He asked you to bring Demonic Essence to use as its energy source. Defeat the demons in Izoliacjia Plateau to collect Demonic Essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002780
text: Defeat demons to collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002781
text: Break the auxiliary detector system

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002782
text: Aistis has proposed to alter the detector system to turn them into something defensive. To do that, the detector system needs to be shut down. However, auxiliary detector systems will keep that from happening. Aistis will stop the detector system, so you must shut down its auxiliary systems.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002783
text: Bring the parts from a destroyed defensive system nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002784
text: Aistis needs parts from a destroyed defensive system to make repairs. However, there are demons near the place. Aistis will bring the parts, so you must defeat the demons in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002785
text: Collect the leaked energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002786
text: Aistis thinks that despite the repairs, its lack of energy will keep the defensive system from working. He proposed to use the leaked energy to power the system. Use the Energy Storing Globe he gave you to gather the energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002787
text: Collect the leaked energy

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002788
text: Aistis found out that defensive systems are overloading. If the problem isn't solved, they will become useless. Aistis says he'll try to shut it down safely to prevent this. But in order to do that, its energy must be taken out, and reuse those energy to reboot the system. Aistis has asked you to gather the energy when he shut down the defensive systems.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002789
text: Inject the gathered energy into the defensive system

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002790
text: Monk Aistis has safely turned off the defensive system. The system needs to be refueled to be turned on again. Refuel the defensive system after Aistis has activated the system.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002791
text: Check how the defensive system is working

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002792
text: Aistis wants to check how the defensive system is working. Check how it is doing with Aistis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002793
text: Defeat demons who are entering Narvas temple

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002794
text: Go to Narvas Temple with Monk Aistis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002795
text: Into the Lion's Mouth

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002796
text: Talk to Monk Aistis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002797
text: Defeat followers of Suspicion Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002798
text: Suspicion Hauberk has commanded his demons to destroy Agailla Flurry's equipment. Stop them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002799
text: Defeat followers of Suspicion Hauberk who are trying to destroy Flurry's equipment

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002800
text: Gather Strong Essence of Demon

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002801
text: Monk Aistis wants to upgrade Agailla Flurry's equipment. He needs Strong Essence of Demon to power the upgrade. Gather Strong Essence of Demon for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002802
text: Defeat followers of Suspicion Hauberk to gather %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002803
text: Collect Black Hohen Mage's blood

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002804
text: Aistis has found out that equipment in the area are already ruined by followers of Suspicion Hauberk. However, its core components are still functional. With enough repairs, it can be fixed and even get upgraded. He needs some demonic blood to do this. Defeat Black Hohen Mage and bring its blood to Aistis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002805
text: Defeat Black Hohen Mage to gather %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002806
text: Collect Holy water mixed with demonic blood

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002807
text: Aistis thinks if holy water is mixed with demonic blood, the facilities will only target demons. He wants you to bring a bottle of holy water mixed with demonic blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002808
text: Eavesdrop on Ambition Hauberk and his followers

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002809
text: Ambition Hauberk and his minions are planning something. Eavesdrop on them to find out what their plan is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002810
text: Talk to Aistis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002811
text: Defeat the demons who are transforming monks' spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002812
text: Some demons are transforming monks' spirits under Ambition Hauberk's command. Defeat them to release the monks' spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002813
text: Break the spirit altering device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002814
text: Defeat %s, who are torturing the spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002815
text: Collect Magic Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002816
text: Monk Aistis is going to upgrade Agailla Flurry's equipment. He will need some magic crystals after making the upgrade. Collect them for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002817
text: Look around the unidentified facility

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002818
text: You've found an unidentified facility by following the light. Look around the place.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002819
text: Retrieve the Apparition Generator from the locked system

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002820
text: Based on what you learned, find the Apparition Generator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002821
text: Place the parts in the unidentified facility

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002822
text: Place the parts in the unidentified facility.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002823
text: Talk to Agailla Flurry Apparition

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002824
text: Talk to Agailla Flurry Apparition.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002825
text: Give the magic crystal to Aistis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002826
text: Agailla Flurry Apparition has told you to give the magic crystal to Aistis. Do as she says.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002827
text: In order to retrieve Agailla Flurry's Staff from its container, Aistis needs the surrounding demons gone. Defeat the demons to retrieve the staff.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002828
text: Approach Deception Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002829
text: Agailla Flurry Apparition has proposed that you approach Deception Hauberk by meddling with his mind. Do as she says.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002830
text: Suspiciously Secretive

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002831
text: Agailla Flurry's equipment

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002832
text: Monk Aistis needs some parts to upgrade the equipment. However, the monk doesn't know what the parts look like. Because of this, he wants you to use an Absorbing Stone. With the stone, the parts will just come to you. Use the stone to gather the parts.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002833
text: Gather Demon's Flesh

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002834
text: The apparition has told you that Suspicion Hauberk needs to be informed of what Deception Hauberk is doing. However, just like his name, Suspicion Hauberk is quite suspicious of everything, so approaching him won't be easy. The apparition wants you to kill his minion and disguise yourself as it to get close. First, you'll need Demon's Flesh to do this. Go find some.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002835
text: Defeat a core follower of Suspicion Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002836
text: The apparition has told you that one of the core followers of Suspicion Hauberk is looking for something. Find the follower and defeat him to use his blood for disguise.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002837
text: Defeat King Hammer and collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002838
text: Approach Suspicion Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002839
text: A scroll for disguising into one of Suspicion Hauberk's core followers has been completed. Use the scroll to approach him, and inform him of what Deception Hauberk is doing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002840
text: Alter the Contract Token

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002841
text: Agailla Flurry needs to alter the equipment to utilize the Contract Token. Do as she says.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002842
text: Give the Contract Token to Suspicion Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002843
text: The Contract Token is altered. Use the scroll to turn into King Hammer and give the token to Suspicion Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002844
text: Alter the Registry Orb

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002845
text: Agailla Flurry has told you that Ambition Hauberk needs to be informed of what Deception Hauberk is doing. His core follower is already dead, so you'll need to brainwash Ambition Hauberk's minions to drive him to action. There is a Registry Orb in the area which helps managers of this place to remember small details. Agailla Flurry has proposed to use the altered version of the orb and use it on their minions. Alter the Registry Orb as she suggested.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002846
text: Find the essence of an elite follower of Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002847
text: Agailla Flurry Apparition has told you that you need to brainwash the elite followers of Ambition Hauberk. However, it isn't easy telling the elites apart from the other followers. The apparition is going to craft a Mark of Identification by using the essence from elites. Defeat the elite followers to collect their essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002848
text: Defeat Harugal to collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002849
text: Use the Registry Orb on Black Harugal, one of Ambition Hauberk's elite followers

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002850
text: The apparition has asked you to use the Mark of Identification to find Black Harugals, who are Ambition Hauberk's elite followers, and use the Registry Orb on them. Weaken them first, and use the Registry Orb on them by clicking on the item in the inventory.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002851
text: Observe Ambition Hauberk's situation

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002852
text: Observe how Ambition Hauberk reacts to what his brainwashed followers are saying.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002853
text: Give the parts to Monk Aistis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002854
text: Agailla Flurry has asked you to give the parts to Aistis and protect him while the system is being repaired. Do as she says.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002855
text: Repair the Central Control Terminal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002856
text: Agailla Flurry wants to adjust the power level of the altered system while the three Hauberks are fighting amongst themselves. You'll need to use the Central Control Terminal to do this, but it is broken. Repair the terminal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002857
text: Long Dreams Are Dreamt at Narvas Temple

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002858
text: Use the Warp Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002859
text: Use the Warp Device to go to where Hauberk is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002860
text: Defeat the united Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002861
text: Three Hauberks are now united into one. His powers aren't fully recovered yet, but are getting stronger by the minute. Defeat Demon Lord Hauberk with the altered system before that happens.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002862
text: Near the butterfly, you have read the writing on the tombstone out loud. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002863
text: After reading the writing out loud, the tree started singing. Listen to the song.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20171128_002864
text: A peculiar blue apple has grown out of the tree. Talk to Indrea.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002873
text: Demon Goddess Giltine came to this place to look for Goddess Laima's revelation that should have been for you, Revelator.{nl}Goddess Vivora believed that Demon Goddess Giltine was looking for a book that contained knowledge about her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002874
text: But Goddess Laima did not want you to know this much about the revelation.{nl}This revelation contains truths meant for Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002875
text: You must do your best to lose it.{nl}Neringa will tell you Goddess Laima's predictions at the time when you are meant to know.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002876
text: Put your faith in Goddess Laima and Neringa shall work with you.{nl}Outside of us, no one else must learn of Goddess Laima's prediction.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002877
text: This is Goddess Vaivora's Fantasy Library, which has on record all of the world's knowledge and history.{nl}In this place, you can only view the information meant for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002878
text: You will not be able to see the books that are not.{nl}This place has history and wisdom about humanity that even the Goddesses themselves do not know about.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002879
text: In the far future, when you are ready to learn of it, you will be able to view it too.{nl}But now is not that time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002880
text: Neringa knew you would accept the invitation.{nl}And there is much that needs to be said.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002881
text: You and Neringa will go together to Goddess Vaivora's domain.{nl}Humans are meant to approach the location primarily by invitation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002882
text: But this is still not the case.{nl}There is something you need to know.{nl}Starting from Neringa...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002883
text: Revelator, you must have some concerns about this current situation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002884
text: Neringa will convey Goddess Laima's will to you.{nl}Yet only at the times deemed right.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002885
text: Together with Neringa, you will go to Fantasy Library.{nl}There you will meet with Goddess Vaivora and her Kupole helper.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002886
text: They will not welcome a human to the Fantasy Library.{nl}Please do not forget. Neringa recommended you for an invitation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002887
text: You are here because Neringa helped you to gain the Goddess' trust.{nl}Please continue to build her trust in you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002888
text: Focus on listening to her and completing her requests.{nl}Neringa will go first and wait for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002889
text: So, you are the Revelator.{nl}I have heard about you from Neringa.{nl}Where you come from and where you are being pulled towards... I have heard it all.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002890
text: Yet, I still have reservations about Neringa's judgement in inviting you here.{nl}I assume you have already heard from Neringa what it that we do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002891
text: I asked Neringa as well. What can a human do for us here?{nl}You will have to prove yourself through sacrifice to answer that question.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002892
text: I strive to prevent humans like you from interrupting the Goddesses' work.{nl}Go help Neringa.{nl}That is something you can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002893
text: As you can see, at the moment there is no opportunity for you to join Goddess Vaivora's plans.{nl}So, solve her smaller issues to gain her trust.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002894
text: The defensive system in Sausis Room 9 is weak, allowing demons to trespass easily.{nl}But Goddess Vaivora's Kupole cannot stop them alone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002895
text: It would be good to take her place.{nl}Defeat a few of the demons and you will gain a lot Her trust.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002896
text: Your ability is already known.{nl}How much you can do is also already known.{nl}Meaning, what you need to know is already known.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002897
text: You did well.{nl}Right now Goddess Vaivora is in Valandis Room 2 preparing a trap to capture Demon Goddess Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002898
text: She thinks that Giltine wants to get her hands on the book that's about her.{nl}It's not proper work for a goddess, but Giltine won't fall for just any trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002899
text: You will have to work hard to gain Goddess Vaivora's trust.{nl}But the time, and the work that you have to do, has already been decided.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002900
text: Set your mind towards protecting the Goddess' very precious records.{nl}Everywhere is flooded with demons destroying them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002901
text: Please go and collect these scattered records.{nl}Doing something as simple as this will surely attract the Goddess' attention.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002902
text: Doing this much will draw the Goddess' attention.{nl}Goddess Vaivora believes that if Giltine is removed everything will be solved.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002903
text: This means isolating her from the rest of the world.{nl}But everything that happens is influenced by the Devine Tree itself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002904
text: Even if Demon Goddess Giltine disappears other, more uncontrollable versions of her will take her place.{nl}Sadly, Goddess Vaivora does not have faith in Goddess Laima's prediction.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002905
text: She also does not have faith in you, who was selected by Laima.{nl}Therefore, here, together with the hand of faith, you must match Goddess Lamia's prediction.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002906
text: Kupole Rugile is alone in Sausis Room 9 dealing with the demons.{nl}Despite being Vaivora's Kupole, she will not be able to handle them all alone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002907
text: You must help Kupole Rugile.{nl}However, Vaivora's Kupole will be weary of you since you are a human.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002908
text: Before approaching her, remove the Kupole trap set by the demons.{nl}Kupole Rugile will show interest in you after this. And, of course, this interest will be conveyed to Goddess Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002909
text: You are the human Neringa invited.{nl}There is something a human can do to help us...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002910
text: You seem strong enough and ready to serve the goddess.{nl}If there is no other place you must be, can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002911
text: It's a difficult situation.{nl}Vaivora and I sealed off all of the passages used by the demons.{nl}But how are they still able to enter?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002912
text: Certainly, by someone's help they are entering.{nl}This scroll can detect the small gaps in which the demons are using to invade.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002913
text: With this scroll, find the point of invasion and remove it.{nl}I will not be able to hold out for long if this continues.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002914
text: This place has been run by Goddess Vaivora and the Kupoles for a long time.{nl}This place is unbeknownst even to the followers of Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002915
text: It's more than just a few demons that have entered.{nl}And they are ruining the library.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002916
text: I do not know what it is they seek, but I cannot allow them to touch the records at will.{nl}Please get rid of the demons you see in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002917
text: Possibly the records of the great and unnamed kings have already disappeared. {nl}As time passes, so will more and more records.{nl}Please stop the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002918
text: Thank you so much.{nl}Thanks to you we can protect the records that are under our care.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002919
text: After seeing your actions here, it seems you would be an even greater help to the Goddess.{nl}We will tell the Goddess of your courage and sacrifice.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002920
text: Now return to Neringa and tell her of your accomplishment.{nl}And, by all means, please use your power in correct place.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002921
text: You have returned.{nl}The news of you helping Rugile has been passed on to Goddess Vaivora.{nl}We can now move on to the next stage.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002922
text: You with Neringa will meet someone you have had a long ill-fated relationship with.{nl}Let's go to Sausis Room 10.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002923
text: You are the first to be invited here.{nl}In the past, there was commotion because of those who were not invited.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002924
text: Slowly more and more demons are invading.{nl}It's hard for me to figure out alone how they are coming here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002925
text: I've done all I've could but it's not enough.{nl}However, if you can help me, I will be able to gather some time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002926
text: Suspicious magic gathering demons have been found.{nl}If you can defeat them, it will decrease the number of demons coming this way.{nl}Please do this for us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002927
text: Although I know a great scale of the Fantasy Library, there are thousands of areas.{nl}If the demons enter through another location this will cause huge problems.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002928
text: At least I have one less nuisance to deal with.{nl}I appreciate your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002929
text: The invading demons are damaging the books.{nl}They do not hesitate with their meaningless plundering.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002930
text: Maybe their leader said to destroy whatever they could get their hands on.{nl}If you want to help the Goddess don't allow them to run away with the records.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002931
text: Please recover the unidentified records that the demons stole.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002932
text: We still have not found a place for all that is contained in the Fantasy Library.{nl}The records that Vaivora and us, the Kupole, still need to classify are slowly coming in.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002933
text: I see the damaged records. Those demons...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002934
text: After this is done, Vaivora will punish those demons.{nl} Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002935
text: Everything have been decided.{nl}Even if you try to fight your destiny, the end will be the same.{nl}You are on the right track. You are doing well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002936
text: Vaivora will help solve everything.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002937
text: Goddess Vaivora has almost completed her plan.{nl}But we cannot have the Beholder interfere.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002938
text: Your work here should stand out.{nl}Therefore, Vaivora will have a request for you in the next District.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002939
text: This place is overrun with the Beholder's plans.{nl}Everywhere the Kupole are falling into its traps and getting into trouble.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002940
text: We must rid Sausis Room 10 of the Beholder's shadow.{nl}Destroy the first corrupted crystal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002941
text: If you leave the corrupted crystal alone, the Beholder and the demons will continue to harass the Kupole.{nl}And, remember, the fact that Neringa is here must not be revealed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002942
text: The Beholder thinks the situation will go according to plan.{nl}But everything will go as predicted. Focus on your role.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002943
text: Destroying that many will be enough.{nl}It will be troublesome if the Beholder becomes aware of us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002944
text: Destroying the corrupted crystals made the plan smoother.{nl}Kupole Saya is dealing with the invading demons here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002945
text: But there were so many, she went into hiding to replenish her energy.{nl}You will present a good impression if you defeat the demons that are near her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002946
text: Defeat the demons and then go to Kupole Saya.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002947
text: There is no better way. Follow the chosen path.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002948
text: You are the human traveling with Neringa.{nl}I'm surprised that a human can defeat these demons.{nl}You could be a powerful asset to Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002949
text: As the demons invaded they destroyed most of the protection crystals.{nl}If they are not restored the demons will treat this place like their house.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002950
text: If you want to help Vaivora, first help to restore the protection crystals.{nl}The protection crystals were shattered into Trasium Pieces, please collect as many Trasium Pieces as possible and return to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002951
text: I do not know how far you will accomplish, but I will not refuse you even if you fail.{nl}Whereever you go, you are still just a human.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002952
text: I'm surprised. You have completely changed my thoughts about humans.{nl}Have all humans become as strong as you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002953
text: While you were away Neringa contacted me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002954
text: I told her about your skillfulness.{nl}But Neringa's thinking seems a little different.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002955
text: You did well. Saya has praised you.{nl}Now there is only one more Kupole to save.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002956
text: I'm planning to collect Trasium Pieces in order to restore the protection crystals.{nl}I hope we can use your strength when the time comes.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002957
text: The Beholder has installed a magic prison to keep the Kupole.{nl}Goddess Vaivora's main helper, Kupole Ouida is here as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002958
text: If you save her, Goddess Vaivora's expectations of you will rise.{nl}Destroy the magic prison and save Kupole Ouida.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002959
text: She will then have a request for you.{nl}After that we will meet the Beholder.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002960
text: I trust and follow you in accordance with the prediction.{nl}Refrain from unnecessary actions and concentrate on your role.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002961
text: And you are?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002962
text: A human... I thought I would be saved by Vaivora...{nl}It's not what I expected but thank you for rescuing me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002963
text: The Beholder has installed magical prisons everywhere.{nl}The Kupole are in a state of confusion allowing the Beholder to rummage through the library.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002964
text: But we cannot allow this to continue.{nl}Will you allow them to roam around Vaivora's library? Open your eyes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002965
text: The reason they can roam here is because the protection crystals were destroyed.{nl}The remaining one is being attacked by the demons now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002966
text: Ride this transportation device to the crystal.{nl}Defeat them all with your power.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002967
text: You do not need to return to Ouida.{nl}Time is short. We must go to Goddess Vaivora after facing him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002968
text: The Beholder must be growing aware that their plan is falling apart.{nl}Soon the Beholder will be here. Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002969
text: The Beholder follows Demon Goddess Giltine but shows no interest in her safety.{nl}He will leave soon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002970
text: With Neringa, you will need to go to Valandis Room 2.{nl}When you are ready, follow. Neringa will go first and wait for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002971
text: The Beholder still does not know you and Neringa are here.{nl}Neringa will stay out of the way until the Beholder thinks the task is done.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002972
text: If Neringa is discovered here, Giltine will be alerted.{nl}Now we have to let them destroy the Fantasy Library.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002973
text: Why did they come here at this time?{nl}This is troublesome.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002974
text: Talk of you helping Vaivora's Kupoles is circulating amongst them.{nl}Goddess Vaivora will come to look for you soon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002975
text: She will trust you and tell you her plans.{nl}But you and Neringa's plans differ from the Goddess Vaivora's.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002976
text: Don't forget this. Listen politely to all the Goddess has to say.{nl}Goddess is coming.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002977
text: In fact, Goddess Vaivora has more conviction than Neringa thought.{nl} Neringa will need to execute this plan more precisely.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002978
text: Kupole Litae and Danute are in charge of this area.{nl}Kupole Litae will still be unsure about you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002979
text: But defeat the demons and she will come to your way.{nl}Please listen to her request. For Neringa's role, Neringa will leave first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002980
text: I can't believe you came here, but even more so, I can't believe your skills.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002981
text: I've heard of your courage and sacrifice from the other Kupole.{nl}Thank you very much for coming to help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002982
text: You've arrived. Did Kupole Litae greet you well?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002983
text: The Kupole are also different in their thinking and personalities.{nl}Some listen better than others.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002984
text: {nl}Goddess Vaivora will come to find you again.{nl}But before that, there is something you need to prepare.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002985
text: You and Neringa will face Giltine in Valandis Room 91.{nl}The Demon God can take your life with just one finger.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002986
text: So please find the item Nobraenal Blueprint so that Neringa may use that to protect you.{nl}With Neringa's divine energy and that item I will be able to hold back her power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002987
text: Unfortunately, Goddess Laima cannot protect you.{nl}However, Neringa will tell you how to protect yourself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002988
text: Believe Neringa and follow what Neringa says.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002989
text: That should be enough.{nl}Neringa will tell you when it is time to use it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002990
text: Now go to Goddess Vaivora.{nl}There are still parts Neringa needs to prepare for the plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002991
text: Your help is making the final preparations much easier.{nl}Now, please help us one last time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002992
text: I must leave this place to examine Giltine's actions more closely.{nl}Kupole Danute is coming so please lend a hand. I hope that you help her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002993
text: As Vaivora predicted, the demons are gathering her to make it easier for Giltine to enter.{nl}There is no time to waste so I must ask you for two items.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002994
text: The first is Dimensional Essence. That will be easy to find around here.{nl}The last one will be a problem...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002995
text: Defeat the demons and gather their magic source.{nl}After collecting both, come back here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002996
text: The protection crystals are under attack!{nl}Since all of the library's energy is directed towards the trap, there is only one protection crystal guarding this area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002997
text: If the protection crystals are not working, Giltine will still be able to escape even if we seal her within our trap.{nl}Take this tool and until the protection crystals are recharged fight off the demons!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002998
text: Thank you! And Neringa has returned as well.{nl}I will go and help with Vaivora's seal.  I'm grateful for your help!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_002999
text: Vaivora has finished her seal for Giltine.{nl}Unfortunately, Giltine will not appear this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003000
text: Please remain calm and do as Vaivora instructed.{nl}Come back to Neringa when the work there is done.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003001
text: Neringa is preparing for the next plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003002
text: That is a record. Neringa will give it back to Vaivora.{nl}Right now you must deal with the embarrassed Goddess of Knowledge.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003003
text: Goddess Vaivora know much more than you or Neringa, expect for the future.{nl}Therefore it is impossible to convince Vaivora.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003004
text: Vaivora will now make an extreme choice.{nl}Give up the revelation and remove Giltine from this world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003005
text: She still thinks that is correct.{nl}In the meantime, let's move to Valandis Room 3.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003006
text: There you and Neringa will listen to the Goddess plans and follow.{nl}Neringa will go first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003007
text: Goddess Vaivora has instructed you to collect all the magical energy that can be used on the alter for the seal.{nl}There are devices around the library that you can collect the magic from.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003008
text: Please activate them.{nl}The activated magic devices will go where they are needed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003009
text: There was a human who came here without an invitation.{nl}But you are the first to be formally invited.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003010
text: That looks like enough.{nl}Also, Neringa is looking for you. It would be good if you go.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003011
text: I will finish the rest of the work here.{nl} I will be off.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003012
text: I'm surprised by your work. Human potential seems to know no bounds.{nl}To play a part in continuing human history, I will tell you something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003013
text: Several hundred years ago, Demon Goddess Giltine had already invaded this place.{nl}She was looking for a record of herself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003014
text: But at the time she could not obtain it.{nl}So she comes again today.{nl}I do not know where she will use it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003015
text: But she is coming to this place soon to get her hands on that record.{nl}We have taken advantage of her greed by preparing a trap.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003016
text: As she becomes overcome with joy for finally getting her hands on the record, she will disappear from this world.{nl}If she disappears from this world, every problem will be solved.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003017
text: All of the Goddesses will return to their rightful places and you too may go home.{nl}For this I need you help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003018
text: My Kupole are in the final stages of perfecting the trap.{nl}Please help them. I also have last minute preparations.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003019
text: Once again, thank you for your courage and you sacrifice.{nl}For the sake of the world, please endure just a little bit longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003020
text: Please collect them quickly!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003021
text: Kupole Danute is still unfocused. This may be a handful for a human such as yourself.{nl}But if you have nothing else to do...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003022
text: Vaivora wants to destroy a part of the Fantasy Library in order to block future entry.{nl}But it will not go according to the Goddess' wish.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003023
text: It's quite unfortunate... To ensure that the prediction comes true, you must artfully disrupt the Goddess' plan.{nl}And Goddess must not know what you and Neringa are the ones to blame.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003024
text: So follow the Goddess' plan for awhile.{nl}When it is time to execute our own plan, Neringa will call you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003025
text: To sacrifice a part of the district to capture Giltine.{nl}Vaivora's plan seems reckless.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003026
text: Vaivora will ask you to activate the sealing device set up in Valandis Room 3.{nl}Go about the task.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003027
text: Neringa will also do as such.{nl}Go to Vaivora.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003028
text: Neringa will call you when it is time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003029
text: Time is running out and there are not many Kupoles remaining that I can call...{nl}You will be able to help me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003030
text: Here Skywa is helping me to operate the Bluenode Collapsing Device.{nl}But the energy from this device is calling demons to it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003031
text: Please go there and protect the device for me.{nl}If we lose even one, Giltine will slip away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003032
text: It hurts me as well to make such a decision.{nl}And I will bear this crime for eternity.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003033
text: But to save the world from Giltine's grip...{nl}It's an expensive sacrifice that must be done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003034
text: Amazing!{nl}The activated collapsing device will conceal its magic, and will not face attack again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003035
text: Now Skywa will activate the collapsing device remotely.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003036
text: Next we need to activate the second collapsing device.{nl}However, it does not have enough energy to run.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003037
text: Gather the Gigantic magic source around the area of the second collapsing device.{nl}After that, listen to Meringa about what to do next.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003038
text: I will return after surveilling Valandis Room 91.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003039
text: I will not be gone long.{nl}However, while I am away please consult Neringa if you need help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003040
text: Our goal is to cause the Blanorth collapsing device to overload.{nl}Until then we will continue to follow Vaivora's plan, so as to not alert suspicion.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003041
text: Kupole Skywa is walking around and managing the collapsing devices.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003042
text: Operating them is simple enough. Insert the Gigantic magic source that you have in your possession into the device.{nl}As the device re-energizes, protect it until it can conceal its magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003043
text: Right now the Goddess is checking on Demon Goddess Giltine's rampage in Valandis Room 91.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003044
text: As pressing as the matter is, the Goddess will not use the Fantasy Library as a burial ground for Giltine.{nl}Please follow the plan thoughtfully and reliably.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003045
text: You have successfully energized the device.{nl}It's good to know the plan is right on schedule.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003046
text: Giltine is currently in Valandis Room 91 searching frankly for the revelation.{nl}Let us finally finish the task before us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003047
text: Now, there are only a few devices left to run.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003048
text: But is there enough time to leave everything to Skywa... And it would be difficult to protect.{nl}Would you be willing to help Skywa?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003049
text: Make you way to Ballandans collapsing device.{nl}Skywa will be waiting for you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003050
text: The human helping Vaivora is you?{nl}This is my first time seeing one, but you seem particularly strong.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003051
text: I have a job for you...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003052
text: Not too long ago, I set the Ballandans Collapsing Device.{nl}I was going activate another devicce here as well, but the demons swarmed me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003053
text: If I waste my time on them, I won't be able to finish the work Vaivora gave me.{nl}How about clearing demons from around the Ballandans collapsing device?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003054
text: You just need to protect it until the device is set and conseals itself...{nl}While you deal with this, I'll be able to go and finish my other remaining tasks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003055
text: Thank you so much! Humans are so kind, no?{nl}Alright, I'm going to go finish my other preparations. I'm counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003056
text: Your help is appreciated. Thanks to you, Skywa was able to complete the rest of the preparations.{nl}Now only Balanorth collapsing device is left.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003057
text: Shall I give this remaining task to you?{nl}When all is ready, just turn on the device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003058
text: Oh, right Neringa was looking for you. It seems she also needs your help.{nl}I'll wait here for your successful return.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003059
text: Everything has been prepared.{nl}And Vaivora has no reason to distrust you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003060
text: You received the request to handle the Balanorth collapsing device, no?{nl}When go to run that device, the head monsters will appear and interrupt you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003061
text: When the head monsters are defeated they will release great amounts of energy.{nl}We will use that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003062
text: Please lure the head monsters closer to the Balanorth device and defeat them there.{nl}Their released energy will overheat the device and destroy it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003063
text: Then Vaivora's mission will fail in its final step.{nl}Once you have completed this task, you and Neringa will go together to Valandis Room 91.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003064
text: Please do not forget.{nl}You must defeat the head monsters when they are nearest to the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003065
text: All of history is recorded in Fantasy Library. Of course, records about you are also here.{nl}This is a situation where a human is involved in both Goddess and demon history.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003066
text: But, sadly, it will not be recorded.{nl}Neringa has destroyed all records of your involvement.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003067
text: Vaivora has sensed that something has gone wrong.{nl}She believed all to be finished.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003068
text: But right now there is no reason to care about her.{nl}Neringa will head towards Valandis Room 91 first.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003069
text: Inform Vaivora that the plan has failed.{nl}Then you must come straight to Valandis Room 91.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003070
text: Neringa will wait for you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003071
text: How did it turn out like this?{nl}The device isn't responding.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003072
text: You've failed me.{nl}Now I see the human limit.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003073
text: I was stupid...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003074
text: But it's not your fault.{nl}It was my fault for giving such an important task to a human.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003076
text: The Next plan is...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003077
text: To stop Giltine I could...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003078
text: Everywhere has become polluted and ruined by Demon Goddess Giltine.{nl}Vaivora, before she destroys everything, us included, you must take action.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003079
text: It's no use.{nl}There is no way a human can compete against a Demon God..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003080
text: However, a human chosen by Laima may be different.{nl}I wish not to put you harm's way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003081
text: But I need you to buy us some time until the Kupole and I can figure out how to trap Giltine.{nl}Right now, this is our best plan..

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003082
text: Demon Goddess Giltine is summoning her demons to Valandis Room 91.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003083
text: Neringa is sure she is residing there.{nl}You need to stop Giltine before she gets her hands on the revelation and escapes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003084
text: To do this you must destroy the dimensional doors used to summon the demons.{nl}Then, you and Neringa will need to prepare a way to keep you safe from Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003085
text: But first, destroy the doors.{nl}This incident is coming to an end just as the Goddess predicted.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003086
text: And your role has become more important.{nl}Neringa will make the necessary preparations and, during this time, destroy as many dimensional doors as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003087
text: We have almost reached where Demon God Giltine is residing.{nl}Nearby is the revelation Goddess Laima prepared for Giltine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003088
text: Giltine has already burned her way through the library to reach that one revelation.{nl}And Goddess Laima has said that you also must be there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003089
text: Stay near Neringa. Neringa will keep you safe.{nl}But you must also keep Neringa safe from the demon minions.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003090
text: Now let us follow Giltine.{nl}Now we only need to follow Giltine.{nl}Stay close. If you get too far away from Neringa, you will be struck by Giltine's power.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003091
text: Goddess Laima spoke of a day where Giltine's black wings will be broken.{nl}But this is not that day.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003092
text: From here forward, you will face Giltine alone.{nl}Neringa did not appear in the final scene of Goddess Laima's prediction.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003093
text: Under the black wing's shadow is the future.{nl}suppress your fear and continue forward.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003094
text: Fate, itself, will protect you.{nl}Go forth, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003095
text: You have successfully fulfilled Goddess Laima's prediction.Then, Neringa's role here is done.{nl}But the journey for you has not come to an end.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003096
text: Now that this is over, Goddess Laima wished to guide you to Astral Tower.{nl}At the tower will be a revelation for you to find.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003097
text: At Astral Tower there will be new hardships and revelations waiting for you.{nl}However, all of this follows from Goddess Laima. You will be safe.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003098
text: Before leaving, report to Vaivora that the revelation was not retrieved.{nl}And that Neringa has also left.{nl}She will not ask you why.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003099
text: I see.. this is how things turned out.{nl}I appreciate your courage and sacrifice.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003100
text: This is the second time I have missed Giltine in my own library.{nl}It seems Laima and my sisters will berate me for this..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003101
text: I knew that Neringa would leave eventually.{nl}She was always around but her presence was never imposing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003102
text: If we meet again, there is much I want to ask.{nl}But it will have to wait until the world is freed from Giltine's grasp.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003103
text: This power was something given to me by Laima through Neringa.{nl}And it was Neringa who told me to pass this on to you, once everything was finished.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180208_003104
text: I pray this will be useful to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180305_003111
text: Chapter 2 : Legends of the Hidden Royal Mausoleum{nl}-{nl}The Great Woodlands have been used by the nobles and public alike{nl}as hunting grounds or refuge thanks to their lush vegetation.{nl}As such, it is an inevitability that people have experience.{nl}However, the funny thing is{nl}there is no account related to the royal family.{nl}According to some rumors,{nl}the reason for lack of accounts is because after Taniel II era.{nl}Many offerings were buried in the secret mausoleum.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180305_003112
text: To be frank, record of Taniel the Second's funeral{nl}are extremely sparse{nl}which lends extra credibility to these claims.{nl}That is because the other funerals{nl}had some sort of records{nl}no matter how small.{nl}However, even if these claims are true{nl}the Mausoleum will never see the light of day.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180305_003113
text: The location of the secret mausoleum remains hidden{nl}for it is almost impossible to avoid{nl}the gaze of  Goddess Medeina.{nl}That is why even if the rumors are true, it is likely that it will remain just a legend.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180320_003114
text: Goddess Medeina used the trees to sow a song that she could pass on to the priests.{nl}The priests would then break down the metaphorical lyrics to grasp the Goddess' true meaning.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180320_003115
text: To change the detectors, the detector and its auxiliary systems must be shut down.{nl}Yet, there are numerous systems. If even one turns back on, the remaining ones will also turn on, making the task difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003116
text: Teliavelis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003117
text: I see you got a few Spirit Fragments from that Velcoffer monster.{nl}Say, I could make you a fine piece of armor with those.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003118
text: Here ya go.{nl}If you get any more Velcoffer Spirit Fragments, just come and talk to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003119
text: I can fix you up with a new piece of Velcoffer gear any time you need.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003120
text: Velcoffer Armor (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003121
text: Velcoffer Armor (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003122
text: Here, take them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003123
text: I'll hold on to them for now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003124
text: Velcoffer Armor

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003125
text: Defeat Velcoffer

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003126
text: Defeat Velcoffer at Velcoffer's Nest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003127
text: Defeat %s at Velcoffer's Nest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003128
text: Talk to Teliavelis

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180517_003129
text: Obtained Velcoffer Spirit Fragments. Talk to Blacksmith Teliavelis; he might know how to use them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003130
text: Owynia Dilben

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003131
text: What a surprise to find a visitor in Nicopolis.{nl}{nl}Why am I surprised, you say?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003132
text: Yes! Nicopolis is a city of wizards, built by and for wizards.{nl}In its glory days, the city used to be the center for the study of magic.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003133
text: But curiosity got the better of them and their studies resulted in the elimination of all life in Nicopolis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003134
text: Years after the incident, people returned to the city and life began anew, but the city was damaged once again during Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003135
text: It was also during Medzio Diena that the magical prowess of the city's residents brought out the evil magic forces that were sealed within the city.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003136
text: Some left the city behind, but most stayed as they knew that other cities were already filled with refugees and there would be no room for them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003137
text: Owyn Dilben, a Court Mage who is a distant relative of mine, has asked me to try and suppress the evil magic in the city of Nicopolis.{nl}I have nothing but respect for that man, so I could not refuse his favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003138
text: {nl}But I was not strong enough to suppress the evil magic on my own.{nl}{nl}I found people who would help me in my quest, but it seems I'm still short of manpower for the task.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003139
text: You will help me?{nl}I am grateful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003140
text: Nicopolis is quarantined from the outside world with Barrier Stones around the city.{nl}I thought that the monsters here were more ferocious than in other areas because of this barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003141
text: I did some investigating and found some structures in Starry Town that were radiating with ominous energy.{nl}My guess is that this energy is agitating the monsters here.{nl}I want to suppress the energy radiating from the structures.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003142
text: Traveler. Could you use these Magic Block scrolls on the sculptures in Starry Town to nullify the evil energy they radiate?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003143
text: I will entrust you to deal with the sculptures in the Magic Shop District, Starry Town Square, and Magija Lot.{nl}I will go use the scrolls in the remaining areas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003144
text: Let's meet back at Represijos Street when we're done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003145
text: Looks like the sculpture is protected by something. Investigate its surroundings.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003146
text: The structure seems to be protected by a device nearby. Inject the device with a ball of electricity to overload it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003147
text: The structure is immune to magic but a strange device rose up from the ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003148
text: Looks like you have to enter a password to unlock the device and remove the sculpture's barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003149
text: You need to investigate the Raktas Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003150
text: Investigate the Raktas Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003151
text: Auguste Dupin

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003152
text: Bace is at Keista Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003153
text: Watch Guard Bace

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003154
text: I lost him at the Raktas Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003155
text: This is a difficult task for me because I've never tracked down a possessed person during my career as a detective.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003156
text: Since the incident here, all life has been eliminated in Nicopolis.{nl}But, still, I feel as if the spirits of those who died here still linger in the city.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003157
text: Secretary

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003158
text: If you're thinking of moving to Nicopolis, I would have to try and stop you.{nl}You're not safe here, not even within these city limits.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003159
text: A city of wizards sounds fascinating on paper, but, in reality, it isn't.{nl}All these objects moving about on their own make this place look haunted.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003160
text: Watch Guard Bace

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003161
text: I am doing my best to get to the bottom of the bizarre occurrences in Feline Post Town, but it's not an easy task.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003162
text: The people here are living in constant fear of these strange occurrences.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003163
text: Town Beggar

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003164
text: What good is it trying? Everything I've worked hard for turns to dust when the tree goes haywire.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003165
text: I just want to live my life in peace, but the world won't let me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003166
text: Kelly

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003167
text: The wizards here are trying their best to fix the problems that us ordinary people are facing, but we are still afraid nonetheless.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003168
text: The city looks peaceful on the outside, but it isn't really.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003169
text: The city has been plagued by evil magic forces since Medzio Diena.{nl}Even the monsters are lured to the city because of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003170
text: The people of Nicopolis seem to have fallen under the influence of the evil magic.{nl}I've even seen some people collapse in the streets for no good reason.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003171
text: The wizards are trying to come up with a solution, but their efforts haven't been all that fruitful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003172
text: The people of Nicopolis live in fear that monsters may invade the town.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003173
text: Artist

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003174
text: I can't get much sleep these days because of a dream I have where I am chased by a monster.{nl}Please leave if you have no business here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003175
text: Leave me be unless you have business here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003176
text: At times I had felt I was being controlled by someone or something...{nl}It turns out that I was really under the control of a wizard of Nicopolis' past.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003177
text: It pains me to think that I have caused others suffering because of my condition.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003178
text: I will summarize our findings on the Feline Post Town case and report to Owyn Dilben.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003179
text: Wizard Nidia

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003180
text: Nicopolis was a place I've only read about in books. It's a rather bleak and eerie place even with all these people living here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003181
text: I am in awe of the wizards of the past for having built such a city.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003182
text: But it was very amateurish of them to have lost control over the city like they did.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003183
text: Wizard Aldoni

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003184
text: We are under the orders of Owynia Dilben to look after the Barrier Stones in Spell Tome Town.{nl}These days we are investigating the sudden increase in the number of monsters around the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003185
text: The magic forces that surround the city of Nicopolis have a negative influence on its people.{nl}We look after the Barrier Stone that suppresses the negative energy to some extent.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003186
text: Wizard Ane

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003187
text: There weren't many monsters when we first arrived.{nl}The monsters grew in number since we started looking after the Barrier Stones.{nl}Thankfully, we have never been attacked by them but we live in fear that they could strike at any moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003188
text: If it wasn't for what happened in the past, Nicopolis would have been a great city.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003189
text: No matter what happens when you switch the Old Research Papers with the fake documents, come back to Avarija Street.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003190
text: I must follow the tracking spell on the Quipmage and stop him from performing the ritual.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003191
text: The Quipmage almost had me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003192
text: I never knew I would end up fighting monsters...{nl}I didn't know this job would get so dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003193
text: We could stop the Quipmage because Aldoni chased after him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003194
text: It seems to be locked because of the devices found near it.{nl}Try turning them off.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003195
text: The device is empty. The Quipmage must have taken the papers already.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003196
text: Removing the crystal from the magic circle could unlock it. Ask Nidia for a way to remove the crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003197
text: Can't see if the Old Research Papers are still here because the device is locked. Investigate the area and find a way to unlock it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003198
text: You're here.{nl}{nl}I've researched the sculptures while using the Magic Block scroll.{nl}The sculptures were put up by the Pervading Queen to watch over and experiment on the city's people.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003199
text: I don't know what kind of experiment, but there are records that these structures were used to take control of people's wills.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003200
text: If we use the Magic Block scroll on this sculpture we will be able to suppress the influence of sculptures all over town and calm the monsters down.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003201
text: Monsters?{nl}They attacked while you were trying to use the scrolls?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003202
text: We must be careful then.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003203
text: They really did attack...{nl}It was as if they were protecting the structures.{nl}Without your help I would have died, traveler.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003204
text: I sense powerful magic coming from the clock tower in Starry Town Square.{nl}I've never felt such powerful magic before.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003205
text: This does not bode well.{nl}Let's go have a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003206
text: No... There seems to be a problem with the Barrier Stones...{nl}Looks like we need to go check up on them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003207
text: Thank you.{nl}We may be attacked by even stronger monsters now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003208
text: If a monster appears, don't hesitate to run away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003209
text: The Pervading Queen appeared?{nl}I've put you in danger again, traveler. I am sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003210
text: I'm glad to hear that you are alright.{nl}So, the Pervading Queen told you to stop meddling in her affairs?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003211
text: Owyn Dilben has found that the old leaders of Nicopolis now roam the lands as monsters.{nl}These leaders now have taken the form of the Teal Specter, the Quipmage, and the Pervading Queen, who you've already come across.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003212
text: Owyn Dilben has not only suppressed their magic but he also made sure that they won't escape Nicopolis and wreak havoc on the world.{nl}He has put me in charge of the duties before he left.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003213
text: I am impressed that you defeated the Pervading Queen, one of the ancient figures of power in Nicopolis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003214
text: Excuse me for saying so, but perhaps you would help me track down and defeat the ancient beings of the city.{nl}So that the people of Nicopolis can live in peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003215
text: Ramute

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003216
text: Have you been to the Starry Town Square?{nl}There's a big clock tower there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003217
text: I've heard that the stairs leading to the top of the clock tower are made of stars.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003218
text: Being a wizard myself, I was curious as to how the stairs were made.{nl}But I could never go take a look myself because I can sense powerful magic in the area. I'm afraid there could be a monster or a trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003219
text: I wanted to ask someone to help me gather the material that makes up the starry stairs.{nl}But asking others of things I can't do myself would just be rude, wouldn't it?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003220
text: It saddens me that I won't ever find out what those stairs are made of.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003221
text: Really?{nl}That would be wonderful!{nl}Here. Please gather the materials using this bottle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003222
text: Please gather the materials that make up the starry stairs of the clock tower in Starry Town Square using this special bottle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003223
text: You've brought the materials that make up the starry stairs! Thank you.{nl}I'm so happy that I can finally study the starry stairs!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003224
text: Nicopolis Guard

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003225
text: A traveler here in Nicopolis...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003226
text: I'm not trying to poke fun at you, it's just that this place is dangerous and we don't see many travelers.{nl}It was rude of me but I was surprised to see someone visiting the city alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003227
text: I am the guard in charge of watching over Starry Town.{nl}Being on guard duty isn't easy what with all the monsters and strange devices lying about.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003228
text: Able wizards are in charge of defending the city from evil magic and I warn the people of the city not to mess around with the devices.{nl}But the monsters keep appearing no matter how many times I chase them away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003229
text: Watch out for monsters on your travels.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003230
text: Nicopolis Guard

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003231
text: You want to help?{nl}Are you sure about that?{nl}The monsters these days are more ferocious than ever, you could hurt yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003232
text: Hmm... If you say so yourself. I will accept your offer.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003233
text: If you can't seem to handle the monsters, just tell me.{nl}I'd rather that I work harder than to see you get hurt out there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003234
text: You've defeated the monsters...{nl}Are you a mercenary or a soldier by trade?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003235
text: I wish I could offer you a job in guarding Nicopolis with me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003236
text: Are you a new settler?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003237
text: Oh... A traveler.{nl}I warn you not to stay too long in Feline Post Town.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003238
text: Those who caused the past incident at Nicopolis now roam the streets of Feline Post Town as monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003239
text: The Teal Specter is the worst of them all.{nl}He is now an evil spirit that possesses the townsfolk to suck the life force out of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003240
text: Why don't we do anything about him?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003241
text: Owyn Dilben had tried to locate the Teal Specter himself, but because of the incident in the past and Medzio Diena it had become very difficult to track down a spirit in Nicopolis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003242
text: With help from the Exorcist Master, he had created a Detecting Solution that could detect the presence of the Teal Specter. But the solution can only be used once.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003243
text: Owyn Dilben hired me, a detective, to track down the victim possessed by the Teal Specter.{nl}For now I have narrowed it down to twelve suspects.{nl}I need to further narrow down the number of suspects to two, but it's not going to be easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003244
text: You'd better leave before the Teal Specter gets you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003245
text: You want to help me?{nl}Fine.{nl}The more the merrier, I guess.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003246
text: I want to investigate the people who arrived in Feline Post Town around the time of the incident.{nl}I'll need the Resident Logs for that. We will need the secretary's assistance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003247
text: Go and ask him for the Resident Logs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003248
text: The Resident Logs?{nl}Sigh...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003249
text: I need to be truthful with you.{nl}I was being careless and lost the Resident Logs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003250
text: I opened the window to let in some fresh air and the Resident Logs were blown out the window by the wind.{nl}I looked everywhere for the logs but some pages have been eaten by monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003251
text: I need to retrieve the Resident Logs but I don't have the power to fight the monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003252
text: My heart is heavy because of all that's happened because of me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003253
text: That's right.{nl}These are the lost Resident Logs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003254
text: I will let you borrow the Resident Logs if you need it for your investigation.{nl}You can give them back to me after you're done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003255
text: Let's check the Resident Logs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003256
text: You've found Resident Logs?{nl}I am relieved that you did.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003257
text: The people who moved in around the time of the incident are Ced, Efo, Fog, Gogh, Kelly and Leslie.{nl}Looks like we narrowed the number of suspects down to six.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003258
text: Bace is an eyewitness.{nl}Go get his testimony for me. He should be at the Keista Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003259
text: Auguste Dupin must have sent you.{nl}I'll tell you everything I saw.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003260
text: The night was so dark that I could not go out without a torch.{nl}It was when I was heading towards the Keista Intersection on my watch duty that I heard someone moaning.{nl}I headed over to where the sound was coming from and found a well-built man afloat in midair.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003261
text: I screamed out loud.{nl}Then someone who was hiding in the dark started running away towards the Raktas Intersection.{nl}I chased him thinking that he could be a suspect in the Feline Post Town Case.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003262
text: He was too fast so I couldn't keep up with him.{nl}I threw my torch at him in the hopes of stopping him but the fire from the torch just burnt his clothes slightly and I lost him at the Raktas Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003263
text: I lost the suspect at the Raktas Intersection.{nl}This is all I can tell you, unfortunately.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003264
text: Possible clues?{nl}All I had was the clothes I gave you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003265
text: You can smell the chemicals on the clothes.{nl}Perhaps you'll find something if you investigate this smell further.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003266
text: We want to identify the chemical found on the clothing.{nl}In order for that, we need the Ingredy Powder found on Mimorats. Could you get some for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003267
text: I will make preparations for the investigation while you fetch the Ingredy Powder.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003268
