text: I have finished making the necessary preparations.{nl}Let's find out what this chemical really is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003269
text: The chemical extracted from the clothes are the chemicals used in making dyes.{nl}I saw the town chemist working with such chemicals.{nl}He is the primary suspect for now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003270
text: I can feel that we're getting closer to finding the possessed.{nl}You will be able to find the chemist in Irodymai Trade District.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003271
text: {nl}I will go ahead and question him first.{nl}I am sure that the chemist will lead us one step closer to finding the possessed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003272
text: He tried to run but I caught him.{nl}We almost lost him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003273
text: Let's interrogate the chemist about the possession.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003274
text: Let's interrogate the chemist.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003275
text: After hearing his testimony, I am certain that the chemist is not possessed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003276
text: The chemist spoke of an artist and a woman named Kelly.{nl}The two of them could have the access to such chemicals.{nl}We should spray them both with the Detecting Solution and find out who is possessed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003277
text: Let's spray the suspects with the Detecting Solution and find out who is possessed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003278
text: We must perform an exorcism on the possessed to lure out the Teal Specter.{nl}Why don't you prepare a seal around the suspect's house while I call for an exorcist?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003279
text: You've done it.{nl}I have brought an exorcist with me as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003280
text: Let's go.{nl}The exorcist is performing the ritual on Pabegti Street.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003281
text: What happened to the Teal Specter?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003282
text: We've finally vanquished the Teal Specter.{nl}Thanks to you, the Feline Post Town Case has finally been closed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003283
text: A traveler in Nicopolis...{nl}It isn't safe around here because of all that evil magic and monsters and whatnot. Many people are leaving the town because of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003284
text: Us? We take care of the Barrier Stones in Spell Tome Town by the request of Ownynia Dilben.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003285
text: As of recent, we've been investigating the growing number of monsters in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003286
text: You will help us?{nl}It's always good to have an extra pair of hands.{nl}There is a magical device in the Spell Tome Empty Lot and we suspect that this device is causing the number of monsters to grow.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003287
text: Let's head out to the Spell Tome Lot and investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003288
text: Seeing how the monsters attacked when we approached the device, it is now certain that device is calling the monsters to this area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003289
text: Let's check the device to see what exactly it is that draws them here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003290
text: Did you see that?{nl}That was the Beholder and the Quipmage.{nl}Who is the Quipmage you ask?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003291
text: The Quipmage is one of the central figures that caused the deaths of millions at Nicopolis.{nl}I've heard Owynia Dilben mention him before but it's my first time seeing him for myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003292
text: Having seen him talking to the Beholder in the form of a monster, there is no doubt that the Quipmage is planning something sinister.{nl}We need to stop them.{nl}I'll talk to my colleagues about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003293
text: Aldoni told me just now.{nl}We all agreed to stop the Quipmage. We believe that he is up to no good.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003294
text: Our plan is to find the Quipmage's Old Research Papers.{nl}Ane suggested that he probably scattered them around various locations.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003295
text: Ane also made this Micro Magic Detector on the grounds that the papers will also be radiating with the Quipmage's evil magic.{nl}We will use this device to switch the original papers with the Forged Papers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003296
text: Using the Micro Magic Detector will display the areas that possibly hide the Quipmage's papers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003297
text: There are eight areas in total.{nl}We'll check the areas to the south.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003298
text: Please go check the Residential Area, Tyrimai Lot and Magija Slove Square.{nl}Should any one of us be in trouble, let's meet back on Avarija Street.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003299
text: You think removing the crystal from the magic circle is going to unlock the device?{nl}Hold on. There may be a way to do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003300
text: This is a Scroll of Gravity.{nl}Use this on the crystal and the crystal will float into the air.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003301
text: Use the Scroll of Gravity on the crystal to make the crystal float mid-air.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003302
text: Check the Residential Area, Tyrimai Lot and Magija Slove Square for the Quipmage's papers and replace them with the Forged Papers.{nl}Come back when you're done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003303
text: You've done it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003304
text: Magic, for Nicopolis, was the driving force behind both its success and demise.{nl}This city is a warning of sorts to all those who study the arcane arts.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003305
text: The city is a site of the devastating accident caused by those that were blinded by their own glory and quest for knowledge beyond their comprehension.{nl}What we are looking at is more than just the remnants of a bygone era.{nl}The city itself is a site of learning.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003306
text: I want to study the city in order to learn what it has to teach.{nl}Through what I've learned, I want to guide the people and provide them better a future for the good of the entire Kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003307
text: These are the thoughts that run through my head when in Nicopolis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003308
text: Magic gives us convenience, but at times it is a force that can destroy us.{nl}At long last I've finally come to understand the weight of the responsibilities that I have as a wizard here in Nicopolis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003309
text: Chronomancer Ramute

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003310
text: Nicopolis may be a glorious achievement in the eyes of wizards, but at the same time, it is a stern warning.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003311
text: The buildings of Nicopolis have remained the same for hundreds of years.{nl}They seem unfazed by all that's happened here in the past.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003312
text: We are all doing our part in trying to revitalize the city of Nicopolis alongside Owynia Dilben.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003313
text: Many have left the city again after Medzio Diena.{nl}But there are still many at work to make this city great once again.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003314
text: There are rumors that the people who caused the incident at Nicopolis are still roaming the lands in the form of monsters.{nl}Don't pay any mind to that, it's just a rumor.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003315
text: There are many unidentified magic structures around the city.{nl}Some of them are known to cause trouble so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003316
text: It is the same for me.{nl}One half of my soul is still bound to the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003317
text: I do not know when I'll be gone.{nl}That's why I want to save as many Kupoles as possible while I still can.{nl}Right now, I can save them but I have no way of keeping the Kupoles safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003318
text: {nl}We must protect the Kupoles until they regain their health.{nl}Head to the Baltinel Parish and collect the holy relics that used to belong to the believers of this city.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003319
text: {nl}The holy relics should be able to hide the Kupoles from the demons.{nl}After that, we'll go looking for other Kupoles.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003320
text: With your help, I was able to make preparations to hide the Kupoles.{nl}But there are still many Kupoles that are being hunted down by the demons.{nl}I know it's ridiculous for me to seek the help of a human.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003321
text: {nl}But could you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003322
text: I will still need your help for now.{nl}So if you could help...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003323
text: {nl}Please follow me to the Gliehel Memorial.{nl}I beg of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003324
text: Thank you for coming.{nl}We may be able to help Zsaia and the Kupoles of the area with your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003325
text: I may have found Zsaia.{nl}She is at the entrance of the Gliehel Ranch area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003326
text: {nl}But... It seems she is being chased by demons.{nl}Before you contact Zsaia, please defeat the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003327
text: {nl}I can't give up just yet.{nl}I will hide the Kupole you brought to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003328
text: I can't trust a human.{nl}Get out of my way!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003329
text: We went through all that trouble for nothing...{nl}I am terribly sorry.{nl}I will hide this Kupole from the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003330
text: {nl}Protect my sisters...{nl}Help Grisia and Velad escape ...{nl}I am sorry I didn't trust you at first.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003331
text: This is my last request...{nl}Please help them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003332
text: I can't believe that I've met my end falling into a demon's trap!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003333
text: Why are you following me?{nl}Leave me alone!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003334
text: Kupole Velad has gone away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003335
text: You're here. I've been waiting for you.{nl}The Supreme Commander and the others have already headed upstairs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003336
text: I will hold my position here and act as the base for the other Resistance members.{nl}I was going to send reinforcements to Byle as soon as the base was ready but I came across a problem.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003337
text: There is a trap that shoots arrows, which is stopping our men from moving forward.{nl}I need your help to solve this problem, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003338
text: Could you defeat the demons in the area so that our scouts can return safely?{nl}I will inspect the base while you are away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003339
text: The Astral Tower is full of traps that have been installed to keep the demons away.{nl}Our foremost priority should be to disarm these traps.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003340
text: But the Control Devices are hidden away to prevent such a thing from happening.{nl}It should be the same for the other floors as well. There may even be other traps that we are not aware of.{nl}But we cannot back down now.{nl}We must protect Lydia Schaffen's Astral Tower, whatever it takes.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003341
text: Thank you.{nl}The scouts could return safely because of your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003342
text: The scouts reported seeing demons in the Astral Tower that they've never seen before.{nl}They could be entering the tower through the portal on the first floor that Elder Ramunas has spoken of.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003343
text: According to the scouts, they spotted a red glow that looked like a portal in the Engine Room on 1F.{nl}Could you go and have a look for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003344
text: Elder Ramunas had mentioned that Ignas installed a portal somewhere on 1F.{nl}I remember that he said the portal lead to the Outer Wall District 13.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003345
text: When this fight is over, I must report to the Supreme Commander and have that area inspected.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003346
text: We progressed this much while you were away investigating the portals. So the portals do exist...{nl}Now we know for sure that the demons are sending in their reinforcements through the portals.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003347
text: Elder Ramunas has provided us with the materials to make an explosive that could destroy the portal.{nl}But it will take some time for the explosive to be crafted.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003348
text: I will give you the Portal Suppressors that the elder gave to me as plan B.{nl}Install it around the portals to weaken their power.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003349
text: Destroying the portal would be our best bet in stopping the demons invading the tower...{nl}But we need to buy time to manufacture the explosive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003350
text: The suppressors will make it difficult for demons to use the portals.{nl}Please install the Portal Suppressors around the portals.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003351
text: You've come. I'm sorry to have kept you waiting.{nl}We've just completed the explosive.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003352
text: Now, you will have to set the explosive near the portals.{nl}When it explodes, the magic that powers the portals will disappear.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003353
text: We may fail to destroy all portals if there is a powerful demon or magic guarding the portals.{nl}I will give you some more suppressors just in case such a thing happens.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003354
text: Hopefully, the portals will be destroyed completely. But we should plan ahead in preparation for the worst case scenario.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003355
text: So it hasn't been removed completely.{nl}But it's okay. That should have drastically decreased the number of demons invading the Astral Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003356
text: I need you to help me with something while the Resistance soldiers fight the remaining demons near the portals.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003357
text: From the reports, we have found that the Control Device for the arrow trap is in the Command Room on 1F.{nl}The reports also said that the road to the Command Room is a perilous one full of demons and more traps.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003358
text: Could you go check the Command Room on 1F?{nl}Please defeat the monsters in the area as well to make way for the Resistance soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003359
text: The Astral Tower had always been an impregnable fortress in stopping the demon invasion.{nl}But now to see them enter the tower so freely... I am worried.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003360
text: You're back.{nl}Did you find the Defensive Device in the Command Room?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003361
text: So it is protected by a barrier...{nl}Then we should find a way to remove that barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003362
text: It could either be the demons or the Schaffenstar that installed the barrier.{nl}We are currently out of materials to make more explosives.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003363
text: I guess the only thing left to do is use the Magic Stones carried by the demons to destroy the barrier.{nl}The Elder once told me that the Magic Stones that demons carry have small traces of magic in them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003364
text: I'm sure we will be able to make a new explosive that could blow up the barrier using these Magic Stones.{nl}Could you collect the Magic Stones for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003365
text: I am sure that we will be able to make powerful explosives out of these Magic Stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003366
text: You did it! Could you hold on a second?{nl}I will make the explosives for you right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003367
text: This is an explosive made from the Magic Stones you've collected.{nl}You should set these explosives to remove the barrier protecting the Defensive Device and disarm the trap.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003368
text: We, the Resistance, will defeat the demons on the way up to the next floor.{nl}But I must warn you that it's going to take some time for the explosives to go off because they were made using Magic Stones. The demons will try to stop you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003369
text: We will fight off the demons located on the way to the next floor up while you disarm the trap.{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003370
text: The trap has been disarmed.{nl}Now the Resistance will be able to minimize our losses!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003371
text: We've done everything we could on the first floor.{nl}Let's move on to the next floor.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003372
text: Instead of 2F, we will take the path straight for 4F that the Elder has prepared for us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003373
text: I will remain here to take care of the remaining demons and to make sure other Resistance members can make it safely to 4F.{nl}I have marked your map with the Supreme Commander's location.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003374
text: You must be the Revelator! We've been expecting you.{nl}This must mean that Kron has successfully taken over 1F.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003375
text: The security here in 4F has been tightened.{nl}The demons must know that 1F has fallen to the Resistance.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003376
text: But we cannot give up just yet. We must take back the Astral Tower.{nl}Revelator. I will tell you what you need to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003377
text: According to our scouts, the Defensive Device here is made up of two parts.{nl}I've been told there is a poison gas trap in the area, as well as arrows.{nl}You must be cautious.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003378
text: We sent our men to scout the Second Control Room to have a closer look.{nl}Could you have a look at the First Control Room for us?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003379
text: Please defeat the demons on your way there to help the Resistance members who are on their way up from the floor below.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003380
text: As I've told you already, the Astral Tower is full of dangerous traps.{nl}But I've never heard of a poison trap before. I am perplexed as to who prepared such a thing...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003381
text: You've defeated the demons nearby.{nl}Now please investigate the First Control Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003382
text: You've returned. Our scouts have also returned from the Second Control Room.{nl}Let's discuss our next plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003383
text: Having heard both your reports, it seems that the First Control Room is not as tightly guarded as the Second.{nl}The demons there seem a bit less well trained.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003384
text: Could you defeat the demons in the First Control Room and shut down the Defensive Device there?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003385
text: Hmm... But now I realize that there is no way that the demons will let their guard down this easy.{nl}There must be something that we're overlooking.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003386
text: Oh, so the guardian of the Control Room had the Defensive Device Lever.{nl}Even if we get to the Defensive Device, we won't be able to disarm it without that lever...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003387
text: Thank you for your help. Now the arrow trap has been disarmed.{nl}But the poison gas trap is still blocking our path.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003388
text: Since the lever was kept separately, it is most likely that the demons are doing the same to defend the Second Control Room as well.{nl}We'll need more information.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003389
text: Could you collect any items that could give us a clue to the workings of the defense system of the Second Control Room?{nl}Report back when you've gathered enough information.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003390
text: Ignas is cunning, cold-hearted, and cautious.{nl}From what we've gathered, we can tell that disarming the trap in the Second Control Room won't be an easy task.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003391
text: This is... An instruction? And it's written in our language and not in the language of demons.{nl}And you said you got it from a Naste? Hmm...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003392
text: {nl}Thank you for that.{nl}We need anything we can get our hands on, I'll have a read.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003393
text: According to the instruction, the Second Device Lever is hidden in the Storage Room on 4F.{nl}Could you locate the hidden lever in the Storage Room?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003394
text: But the Storage Room has a guardian just like in the First Control Room.{nl}You will need to prepare yourself for a fight. I will go to the Second Control Room with the Resistance soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003395
text: We will march onwards regardless of all the tricks Ignas has up his sleeves.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003396
text: I've warned my men to be cautious in avoiding the traps... It's embarrassing to have fallen into one myself.{nl}But thanks to you, Revelator, my life has been spared.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003397
text: I was the first to arrive in the Second Control Room but others couldn't make it because of the demons and traps.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003398
text: Could you buy us some time to regroup and have our soldiers healed up?{nl}Please defeat the monsters in the passageway and wait for us in the room opposite to the Training Area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003399
text: You will be able to use the elevator to 12F that the Elder has prepared once you pass the Training Area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003400
text: That room will be the rendezvous point. Go defeat the demons in the area and wait for us there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003401
text: Defeat the monsters on the way to 12F and wait for us at the rendezvous point.{nl}The rendezvous point is the room opposite the Training Area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003402
text: I will lead my men there as soon as we are done regrouping.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003403
text: You've done it. Thank you.{nl}I want to move to the rendezvous point but there are still some men who need to recover.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003404
text: Go ahead and wait for me there.{nl}I will follow you as soon as our men have regrouped.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003405
text: You've come. I've captured Henika on my way here but he seems to be acting strangely.{nl}I expected him to run away when I saw him but instead, he challenged me to a duel.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003406
text: I thought he was acting rather suspicious so I shot him with an arrow that nullifies all magic effects and he collapsed to the ground.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003407
text: I've prepared this arrow to use when fighting a powerful demon and didn't expect it to affect Henika...{nl}I'm sorry, I was caught up in my train of thought and forgot to thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003408
text: Thank you for protecting us from the enemy's ambush.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003409
text: We can finally move to 12F but before we do I need to talk to you.{nl}Is that okay with you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003410
text: I almost forgot to tell you this because of Henika but I learned that there are other Elders in the tower between 12F and 20F.{nl}And Ignas, my sworn enemy, is at the observatory on 21F.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003411
text: I also found this key while searching Henika's body.{nl}I don't know what this is for, but I will hold on to it in case we need it in the future.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003412
text: Now, I should get back to preparing for 12F.{nl}You will also need time to prepare so tell me when you feel ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003413
text: Medic

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003414
text: Ah, Revelator... I know you're busy but could you help me?{nl}I am a medic for the Resistance. My job is to tend to injured soldiers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003415
text: There are many Resistance soldiers poisoned by the gas trap on the 4th floor.{nl}I need to concoct a cure for these men but ingredients are scarce.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003416
text: I am sure that the demons in these areas carry something they use to cure the poison with.{nl}Could you help me find the cure for the sake of the Resistance?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003417
text: First the arrows and now the poison gas...{nl}My heart hangs heavy seeing my comrades fall as we march onwards.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003418
text: This is a Schaffenstar Emergency Med...! And the Naste had these?{nl}How could they have gotten a hold of this?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003419
text: Thanks to you, now I can cure the poisoned soldiers. Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003420
text: I know it's suspicious, but we can't help but agree to his terms as we have no other choice.{nl}Revelator. Do not hesitate to back away when you find something suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003421
text: Elder Adaux

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003422
text: Thank you for agreeing to my terms. Why don't we begin with disarming the Defensive Device for the arrow trap?{nl}You will find a room that was once used as a Schaffenstar Member's Lounge nearby.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003423
text: There are two Control Devices that hide the Defensive Device for the arrow trap.{nl}Demons in the area should have the lever for those devices.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003424
text: Defeat them to find the Control Device Levers.{nl}Use the two levers to reveal the Defensive Device that controls the arrow trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003425
text: Adaux has asked that you retrieve the two Control Device Levers from the demons in the Member's Lounge.{nl}Use the levers on the Devices to reveal the Defensive Device for the arrow trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003426
text: We'll do what he says for now because he knows the area very well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003427
text: The Control Terminals have been shut down.{nl}If Adaux was telling the truth, we should be able to see the First Defensive Device for the arrow trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003428
text: Adaux said that the First Defensive Device for the arrow trap can be found in the Control Room near the entrance.{nl}There are guardians in the area who have the levers that are required to shut down the Defensive Device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003429
text: Adaux has deployed demons towards the Control Room to trick Ignas into thinking he's still working for him.{nl}Defeat the guardian at the Control Room to retrieve the lever and use it to shut down the Defensive Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003430
text: If what Adaux has said is true, some of my comrades would have become...{nl}I can't believe it. If that is the truth... We're...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003431
text: We want to move as quickly as possible since the arrows have stopped{nl}but our soldiers can't seem to move any further because of this evil energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003432
text: Adaux said that he had a favor for you since you are free from the influence of the nefarious energy.{nl}He says that there is an invisible barrier that Ignas created on 12F.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003433
text: No one was able to get past 12F because of this invisible barrier and he wanted to see if you, the Revelator, were able to pass the barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003434
text: I've never heard of this before but could you go have a look?{nl}And it would be great if you could defeat the demons in the area while you're at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003435
text: An invisible barrier... I've never heard of this before.{nl}Then do you think it's the barrier that's spreading this nefarious energy throughout the tower?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003436
text: Ah, even you could not pass the invisible barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003437
text: The invisible barrier must be removed at all costs if we want to get past 12F.{nl}Though we would still have to do something about the nefarious energy after the barrier's been removed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003438
text: We've investigated the area beforehand but did not find any device that seemed to control the barrier.{nl}Perhaps there are areas that we have not searched yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003439
text: Could you perhaps look for any anomalies in the area?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003440
text: We cannot back down now, Revelator.{nl}We must find a way to remove the invisible barrier and the nefarious energy by any means necessary.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003441
text: I've been waiting for you, Savior.{nl}On this statue is my gift to you that will guide you in your most perilous hour.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003442
text: The mysterious girl you saw earlier will help you when you are faced with a great adversity.{nl}The girl's powers have now been restored with your help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003443
text: Return to the invisible barrier that blocks your path, Savior.{nl}The mysterious girl is waiting for you there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003444
text: The girl will cleanse the area of the nefarious energy and open the way for your passage.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003445
text: Return to the invisible barrier that blocks your path.{nl}The mysterious girl is waiting for you there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003446
text: I felt my body getting lighter, you...{nl}Does this mean that you've removed the barrier?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003447
text: I don't know how you did it but even without the barrier, there are still many traps that hinder progress.{nl}Unless those traps are disarmed, I cannot escape from this place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003448
text: For now, you should go tell your friends at the Resistance about this.{nl}They should now be able to progress a little further.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003449
text: I no longer feel the nefarious energy that's been weighing me down.{nl}Could it have disappeared when the barrier was removed?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003450
text: We couldn't have made it this far without you, Revelator.{nl}You've done a lot to help us. I thank you from the bottom of my heart.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003451
text: I heard you removed the invisible barrier. And the nefarious energy seems to have disappeared...{nl}Did you find the device to remove it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003452
text: Of course, I won't pry.{nl}But even if the trap on your side has been disarmed, there's still another trap here that's blocking the path.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003453
text: You will be able to find the Second Defensive Device in the Command Room on 12F. There is another guardian and the situation is the same as before.{nl}Find the Defensive Device Lever to disarm the trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003454
text: We will go to where Adaux is to see if he'll uphold his part of the bargain.{nl}Revelator, you should deactivate the Second Defensive Device to disarm the trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003455
text: I've told Byle what needs to be done in the upper floors before you arrived.{nl}You should talk to him for further instructions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003456
text: Ignas seems to have abandoned his humanity... He cannot be forgiven.{nl}Revelator. Let's move to 20F and defeat Ignas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003457
text: {nl}Take this before you go. Adaux wanted me to deliver this to you.{nl}I hope that this equipment will be of help to you, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003458
text: {nl}Adaux has also opened up a secret passage that will lead us to 20F.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003459
text: {nl}I will go ahead and set up camp on 20F.{nl}Follow the secret passage to 20F whenever you're ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003460
text: You've arrived.{nl}I have finished setting up camp here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003461
text: With Henika and Adaux gone, only Cezaris remains by Ignas' side. He should be feeling pretty anxious about now.{nl}First, I will tell you what needs to be done here based on what I've learned from Adaux.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003462
text: I'm relieved that our men seem relatively unharmed despite the ambush.{nl}Now I know for sure that Ignas is at his wit's end. This is our chance to strike!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003463
text: According to Adaux, the defenses on 20F are protected by 4 Protective Devices.{nl}Each device can be found in Schaffenstar Lodges 1 to 4 respectively.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003464
text: He said that each device is controlled in a different method.{nl}First, go to the Schaffenstar Lodges 1 and 2. Defeat the monsters there and disable the devices.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003465
text: Go to Schaffenstar Lodge 3 afterward and defeat the demons there to obtain the Suspicious Scrolls.{nl}Use the scrolls there to find the hidden magic source and destroy them to stop the Protective Device in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003466
text: There are demons in Schaffenstar Lodge 4 that act as a power source for the barriers for the Protective Device.{nl}Defeat the demons to remove the barrier and disable the device there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003467
text: There's a lot to remember so you may forget a few details here and there.{nl}If you do forget, come back and ask me again any time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003468
text: I will regroup the Resistance men here and fight off the demons in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003469
text: First, disable the protective devices in Schaffenstar Lodges 1 and 2.{nl}The demons there will try to stop you so clear the area before you disable the device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003470
text: Go to Schaffenstar Lodge 3 and obtain Suspicious Scrolls by defeating the demons there.{nl}Use the scrolls to look for a magic source in the area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003471
text: When you locate the magic source, destroy it and the barrier surrounding the Protective Device will weaken.{nl}That's when you will have to disable the Protective Device there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003472
text: In Schaffenstar Lodge 4, there are demons that act as a power source for the barriers for the Protective Device.{nl}Defeat the demons to weaken the barrier and disable the device there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003473
text: Now we can disable the Defensive Device.{nl}We should have no trouble doing so as the Protective Devices have all been disabled now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003474
text: The Defensive Device should be in the control room on 20F.{nl}But there will be a guardian protecting it like on the other floors.{nl}Defeat the guardian and disable the Defensive Device so that the traps are no longer functional.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003475
text: All there's left to do after that is to find and defeat Elder Cezaris and move onto 21F.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003476
text: We should look for Cezaris now. He should be in the Elder Chambers.{nl}Let's head towards the Elder Chambers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003477
text: After we deal with Cezaris, all the Elders of the Schaffenstar will have been removed.{nl}Ignas will be the last one left after this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003478
text: To see Ignas before my own eyes... It's almost over.{nl}What Adaux said was true. Some of the demons we fought were actually our comrades...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003479
text: But there's no time to look back now.{nl}We must end this once and for all and take back the Astral Tower for the sake of all of our fallen comrades.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003480
text: Revelator. It's time we faced Cezaris but there are some things that must be taken care of before we do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003481
text: Adaux has told us that we need five keys to move up to 21F.{nl}Three of the five keys are held by each Elder and the remaining two are in the two General Offices on 20F.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003482
text: We must first find those keys before we face Cezaris.{nl}Why don't we start with the nearest General Office on 20F?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003483
text: It's most likely that one of the demons in the area will be carrying the key.{nl}If you've found the key, go look for the second key in the Secondary General Office.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003484
text: To prevent theft, it is said that the keys are stored in a way where one key is required to find the other.{nl}Finding the first key will lead you to the second key in the Secondary General Office.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003485
text: Report to me when you've found the two keys.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003486
text: In the past, Lydia Schaffen had prepared five keys that opened the passage to 21F of the Astral Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003487
text: Three of those keys were trusted to each of the three Elders and the remaining two were stored in the two General Offices on 20F.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003488
text: Usually, you would only need to have two keys from the General Offices to get to 21F. But in the case of special emergencies, the security mechanism is changed so that you need the keys of the three Elders to move up to 21F.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003489
text: We currently have two Elder keys.{nl}The remaining keys can all be found here on 20F.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003490
text: You've found one key. The other should be in the Secondary General Office.{nl}Use the key you've just found to find the next key.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003491
text: If there is a demon that reacts to the first key you've found, it's most likely the that the demon is holding the second key.{nl}Come back after you've found both keys.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003492
text: We now have both keys.{nl}All we need now is the key that Cezaris holds.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003493
text: Now we must face Cezaris. According to Adaux, Cezaris has turned himself into a demon completely.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003494
text: This will be a difficult fight, Revelator.{nl}I will give you three arrows to help you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003495
text: It's weaker than the arrow that subdued Henika, but you will still be able to use these on Cezaris to weaken him temporarily.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003496
text: We will deal with Ignas after we've taken care of Cezaris.{nl}The Resistance will clear the way to the Elder Chambers for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003497
text: It will be an arduous battle.{nl}After this, all that's left will be Ignas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003498
text: You must use the five keys on the Elevator Control Device in the Night Duty Office to get to 21F.{nl}The five keys are the there Elder keys and the two keys from the General Offices.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003499
text: Thanks to your help we now have all five keys.{nl}Take these keys with you. Use them on the Elevator Control Device to activate the elevator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003500
text: Use the five keys and activate the elevator.{nl}Ignas is waiting for us on the next floor.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003501
text: I was trying to set up camp before the fight with Ignas, but demon forces are too strong here. This way we'll...{nl}Could you help clear the area until we set up camp on 21F and the remaining Resistance forces arrive?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003502
text: Please buy us some time to set up camp here.{nl}I beg you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003503
text: It's important that we defeat Ignas, but there is one more thing we must take care.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003504
text: We must destroy the device that turns people into demons located somewhere in the Astral Tower.{nl}According to Adaux, this device turns Schaffenstar members into demons and gives power to Ignas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003505
text: If I am correct in guessing that this device collects magic energy and supplies it to Ignas, there may be a way to use this device to our advantage.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003506
text: The fact that the device collects magic could only mean that an influx of magic will overload the machine and break it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003507
text: There's no harm in trying, so please collect some Magic Residue from the areas of the tower where magic runs strong.{nl}Search the areas with a glowing light and you will find the residue.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003508
text: About 15 of the residues will be powerful enough. Collect 15 Magic Residues for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003509
text: I've turned the idea around and came to the conclusion that if the machine is powered by magic,{nl}overloading it with magic will cause the machine to malfunction.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003510
text: So please collect the residues for me.{nl}15 will be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003511
text: You've done it. I will now tell you my plans to destroy the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003512
text: First, throw the Magic Residue you've collected into the device.{nl}I'm sure that will overload the device with magic and destroy it eventually.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003513
text: If there aren't enough residues to destroy the device the defense systems of the room will be activated.{nl}The defense system will make the machine excrete the remaining Magic Residues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003514
text: When that happens, please throw the excreted residue back in the machine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003515
text: While you disable the device, we will fight off any demons in the area that may interfere with your task.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003516
text: You will need to throw back the Magic Residues that are excreted from the machine.{nl}It was Adaux who taught me this method.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003517
text: Hopefully it won't come down to that,{nl}but think of this as a backup plan just in case something goes wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003518
text: You've destroyed the device. Now we will be free from the suffering this machine creates.{nl}Thank you. Now... We must face Ignas at the First Observatory.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003519
text: Ignas should be waiting for us at the First Observatory.{nl}Perhaps there you will find the Revelation you are looking for.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003520
text: The Resistance will stay back and fight off any demons that may come to aid Ignas during the battle.{nl}I hope that you can defeat Ignas and find the Revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003521
text: If there's anything I've learned from watching you battle Cezaris and having landed that blow on Ignas, it's that I am no match for Ignas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003522
text: I must admit that I would have never made it this far if it wasn't for your help, Revelator.{nl}This will be the last favor I ask you... Defeat Ignas, he must be stopped.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003523
text: I knew Ignas wouldn't stand idle. The gatekeepers in front of the observatory...{nl}Now all that's left is to face Ignas himself. We're counting on you to defeat him, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003524
text: You've defeated Ignas!{nl}The Resistance has finally reclaimed the Astral Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003525
text: Did you find the Revelation? We got the Astral Tower back with your help but weren't you here looking for a Revelation?{nl}You should go look for it now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003526
text: I've long wanted to take back the Astral Tower. It pained me to see it suffer under Ignas' rule for all those years.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003527
text: I am glad that I've met you and we could successfully reclaim the tower fighting alongside our comrades.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003528
text: I thank you once again for all that you've done to help us, Revelator.{nl}Without you, all of this wouldn't have been possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003529
text: I will now work on rebuilding the Astral Tower with the remaining Resistance members and the Schaffenstar.{nl}I guess you'll be leaving to find your Revelation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003530
text: If ever on your journey you need our help, please come and see us.{nl}The Resistance will be there for you when you need us, Revelator. Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003531
text: You've done well. Adaux is looking for you.{nl}He is nearby, you should go talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003532
text: The Resistance is now complete.{nl}The Schaffenstar and the Astral Tower are now free from the tyranny of evil.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003533
text: What I need to do now is to rebuild the Astral Tower and the Schaffenstar.{nl}I will work hard to make the Schaffenstar a great organization that it once was.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003534
text: You've found the levers. Go to the Second Control Room.{nl}I will join the other members and we will meet you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003535
text: An invisible barrier from which evil energy is radiating blocking the path.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003536
text: Ignas kept ignoring the demon infestation despite their growing numbers.{nl}That is no way for a man who calls himself leader to act. It is an outrage!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003537
text: The head of the Astral Tower was negligent of his duties of defending the tower from demons.{nl}That's why we left the tower to form the Resistance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003538
text: So that's what happened...{nl}Perhaps it was me who drove him to his death...{nl}I will ask the others to retrieve his body.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003539
text: But... The note said that the demons were freely let into the tower.{nl}It also says that Ignas may have joined forces with the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003540
text: Did you see all the demons walking around?{nl}The Resistance soldiers are having a hard time because of them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003541
text: We're a little short-handed so I wouldn't dare to take care of them on my own.{nl}I know it's a difficult request, but would you give me a hand?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003542
text: The demons took over when the water points stopped functioning...{nl}Hopefully they'll start working again soon...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003543
text: I already see a lot fewer demons around!{nl}You're amazing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003544
text: There are many Water Facilities near the Starlit Lake.{nl}They were built to prevent the demons from entering the Astral Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003545
text: Those of us who felt like the problem was serious told Ignas that we should fight the demons and take back the Facilities...{nl}But he continued to act like everything was fine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003546
text: We hurried to check on the Water Facilities as soon as we were out...{nl}But most of them had already been destroyed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003547
text: Luckily there was one Facility still remaining, and that was 86 Waters...{nl}Although we're still struggling to drive away the demons, since we can't restart the water point.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003548
text: Elder Ramunas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003549
text: So you're the Revelator Kron told me about?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003550
text: And these are the Water Facility Management documents.{nl}Very well. We should get our own Water Facility working soon with these.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003551
text: The Resistance army is outnumbered.{nl}And Ignas' army is made up of formidable soldiers, so there's no way we can win using only brute force.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003552
text: I was going over our tactics to confuse the enemies here.{nl}From what I've gathered, I've learned that there were many neutral forces in Ignas' rear camp.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003553
text: They already know what I look like, but I think we can disguise you as a member of the Schaffenstar.{nl}You should be okay as long as you don't make a fuss.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003554
text: And the documents only say that the controllers need a means for the magic reaction...{nl}Maybe it doesn't have to be Magic Stones!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003555
text: It's not easy for the Resistance to mobilize since there are too many demons and monsters.{nl}Could you defeat them for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003556
text: Did you clear the area of demons and monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003557
text: The number of demons and monsters has decreased noticeably.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003558
text: Oh, I almost forgot. My name is Morvio, I'm a student of the Ranger Master.{nl}She asked me to come and help the Resistance soldiers, so here I am.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003559
text: I saw it once when I was working inside the Tower.{nl}I'll never forget the awful energy I felt then.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003560
text: But now... I can feel it again! It's the same energy, spreading all over the region!{nl}I think... Ignas must have taken the Essence of Ziburynas and given it to Pbeta.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003561
text: It is said that Lydia Schaffen defeated Demon Lord Ziburynas using an arrow called the Flechette.{nl}The Flechette is a bow created by the ancestors of the Fletcher Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003562
text: {nl}The current Fletcher Master also knows of a way to defeat a demon holding the Essence of Ziburynas.{nl}Could you visit the Fletcher Master and ask how?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003563
text: Oh, and the Fletcher Master said that he would send his apprentice but he has not arrived yet.{nl}It would be good if you could ask him about that as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003564
text: The Essence of Ziburynas?{nl}I didn't expect to hear that name again.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003565
text: It is said that Lydia Schaffen defeated the Demon Lord Ziburynas a long time ago.{nl}And it is also said that she used an arrow called the Flechette, made by an ancestor of mine.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003566
text: I have yet to find it, but... I did my research on it.{nl}I found a way to produce an arrow that's almost as powerful as the original Flechette.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003567
text: This arrow should be powerful enough to defeat the Essence of Ziburynas in the Barynwell area.{nl}My apprentice should arrive soon and he will make the arrow for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003568
text: It's already been a few days since he left...{nl}If you go now, he should be there when you arrive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003569
text: The Master wanted me to have this?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003570
text: This is quite an impressive recipe indeed.{nl}I heard that a powerful demon named Pbeta was found in this area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003571
text: I noticed there were some natural Obsidian on the way to 86 Waters.{nl}It seems to contain some magic...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003572
text: I will make preparations to melt the Obsidian while you're gone.{nl}Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003573
text: Now I can make the arrow.{nl}I noticed that there were a lot of Humming Dukes in the area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003574
text: Humming Duke feathers are flexible but durable. They'll make for good fletching materials.{nl}Would you collect some for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003575
text: That's a lot of feathers.{nl}Some are bent, but the rest look good enough to use for the fletching.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003576
text: Please wait while I make the arrow.{nl}It's going to take some time... Oh, I remembered that someone was looking for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003577
text: Oh, it looks like Voleta is done with the arrows.{nl}You should go with Morvio and Voleta, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003578
text: Let's go back to where we set the trap and look for traces!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003579
text: So the Essence of Ziburynas has been found in the Barynwell area.{nl}That's why you need to learn about Flechette, the arrow used to defeat Ziburynas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003580
text: Thanks to you, I've stored the Flechette safely.{nl}Since then, my research on the Flechette has progressed exponentially.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003581
text: Although it's not as powerful...{nl}I've managed to finally make a new arrow almost as powerful as the Flechette.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003582
text: I don't have any right now, but my apprentice left for Barynwell.{nl}I will give you the materials and the recipe for the arrows. Deliver them to my apprentice and he'll make the arrows for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003583
text: I know there are other people helping the resistance soldiers from the outside.{nl}My Master was apparently an acquaintance of Elder Ramunas' from the old days.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003584
text: After Ziburynas was defeated, Lydia Schaffen commanded the demon's essence to be kept in the Tower.{nl}That was because the Essence of Ziburynas was far too dangerous if it fell into the wrong hands.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003585
text: We abandoned the Tower and formed the Resistance... But we're still outnumbered.{nl}If we could only get the neutral members to cross over to our side...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003586
text: I can't help but be amazed looking at the Fletcher Master's recipe.{nl}There is no doubt that this arrow will be the coup de grace for Pbeta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003587
text: Please find and restore Lydia Schaffen's relic with Lehon.{nl}You will be able to find the clues in Rombas Hill Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003588
text: The story of how Lydia Schaffen defeated Ziburynas is a very famous one.{nl}It's how Ziburynas Forest–the place where the demon was defeated–got its name.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003589
text: We are short of supplies because of the enemy ambush.{nl}I'm worried because it's going to be some time until a new shipment comes in.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003590
text: There was a pledge I made on my pilgrimage to the Great Cathedral.{nl}I pledged that I would fight for justice as a member of the Schaffenstar.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003591
text: I slipped and hurt myself seriously on my pilgrimage to the Great Cathedral way back.{nl}This is nothing compared to that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003592
text: Those who were once allies now have their arrows aimed at each other.{nl}It pains me to see this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003593
text: The Vulnerable Fugitive (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003594
text: The Vulnerable Fugitive (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003595
text: I'll go and find the relics.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003596
text: The Vulnerable Fugitive (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003597
text: The Vulnerable Fugitive (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003598
text: The Vulnerable Fugitive (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003599
text: The Vulnerable Fugitive (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003600
text: The Vulnerable Fugitive (7)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003602
text: The Essentials for Survival

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003603
text: Think Back

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003604
text: I can retrieve it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003605
text: The Downward Spiral (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003606
text: The Downward Spiral (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003607
text: I'll head behind the Waterworks Office.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003608
text: The Downward Spiral (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003609
text: The Downward Spiral (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003610
text: The Downward Spiral (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003611
text: The Downward Spiral (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003612
text: You're wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003613
text: I won't interfere.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003614
text: The Downward Spiral (7)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003615
text: I'll go and have a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003616
text: The Downward Spiral (8)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003617
text: You should rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003618
text: The Fugitive's Dream (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003619
text: The Fugitive's Dream (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003620
text: I'll do my best.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003621
text: The Fugitive's Dream (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003622
text: The Fugitive's Dream (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003623
text: The Fugitive's Dream (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003624
text: Leave it be.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003625
text: Disarm the Kupole Trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003626
text: The Fugitive's Dream (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003627
text: The Fugitive's Dream (7)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003628
text: The Fugitive's Dream (8)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003629
text: The Fugitive's Dream (9)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003630
text: You should rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003631
text: That's very cruel.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003632
text: Prepare Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003633
text: I need some time to prepare.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003634
text: Portal Investigation (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003635
text: Why don't you get a Resistance member to do it?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003636
text: Portal Investigation (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003637
text: Give me some time to get ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003638
text: Portal Investigation (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003639
text: I need more time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003640
text: Disarming the Defense System (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003641
text: Let's wait here for a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003642
text: Disarming the Defense System (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003643
text: Disarming the Defense System (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003644
text: I need time to rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003645
text: Installing the explosive...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003646
text: Disarming the Defense System (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003647
text: I'll see you upstairs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003648
text: It's not time yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003649
text: Secure the attack route.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003650
text: I need time to prepare.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003651
text: You've defeated the monsters on the way to the First Control Room!{nl}Now head inside and investigate the premises.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003652
text: Investigate the First Control Room

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003653
text: Take back the First Control Room

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003654
text: I'm not ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003655
text: Turning the lever to stop the device...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003656
text: Obtaining the Defensive Device Lever (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003657
text: Obtaining the Defensive Device Lever (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003658
text: I'm not ready yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003659
text: Take Back the Second Control Room

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003660
text: Turning the lever to stop the device...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003661
text: You've undone all defense systems on 4F!{nl}Talk to Resistance Supreme Commander Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003663
text: I need more time to prepare.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003664
text: You've defeated the monsters blocking the way!{nl}Now move to the rendezvous point where Byle is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003667
text: Tell me more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003668
text: The Poisoned Soldiers

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003669
text: I've got other things to take care of.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003670
text: Suspicious Bargain (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003671
text: Suspicious Bargain (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003672
text: He can't be trusted. I can't.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003673
text: Suspicious Bargain (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003674
text: I need some time to prepare.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003675
text: Suspicious Bargain (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003676
text: Give me some time to get ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003677
text: Search the Remaining Area

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003678
text: Across the Barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003679
text: Head for the Invisible Barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003680
text: Take some time to prepare first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003681
text: Disarming the Second Defensive Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003682
