text: Search the Baltinel Memorial

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003914
text: The demons are looking for someone at the Baltinel Memorial. Investigate their suspicious activity in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003915
text: Talk to Kupole Grisia

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003916
text: You've come across Kupoles while searching the Baltinel Memorial. Talk to the Kupole Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003917
text: Kupole Grisia is waiting for someone to help her at the Baltinel Memorial.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003918
text: Collect the Holy Relics of Baltinel Parish

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003919
text: Kupole Grisia says that she needs a special power that could hide her from the demons' pursuit. Grisia says that she may be able to transport the Kupoles to safety and hide them using the Holy Relics used by the believers of Baltinel Parish in the past. Go to the Baltinel Parish area and collect the Holy Relics to deliver to Kupole Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003920
text: You have collected enough Holy Relics. Deliver them to Kupole Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003921
text: Talk to Kupole Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003922
text: Remove the Kupole Traps

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003923
text: Kupole Grisia wants you to remove the Kupole Traps set by the pursuing demons. The weakened Kupoles may be captured if the traps are left in place. Remove the Kupole Traps in Tabaras Street.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003924
text: Defeat the Demons in Pagal Market

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003925
text: Kupole Grisia wants you to defeat the demons setting the traps. The demons in possession of the trap will have a blue glow due to the power of the trap. Find them and defeat them in Pagal Market.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003926
text: Defeat the Demons Carrying the Traps in Pagal Market

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003927
text: Rescue the Trapped Kupoles

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003928
text: Kupole Grisia wants you to rescue the captured Kupoles in South Square.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003929
text: You have rescued the captured Kupoles. Go back and talk to Kupole Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003930
text: Kupole Grisia is waiting for you in the Baltinel Memorial.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003931
text: Search for Kupole Zsaia

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003932
text: Kupole Grisia is worried that Kupole Zsaia may be in trouble. Head to Central Square and look for Kupole Zsaia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003933
text: You have rescued Kupole Zsaia. Follow Zsaia back to Kupole Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003934
text: There's been a setback to Kupole Grisia's plan. Talk to Grisia about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003935
text: Talk to the rescued Kupole

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003936
text: The rescued Kupole of Baltinel Memorial wants to speak to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003937
text: The rescued Kupole requested that you defeat the demons pursuing Kupoles while she regains her memory.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003938
text: Enough demons have been defeated. Go back and talk to the rescued Kupole.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003939
text: Retrieve the Rescued Kupoles' Belongings

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003940
text: The rescued Kupole believes that the demons will find them using the belongings they misplaced while running away. Defeat the demons and retrieve the Kupoles' belongings to put the Kupoles at ease.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003941
text: You have retrieved all of the Kupole's belongings. Deliver them to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003942
text: Defeat the Demons Carrying the Traps and Retrieve %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003943
text: The Downward Spiral

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003944
text: Kupole Grisia is awaiting your help in Gliehel Memorial.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003945
text: Kupole Grisia wants you to defeat the demons in the area while she investigates it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003946
text: You have defeated enough demons. Return to Kupole Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003947
text: Rescue the Surviving Kupoles

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003948
text: Kupole Grisia says she can sense there are surviving Kupoles in the backyard of the Waterworks Office. Rescue them before the demons get to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003949
text: You have rescued the surviving Kupoles. Return to Kupole Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003950
text: Defeat the Demons in Possession of Traps

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003951
text: Kupole Grisia believes she has found Kupole Zsaia. Go to Pilgrim Square before heading to the Gliehel Ranch entrance for Zsaia's safety.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003952
text: Chase Kupole Zsaia

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003953
text: Kupole Grisia wants you to head to the Gliehel Ranch entrance to convince Kupole Zsaia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003954
text: You've met Kupole Zsaia but failed to convince her. Report to Kupole Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003955
text: Talk to Kupole Zsaia

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003956
text: Kupole Grisia wants you to go to the Central Parish Branch and try to convince Kupole Zsaia again. She says that Zsaia is slowly perishing in the demon's trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003957
text: Kupole Zsaia is waiting for you at the Gliehel Memorial.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003958
text: Kupole Zsaia has refused to talk and ran away. Chase after her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003959
text: You have defeated the demon but failed to convince Kupole Zsaia. Talk to Kupole Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003960
text: Rescue Kupole Zsaia

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003961
text: Kupole Zsaia is in danger. Rescue Zsaia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003962
text: Talk to Kupole Grisia

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003963
text: Kupole Zsaia is awaiting your help in Gliehel Memorial.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003964
text: The Fugitive's Dream

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003965
text: You have found Kupole Velad. Velad is on the run from demons. Talk to Kupole Grisia about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003966
text: Kupole Grisia is awaiting your help in Frienal Memorial.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003967
text: Rescue the Captured Kupoles

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003968
text: Kupole Grisa asked you to rescue the Kupoles caught in the trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003969
text: Look for Kupole Velad

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003970
text: Kupole Zsaia wants you to find Kupole Velad and convince her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003971
text: Talk to Kupole Velad

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003972
text: Kupole Velad is staring at you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003973
text: Kupole Grisia wants you to remove the Kupole Traps for the safety of the Kupoles.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003974
text: Talk to Kupole Velad

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003975
text: Kupole Velad has run away again. Return to Kupole Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003976
text: Collect the Neutralizing Orbs

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003977
text: Kupole Grisia believes that she must first capture Kupole Velad and incapacitate her in order to protect her. Obtain the Neutralizing Orb from the demons in the Birthplace of Frienal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003978
text: You have collected enough Neutralizing Orbs. Return to Kupole Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003979
text: Defeat Bishop Gray and Bishop Blanco Monsters to Collect %s.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003980
text: Deliver the Fake Keepsake to Kupole Velad

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003981
text: Kupole Grisia has asked you to tell Kupole Velad that she will do what Velad wants her to while delivering the Fake Keepsake.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003982
text: Defeat the Demon Boss

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003983
text: You have successfully lured Kupole Velad to safety. But now Kupole Grisia is under threat from the demon boss. Defeat the demon boss.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003984
text: Kupole Grisia's condition is worsening. Talk to Grisia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003985
text: Kupole Grisia is waiting for you at the Frienal Memorial.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003986
text: Find Kupole Velad

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003987
text: Kupole Grisia wanted you to deliver her everything to Kupole Velad.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003988
text: Talk to Resistance Deputy Commander Kron

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003989
text: Deputy Commander Kron, who has just arrived in the tower, is looking for you.{nl}Talk to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003990
text: Kron wants you to defeat the demons in the area to buy time for the Resistance to regroup.{nl}Defeat the demons found in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003991
text: You have defeated the demons.{nl}Report to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003992
text: Portal Investigation

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003993
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron wants to ask you another favor.{nl}Talk to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003994
text: Investigate the Portals in 1F Engine Room

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003995
text: Kron said that his scouts found what looked like portals in 1F Engine Room and wants you to go and investigate it.{nl}Head to the Engine Room on 1F and investigate the suspicious portals.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003996
text: You have investigated the portals in the Engine Room on 1F.{nl}Report to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003997
text: Deputy Commander Kron seems confident about something.{nl}Talk to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003998
text: Install the Portal Suppressors Near the Portals

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_003999
text: Kron wants you to install the Portal Suppressors that he received from Elder Ramunas.{nl}Install the Portal Suppressors near the portals in the Engine Room on 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004000
text: You have installed all the Portal Suppressors.{nl}Report to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004001
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron seems to have something prepared.{nl}Talk to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004002
text: Use the Explosive to Destroy the Portals

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004003
text: Kron has crafted explosives while you were installing the Portal Suppressors and wants you to destroy the portals using the explosives he made.{nl}Install the explosive near the portals in the Engine Room on 1F.{nl}If not all portals are destroyed, install the remaining Portal Suppressors near the portals.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004004
text: The explosives went off but one portal still remains.{nl}Report to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004005
text: Disarming the Defensive Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004006
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron wants to move on to the next step.{nl}Talk to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004007
text: Defeat the demons in the area and investigate the 1F Command Room

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004008
text: Kron wants you to investigate the Defensive Device in the Command Room on 1F.{nl}Defeat the demons in the area and investigate the Defensive Device on 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004009
text: The Defensive Device seems to be protected by magic.{nl}Report to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004010
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron seems busy preparing for something.{nl}Talk to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004011
text: Defeat the Demons to Collect Magic Stones

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004012
text: Kron says he wants to use the demons' Magic Stones as materials for crafting new explosives.{nl}Defeat the demons in the area and collect Magic Stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004013
text: You have collected enough Magic Stones.{nl}Report to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004014
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron seems ready to destroy the barrier around the Defensive Device.{nl}Talk to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004015
text: Shut off the Defensive Device in the Control Room on 1F

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004016
text: Kron has crafted explosives from the Magic Stones you've collected and wants you to use the explosives to remove the barrier around the Defensive Device in the Control Room on 1F.{nl}Remove the barrier using the explosive and shut down the Defensive Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004017
text: You've shut down the Defensive Device.{nl}Report to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004018
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron is looking for you.{nl}Talk to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004019
text: Move to 4F and Talk to Byle

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004020
text: Kron asks you to move to 4F and join Byle using the passage that Elder Ramunas told you about.{nl}Move to 4F and talk to Resistance Commander Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004021
text: Move to 4F and talk to the Resistance Commander Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004022
text: Byle wants you to follow him to 4F through the passage that Elder Ramunas told you about.{nl}Move to 4F and talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004023
text: Talk to Resistance Commander Byle

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004024
text: Resistance Commander Byle has a favor to ask you.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004025
text: Defeat the Demons on the Way to the First Control Room

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004026
text: Byle wants you to investigate the First Control Room and defeat the monsters there while he investigates the Second Control Room.{nl}First, defeat the monsters on the way to the First Control Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004027
text: You've defeated the monsters around the First Control Room.{nl}Move inside the First Control Room and investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004028
text: Move to the First Control Room and Investigate

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004029
text: You've investigated the First Control Room. Report to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004030
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to ask you a favor.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004031
text: Byle wants you to shut down the Defensive Device in the First Control Room.{nl}Move to the First Control Room, defeat the monsters there and shut down the First Defensive Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004032
text: Shut Down the First Defensive Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004033
text: You've defeated the guardian and obtained the Defensive Device Lever.{nl}Use the Defensive Device Lever to shut down the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004034
text: Obtaining the Defensive Device Lever

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004035
text: Collect any Objects That May Be a Clue

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004036
text: Byle wants you to find clues to how to shut down the Second Defensive Device by defeating the demons.{nl}Defeat the demons in the area to find clues.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004037
text: You've collected enough clues.{nl}Report to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004038
text: Obtained %s.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004039
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to shut down the Second Defensive Device.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004040
text: Find the Second Device Lever from the Storage Room

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004041
text: Byle says that there are guardians defending the Second Defensive Device according to the found instruction. He wants you to meet him in the Second Control Room after finding the Second Device Lever from the Storage Room.{nl}Go to the Storage Room and look for the Second Device Lever.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004042
text: Move to the Second Control Room

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004043
text: You have obtained the Second Device Lever.{nl}Move to the Second Control Room to meet Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004044
text: Shut Down the Second Defensive Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004045
text: You have defeated the monsters guarding the Defensive Device.{nl}Use the Second Device Lever to shut down the Defensive Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004046
text: To 12F

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004047
text: Resistance Commander Byle looks worried.{nl}Talk to Byle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004048
text: Defeat the Demons on the Way to the Rendezvous Point

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004049
text: Byle says he needs time to regroup his men before moving on and wants you to head to the rendezvous point before him.{nl}Defeat the demons on the way to the rendezvous point so that Resistance Soldiers can get there easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004050
text: Defeat the Monsters in the Way

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004051
text: Move to the Rendezvous Point

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004052
text: You have defeated the monsters so that the Resistance Soldiers can pass safely.{nl}Move to the rendezvous point as instructed by Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004053
text: You have defeated the ambushing enemies sent by Elder Henika.{nl}Go join Byle who went to fight Elder Henika.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004054
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to talk to you.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004055
text: Talk to the Medic

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004056
text: The Medic is looking for someone to help him.{nl}Go and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004057
text: Collect the Schaffenstar Emergency Meds

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004058
text: The Medic says that many Resistance members have been poisoned by the poison gas trap and wants you to collect anything that can cure them.{nl}Defeat the demons and look for something that could cure the poisoned soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004059
text: You've collected enough antidotes.{nl}Go back to the Medic and report.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004060
text: Suspicious Bargain

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004061
text: To 12F

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004062
text: Byle, the commander of the Resistance, wants to meet in Astral Tower 12F.{nl}Follow Byle to Astral Tower 12F.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004063
text: Elder Adaux wants to make a deal.{nl}Ask Byle for his opinion on the matter.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004064
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to make a deal with Adaux.{nl}Talk to Byle about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004065
text: Find a way to remove the Control Device that makes the Defensive Device invisible.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004066
text: Elder Adaux says that you must first shut down the  Control Device in the Schaffenstar Member's Lounge.{nl}You must obtain the

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004067
text: Control Device Handle

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004068
text: by defeating the demons nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004069
text: You've shut down all the Control Devices.{nl}Report to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004070
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to talk to you about his next plan.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004071
text: Stop the First Defensive Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004072
text: Byle says that the First Defensive Device should have appeared if Adaux was telling the truth and wants you to stop the device.{nl}Find the First Defensive Device and shut it down.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004073
text: You've defeated the guardian and obtained the First Device Lever.{nl}Use the lever to stop the Defensive Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004074
text: Resistance Commander Byle is looking for you.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004075
text: Defeat the Demons in the Area and Investigate the Invisible Barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004076
text: Byle told you that Adaux thinks you may be able to pass the invisible Barrier and wants you to try doing so.{nl}Byle also asked if you could defeat the monsters in the area so that the Resistance Soldiers can pass safely later.{nl}Defeat the demons in the area first and see if you are able to pass the invisible barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004077
text: You've investigated the barrier, but you could not pass.{nl}Report to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004078
text: Elder Adaux wants to talk to you about the key that Resistance Commander Byle has.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004079
text: Search for the Device that Controls the Invisible Wall

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004080
text: Elder Adaux says there may be a device that controls the invisible barrier and asks you to search for it.{nl}Have a look around to see if there are any possible devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004081
text: Investigate the Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004082
text: You've defeated the guardian.{nl}Investigate the suspicious sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004083
text: Defeat the Guardian of 12F, Devilglove

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004084
text: You can feel a surge of power coming from the sculpture.{nl}Have a closer look at the sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004085
text: Go to the invisible barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004086
text: Goddess Laima says that the mysterious girl will purify the nefarious energy created by Ignas and remove the invisible barrier.{nl}Head to where the invisible barrier is and watch what happens.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004087
text: The girl's power removed the invisible barrier and purified the area of the nefarious energy!{nl}Report to Byle what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004088
text: The mysterious girl's power removed the invisible barrier and purified the area of the nefarious energy!{nl}Report to Byle what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004089
text: Elder Adaux said that the arrow traps on his side are not yet disarmed and wants you to shut down the Second Defensive Device in the Control Room on 12F for the safety of the Resistance members.{nl}Move to the Command Room on 12F and stop the Defensive Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004090
text: You have defeated the monsters guarding the Defensive Device.{nl}Use the Defensive Device Lever to shut down the Defensive Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004091
text: Talk to Elder Adaux

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004092
text: You have stopped the Second Defensive Device.{nl}Join Byle to meet Adaux and listen to what he has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004093
text: Elder Adaux and his men have escaped the Astral Tower after giving you the information as promised.{nl}Talk to Byle about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004094
text: Building Initiation

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004095
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to ask you a favor.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004096
text: Defeat the Ambushing Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004097
text: Demons have ambushed you while you are talking to Byle.{nl}Defeat the attacking demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004098
text: The demons have been defeated.{nl}Talk to Byle again.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004099
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to prepare his soldiers for taking over 20F.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004100
text: Defeat Nearby Monsters and Stop the Protective Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004101
text: Byle believes that the Protective Devices must first be shut off to remove the floor's defenses.{nl}Defeat the demons in Lodges 1 and 2 and shut off the Protective Devices there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004102
text: Byle says that the Protective Device in Lodge 3 has additional protection that must be undone first.{nl}Defeat the demons near Lodge 3 to obtain Suspicious Scrolls and use them to find and destroy the magic source to remove the barrier around the Protective Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004103
text: Use the Suspicious Scrolls to Find and Remove the Magic Source

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004104
text: Shut Down the Protective Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004105
text: You have removed the barrier around the Protective Device in Lodge 3.{nl}Go to the Protective Device and shut it down.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004106
text: Go to the Protective Device in Lodge 4 and try to shut it down.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004107
text: Investigate the Protective Device in Lodge 4

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004108
text: Shut Down the Protective Device in Lodge 4

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004109
text: You have removed the seal guarding the Protective Device in Lodge 4.{nl}Shut down the Protective Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004110
text: You have shut down all Protective Devices.{nl}Report to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004111
text: Defeat the Guardian Protecting the Defensive Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004112
text: Byle has confirmed that all Protective Devices have been stopped and wants to move to the Control Room on 20F where the Defensive Device is.{nl}He warns that there will be a guardian protecting the device.{nl}Defeat the guardian and obtain the Defensive Device Lever.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004113
text: Shut Down the Defensive Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004114
text: You have defeated the guardian and obtained the Defensive Device Lever.{nl}Use the lever to shut down the Defensive Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004115
text: The Defense Device has been stopped.{nl}Report to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004116
text: Head to the General Office on 20F

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004117
text: Byle says that you must find the keys to move to 21F. He presumes that the remaining keys will be near the General Office and the Elder Chambers.{nl}Move to the General Office on 20F that Byle mentioned.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004118
text: Byle attacked Ignas but his attack was dodged and Ignas got away.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004119
text: Resistance Commander Byle is moving on to the 21F.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004120
text: Get the First Key from the Demons in the General Office on 20F

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004121
text: Byle says there are three zones heavily populated by demons in the area and two of those are where the keys are probably hidden.{nl}Byle also said that finding one key will lead you to another so the task will be much easier after one key is found.{nl}First, head to the General Office on 20F and defeat demons there to look for a key.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004122
text: Use the Key You Found to Search for the Second key

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004123
text: You have found the key in the General Office on 20F.{nl}Use this key to find the second key in the Secondary General Office.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004124
text: You have found the key in the General Office on 20F.{nl}Use this first key to find demons holding the second key in the Secondary General Office.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004125
text: You have found all the keys from the General Offices.{nl}Report to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004126
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to make the final preparations to head to 21F.{nl}Talk to Byle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004127
text: Obtain the key by defeating Elder Cezaris

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004128
text: Byle has told you that Cezaris will have fully transformed into a demon and gave you an arrow that nullifies the power of demons. He used this arrow to defeat Henika and assumes that it will also be effective on Cezaris.{nl}Go to the Schaffenstar Elder's Chambers, defeat Cezaris and obtain the key.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004129
text: You've defeated Elder Cezaris and obtained his key.{nl}Report to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004130
text: Defeat Elder Cezaris and Obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004131
text: Use the Keys to Activate the Elevator Control Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004132
text: Byle says you need to activate the elevator to get to 21F. The elevator can be activated using all the keys you obtained on the Elevator Control Device in the Night Duty Office.{nl}Activate the Elevator Control Device to move to 21F.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004133
text: You've activated the elevator to 21F.{nl}Report to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004134
text: The Final Battle

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004135
text: Resistance Commander Byle is looking for you.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004136
text: Defeat Nearby Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004137
text: Byle wants you to defeat the demons in the area to buy him time to build a camp and regroup his men.{nl}Defeat the demons in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004138
text: You have defeated the demons in the area.{nl}Report back to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004139
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to build a camp on the Third Observatory and plan his next move.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004140
text: Collect the Magic Residue

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004141
text: Byle wants to overload the device that turns people into demons to destroy it.{nl}Byle wants you to collect the Magic Residue on 21F and wants you to investigate the areas of the map that he's marked for you. Look for the residue in the glowing areas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004142
text: You have collected enough Magic Residue.{nl}Report to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004143
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to talk to you about his next plan.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004144
text: Destroy Ignas' Transforming Device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004145
text: Byle wants to destroy Ignas' device that turns people into demons.{nl}Byle says that throwing the Magic Residue into the device will overload the machine and destroy it.{nl}He also said that if there isn't enough Magic Residue to destroy the device, the device will excrete the Magic Residue in the system and that you should throw it back into the device to overload it.{nl}Destroy Ignas' device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004146
text: You have defeated Ignas' device.{nl}Return to Byle and report to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004147
text: Resistance Commander Byle seems to have a favor to ask you.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004148
text: Defeat the Demons on the Way to the First Observatory

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004149
text: Byle wants you to defeat Ignas for him, as his men and himself have been injured from Ingas' ambush earlier.{nl}Defeat the monsters on the way to the First Observatory before battling Ignas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004150
text: Defeat the Head of the Schaffenstar Ignas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004151
text: You have cleared the way to the First Observatory of demons.{nl}Now look for Ignas in the First Observatory and defeat him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004152
text: Investigate the First Observatory Telescope

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004153
text: The mysterious girl told you to look into the telescope and disappeared.{nl}Investigate the First Observatory telescope.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004154
text: You have retrieved the Revelation left by Lydia Schaffen by Goddess Laima's request.{nl}Report to Byle that you defeated Ignas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004155
text: Byle, the commander of the Resistance, wants to thank you for helping him reclaim the Astral Tower.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004156
text: Talk to the Resistance Soldier Mait

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004157
text: Mait is standing guard over at the Barynwell 85 Waters. Talk to Resistance Soldier Mait.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004158
text: Resistance Soldier Mait says it would be difficult to enter the Astral Tower and wants you to follow him if you want a detailed explanation. Follow and talk to Mait.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004159
text: Talk to Resistance Adjutant Bern

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004160
text: Resistance Soldier Mait tells you that you should talk to Bern. Talk to the Resistance Adjutant Bern.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004161
text: Resistance Adjutant Bern says that entering the Astral Tower won't be easy but that, with his help, you will be able to enter much faster. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Bern.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004162
text: Resistance Adjutant Bern wants you to help the Resistance Soldiers who are short-handed. Talk to Mait and see if he needs any help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004163
text: You've helped out all the Resistance Soldiers. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Bern.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004164
text: Resistance Soldier Mait looks worried. Ask Mait if he needs any help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004165
text: Remove the Moss from the Lake

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004166
text: Resistance Soldier Mait says that the Resistance Soldiers are having a difficult time mobilizing due to the moss growing near the lake. Remove the moss that grows around the lake.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004167
text: You have removed most of the moss around the lake. Talk to Resistance Soldier Mait.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004168
text: Talk to Resistance Soldier Molan

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004169
text: Resistance Soldier Molan looks like he needs help. Talk to Resistance Soldier Molan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004170
text: Defeat the Demons and the Monsters in the Area

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004171
text: Resistance Soldier Molan says that the Resistance Soldiers are taking too much damage from the demons and monsters in the area and wants you to help him. Defeat the monsters and demons in the area as requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004172
text: You have defeated most monsters and demons in the area. Talk to Resistance Soldier Molan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004173
text: Resistance Soldier Molan is worried about the state of the lake. Ask him what it is exactly that he's worried about.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004174
text: Collect the Lake Fish

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004175
text: Resistance Soldier Molan is worried that demons may be polluting the lake and wants you to collect the Lake Fish to check the pollution level of the lake. Collect the Lake Fish near the Mazas Reservoir area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004176
text: You've collected enough Lake Fish. Talk to Resistance Soldier Molan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004177
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron wants to talk to you. Go talk to Resistance Deputy Commander Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004178
text: Look for the Missing Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004179
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron ordered his scout to retrieve the Water Facility Documents from the Astral Tower but he hasn't returned yet. Look for the missing scout.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004180
text: You have found some documents and a note on the dead scout. Deliver them to Resistance Deputy Commander Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004181
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron is sad to lose his scout, but relieved that the documents were retrieved. Ask Resistance Deputy Commander Kron about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004182
text: Collect Good Magic Stones

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004183
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron had set up a Supply Storage to store the equipment for the Water Facility in the past but it has since been destroyed by demons. Search the old Storage area for Good Magic Stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004184
text: You have collected enough Magic Stones. Talk to Resistance Deputy Commander Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004185
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron says that the Magic Stones you collected look good enough. Talk to Kron about his next plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004186
text: Go to the Water Facility

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004187
text: Reactivate the Water Facility by following the instructions in the documents Resistance Deputy Commander Kron gave you. You must place the Magic Stones on the Water Controller to reactivate the facility. Place 3, 2 and 1 Magic Stones in the order of the Water Controller closest to the water point. Be careful because the facility will not be reactivated if the order and the number of Magic Stones are mixed up!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004188
text: You have defeated all demons who were attacking the Water Facility. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Bern who followed you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004189
text: Resistance Adjutant Bern says that reactivating the Water Facilities will keep the demons away from the area. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Bern before reactivating the Water Facility.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004190
text: Reactivate the Water Controller

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004191
text: You have reactivated the Water Controller. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Bern.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004192
text: The Water Controller seems to be working. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Bern.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004193
text: Activate the Magic Circle of Protection for the Water Facility

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004194
text: After the Water Facility was reactivated, a magic circle appeared and a mysterious girl moved over the magic circle. Follow the girl's steps over the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004195
text: You have successfully activated the magic circle of protection over the Water Facility. Talk to Resistance Deputy Commander Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004196
text: Kron is now preparing to take back the Astral Tower since the Water Facility has been reactivated successfully. Ask Kron if he needs any help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004197
text: Kron is now preparing to take back the Astral Tower since the Water Facility has been reactivated successfully. Ask Kron if he needs any help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004198
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron says it wouldn't hurt to gather some purified water near the water point. Ask Kron about what you should use to carry the water.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004199
text: Resistance Adjutant Bern says that Kron has already moved to where the monster is. Ask Resistance Adjutant Bern where Kron is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004200
text: Move to Where the Giant Monster Is

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004201
text: Resistance Adjutant Bern says that the monster appeared in the upper floors of Barynwell Watchtower. Kron is also headed there so go look for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004202
text: You have defeated the giant monster. Talk to Resistance Deputy Commander Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004203
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron is waiting for you. Talk to Resistance Deputy Commander Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004204
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron wants to talk more at the base. Talk to Kron back at the base.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004205
text: Resistance Soldier Mait looks perplexed. Talk to Resistance Soldier Mait.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004206
text: Collect the Rias Weeds

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004207
text: Resistance Soldier Mait says he has noticed that demons do not go near the Rias Weeds and wants you to collect them for his research. Collect the weeds from the area around the lower floors of the Barynwell Watchtower.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004208
text: You have collected enough Rias Weeds. Talk to Resistance Soldier Mait.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004209
text: Resistance Soldier Mait has made Refined Rias Weed Powder using the Rias Weeds. Talk to Resistance Soldier Mait.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004210
text: Defeat the Demons Affected by the Refined Rias Weed Powder

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004211
text: Resistance Soldier Mait wants you to see if the Refined Rias Weed Powder has any effect on the demons. Use the powder on the demons and defeat the ones who are affected by the powder.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004212
text: You have confirmed the efficacy of the powder. Talk to Resistance Soldier Mait.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004213
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron seems to be in need of something. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004214
text: Bring Purified Water From the Water Point

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004215
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron handed you a bag and asked you to bring some Purified Water from the water point. Gather the Purified Water using the bag.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004216
text: You have filled the bag with Purified Water. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Bern.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004217
text: Talk to Resistance Soldier Rett

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004218
text: Resistance Soldier Rett is blocking the path to Barynwell 86 Waters. Talk to Resistance Soldier Rett.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004219
text: Talk to Elder Ramunas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004220
text: Resistance Soldier Rett says that Elder Ramunas is waiting for you at the assembly area. Go to the assembly area and talk to Elder Ramunas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004221
text: Talk to the Resistance Adjutant Taylor

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004222
text: Elder Ramunas asks you to help Resistance Adjutant Taylor because the Supreme Commander is away. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Taylor.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004223
text: Resistance Adjutant Taylor looks worried. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Taylor and ask him why.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004224
text: Remove the Traps

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004225
text: Resistance Adjutant Taylor wants you to disarm the traps that the enemy has set in the Resistance assembly area. He also wants you to look for Resistance Adjutant Lehon while you're there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004226
text: Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004227
text: You have disarmed all the traps. Look for Resistance Adjutant Lehon who may be hiding in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004228
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon seems to have something to say. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004229
text: Convince the Neutral Schaffenstar Members

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004230
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon says that some members of the Schaffenstar in their rear camp have neutral tendencies and wants you to convince them not to fight. Go to the Schaffenstar rear camp and convince the neutral Schaffenstar members.{nl}{nl}You will not be able to jump while disguised as a Schaffenstar member for the quest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004231
text: You have convinced most of the neutral Schaffenstar members. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004232
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon is holding something in his hand. Ask Lehon what he has in his hand.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004233
text: Poison the Supplies

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004234
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon has asked you to contaminate the enemy supplies with the poison he concocted. Move to the enemy's rear camp and poison their supplies.{nl} {nl}You will not be able to jump while disguised as a Schaffenstar member for the quest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004235
text: You have poisoned all the enemy supplies. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004236
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon looks startled. Ask Resistance Adjutant Lehon why.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004237
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon says he noticed black smoke coming from the Resistance assembly area. Go to the assembly area and ask Elder Ramunas what is happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004238
text: Elder Ramunas says that demons have attacked the Resistance's Rear Supply Camp. Ask Elder Ramunas what you can do to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004239
text: Go to the Rear Supply Area

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004240
text: Elder Ramunas wants you to fight off the demons attacking the Rear Supply Area. Go to the Rear Supply Area and defeat the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004241
text: Resistance Adjutant Taylor is helping Resistance Soldier Rett who is injured. Ask Taylor if he needs any help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004242
text: It seems that the attack was planned by Elder Henika. Talk to Elder Ramunas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004243
text: Elder Ramunas has a serious face on. Talk to Elder Ramunas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004244
text: Destroy the Hidden Teleportation Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004245
text: Elder Ramunas wants you to destroy the hidden Teleportation Magic Circle used by Elder Henika in the invasion. Go to Barynwell 85 Waters to find and destroy the Teleportation Magic Circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004246
text: You have successfully found the hidden Teleportation Magic Circle and destroyed it. Report to Elder Ramunas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004247
text: Elder Ramunas has a task for someone who he can trust. Ask Elder Ramunas what he needs to be done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004248
text: Elder Ramnuas asks if you can retrieve Lydia Schaffen's Relic along with Resistance Adjutant Lehon. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004249
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon looks like he made up his mind. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004250
text: Investigate the Old Tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004251
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon has spotted an Old Tombstone in Rombas Hill Road and believes that you will be able to find something there. Investigate the Old Tombstone in Rombas Hill Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004252
text: You have read the inscription on the tombstone and obtained the First Half of the Ancient Disc. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004253
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon has read the inscription on the Ancient Disc. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004254
text: Go to the Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004255
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon says the inscription refers to the Senoves Altar and wants you to follow him there. Go to the Senoves Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004256
text: You've obtained the Second Half of the Ancient Disc after transforming all magic circles in the Senoves Altar using the Control Device. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004257
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon has read all the inscriptions on the Ancient Disc. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004258
text: Go to Patogus Shelter

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004259
text: According to Resistance Adjutant Lehon, the inscription on the Ancient Disc is referring to Patogus Shelter. Go to Patogus Shelter.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004260
text: While traveling with Resistance Adjutant Lehon, a mysterious girl appeared and muttered something, then disappeared. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004261
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon is deep in thought. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004262
text: Place the Ancient Disc on the Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004263
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon says there is an altar at Patogus Shelter and you should place the Ancient Disc on the altar like the mysterious gIrl said. Place the Ancient Disc on the altar in Patogus Shelter.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004264
text: You have successfully revealed the magic circle. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004265
text: Listen to Goddess Laima's Prophecy

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004266
text: Lydia Schaffen's Relic was a prophecy left by Goddess Laima. Listen to the prophecy left by Goddess Laima.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004267
text: It looks like Resistance Adjutant Lehon has something to say. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004268
text: You have obtained the Revealing Orbs by retrieving Lydia Schaffen's Relic. Now talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004269
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon asks you to talk to Elder Ramunas in the Assembly Area. Talk to Elder Ramunas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004270
text: Elder Ramunas has heard what you had to say and wants you to talk to the Supreme Commander of the Resistance who just got back from the line of defense. Talk to Resistance Commander Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004271
text: Resistance Commander Byle has come back to the Assembly Area. Talk to Resistance Commander Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004272
text: Bury the Revealing Orbs

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004273
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants you to bury the orbs under the roads in Raikinas Lowlands. Go to the Raikinas Lowlands and bury the orbs in three places.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004274
text: You have buried all the orbs. Talk to Resistance Commander Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004275
text: Looks like Resistance Commander Byle is ready to mobilize. Talk to Resistance Commander Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004276
text: Lure the Enemy Commander to Where the Orbs are Buried

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004277
text: Resistance Commander Byle says that if you lure the enemy commander to the areas where the orbs are buried, you will be able to reveal his true identity. Lure them to where the orbs are buried.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004278
text: You have defeated the enemy commander who turned out to be a demon. Talk to Resistance Commander Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004279
text: It looks like Resistance Commander Byle is ready to move on. Talk to Resistance Commander Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004280
text: Looks like Elder Ramunas wants to talk to you. Go talk to Elder Ramunas of the Resistance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004281
text: Collect the Stones with Lake Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004282
text: Elder Ramunas wants you to reactivate the Water Facility near the assembly area. He wants you to collect Stones with Lake Energy that can be used in place of Magic Stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004283
text: You have collected enough Stones with Lake Energy. Talk to Elder Ramunas of the Resistance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004284
text: Elder Ramunas wants to explain to you about the Water Facility. Talk to Elder Ramnuas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004285
text: Elder Ramunas says that you must place the stones on the Water Controller in order to reactivate the Water Facility. Place the stones in a clockwise order and place 1, 2 and 3 stones in each Water Controller in order. Be careful because the facility will not be reactivated if the order and the number of Magic Stones are mixed up!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004286
text: Check the Water Point

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004287
text: Looks like the Water Facility has been activated. Check the water point.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004288
text: The water point has changed after placing the stones in the order that Elder Ramunas has told you. Check the water point.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004289
text: Magic circles appeared after the Water Facility was activated. Move over the magic circle avoiding the magic devices to transform the circle just as Elder Ramunas told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004290
text: You have successfully activated the magic circle of protection over the Water Facility. Talk to Elder Ramunas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004291
text: Resistance Adjutant Taylor is deep in thought. Ask Resistance Adjutant Taylor what he is doing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004292
text: Convince the Agitated Schaffenstar Members

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004293
text: Resistance Adjutant Taylor wants you to convince the Schaffenstar members who are startled by the fact their commander was a demon. Talk to the agitated Schaffenstar members to turn them over to the Resistance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004294
text: You have convinced all agitated Schaffenstar members in the area. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Taylor.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004295
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon looks as if he's got a favor to ask you. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004296
text: Defeat the Demons and Monsters in the Area

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004297
text: Resistance Adjutant Lehon says that the Resistance soldiers cannot be mobilized because there are too many demons and monsters in the area. Defeat all the demons and monsters that you come across.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004298
text: You have defeated enough demons and monsters in the area. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Lehon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004299
text: Go to Barynwell 87 Waters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004300
text: Resistance Commander Byle has gone to Barynwell 87 Waters. Follow Byle to Barynwell 87 Waters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004301
text: Ranger Morvio says that he has confirmed the presence of the demon Pbeta in the area under Byle's orders. Talk to Byle about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004302
text: Talk to Ranger Morvio

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004303
text: Resistance Commander Byle says there are not enough men in the Resistance to defeat Pbeta. He wants you to defeat Pbeta with the other apprentices. Talk to Ranger Morvio.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004304
text: Ranger Morvio is holding something in his hand. Talk to Ranger Morvio.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004305
text: Absorb the Evil Energy of the Stones of Constraint

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004306
text: Ranger Morvio says that there are Stones of Constraint that emanate an evil energy over the area. He wants you to absorb the evil energy using the Absorption Stones and destroy the Stones of Constraint in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004307
text: You have destroyed all Stones of Constraint in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004308
text: Elder Ramunas is looking for you. Talk to Elder Ramunas of the Resistance.

text: Talk to the Fletcher Master

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004310
text: Elder Ramunas tells you the situation is quite serious and he wants you to visit the Fletcher Master to see if he knows a way to solve the current situation. Talk to the Fletcher Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004311
text: The Fletcher Master has pulled something out. Ask him what it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004312
text: The Fletcher Master has handed you a recipe for a powerful arrow that could be useful in defeating Pbeta. Go back to Elder Ramunas and tell him about this.

text: Talk to Fletcher Voleta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004314

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004317

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004318

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004319

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20180827_004322

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004470
text: {nl}But I was not strong enough to suppress the evil magic on my own.{nl}{nl}I found people who would help me in my quest, but it seems I'm still short of manpower for the task.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004471
text: The structure seems to be protected. Inject the device with a ball of electricity to overload it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004472
text: If you're thinking of moving to Nicopolis, I would have to try and stop you.{nl}You're not safe here, not even within these city limits.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004473
text: A city of wizards sounds fascinating on paper, but, in reality, it isn't.{nl}All these objects moving about on their own make this place look haunted.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004474
text: It seems to be locked because of the devices found near it.{nl}Let's try turning them off.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004475
text: Removing the crystal from the magic circle could unlock it. Ask Nidia for a way to remove the crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004476
text: No... There seems to be a problem with the Barrier Stones...{nl}Looks like we need to go check up on them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004477
text: As a magician, I was fascinated by how the starry stairs were made.{nl}I wanted to study the stairs closely but I was afraid that the magic that binds the stairs will clash with the kind of magic I've mastered.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004478
text: I wanted to ask someone to help me gather the material that makes up the starry stairs.{nl}But asking others of things I can't do myself would just be rude, wouldn't it?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004479
text: You've brought the materials that make up the starry stairs! Thank you.{nl}I'm so happy that I can finally study the starry stairs!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004480
text: I am the guard in charge of watching over Starry Town.{nl}Being on guard duty isn't easy what with all the monsters and strange devices lying about.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004481
text: Able wizards are in charge of defending the city from evil magic and I warn the people of the city not to mess around with the devices.{nl}But the monsters keep appearing no matter how many times I chase them away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004482
text: Hmm... If you say so, I must ask you to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004483
text: If you can't seem to handle the monsters, just tell me.{nl}I'd rather that I work harder than to see you get hurt out there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004484
text: You're so powerful that I want to ask you to stay and help me guard the city.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004485
text: Ah... Yes, let's call you adventurer for now.{nl}It's best that you don't stay long in Feline Post Town.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004486
text: Those who caused the past incident at Nicopolis now roam the streets as monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004487
text: The Teal Specter is the worst of them all.{nl}He is now an evil spirit that possesses the townsfolk to suck the life force out of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004488
text: Why don't we do anything about him, you ask?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004489
text: Owyn Dilben had tried to locate the Teal Specter himself, but because of the aftermath of the incident at Nicopolis and Medzio Diena it had become very difficult to track down a spirit in Nicopolis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004490
text: I want to investigate the people who arrived in Feline Post Town around the time of the incident.{nl}I'll need the Resident Logs for that. We will need the secretary's assistance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004491
text: I will let you borrow the Resident Logs if you need it for your investigation.{nl}You can give them back to me after you're done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004492
text: The night was so dark that I could not go out without a torch.{nl}It was when I was heading towards the Keista Intersection on my watch duty that I heard someone moaning.{nl}I headed over to where the sound was coming from and found a well-built man afloat in midair.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004493
text: I screamed out loud.{nl}Then someone who was hiding in the dark started running away towards the Raktas Intersection.{nl}I chased him thinking that he could be a suspect in the Feline Post Town Case.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004494
text: He was too fast so I couldn't keep up with him.{nl}I threw my torch at him in the hopes of stopping him but the fire from the torch just burnt his clothes slightly and I lost him at the Raktas Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004495
text: You can smell the chemicals on the clothes.{nl}Perhaps you'll find something if you investigate this smell further.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004496
text: We want to identify the chemical found on the clothing.{nl}In order for that, we need the Ingredy Powder found on Mimorats. Could you get some for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004497
text: I have finished making the necessary preparations.{nl}Let's find out what this chemical really is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004498
text: The chemicals found in the clothing are used in manufacturing dyes. {nl}The town's chemist is known to deal with such chemicals.{nl}He is our prime suspect for now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004499
text: I can feel that we're getting closer to finding the possessed.{nl}You will be able to find the chemist in Irodymai Trade District.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004500
text: {nl}I will go ahead and question him first.{nl}I am sure that the chemist will lead us one step closer to finding the possessed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004501
text: From the testimonial, I am sure that he is not possessed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004502
text: The chemist spoke of an artist and a woman named Kelly.{nl}The two of them could have the access to such chemicals.{nl}We should spray them both with the Detecting Solution and find out who is possessed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004503
text: What happened to the Teal Specter?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004504
text: We've finally vanquished the Teal Specter.{nl}Thanks to you, the Feline Post Town Case has finally been closed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004505
text: This is a Scroll of Gravity.{nl}Use this on the crystal and the crystal will float into the air.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004506
text: Use the Scroll of Gravity on the crystal to make the crystal float mid-air.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004507
text: The city is a site of the devastating accident caused by those that were blinded by their own glory and quest for knowledge beyond their comprehension.{nl}What we are looking at is more than just the remnants of a bygone era.{nl}The city itself is a site of learning.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004508
text: I want to study the city in order to learn what it has to teach.{nl}Through what I've learned, I want to guide the people and provide them better a future for the good of the entire Kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004509
text: These are the thoughts that run through my head when in Nicopolis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004510
text: Magic gives us convenience, but at times it is a force that can destroy us.{nl}At long last I've finally come to understand the weight of the responsibilities that I have as a wizard here in Nicopolis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004511
text: There are many unidentified magic structures around the city.{nl}Some of them are known to cause trouble so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004512
text: But is there enough time to leave everything to Skywa... And it would be difficult to protect.{nl}Would you be willing to help Skywa?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004513
text: Then, somehow their restrainment got weaker and we took the chance to escape.{nl}But as you can see, they are trying to take us again.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004514
text: It's going to take some time for me to track Zsaia.{nl}But I believe I found the other Kupoles!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004515
text: Why can't you understand how I feel... Zsaia.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004516
text: Why is she so stubborn...{nl}I can't understand...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004517
text: Grisia is nothing but delusional.{nl}Does she really think we can escape from the demons?{nl}And you're a fool...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004518
text: This is our only hope.{nl}There's nothing we can do.{nl}So don't try to stop me!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004519
text: I can't trust a human.{nl}Get out of my way!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004520
text: I've already lost the goddess, I can't lose my sisters too...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004521
text: {nl}Oh, Goddess...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004522
text: Did she not hear my voice?{nl}She's going to end up like Zsaia, running away like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004523
text: I think I've found Velad.{nl}She's at the West Sanctuary.{nl}I believe she's waiting for someone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004524
text: Hurry!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004525
text: So you're the one who was with Grisia.{nl}What are you up to? Hanging around a weak Kupole like her.{nl}Don't even think you can fool me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004526
text: Having a sister of mine disgraced like this grieves me beyond measure...{nl}But I want to save her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004527
text: {nl}Even if it isn't, there's nothing you can do to stop me.{nl}I'll talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004528
text: {nl}I feel terribly guilty asking you to do such a sad thing.{nl}But please.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004529
text: There is a trap that shoots arrows, which is stopping our men from moving forward.{nl}I need your help to solve this problem, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004530
text: The scouts reported seeing demons in the Astral Tower that they've never seen before.{nl}They could be entering the tower through the portal on the first floor that Elder Ramunas has spoken of.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004531
text: According to the scouts, they spotted a red glow that looked like a portal in the Engine Room on 1F.{nl}Could you go and have a look for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004532
text: Elder Ramunas had mentioned that Ignas installed a portal somewhere on 1F.{nl}I remember that he said the portal lead to the Outer Wall District 13.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004533
text: We progressed this much while you were away investigating the portals. So the portals do exist...{nl}Now we know for sure that the demons are sending in their reinforcements through the portals.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004534
text: Elder Ramunas has provided us with the materials to make an explosive that could destroy the portal.{nl}But it will take some time for the explosive to be crafted.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004535
text: Destroying the portal would be our best bet in stopping the demons invading the tower...{nl}But we need to buy time to manufacture the explosive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004536
text: The suppressors will make it difficult for demons to use the portals.{nl}Please install the Portal Suppressors around the portals.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004537
text: You've come. I'm sorry to have kept you waiting.{nl}We've just completed the explosive.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004538
text: Now, you will have to set the explosive near the portals.{nl}When it explodes, the magic that powers the portals will disappear.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004539
text: We may fail to destroy all portals if there is a powerful demon or magic guarding the portals.{nl}I will give you some more suppressors just in case such a thing happens.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004540
text: So it hasn't been removed completely.{nl}But it's okay. That should have drastically decreased the number of demons invading the Astral Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004541
text: I need you to help me with something while the Resistance soldiers fight the remaining demons near the portal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004542
text: From the reports, we have found that the Control Device for the arrow trap is in the Command Room on 1F.{nl}The reports also said that the road to the Command Room is a perilous one full of demons and more traps.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004543
text: Could you go check the Command Room on 1F?{nl}Please defeat the monsters in the area as well to make way for the Resistance soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004544
text: The Astral Tower had always been an impregnable fortress in stopping the demon invasion.{nl}But now to see them enter the tower so freely... I am worried.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004545
text: It could either be the demons or the Schaffenstar that installed the barrier.{nl}We are currently out of materials to make more explosives.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004546
text: I guess the only thing left to do is use the Magic Stones carried by the demons to destroy the barrier.{nl}The Elder once told me that the Magic Stones that demons carry have small traces of magic in them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004547
text: I'm sure we will be able to make a new explosive that could blow up the barrier using these Magic Stones.{nl}Could you collect the Magic Stones for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004548
text: I am sure that we will be able to make powerful explosives out of these Magic Stones.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004549
text: You did it! Could you hold on a second?{nl}I will make the explosives for you right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004550
text: We, the Resistance, will defeat the demons on the way up to the next floor.{nl}But I must warn you that it's going to take some time for the explosives to go off because they were made using Magic Stones. The demons will try to stop you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004551
text: We will fight off the demons located on the way to the next floor up while you disarm the trap.{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004552
text: Instead of 2F, we will take the path straight for 4F that the Elder has prepared for us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004553
text: I will remain here to take care of the remaining demons and to make sure other Resistance members can make it safely to 4F.{nl}I have marked your map with the Supreme Commander's location.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004554
text: The security here in 4F has been tightened.{nl}The demons must know that 1F has fallen to the Resistance.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004555
text: According to our scouts, the Defensive Device here is made up of two parts.{nl}I've been told there is a poison gas trap in the area, as well as arrows.{nl}You must be cautious.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004556
text: We sent our men to scout the Second Control Room to have a closer look.{nl}Could you have a look at the First Control Room for us?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004557
text: You've returned. Our scouts have also returned from the Second Control Room.{nl}Let's discuss our next plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004558
text: Hmm... But now I realize that there is no way that the demons will let their guard down this easy.{nl}There must be something that we're overlooking.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004559
text: Ignas is cunning, cold-hearted, and cautious.{nl}From what we've gathered, we can tell that disarming the trap in the Second Control Room won't be an easy task.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004560
text: We will march onwards regardless of all the tricks Ignas has up his sleeves.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004561
text: I thought he was acting rather suspicious so I shot him with an arrow that nullifies all magic effects and he collapsed to the ground.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004562
text: First the arrows and now the poison gas...{nl}My heart hangs heavy seeing my comrades fall as we march onwards.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004563
text: Thanks to you, now I can cure the poisoned soldiers. Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004564
text: I know it's suspicious, but we can't help but agree to his terms as we have no other choice.{nl}Revelator. Do not hesitate to back away when you find something suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004565
text: Adaux has deployed demons towards the Control Room to trick Ignas into thinking he's still working for him.{nl}Defeat the guardian at the Control Room to retrieve the lever and use it to shut down the Defensive Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004566
text: We want to move as quickly as possible since the arrows have stopped{nl}but our soldiers can't seem to move any further because of this evil energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004567
text: Adaux said that he had a favor for you since you are free from the influence of the nefarious energy.{nl}He says that there is an invisible barrier that Ignas created on 12F.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004568
text: The invisible barrier must be removed at all costs if we want to get past 12F.{nl}Though we would still have to do something about the nefarious energy after the barrier's been removed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004569
text: We've investigated the area beforehand but did not find any device that seemed to control the barrier.{nl}Perhaps there are areas that we have not searched yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004570
text: We cannot back down now, Revelator.{nl}We must find a way to remove the invisible barrier and the nefarious energy by any means necessary.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004571
text: This relic will help you in your time of need.{nl}The power of the relic has been freed by your own hands and restored to the Girl.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004572
text: Return to the invisible barrier that blocks your path, Savior.{nl}The mysterious girl is waiting for you there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004573
text: Return to the invisible barrier that blocks your path.{nl}The mysterious girl is waiting for you there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004574
text: I've told Byle what needs to be done in the upper floors before you arrived.{nl}You should talk to him for further instructions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004575
text: With Henika and Adaux gone, only Cezaris remains by Ignas' side. He should be feeling pretty anxious about now.{nl}First, I will tell you what needs to be done here based on what I've learned from Adaux.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004576
text: I'm relieved that our men seem relatively unharmed despite the ambush.{nl}Now I know for sure that Ignas is at his wit's end. This is our chance to strike!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004577
text: He said that each device is controlled in a different method.{nl}First, go to the Schaffenstar Lodges 1 and 2. Defeat the monsters there and disable the devices.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004578
text: First, disable the protective devices in Schaffenstar Lodges 1 and 2.{nl}The demons there will try to stop you so clear the area before you disable the device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004579
text: Go to Schaffenstar Lodge 3 and obtain Suspicious Scrolls by defeating the demons there.{nl}Use the scrolls to look for a magic source in the area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004580
text: When you locate the magic source, destroy it and the barrier surrounding the Protective Device will weaken.{nl}That's when you will have to disable the Protective Device there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004581
text: In Schaffenstar Lodge 4, there are demons that act as a power source for the barriers for the Protective Device.{nl}Defeat the demons to weaken the barrier and disable the device there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004582
text: To see Ignas before my own eyes... It's almost over.{nl}What Adaux said was true. Some of the demons we fought were actually our comrades...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004583
text: But there's no time to look back now.{nl}We must end this once and for all and take back the Astral Tower for the sake of all of our fallen comrades.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004584
text: For security, it is said that one key must be found first to find the second key.{nl}Let's look for the first key in the area closest to us and talk about the second key then.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004585
text: If there is a demon that reacts to the first key you've found, it's most likely the that the demon is holding the second key.{nl}Come back after you've found both keys.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004586
text: Now we must face Cezaris. According to Adaux, Cezaris has turned himself into a demon completely.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004587
text: It's weaker than the arrow that subdued Henika, but you will still be able to use these on Cezaris to weaken him temporarily.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004588
text: We will deal with Ignas after we've taken care of Cezaris.{nl}The Resistance will clear the way to the Elder Chambers for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004589
text: Hopefully it won't come down to that,{nl}but think of this as a backup plan just in case something goes wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004590
text: You've defeated Ignas!{nl}The Resistance has finally reclaimed the Astral Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004591
text: The Resistance is now complete.{nl}The Schaffenstar and the Astral Tower are now free from the tyranny of evil.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004592
text: You've found the levers. Go to the second control room.{nl}I will join the other members and we will meet you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004593
text: I would like to ask you for a special favor.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004594
text: They should have reported back by now, but there are no signs of them.{nl}Would you find out what happened to them?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004595
text: I followed you here just to make sure...{nl}That was close!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004596
text: Do you want something?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004597
text: Did you defeat the Hydra?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004598
text: The moss growing around the lake makes it difficult for us soldiers to move around.{nl}The ground is too slippery, some of us even got hurt because of it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004599
text: Unfortunately there's no way to do it other than getting it out by hand.{nl}My job used to be clearing out the weeds, so I'm used to it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004600
text: Getting the Water Facility working, defeating the Hydra...{nl}It can't have been easy. You're quite impressive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004601
text: Would you help dismantle and remove the traps?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004602
text: Here's what you can say; listen carefully.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004603
text: Did you spray the poison on the supplies?{nl}It won't kill them, but it'll stop them for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004604
text: There's dark smoke coming out of the assembly area.{nl}Something must have happened...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004605
text: This means Lydia Schaffen's provisions were all a plan of Goddess Laima...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004606
text: The members siding with Ignas now will certainly change their minds if they find out.{nl}Imagine finding out the leaders of your camp were demons all along.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004607
text: I have yet to find it, but... I did my research on it.{nl}I found a way to produce an arrow that's almost as powerful as the original Flechette.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004608
text: This arrow should be powerful enough to defeat the Essence of Ziburynas in the Barynwell area.{nl}My apprentice should arrive soon and he will make the arrow for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004609
text: But it looks like we're going to have to face Pbeta now. Is that right?{nl}Won't we have to deal with his subordinates as well? I think we should prepare for that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004610
text: As you know, the resistance needs soldiers to fight for them, but most of all they need the funds to support themselves.{nl}My guess is that a lot of people are helping with donations.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004611
text: Now that the water point is working, the demons will have to leave the lake.{nl}Of course, it will be a while before all the water is purified...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004612
text: This is a conflict zone between Ignas' army and the resistance.{nl}Please refrain from any unnecessary movements.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004613
