text: We sent a few scouts to the Lanko Waters region... no news from them yet.{nl}They should be back by now...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004614
text: Somewhere in this region is Pbeta, the demon Ignas is siding with.{nl}I still can't understand why he would do such a thing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004615
text: What you did was remarkable.{nl}I say your talent is impressive, even for a Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004616
text: Owyn Dilben found that part of Nicopolis disappeared to the Other Dimension at the time of the accident.{nl}Now I'm in charge of investigating the disappeared region.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004617
text: Unfortunately, my other work here has kept me from doing much investigation at all.{nl}I was hoping to find someone talented enough to help me with this task.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004618
text: If it isn't too much to ask, would you help me investigate the Magic Research Facility?{nl}A Revelator of your caliber is more than qualified for a task like this, I'm sure.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004619
text: I've heard that the Magic Research Facility is highly populated with monsters.{nl}It's uncharted territory after all, and therefore very dangerous.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004620
text: Not only that, there's a high chance you'll encounter monsters with very powerful mana.{nl}If you do, you must promise to defeat them.{nl}If any such monsters cross over to our dimension, the consequences will be catastrophic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004621
text: Remember, the Magic Research Facility is a dangerous place. Make sure to move in a group.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004622
text: If what you say is true, the Magic Research Facility is even more dangerous than I thought.{nl}I need to be careful with who I let in.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004623
text: But first, I'm going to report your findings to Owyn Dilben.{nl}Thank you very much for all your help!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004624
text: Audrone

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004625
text: You're no ordinary traveler, are you? Wandering around here like that.{nl}My name is Audrone, I'm a guard here at Feline Post Town.{nl}Mr. Dupin asked me to do a bit of investigation in the area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004626
text: Have you heard of a place called Nicopolis?{nl}It was a city created by wizards of the past.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004627
text: The wizards of Nicopolis conducted quite a lot of research in their time.{nl}One of their leaders, the Quipmage, is thought to have attempted merging different creatures.{nl}The records show that he captured large numbers of monsters and animals for his experiments.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004628
text: We also know that the great accident of Nicopolis influenced those experiments in many ways.{nl}We believe that is what led to the creation of a powerful monster known as the Asiomage.{nl}But to this day, we haven't found either him or the Quipmage.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004629
text: Mr. Dupin visited Feline Post Town not long ago to gather more information.{nl}It was his hypothesis that the Quipmage had once built a research facility of his own.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004630
text: He asked me to investigate the area in case there were traces of the Quipmage or the Asiomage around.{nl}After some time, we found his testing grounds and confirmed that the Asiomage described in his records is still alive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004631
text: The monster we saw was taken by anger and resentment.{nl}From what we gathered at the site, he seems to be making plans to do something with the research facility.{nl}That's only our guess, but there's no doubt that the Asiomage has the ability to hurt many innocent people if he ever escapes from the testing grounds.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004632
text: I understand this is a lot to ask, but would you help us defeat the Asiomage?{nl}The other guards are already on their way to report our findings to Mr. Dupin, but we may not have much time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004633
text: Thank you! Your help will be most important.{nl}Just remember, the Asiomage is angered and dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004634
text: Come back to me when you are ready.{nl}The entrance to the testing grounds is hidden by a barrier, so you will not be able to see it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004635
text: We can create a gap in the barrier using a scroll Mr. Dupin gave me, but it won't last for long.{nl}In any case, I will be here guarding the entrance if you need me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004636
text: The Asiomage remembers being subjected to the Quipmage's experiments, that is why he is angry and out for revenge.{nl}If he ever escapes from the testing grounds, the lives of innocent people will be in danger.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004637
text: You defeated the Asiomage! Thank you.{nl}Now there will be no more memories of the Quipmage's cruel experiments...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004638
text: And yet, the fact that he was planning to harm people out of vengeance is alarming.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004639
text: I should look around a little longer and report back to Mr. Dupin.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004640
text: This is where the Quipmage, one of Nicopolis' old leaders, built his research testing grounds.{nl}On these grounds lives a powerful monster called the Asiomage.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004641
text: Where is the apprentice?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004642
text: Investigate the Magic Research Facility

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004643
text: I'm not ready yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004644
text: Fruit of Vengeance

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004645
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron wants to ask you another favor.{nl}Talk to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004646
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron seems to have something prepared.{nl}Talk to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004647
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron seems busy preparing for something.{nl}Talk to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004648
text: Resistance Deputy Commander Kron seems ready to destroy the barrier around the Defensive Device.{nl}Talk to Kron.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004649
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to ask you a favor.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004650
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to talk to you about his next plan.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004651
text: Elder Adaux wants to talk to you about the key that the Resistance Commander Byle has.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004652
text: Resistance Commander Byle wants to ask you a favor.{nl}Talk to Byle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004653
text: Owynia Dilben believes that the Magic Research Facility is inhabited by a large number of monsters, some of which may possess powerful mana.{nl}Owynia wants you to defeat any monsters of powerful mana you may find inside the Magic Research Facility.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004654
text: Defeat %s Inside the Magic Research Facility

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004655
text: Talk to a Nicopolis Resident

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004656
text: Talk to a resident of Nicopolis.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004657
text: Defeat the Asiomage

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004658
text: Audrone believes that the angered Asiomage is making plans for revenge, and that he could put several lives at danger if he manages to escape the testing grounds.{nl}With time running short, Audrone asks you to enter the Asiomage Testing Grounds and defeat the vengeful monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004659
text: Talk to a Nicopolis Resident

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004660
text: Defeat the Angered %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004661
text: Use the Magic Block on the Sculptures in the Magija Empty Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181017_004662
text: Use the Magic Block on the Sculptures in the Slove Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181026_004663
text: It seems that you need to find the first two keys in order to get to the last one.{nl}Try and start with the key to the General Office, 20F.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181026_004664
text: Then, go to the office near the Elder Chambers and use it.{nl}Defeat the demons that react to the key until you find the monster that is carrying the next key.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181026_004665
text: If you forget the procedure, feel free to come back to me.{nl}I'll be glad to give you another briefing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181026_004666
text: If there is a demon that reacts to the first key you've found, it's most likely the that the demon is holding the second key.{nl}Come back after you've found both keys.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20181116_004667
text: You have successfully activated the magic circle of protection over the Water Facility. Talk to Resistance Adjutant Bern.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004668
text: The Pervading Queen appeared?{nl}I've put you in danger again, traveler. I am sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004669
text: Owyn Dilben has not only suppressed their magic but he also made sure that they won't escape Nicopolis and wreak havoc on the world.{nl}He has put me in charge of these duties before he left.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004670
text: Kupole Kaze

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004671
text: Thank you for coming all this way.{nl}I am Kupole Kaze, a servant of Goddess Austeja.{nl}Us Kupoles have come across great peril while Goddess Austeja is away.{nl}That's why we called for you. We are in dire need of your assistance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004672
text: {nl}Deep within the caves of Sulivinas Lair, a dragon lies in confinement.{nl}Even before the beginning of the world, the goddesses have been dealing{nl}with many creatures that posed a great threat to the world.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004673
text: {nl}{nl}One of those creatures that survived is now waiting for the chance{nl}to strike back at the world as the goddesses are away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004674
text: {nl}{nl}His name is Boruta.{nl}A foul creature the likes of which you have never seen before.{nl}We tried to stop him ourselves but we could not...{nl}This is why we called for you...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004675
text: {nl}{nl}There are things we need you to do first.{nl}Please enter the Sulivinas Lair and check up on Boruta for us.{nl}After that, we'll talk further about what needs to be done to stop him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004676
text: I would like to go myself but...{nl}Boruta will be able to sense my presence if I go myself.{nl}Please help us, Savior.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004677
text: If what you say is true, then it seems Boruta has not fully regained his strength.{nl}Creatures like him, we cannot get rid of permanently without the power of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004678
text: {nl}For now, we cannot do anything except keep a close eye on him and keep him fatigued.{nl}For this, we will need to ask for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004679
text: {nl}Me and the remaining Kupoles will go and get help from the Kingdom.{nl}Please go and keep Boruta at bay while we're out getting help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004680
text: {nl}You need to have the Urbas Seal to enter the Sulivinas Lair.{nl}When Boruta gathers his strength again, the unity between you and your allies will be weakened.{nl}Be careful as you and your allies may be gravely wounded.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004681
text: The invisible barrier must be removed at all costs if we want to get past 12F.{nl}Though we would still have to do something about the nefarious energy after the barrier's been removed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004682
text: Boruta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004683
text: Hunger Brings Anxiety

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004684
text: Talk to Kupole Kaze

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004685
text: Kupole Kaze is waiting for you in Vedas Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004686
text: Check up on Boruta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004687
text: Kupole Kaze has asked for you to check up on Boruta in Sulivinas Lair.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190104_004688
text: You have checked up on  Boruta. Return to Kupole Kaze.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004689
text: I'm looking for someone special.{nl}Someone who helped other in the south and defeated the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004690
text: {nl}The only people who have met the goddesses we all believe to be gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004691
text: {nl}People who came to our world with dreams of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004692
text: {nl}People who are on their way to the north, searching for Her last Revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004693
text: {nl}Sounds like you, doesn't it?{nl}My name's Pajauta.{nl}I came to listen to your story and help you on your quest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004694
text: {nl}If you're looking to cross the Kingdom all the way to the Capital, I can help you.{nl}I'm guessing you're not too familiar with the northern regions yet. Do you want to join me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004695
text: You're a lot more easy-going than I expected, you know?{nl}A little too gullible, maybe...?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004696
text: Okay.{nl}Let's meet at Barynwell 87 Waters, then.{nl}I'll wait for you there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004697
text: You're kind of late, but I'm glad you made it.{nl}Anyway, our job here is simple. Let me explain.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004698
text: {nl}I think it will be good to decide a few base locations in advance on our way through the northern regions.{nl}I selected a few spots that I think we should mark.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004699
text: {nl}I'm going to keep helping you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004700
text: I hid a few repair supplies around here before I went out to find you...{nl}But it looks like the monsters dug everything up.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004701
text: {nl}Now, we're going to need a tool to mark our locations, but that has to be done by me...{nl}While I do that, I think you could go and fetch some new repair supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004702
text: Take your time. But don't be lazy, alright?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004703
text: You're just as good as they say.{nl}I'm done with the tools, too, so let me tell you the next step.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004704
text: {nl}Let me tell you what I've got so far.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004705
text: {nl}Let me tell you the information I've collected in the region so far.{nl}Just come back to me when you're ready to hear the details.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004706
text: The last time I was at the Astral Tower was before Medzio Diena, so I'm not sure what it's like right now.{nl}I only looked into the reservoir areas around the Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004707
text: {nl}Survivors in the regions south of the Astral Tower aren't aware of much.{nl}Not many people these days are interested in it, unless you're an archer yourself.{nl}I suppose you aren't either. Are you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004708
text: {nl}{nl}In general, none of the regions I visited are looking to interfere in Astral Tower issues.{nl}They only seem to be helping the resistance forces.{nl}Or, I suppose they could also be hoping for something in return.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004709
text: {nl}Good, innocent people are living in fear every day because of these monsters...{nl}Yet no one in power is doing anything... Not even the goddesses...{nl}I don't even know if coming to find you was a good decision...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004710
text: But okay, enough of that talk...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004711
text: {nl}Okay, shall we go set up the mark, then?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004712
text: Let's go down to the entrance of the reservoir regions first.{nl}If there are no monsters there, crossing the area should be relatively easy.{nl}But we should check first, just in case.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004713
text: {nl}I was hoping you could help me there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004714
text: Alright, the mark's down. Let's move to the next region.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004715
text: Next up is Outer Wall District 9.{nl}Meet me there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004716
text: Can you believe the Capital was just behind these walls?{nl}Not that long ago this place was full of merchants and adventurers...{nl}Their lives filling up the city day and night.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004717
text: {nl}Where are the goddesses?{nl}Could They really be gone?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004718
text: But then, doesn't that mean the goddesses put the fate of the entire world in the hands of a single person?{nl}I know I wouldn't leave it at that if I were a goddess...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004719
text: {nl}When you lost everything, didn't you pray for the goddesses to save you?{nl}When you met Them, what did They say to you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004720
text: Sorry if I'm getting a little agitated...{nl}Let's just focus on our task.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004721
text: Outer Wall Districts 9 and 11 are interconnected.{nl}The people there are acting like they're being hypnotized by something.{nl}I try to scare a few of them, but they just ran away.{nl}If you're going to travel there, you need to prepare yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004722
text: {nl}First, let's focus on setting up that mark.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004723
text: We're going to need some Magnetic Dirt to make the mark.{nl}I buried some around here, so we should be able to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004724
text: One of us has to search for it, so let me cover for you.{nl}If you find any magnetic dirt just dig it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004725
text: This should be enough to make the mark last a few days.{nl}I'll go set it up and move on to the next region right away.{nl}Meet me at Pystis Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004726
text: Come on.{nl}After we set up this last mark I'm gonna be almost done with my part.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004727
text: {nl}Some time ago when I was investigating the Heretics, I found out that the demons passed through here.{nl}I asked the locals to help with my investigation but...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004728
text: {nl}All they did was fight over the land...{nl}I think the demons might be up to something back at their base.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004729
text: {nl}We should investigate ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004730
text: There's enough traces around to see that something's not right. Why isn't anyone saying anything?{nl}Something's definitely happening in Pystis Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004731
text: I'm pretty sure the demons are up to something.{nl}Let's get the mark set up first, I'll keep an eye on things later.{nl}We need to have mark set up for that.{nl}Let me know when you're ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004732
text: Good.{nl}Let's set up the last mark.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004733
text: If the place is clear we should be able to set up the mark easily.{nl}But if there are monsters, we going to need to hide the mark from them...{nl}We'll need some time to prepare.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004734
text: {nl}Don't worry.{nl}I'll come back to help you after I set it up.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004735
text: I know I'd certainly show up and help us out right now if I were a goddess...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004736
text: The mark is hidden now, let's go back.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004737
text: There's still a lot to prepare before going back to Fedimian.{nl}I hope you don't forget our marks and all the things I told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004738
text: There's still a lot for you to do, I know...{nl}But I'll be here to help you out.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004739
text: {nl}Come see me again before you head out to the North.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004740
text: Waters Post (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004741
text: Waters Post (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004742
text: Tell me more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004743
text: Tell me later.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004744
text: Waters Post (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004745
text: Outer Wall Post (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004746
text: Outer Wall Post (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004747
text: Outer Wall Post (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004748
text: I'm ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004749
text: Parias Forest Post (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004750
text: Parias Forest Post (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004751
text: Parias Forest Post (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004752
text: First Step

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004753
text: Talk to Pajauta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004754
text: Rumors say that an unknown traveler is looking for you in Fedimian. Go there and find Pajauta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004755
text: Pajauta is waiting for you in Barynwell 87 Waters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004756
text: Waters Post

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004757
text: Retrieve the Stolen Repair Supplies From Nearby Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004758
text: While Pajauta is arranging the tools for the mark, she wants you to retrieve the repair supplies stolen by the monsters. Defeat the monsters in Barynwell 87 Waters and find the stolen supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004759
text: Deliver the stolen repair supplies to Pajauta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004760
text: Collect %s From the Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004761
text: Talk to Pajauta in Barynwell 87 Waters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004762
text: Talk to Pajauta in Barynwell 87 Waters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004763
text: Move to the Mark's Location

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004764
text: Move to the location Pajauta told you in order to set up the mark.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004765
text: Outer Wall Post

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004766
text: Pajauta is waiting for you in Outer Wall District 9.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004767
text: Talk to Pajauta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004768
text: Defeat Monsters on the Wall

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004769
text: Collect Magnetic Dirt

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004770
text: Pajauta has asked you to collect magnetic dirt in order to create the mark.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004771
text: Parias Forest Post

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004772
text: Pajauta is waiting for you in Pystis Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004773
text: Find Traces of the Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004774
text: Find traces of the demons Pajauta mentioned earlier.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004775
text: Check Mark Locations

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190412_004776
text: Accompany Pajauta to the locations where you will be setting up the marks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004777
text: Injured Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004778
text: Who are you? You shouldn't be here.{nl}The monsters are going to come after the smell of blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004779
text: It's too late for me, I'm injured. You need to save yourself!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004780
text: Thank you for saving me. I can't believe you took down all those monsters... Who are you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004781
text: Oh, you're the Revelator. It's an honor to meet you.{nl}I'm part of the Recovery Squad that's trying to take Barynwell 27 Waters back from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004782
text: I was attacked by the monsters during a recon mission.{nl}I thought I was done for until you appeared. Thank you for saving me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004783
text: Agh... The poison is spreading from my wound, I can't move.{nl}Fortunately the water of the lake helps to reduce the monsters' powers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004784
text: The parts near the water lilies have a special purifying effect.{nl}If that's okay, would you bring me some lake water from the Old Residential Quarters?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004785
text: Thank you, Revelator! You can put it inside this bottle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004786
text: Go down to the Old Residential Quarters to get some lake water.{nl}The Water Facilities aren't as strong as they were before Medzio Diena, but the water should still have some of the effects.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004787
text: You're back so soon? Well, you're the Revelator after all.{nl}Thank you. I'll try and get my wound cured before the poison spreads any more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004788
text: I used the lake water on my wound, but I still can't move properly.{nl}Will you take this badge and report to my colleagues at the Recovery Squad camp?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004789
text: Thank you, Revelator! The camp is at the end of the road, up from where we are right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004790
text: I should be safe for a while, now that you took down all the monsters.{nl}The camp is at the end of the road, up from where we are right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004791
text: Recovery Squad Adjutant

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004792
text: We'll be sending a rescue team right away.{nl}Come to think of it, I never really introduced myself. I'm the Adjutant of the Recovery Squad here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004793
text: I'm so sorry to bother you on your first visit to the camp, but we're in a desperate situation.{nl}Would you care to listen?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004794
text: Thank you. I may wear the Schaffenstar uniform, but I am not a member.{nl}I was, once, but I abandoned the Tower with my mentor, who failed to become an Elder at the organization.{nl}My mentor couldn't give up his dream of becoming a Schaffenstar Elder, and he tried desperately to make his name known.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004795
text: One day, he gathered all of his apprentices and he told us.{nl}He said the Astral Tower, our home, was being attacked by demons... and we needed to get it back.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004796
text: We had already abandoned the Tower, but we couldn't just stand idly by and watch the demons take over it.{nl}After we arrived in 27 Waters, he told us Lydia Schaffen's lost relic was near.{nl}He said finding the relic would help us defeat the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004797
text: We started to look for the relic and take down the monsters.{nl}Every day we would fight and search, fight and search.{nl}Even when we were injured, the thought of finding the relic and taking back our home kept us going.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004798
text: Finally, we found a spot where we thought the relic might be hiding.{nl}Before we could do anything, a giant red portal appeared and demons started pouring from it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004799
text: Many of us never made it. Myself and a few others were barely holding on to our lives.{nl}We realized it would be impossible for us to take back the Tower on our own with all those monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004800
text: But our mentor still believed we had a chance, if only we could find the relic.{nl}He commanded us to carry on with the searches.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004801
text: Since then, I started to suspect he had wanted us to take over Barynwell to find Schaffen's relic.{nl}I told him multiple times that it was reckless to do anything with the few men we had left.{nl}His answer is always the same: "Aren't you ashamed for the comrades who died for our mission?"

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004802
text: I do want to defeat the demons and take back our home, and avenge the ones who sacrificed themselves for the cause.{nl}It's just... we can't do it on our own.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004803
text: I know that finding Lydia Schaffen's relic and taking back the Tower is a good, honest cause.{nl}But in our current situation, there's little we can do, realistically.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004804
text: My colleagues and I managed to convince our mentor to stop the searches and look for the keepsakes of our fallen comrades instead.{nl}Once we have them, we're going to reorganize and ask our old allies for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004805
text: If you were to help us look for the keepsakes, we could make good progress.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004806
text: I need to call the others first, they're doing a search in Barynwell Hill Road.{nl}Just hold on a minute.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004807
text: I'm very glad to have a Revelator on our side. That means the goddesses haven't forgotten us yet.{nl}Go up until you reach Barynwell Hill Road.{nl}I'll be preparing us some supplies in the meantime.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004808
text: My colleagues are searching Barynwell Hill Road.{nl}There'll be monsters there, so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004809
text: You're back. I told my colleague to go call our mentor, but no news of them yet.{nl}I guess I'll start by talking to the ones that just arrived.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004810
text: They aren't happy with the plan, are they? I understand...{nl}Our mentor always takes us to safe spots for the searches, after we take care of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004811
text: Even when the demon portal appeared... I'm sorry. I'm talking too much.{nl}I'll tell you next time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004812
text: After the portal appeared in the Collapsed Square, the area has been teeming with monsters.{nl}There's no way we can take it back all by ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004813
text: I think we need to reduce their numbers before we try to destroy the portal.{nl}The plan is to set up a trap and lure the monsters away. Will you help us install the trap?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004814
text: We can't receive external help, so our resources are scarce. This is our last chance to do anything.{nl}Let's make sure we succeed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004815
text: Go ahead and set up the bombs near the alleyway to the Collapsed Square.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004816
text: I'm glad we got the bomb setup out of the way.{nl}Now we just need to lure the monsters in.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004817
text: I was keeping an eye on the monsters while you set up the bombs.{nl}Can you wait by the marked spot near the alleyway?{nl}Let me know when you're ready so I can lure in the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004818
text: Are you ready? Okay, I'll lure the monsters in now.{nl}Go to the location and wait there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004819
text: Looking at the portal reminds me of all the comrades we lost.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004820
text: The operation was risky, we were ready for the worst. Luckily with you here, everything worked out better than expected.{nl}Thank you for doing right by our comrades.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004821
text: We need to destroy the portal before any more monsters can come through.{nl}But I think the explosion earlier may have attracted monsters from other areas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004822
text: We'll get ready to block the alleyways.{nl}You go and take down the portal at the Collapsed Square!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004823
text: The portal is in the middle of the Collapsed Square.{nl}Be careful, there could be monsters in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004824
text: Great job taking down the portal. We can finally look for our comrades' keepsakes.{nl}Also... our mentor is back and he wants to talk to you in private.{nl}I'll be setting up things so we can start searching the Old Concert Hall area in the meantime.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004825
text: Recovery Squad Leader

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004826
text: Ah. Welcome, Revelator. I heard news of you arriving during my search. As you know, we're looking for the relic that will let us take over the Barynwell areas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004827
text: My students told me you helped them take down the demons. We are very grateful.{nl}As their mentor, I apologize for letting them pull you into all this trouble.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004828
text: That said, if you do agree to help us, finding the relic will only be a matter of time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004829
text: Only then, of course, will we be able to finally take back our land.{nl}We couldn't possibly face off that many monsters with such low numbers otherwise.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004830
text: I know my students must have complained to you about what's been happening.{nl}But now that the portal is destroyed, we can finally search the Old Concert Hall.{nl}That's the only area we haven't searched yet. I'm certain that the relic will be there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004831
text: I gave out orders to begin the search there already. Please, have some rest before you join us. I understand you just went through a difficult battle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004832
text: I know my students must have complained to you about me.{nl}Too many of us died when that portal appeared and the monsters attacked.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004833
text: After that day, I knew the rest of us wouldn't survive if we were to face the monsters again.{nl}Our only chance to take back the Barynwell regions was to find Schaffen's relic once and for all.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004834
text: Why didn't we receive external aid, you mean?{nl}Hmm... We did try to request it, but to no avail...{nl}After Medzio Diena, people can barely look after themselves, let alone help a group of strangers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004835
text: My students must be starting the search at the Old Concert Hall soon.{nl}Go ahead and join them there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004836
text: You're back. We managed to find our colleagues' keepsakes in the meantime. Thank you for the help, really.{nl}We also found a hidden location in the Old Concert Hall.{nl}Let me show you what was inside. This is...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004837
text: Hm? Do you feel that shaking? What's happening?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004838
text: That was a nasty monster... I don't know what we would've done without you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004839
text: You know, after Medzio Diena I often thought this was it, this is the end.{nl}But seeing you now, it gives me hope for the future.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004840
text: Brockal Himil

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004841
text: It's rare seeing someone make it here without a scratch. Are you perhaps a Revelator?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004842
text: What an honor to finally meet one of the Revelators.{nl}My name is Brockal Himil. I was sent from the Himil family to help take back the Maven areas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004843
text: Sorry if I'm being too brazen, but I could really use the help of someone like you.{nl}Would you care to give us a hand?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004844
text: Our local defense systems are damaged because of a monster attack we had.{nl}Before I explain, let me get out the orders to start repairing the stockades.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004845
text: Thank you. I'm glad you are as kind as you are talented.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004846
text: It's an honor to have you on our side.{nl}The damaged stockades are at the camp alleyway.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004847
text: We wouldn't have gotten our defense back up so quickly without you. Thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004848
text: It's been a long time since family, the Himils, abandoned the Astral Tower.{nl}Yet, we couldn't stay still and watch it being taken over by the monsters. We needed to act.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004849
text: This region here connects to District 13 of the Outer Wall.{nl}If we can't block the monsters here, many people will be in danger.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004850
text: Maven 31 Waters, on the other hand, connects to the Outer Wall as well as two Water regions.{nl}Even if we take down all the monsters in one area, it won't be easy to cover all the regions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004851
text: I do think it will be long before our defense operation here is over.{nl}We're still receiving external aid, but we needed to find local resources as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004852
text: Fortunately, we now know that the nearest reservoir is not contaminated.{nl}I'm going to send out a few of our soldiers to secure food supplies, would you mind waiting?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004853
text: Are you sure? That's... very kind of you, thank you. To tell you the truth, many of our soldiers were injured in the last battle.{nl}I'm glad you're here to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004854
text: The reservoir is to the right.{nl}There are still monsters around, but the lake water is clean... It seems the Water Facilities there are still working.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004855
text: You're done already? Well, you really can't beat experience, can you?{nl}I'm honestly impressed, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004856
text: Our scouts found some suspicious monster movement in the Old Training Grounds near the camp.{nl}I don't know if we can stand another attack, if that's what they're planning.{nl}This time we need to hit them first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004857
text: Let's go take down the monsters at the Old Training Grounds!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004858
text: With you on our side, I'm sure victory will be ours.{nl}But of course, anything can happen in a battle.{nl}I'll make sure my soldiers are aware of that and don't lose their focus.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004859
text: Thank you for your service. The last battle was hard on us, many were injured during the conflict.{nl}This time you truly gave us the upper hand.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004860
text: Before you arrived, we had other confrontations with the monsters. Each one left several of our soldiers injured.{nl}The problem is that they keep coming, while our forces grow weaker and weaker.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004861
text: The soldiers' morale is lower than ever.{nl}Do you think you can help lift their spirits a little?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004862
text: I believe a hero like yourself can be a great influence on our forces.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004863
text: The atmosphere is completely different with you here, I can already feel it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004864
text: Another reason we weren't doing so well is the new monster that has arrived recently.{nl}Not only is it strong, it's also very clever. We don't know what to do about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004865
text: I was going to put together a squad to take it down, but we're short on manpower. Right now we have a single student keeping an eye on the monsters at the Collapsed Shelter.{nl}Would you care to help him?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004866
text: Thank you, Revelator. I sent him a carrier pigeon earlier, so he should know you're coming.{nl}To get to the Collapsed Shelter, just go up this way and take a left before you reach the entrance to the Observatory.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004867
text: We'll be repairing our damaged equipment in the meantime.{nl}We can get ready to attack as soon as we're done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004868
text: Brockal Himil's Apprentice

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004869
text: Revelator! Hello! I'm a student of Mr. Brockal Himil, the one who's investigating the monsters.{nl}Mr. Himil told me you helped our forces back at the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004870
text: My student is still learning, but he's a fine warrior.{nl}Still, as his mentor, I'm worried about him being on his own.{nl}He's at the Collapsed Shelter investigating the new monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004871
text: When we first arrived, the monsters looked like they were just acting by instinct.{nl}With a little strategy we were able to overpower them, even despite their large numbers.{nl}Recently, however, they've started to make formations and ambush our forces.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004872
text: We've found that, ever since this new monster appeared, it seems to be commanding the others.{nl}That's why I came out to observe their behavior.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004873
text: These monsters started acting very differently after the "leaders" arrived.{nl}They're no longer territorial, and instead have started to form their own social groups.{nl}That's how they make up for each other's weaknesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004874
text: Now they'll hide in the water plants and ambush our soldiers, or they'll wait for night time to attack.{nl}They're getting more and more dangerous, which is why our mentor tried to take down the leader.{nl}What we didn't know was that this leader is a lot more powerful than the other monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004875
text: Not only that, the leader is always surrounded by other monsters.{nl}If we're going to take it down, first we need to get rid of the minions.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004876
text: We know it's a dangerous task, but you're the only one we can count on.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004877
text: Thank you, Revelator!{nl}You can take care of the monsters at Maven Intersection while I look out for the leader.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004878
text: Mr. Himil was injured in the last battle while he was trying to protect me.{nl}He never complained, he simply kept going until the end.{nl}Having a mentor like this really makes me want to work hard to defeat these monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004879
text: I never knew you were so strong.{nl}With you around, we're that much closer to finally getting rid of all evil energy in the region.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004880
text: Unfortunately there are a lot more monsters around now.{nl}If you're going to fight the leader, you need to preserve your power.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004881
text: We believe there's a device located around the Maven lake area that can fight off the monsters.{nl}But ever since we arrived, we've had our hands so full with all these monsters that we haven't been able to check.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004882
text: We think this device could be very useful to us, but it's hard to tell how long that would take.{nl}So, for now, we're going to use a set of bombs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004883
text: Thank you, Revelator. I'll go and set up some bombs at Maven Intersection.{nl}You can do the same around the Collapsed Observatory.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004884
text: I'm going to install the bombs and keep an eye on the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004885
text: The bombs are all set. Time to lure in the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004886
text: I'm going to lure in the remaining monsters.{nl}You can wait by the Collapsed Observatory and take down any monsters that survive the explosion.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004887
text: After we get rid of these monsters, we need to report back to our mentor and get ready to fight the leader.{nl}I really hope we make it this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004888
text: The leader appeared all of a sudden when I was luring in the monsters.{nl}I managed to defend myself from the attack, but I think my arm is broken.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004889
text: I probably would be even worse off if it weren't for you.{nl}That monster's clever, it must have figured out what I was up to.{nl}It don't think it saw you, at least.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004890
text: I can't believe you took down that monster before I could even send out a carrier pigeon...{nl}You really are something special. I admire you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004891
text: That was close, I'm glad you were around to help me. Let's report back to Mr. Himil.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004892
text: Revelator! We heard a monster, I was just about to gather our forces. What on earth just happened?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004893
text: I have never seen anyone take down such a powerful monster, you really are something else.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004894
text: I'm still amazed that you took down the leader on your own.{nl}And thank you for saving my student. We're really fortunate to have you here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004895
text: That lead monster was our biggest obstacle so far.{nl}I never thought we would take it down without some serious sacrifice.{nl}I can't believe you did it so easily...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004896
text: Now it's only a matter of time until we get rid of the other monsters.{nl}I wish we could hold on to you a little longer, but I know you'll be needed somewhere else.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004897
text: I know the Lakers that took care of these regions are having an especially hard time right now.{nl}I don't think they were trained in combat yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004898
text: If you ever meet the Lakers, do help them out like you did to us.{nl}I'll pray that your journey will always be blessed by the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004899
text: {nl}From now on, I swear to protect this region with my own life.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004900
text: Garrison

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004901
text: Thank you. I was so nervous, I'm glad you were here to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004902
text: Thank you, Revelator! I'll protect this lake with my own life.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004903
text: I was so afraid all this time... But no more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004904
text: I know we're going to win this battle with you.{nl}I'm never going to give up.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004905
text: Laker Boy

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004906
text: Hi there. Are you a traveler?{nl}Be careful around here, this place has been full of monsters and water plants since Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004907
text: A Revelator... oh, you're the Revelator! I guess I was worried for nothing, then.{nl}I heard that you help people you are in trouble... Can you help me too?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004908
text: Oh, thank you! Ever since Medzio Diena, the water plants around here have been growing bigger and faster.{nl}It's been getting harder and harder for me to take care of the lake.{nl}Would you help me get rid of the water plants around the watch post?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004909
text: Anyone who wants to become a Schaffenstar has to clean out the water plants.{nl}I'm gonna work hard at the lake, and hopefully one day I'll go live in the Astral Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004910
text: Wow, you're great at getting rid of those heavy water plants! I can't even pick them up.{nl}If I become a member of the Schaffenstar, will I be strong like you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004911
text: To process the water plants, we need to use the machine inside the water point control room.{nl}Usually we hide it away so the monsters don't find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004912
text: I'm gonna go first and get the machine ready.{nl}Meanwhile, can you move the water plants we got from the lake?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004913
text: You don't have to move all of them! Just take some and I'll do the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004914
text: You moved all of them? Wow, that was enough work for half a day... Thank you.{nl}Now let me show you how to process the plants with the machine.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004915
text: Um, Revelator... We have a problem. I never tried to process this many plants...{nl}I don't think my magic source is gonna be enough.{nl}I'm gonna get some more magic sources. You just wait here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004916
text: What? You wanna help? But you already helped me move the plants... Thank you!{nl}You can find some magic sources at the Old Warehouse. They're like shiny stones, you'll see them right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004917
text: You're so friendly, Revelator.{nl}I wanna be a nice member of the Schaffenstar and help other people like you do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004918
text: Wow, that's a lot of magic sources!{nl}I'm not gonna have to worry about them for a while now.{nl}Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004919
text: You helped go through so many water plants, thank you!{nl}If that's okay, will you help our leader at the Laker Temporary Base too?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004920
text: She's the only one who can fight in the whole area of Maven 32 Waters...{nl}She's having a hard time right now because of all the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004921
text: I wish I could help her fight off the monsters too... but I don't know how.{nl}I bet you could help her do that, though!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004922
text: Laker Leader

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004923
text: Welcome. I'm the Laker Leader in charge of this region.{nl}Before I say anything else, I believe I owe you an apology.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004924
text: You see, I've been watching you ever since you arrived in the area. I had to know who you were.{nl}I was ready to attack you if I saw anything that looked suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004925
text: But you were different from what I expected. I saw how you helped the boy.{nl}Thank you for that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004926
text: The leader is always watching over this area.{nl}One time she saved me and my sister when a monster appeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004927
text: When I grow up, I wanna be a member of the Schaffenstar and help the Laker Leader!{nl}I think she's at the Laker Temporary Base right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004928
text: But I wonder... not many people manage to get through all the monsters out there...{nl}You don't look like an ordinary traveler... so what are you doing here, exactly?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004929
text: I see. You're a Revelator. I'm sorry for being so suspicious.{nl}Most of us Lakers come from villages around the lake.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004930
text: Our people have been taking care of this lake for more than 600 years, ever since Lydia Schaffen founded the Astral Tower.{nl}I, too, grew up taking care of the water plants, dreaming of one day joining the Schaffenstar.{nl}That is, until that tragic day that changed everything.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004931
text: After Medzio Diena, the plants started to grow bigger and bigger.{nl}But we never gave up. We carried on taking care of the lake, and we managed to keep the plants under control.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004932
text: So... we can handle the plants now, but the monsters are another story.{nl}I learned how to fight from a mentor who's no longer with us.{nl}But most of the Lakers were never trained in combat.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004933
text: We're seeing more and more monsters around, to the point where it's hard for us to handle them.{nl}There's also a giant monster that's encroaching on our working areas. We can barely get to the water plants anymore.{nl}Will you please help us?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004934
text: Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004935
text: I've tried several times to take down the giant monster myself, but there's little I can do on my own.{nl}The most I could do was feed it some bait with tranquilizers to knock it down for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004936
text: Before you arrived, I was crafting some poison arrows to use on the monster.{nl}Can I ask you to get me some Plants with Lake Energy from the Old Stakeout Box?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004937
text: I'll be collecting the other materials and keeping an eye on the monster meanwhile.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004938
text: I learned how to make poison from my mentor. They're a famous hunter, you see.{nl}They had to leave because of something, but they should be back someday.{nl}And be careful, the Old Stakeout Box is still full of monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004939
text: Great. I hope the monsters didn't give you too hard of a time out there.{nl}The giant one is still knocked out from the spiked bait. We should get going before it wakes up.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004940
text: Fighting this giant monster is going to attract other monsters in the area.{nl}Worst case scenario, these monsters can make the whole situation turn against us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004941
text: The giant monster is asleep in the alleyway to the Old Laker Training Grounds.{nl}Would you clear out the monsters there while I finish the poison arrows?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004942
text: My mentor taught me to always hunt with caution.{nl}It's important to get rid of any uncertainties.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004943
text: Please get rid of a few monsters around the area.{nl}I'll go and help you as soon as I'm done with these arrows.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004944
text: That was fast. I've just finished the poison, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004945
text: Time to take care of that giant monster. Sigh... I'm a little nervous.{nl}I'll be counting on you for this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004946
text: I know you got rid of the monsters in the area, but you never know when the ones from other regions are going to come running.{nl}We should get going now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004947
text: I'll head to the Old Laker Training Grounds first and keep an eye on the giant.{nl}Just come over to the alleyway when you're ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004948
text: Glad to see you're safe, Revelator. I'm sorry I couldn't help.{nl}I don't know what would happen to me if you weren't around.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004949
text: I thought my training was done after my mentor left, but I guess not.{nl}Thank you so much for your help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004950
text: Uhh... this wound's more serious than I thought. I need to have it checked back at the camp.{nl}I'm really sorry, Revelator, but there's one more favor I want to ask of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004951
text: The giant monster may be gone now, but our problems at the lake are far from over.{nl}Young lakers like the Laker Boy need self-defense weapons, but to make them we need a material that can only be obtained from monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004952
text: I would hunt the monsters myself, but in this state, there isn't much I can do.{nl}Would you hunt down the Frocoli at the Laker Shelter and get the materials for me instead?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004953
text: The material we need comes from the Frocoli monsters that live in the Laker Shelter.{nl}I know you must be tired from the battle with the giant monster, I'm very sorry.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004954
text: You got the materials. Great.{nl}This should keep us safe for a while. But of course,  we'll need to be on the lookout for any new threats.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004955
text: Thank you for all your good work here.{nl}I know we can't always depend on the help of people like you.{nl}This is our land, and we need to be strong enough to defend it ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004956
text: I hope we'll finally become strong enough to defend our land by the next time you see us.{nl}May your journey always be blessed by the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004957
text: I know we received a lot of help from you, but it was an honor to fight by your side, Revelator.{nl}I wonder if this is how the old Lakers felt when they helped Lydia Schaffen protect the Astral Tower.{nl}I hope we can be of help to you next time you see us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004958
text: When I become a member of the Schaffenstar, I'm gonna be like you and the Laker Leader and help people who need me!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004959
text: The Outer Wall was the area most affected by Medzio Diena.{nl}If the monsters start crossing over into the region... Well, we can't let that happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004960
text: We're fighting these monsters every day.{nl}But no matter how many we take down, their numbers stay the same. It's honestly making me lose hope.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004961
text: The monsters are multiplying as we speak.{nl}What's going to be of us?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004962
text: The borders are safe for now, but the monsters have been acting strange recently.{nl}I really don't know what to do...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004963
text: After we take back the Maven region, I'm going to go back and propose to my best friend.{nl}Do you think we'll be alright after this?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004964
text: The monsters could still try another attack here.{nl}It's best if we go back to the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004965
text: We'll... take care of the body.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004966
text: I did have my qualms about Mr. Himil, but deep down I really trusted him.{nl}When he first stepped up as our leader, he was a really honorable man. I don't know what made him change like that...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004967
text: Also, the object we found wasn't Lydia Schaffen's relic.{nl}We're not sure what it is, but it seems to be an important part of the Water Facility.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004968
text: It didn't break even after that giant monster stepped on it, which makes us think it's a very special object.{nl}It may not be the relic, but we believe we can use it to reinforce the area's defensive system.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004969
text: First, our forces need some time to reorganize. We're exhausted, both mentally and physically.{nl}We'll prepare for battle later.{nl}We still need to find out where and how to use the piece, so I might need to contact some former colleagues...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004970
text: Come to think of it, Mr. Himil did act a little strange.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004971
text: After the portal appeared in the Collapsed Square, we were looking to escape to the Maven 31 Waters region.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004972
text: But if that region was already taken over by monsters, we would end up completely stranded.{nl}I suggested that we investigate the Barynwell Lot and Maven 31 Waters in advance to make sure.{nl}Mr. Himil, however, insisted that he take charge of the Barynwell Lot himself. He wouldn't even let us go near it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004973
text: He said he had already investigated the area and drawn out an escape route, that it would be a waste of time for us to go there.{nl}I can't be sure, but I believe there's something in Maven 31 Waters he was trying to hide from us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004974
text: Thanks again for your help, Revelator.{nl}We finally avenged our comrades' sacrifice, and we may not have the relic, but this Water Facility piece will be very useful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004975
text: Next time you come by, I hope you can finally see the lake restored to its old glory.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004976
text: I don't know who you are, but you need to run away! There are monsters out there waiting to attack.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004977
text: I'm too young to remember, but they say the plants weren't big like this before Medzio Diena!{nl}I guess cleaning out the plants wasn't as hard back then.{nl}By the way, you should get going now. There's monsters all over this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004978
text: Tiger Hunter Master

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004979
text: Dirty creatures...{nl}You just wait...{nl}I'm gonna...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004980
text: Beasts and people both leave traces wherever they go.{nl}When you hunt, you need to hide yourself and wait for the prey to let its guard down.{nl}Then, you finish it off in one blow.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004981
text: {nl}Otherwise, you may end up becoming the prey yourself.{nl}Like the people in my village...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004982
text: Kedoran Alliance Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004983
text: You're not just a regular traveler, are you?{nl}No one in their right mind comes up here, not even the adventurous ones...{nl}And I heard from the Alliance there's Revelator in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004984
text: {nl}They sent me here to gather the remains of the Outer Wall.{nl}I brought two other people to help me out at first but...{nl}All they do is fight, so I got no one helping me right now.{nl}Say, would you give me a hand?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004985
text: Heya.{nl}These are the two helpers I told you about.{nl}They're both stubborn as mules, and they haven't stopped fighting since we got here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004986
text: {nl}We should be wrapping up things here so we can go back, but with those two it's impossible.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004987
text: I can't do anything the Alliance is asking me.{nl}Would you go out to the Watchman's Post and get some Yellow Fragments instead?{nl}I'm really sorry, kid...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004988
text: I'll try and convince those two meanwhile.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004989
text: The nerve of those kids, not listening to their own boss...!{nl}I really don't know what to do with them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004990
text: I told them they were dismissed, that you were taking care of things.{nl}As soon as I tell them that, they go right after you!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004991
text: {nl}Can you believe this...?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004992
text: I mean, I know you're a famous Revelator and all.{nl}I reckon they just want a chance to work with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004993
text: {nl}But it's complicated, you know? I can't let them do that.{nl}Would you please just try and convince them?{nl}They should listen to you at least, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004994
text: The situation's tricky, you see.{nl}Nergui was born in Mors, but she was raised in the Alliance.{nl}And for some reason she doesn't seem to trust Wolke.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004995
text: {nl}I don't wanna send out the both of them with you, that'd be too much trouble.{nl}Would you take care of Wolke first?{nl}Thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004996
text: Barbarian Wolke

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004997
text: Excellent choice!{nl}Alright, my time to shine.{nl}First things first, we head over to the Collapsed Assembly Area and take everyone down!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004998
text: {nl}Oh, right. The Master asked me to do something else first.{nl}You go ahead and get started.{nl}I'll just go talk to Tadas and I'll join you after that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_004999
text: It's me or the enemy!{nl}One of us has to die.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005000
text: All done.{nl}You're gutsier than you look, huh!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005001
text: {nl}He wants us to go up to the Northern Tournament Hall.{nl}We're supposed to get Shiny Glass Shards from the monsters there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005002
text: {nl}Go ahead if you're ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005003
text: Tadas told me you're a busy Revelator.{nl}How about you get going to the Northern Tournament Hall?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005004
text: That's a lotta Glass Shards right there.{nl}Not bad!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005005
text: There's a lot of stuff here you can't find in regular walls.{nl}Relics with the energy of the goddesses, things you'd see at a church...{nl}I wonder what the Alliance is gonna do with all of this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005006
text: I heard something interesting when I was back with the Alliance.{nl}They told me the Kedora Merchant Alliance was a thing even before the Capital.{nl}Apparently they're the ones who built this wall.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005007
text: {nl}I mean, a single organization building something this big...{nl}I've been with them for decades now, but I still wonder if they're really just a normal merchant guild.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005008
text: {nl}This time I'd like you to go get some Cornerstone Pieces with Nergui.{nl}They said you could find some at the Weapons Assembly Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005009
text: Kedora Alliance Nergui

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005010
text: I'm all about safety first, okay?{nl}Just keep that in mind if you're coming with me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005011
text: This oughta do it.{nl}I guess the Alliance always knows how to find these things...{nl}Secrets a low member like me can't even dream of.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005012
text: And the cornerstones were dragged all the way to the top of the wall...{nl}Isn't that weird?{nl}I thought it was a joke when the Alliance told me to come get them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005013
text: Think about it.{nl}These cornerstones are supposed to be under the ground.{nl}They're there to support the wall, doesn't make sense to have them on top.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005014
text: That tree root over there is all over the wall, how come the wall didn't just crumble?{nl}Just how deep... and how strong is it?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005015
text: {nl}I sent them each on a different task earlier. Can I have a word with you in the meantime?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005016
text: I think the Alliance is gonna try to either restore the wall or take anything of value and then sell it.{nl}The problem is that tree root.{nl}They can't just cut it off, the whole wall could crumble to the ground if they do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005017
text: {nl}So I wanna find out just how strong this root is.{nl}Can you help me out with that?{nl}I can't trust the other two to do this right...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005018
text: Say, you ever thought about quitting that Revelator life and working for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005019
text: {nl}If not, alright, I guess...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005020
text: This thing is heavy as an anvil...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005021
text: {nl}I should find the other two and send them back to headquarters now.{nl}Couldn't get anything done around here if it weren't for you.{nl}Thanks a lot, kid.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005022
text: Kedora Alliance Ineta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005023
text: I should just quit the Alliance already...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005024
text: {nl}Oh! Um, hi. Are you exploring around here?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005025
text: {nl}Huh? Oh! You're that Revelator they talked about at the Alliance!{nl}Listen, I need you to save- I mean help me!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005026
text: Maybe I should just run away...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005027
text: {nl}Oh! That was nothing.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005028
text: That's odd.{nl}When I used it, all I saw were merchants...{nl}Who is that woman?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005029
text: How about this?{nl}You're curious about it too, aren't you?{nl}I'll let you borrow it if you do me a favor. Hm?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005030
text: {nl}It's nothing big...{nl}I just want you to walk with it and bring me any objects that react to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005031
text: Sigh... Maybe I should really run away now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005032
text: {nl}Oh! You're still here?!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005033
text: Woah... that's a lot.{nl}How did you carry all of this stuff?{nl}Can you carry the things and take them to Fedimian?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005034
text: {nl}What? You can't?{nl}Hm, okay...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005035
text: {nl}What's that pendant, though?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005036
text: I've never seen it before.{nl}We should take an image of it with the Time Meter.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005037
text: Go ahead, use it!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005038
text: I'm from the south coast, so I never went through what the refugees did after Medzio Diena.{nl}But I hope the person in this image can be happy again.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005039
text: Oh, thank the goddesses, my prayers have been answered!{nl}Will you come over to the Barrack Roof, then?{nl}There's something else I need you to do there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005040
text: I thought I'd be done here after a couple of days...{nl}I can't believe we have so much left to do...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005041
text: The name Pajauta is written on the back of the pendant.{nl}Do you think it could be the woman from the image?{nl}Hm... Who could she be?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005042
text: Where...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005043
text: {nl}Where did you get this?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005044
text: {nl}No, I won't ask anymore.{nl}Just know that this is a memory I wish I could forget.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005045
text: I don't know who this person is but...{nl}Please make sure they're well if you find them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005046
text: Just take this!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005047
text: I'm a Chronomancer, dispatched here by the Alliance.{nl}I was asked to investigate the events of Medzio Diena, but all they gave me was this necklace...{nl}They didn't tell me what to do with it.{nl}But I can't go beyond that bridge.{nl}The monsters would kill me!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005048
text: {nl}So please, would you help me?{nl}I want you to use this and check for any images in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005049
text: Schaffenstar Adjutant Apollonius

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005050
text: If you're trying to pass through, I would advise you not to.{nl}No, I cannot let you pass. The path ahead is far too dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005051
text: You're... awfully powerful.{nl}You don't seem like an ordinary outsider. May I ask who you are?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005052
text: A Revelator? You're the one I've been hearing about. I never thought I'd see the day!{nl}Is this the will of Laima...?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005053
text: I'm so sorry for the sudden request, but we're in desperate need of assistance.{nl}It wasn't my intention to grab a hold of you like this, but will you listen to our plight?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005054
text: Allow me to introduce myself. I am Adjutant Apollonius, of the Schaffenstar.{nl}I'm in charge of protecting this area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005055
text: This region is very important, you see, as it connects the Astral Tower to the Kingdom territories.{nl}That is why it has been protected from the demons since the beginning.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005056
text: One day, we heard rumors that our leader Ignas had made a pact with the demons himself.{nl}We didn't think that was possible, it was hard for us to believe in it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005057
text: Then recently, this area began to attract more and more demons, and soon enough our supplies had been cut off.{nl}Then the Tower superiors stopped paying attention to this region, and we knew the rumors were true.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005058
text: We were appalled. But we couldn't dare to abandon such a strategic location.{nl}We knew that if we tried, it would only cause the death of innocent people.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005059
text: But now... we're at our limit. We're exhausted, and soon we'll be running out of supplies.{nl}We had our minds set, we wanted to endure this for as long as we could.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005060
text: And then you came.{nl}You're the only one who can turn this situation around, you... you're here now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005061
text: So I ask again: will you please help us?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005062
text: We need your power and the help of the Resistance forces to overcome this once and for all.{nl}Please, help us...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005063
text: Thank you! Oh, thank you!{nl}Thank Goddess Laima for leading you to us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005064
text: Allow me to explain our plan.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005065
text: Just come to me when you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005066
text: Our goal is to get the most efficacy with the least damage taken.{nl}Many of our soldiers are tired and injured, you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005067
text: Receiving material aid and manpower from the Resistance's side will be very important.{nl}But we also need to prepare for any incoming threats.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005068
text: We've managed to obtain the demons' battle instructions before. That is how we have been able to resist their attacks.{nl}I have studied the demon language, so I can read their documents.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005069
text: The instructions have been very helpful in telling us when the demons might attack.{nl}We would like to try the same method this time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005070
text: See whether you can find battle instructions or other documents from monsters in the area.{nl}The more, the better. Can we count on you for that?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005071
text: I learned the demon language from a bishop who had lived in my hometown since before the Schaffenstar.{nl}He was a very generous and considerate man.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005072
text: Thank you! I'll get to analyzing these documents right away.{nl}In the meantime, there's something else I'd like you to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005073
text: These written documents are always very useful, but they don't tell us everything we need to know.{nl}Word of mouth is often just as important.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005074
text: I would like us to try and hear from the demons themselves, and see what it is that they are planning.{nl}For that, we will need to disguise ourselves as demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005075
text: The Druid Master is rather gifted with transformation, or so I've heard.{nl}Would you mind asking her if there is a way to disguise ourselves as demons?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005076
text: You know our situation now. I trust you to handle it with utmost care.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005077
text: Huh? You want to turn into demons?{nl}Why would you do that?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005078
text: Oh, I see...{nl}I'll let you have this, then. It's a transformation potion.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005079
text: I developed the solution myself.{nl}It's still in the testing stages, but I can guarantee you it works.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005080
text: All you have to do is think of the demon you last saw, then drink this to take its form.{nl}I hope it's useful to the people you're trying to help. Alright, go ahead then.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005081
text: I do hope the Druid Master can help us...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005082
text: Do you mean we can turn into demons with this potion?{nl}The last demon I saw...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005083
text: In that case, I believe we should disguise ourselves as Banterers. They're the leaders around here.{nl}It should be easier to obtain the information we need that way.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005084
text: I really hope my potion can help you.{nl}Oh, if you can, do tell me how the transformation went after you take the potion. For my research, you know.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005085
text: Very well, it's time to use the potion.{nl}Make sure you take the form of a Banterer and collect any information you can from the monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005086
text: Report back to me when you're done.{nl}Is that alright?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005087
text: I realize it's a dangerous tactic, but I do think it's the best way we have to investigate the enemy.{nl}We're counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005088
text: Oh, you're back.{nl}I've just finished collecting all the instructions and informing to the soldiers.{nl}What did you find?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005089
text: Are you saying...? They're summoning a Banshee Boss?{nl}They're going to try and end us once and for all...!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005090
text: There's no time to waste.{nl}We must tell the others about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005091
text: Hurry and inform the soldier over to my left.{nl}They'll be quick to alert the rest of the forces.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005092
text: Then, go and see Resistance Adjutant Benjaminas in Barynwell 85 Waters.{nl}He's an old colleague of mine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005093
text: He has worked here before, I'm sure he'll be willing to help us.{nl}I'll gather the soldiers and prepare our defenses in the meantime. Now go.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005094
text: This is a matter of life and death. This attack could threaten the lives of our entire forces.{nl}We have no choice but to win. We must. For our own sake.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005095
text: Resistance Adjutant Benjaminas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005096
text: Revelator?{nl}What are you...?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005097
text: What? No, it can't be...{nl}If they fall, the Astral Tower and everything around it will be in danger!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005098
text: Thank you for the report. He did a great job holding on for so long...{nl}We'll be glad to help in any way we can.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005099
text: I'll inform our commander and gather the soldiers immediately.{nl}If the monsters attack before we arrive, please make sure they stay safe until we arrive. We'll be there as soon as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005100
text: What did he say? Will they help us?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005101
text: I see... That's good to hear. We only need to resist the attack until they arrive.{nl}Thank you, Revelator. This is all thanks to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005102
text: All that's left to do is face the demons.{nl}This could very well become our last battle. Would you... be willing to join us?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005103
text: If you hadn't found us... we wouldn't have made it alive for much longer.{nl}Our soldiers are tired and injured, dealing with the constant threat of demon attacks.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005104
text: And yet we endured all that. We survived.{nl}All thanks to you and our comrades at the Resistance forces.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005105
text: Thank you, Revelator. Thank you for helping us protect our land.{nl}All we need now is for the Resistance to continue offering their help to keep it safe.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005106
text: Myself, I ought to tend to our injured soldiers before returning to oversee the region.{nl}You can rest assured that it will be safe now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005107
text: Go, Revelator. Find our goddess' Revelations and save this world from chaos.{nl}We are all counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005108
text: Wounded Soldier Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005109
text: Run... It's too dangerous... out here...{nl}They're coming... Please, hurry...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005110
text: You're... powerful...{nl}Thank you for saving me...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005111
text: Royal Soldier Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005112
text: I feel a lot better now. Thanks again for helping me.{nl}But I think the wave's already started to spread now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005113
