text: All the other demons in the area are going to come rushing in.{nl}I don't even know if they're really demons. They could have been good spirits...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005114
text: A long time ago this land was cursed with a strange type of evil energy.{nl}That energy had always been dormant because of the Divine Tree.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005115
text: But as you know, during Medzio Diena the Divine Tree grew out of control, and the evil curse was released.{nl}The strange energy started to spread, tearing away at people, demons, and all the creatures that lived here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005116
text: Anyone caught in the curse would eventually go mad and become like a slave to this evil energy.{nl}I was running away from the energy too, trying to escape the curse, but as you saw... it's dangerous out here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005117
text: If it weren't for you I'd be...{nl}Who... are you, by the way? You don't seem too affected by the energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005118
text: You're a Revelator? I see... That means...{nl}If anyone can save this place from the curse, it's you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005119
text: I can't do it on my own.{nl}We need to stop this evil energy and save the people who are suffering from it. Will you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005120
text: Thank you, really.{nl}I want to find a way to stop this evil energy, even if we can't use the power of the Divine Tree.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005121
text: We also need to find out how to cure the ones who are under the curse.{nl}The problem is I'm tied down here, I can't move.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005122
text: Would you find someone who can help us instead?{nl}I'm sure someone in the Kingdom can give us a solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005123
text: We should try the Taoist Master first. Please ask him if there's anything we can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005124
text: Yes, I've heard a lot about that curse.{nl}But I'm afraid I can't clear out the evil energy there all by myself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005125
text: What I can do is help you release those who are under the curse.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005126
text: Let me give you some of my Purifiers.{nl}If you find anything that's spreading the evil energy, simply stick one of these sheets on it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005127
text: That should help clear out the area a little.{nl}Also, you might want to speak with the Exorcist Master. He should know more about this than me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005128
text: Would you go and ask him?{nl}I'm sure there's something he can tell you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005129
text: The Taoist Master wants me to see the Exorcist Master.{nl}I should go find him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005130
text: You should go and see the Exorcist Master.{nl}I'm sure he'll be able to help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005131
text: If only we can stop this energy...{nl}It would make everything better...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005132
text: Oh, how I feel the pain of those poor souls.{nl}We are well aware of the terrible energy that's cursing that land.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005133
text: If you want to eliminate the energy once and for all, you'll first need to find its origin.{nl}That, of course, is no easy task. But if you're willing to try, I can give you these.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005134
text: This one is Purifying Holy Water. You may spray it on the victims after the curse is removed to cleanse their spirit.{nl}This one is a small Goddess Sculpture I received from the Dievdirbys Master.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005135
text: This sculpture has the power of the Dievdirbys Master and myself combined.{nl}I want you to place it on the spot where the energy is coming from.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005136
text: The sculpture will help suppress the evil energy and stop it from spreading.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005137
text: You're back. What did you find?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005138
text: I see. I think I might know where the energy is coming from.{nl}But to get there you need to open a gate, and the mechanism that opens it is being guarded by demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005139
text: It shouldn't be too hard for you to take them down and get to the gate but...{nl}Like the two Masters, I also wish the people who are under the curse now could finally get some peace.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005140
text: I know it won't be easy, but would you go and take care of them first?{nl}You can use the Purifier sheets the Taoist Master gave you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005141
text: There are a few tombstones around here releasing the evil energy.{nl}Stick the Purifiers on the tombstones to keep it from spreading.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005142
text: If you use a Purifier, some spirits might try to attack you and get to the sheet.{nl}Make sure to be careful and stay safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005143
text: I really hope we can stop this curse once and for all...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005144
text: How were the Purifiers, did they work?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005145
text: Good. I'm glad we could do something to help those poor people.{nl}But there are others still suffering from this curse. There's one more thing I need you to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005146
text: You might have noticed that some of the demons out there are actually former soldiers who got transformed by the curse.{nl}I would like to save them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005147
text: Use the Exorcist Master's Purifying Holy Water on them to cure them of the curse and release their spirits.{nl}Like the Master said, the curse needs to be taken out of their bodies first, so you may need to make them weaker before using the water.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005148
text: I hope it works. I just want my former comrades to finally rest in peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005149
text: Thank you. You really saved their souls.{nl}It should be easier for you to get to the gate mechanism now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005150
text: Here's what you need to do to suppress the curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005151
text: Go up through this path until you reach the Meeting Grounds.{nl}There you'll find the mechanism that opens the gate to the Drill Seargent's Lab, where I think the energy is coming from.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005152
text: The thing is, to get to the mechanism, you first need to disable the protective barrier around it.{nl}After that you can turn on the mechanism and open the gate.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005153
text: Put the Exorcist Master's Goddess Scuplture inside the room, wherever you see the energy coming from.{nl}Unfortunately I don't know how to get rid of the protective barrier, though.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005154
text: Also, whoever put this evil energy here in the first place might try to stop us if they figure out what we're doing.{nl}That's as much as I can tell you, I afraid. Sorry I can't help more.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005155
text: I feel terrible knowing there's nothing I can do about this. But I still have hope.{nl}Revelator, please. Stop this curse and let this tragedy end once and for all.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005156
text: I'm really sorry there's nothing else I can do.{nl}But you're the only one who can help us. Please... I beg you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005157
text: What happened? Is the energy... gone?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005158
text: I see. It sounds like the curse isn't completely over yet.{nl}But I'm glad we brought some peace to those poor souls. Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005159
text: But that means the lab wasn't the source of the curse... Then where is it...?{nl}I need to see the end of this curse with my own eyes, or I'll never be able to rest in peace.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005160
text: Until then, I want to do everything I can to stop other spirits from falling into this evil energy.{nl}Seeing your bravery inspires me to do more. It's only right for me to stay here and help in any way I can.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005161
text: If you ever find any clues on how we can get rid of this energy, please come back to see me.{nl}Anything at all. I just want to end this curse as soon as possible.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005162
text: I pray that your path will always be blessed by the grace of the goddesses.{nl}Thank you again, from the bottom of my heart.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005163
text: Resistance Adjutant Antanina

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005164
text: Hey, you. Hold right there. Aren't you that Revelator everyone's talking about?{nl}Funny seeing you here, I was just looking for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005165
text: Did you just roll your eyes at me? Anyway... Oh, I never told you who I was.{nl}My name's Antanina. I'm a detached force adjutant for the Resistance army.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005166
text: We received reports of a portal around here that was supposedly made to ambush our forces.{nl}Our goal, of course, is to destroy it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005167
text: Now, we need to be fast and quiet. We were just trying to figure it out when you showed up.{nl}How about you give us a hand? The whole thing will be a lot faster if you do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005168
text: Listen. This is all for the good of the Astral Tower.{nl}If the Tower is safe, the whole lake is safe.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005169
text: We can bring back the lake's purifying powers.{nl}Then everyone who lives around it will be protected from the demons. Don't you wanna see that happen?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005170
text: Also, if we win this, the Schaffenstar gets to work in a much bigger area. That includes us, too.{nl}Think about it. We can finally go beyond the lake and help real people in need, just like what you're doing now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005171
text: Come on, you got nothing to lose here. Huh? Am I right?{nl}This is totally the right thing to do, you know it is. Just come talk to me when you're ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005172
text: Now we're talking!{nl}Alright, let me brief you on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005173
text: The demon portal is being protected by four safety devices.{nl}Did you see any obelisks in the area? Well, those are the portal's safety devices.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005174
text: The obelisks are there to collect power and stabilize the portal.{nl}So the first thing we need to do is getting rid of them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005175
text: Once we get rid of the obelisks, then we can destroy the portal. Simple, right?{nl}We don't expect you to take care of everything. We can do half of the obelisks.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005176
text: For the portal, we're going to use this tool we got from our superiors.{nl}It's a kind of suppressor. The portal should be pretty weak without the obelisks, so this is gonna finish it off.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005177
text: I wrote everything down on this piece of paper.{nl}In case you forget.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005178
text: After the obelisks are down, we're going to meet up at the corridor between the Training Grounds and the Reception Room.{nl}Got it? Alright, let's get to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005179
text: Okay, I'm gonna get going now.{nl}Go get the obelisk in the Armory first!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005180
text: It won't break by force alone. You need to find another way.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005181
text: There are four obelisks powering the portal.{nl}You can find them at the Armory, Training Grounds, Reception Room and Graveyard.{nl}The Reception Room and Graveyard are further away, so we'll take care of those.{nl}You get the ones at the Armory and Training Grounds.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005182
text: Inside the Armory you have different kinds of explosives.{nl}Just take some from the boxes or the barrels there and put them in front of the obelisk.{nl}Then, get a bomb and find a spot from where you can escape. Throw the bomb at the explosives to trigger the first explosion.{nl}All the other explosives should then cause a reaction and tear down the obelisk.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005183
text: The obelisk in the Training Grounds is tougher.{nl}You'll see four platforms laid out in front of it.{nl}This obelisk can't be destroyed with explosives like the one in the Armory, so you'll have to use something else.{nl}I tried figuring out a way to take it down, but I came up with nothing so far. You'll have to get there yourself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005184
text: First, try hunting down a few demons and see if you can get any clues.{nl}You should find something related to those platforms.{nl}This obelisk is clearly different from the others, so there could also be a trap in it somewhere.{nl}Just keep that in mind and be careful when you try to destroy it.{nl}I know you can do it. We're all counting on you!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005185
text: When you're done taking down both obelisks, come to the corridor between the Training Grounds and the Reception Room.{nl}We'll meet you there.{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005186
text: You're back! Phew, I'm impressed. Guess they don't call you a Revelator for nothing, huh?{nl}Time to take down that portal now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005187
text: Are you ready? We need to look out for any surprise attacks.{nl}Let's take it easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005188
text: I should have been more careful... I can't believe Moringponia was here...{nl}That whirlwind attack was too strong, I couldn't even do anything...!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005189
text: But well... at least we can get to the portal now, thanks to you.{nl}You don't know how much this means to us. Thank you, really.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005190
text: Here, take the Suppressor.{nl}Just put it in front of the portal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005191
text: Our soldiers took a big blow earlier, we're not ready to start moving yet.{nl}You have to be the one to set it up. I'm sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005192
text: That dirty Moringponia, what kind of attack was that...?!{nl}Nothing we did worked, nothing!! Makes me furious.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005193
text: You did it. Thank you.{nl}We're finally safe. The Resistance, the Astral Tower, and everyone in the lake.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005194
text: We're gonna need a while to get patched up before we start looking into the rest of the demons.{nl}Now that their Lord is gone, we need to know what they're up to.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005195
text: As for you... Well, you're the Revelator. Go out and find those Revelations.{nl}If anyone can save this damned world, it's you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005196
text: Be strong, we got your back no matter what.{nl}And uh, make sure to give us a hand again if you ever come back, hehe.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005197
text: There are demons ahead.{nl}You could become gravely injured. I highly recommend you don't go any further.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005198
text: The Resistance forces agreed to continue supporting us with material aid.{nl}Soon we will be safe again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005199
text: My only wish is to see our situation stabilized as soon as possible.{nl}Thank you. All of this was possible because of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005200
text: Uhh... The pain... Run... run away...{nl}You can't be here...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005201
text: You're back! Did you find anything about the curse?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005202
text: I see... Well, I'm glad you came to see me again.{nl}You don't have to bring me news every time, you can just come and hang out if you want. It gets... lonely in here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005203
text: What? Oh, sorry. Kinda busy here.{nl}If you're looking for the Resistance soldiers, check Barynwell 87 Waters.{nl}They should all be there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005204
text: Ugh, I still can't believe I fell for that attack, though.{nl}I used to think I was pretty good with ambush attacks. I guess I was too confident for my own good.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005205
text: I'll just have to learn my lesson and straighten up.{nl}But I'm rooting for you. I know you can get us out of this nightmare.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005206
text: Very well, here's what you need to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005207
text: The platforms in front of the obelisk feel more solid than before.{nl}Maybe the demons around here can give you some clues about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005208
text: Excuse me? Are you saying you saw a man dressed like me?{nl}Where was this?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005209
text: Oh... I see. The Resistance... You must be familiar with Commander Byle then.{nl}That is quite a coincidence. I know Byle very well, you see.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005210
text: I can tell you more about it later. For now, here's what you should know about this area here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005211
text: Ah, Byle... Yes, the commander of the Resistance army!{nl}Did they take back the Astral Tower, then? Oh, that's wonderful news.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005212
text: I am actually very close to Commander Byle, yes.{nl}I can tell you more about it later but, for now, here's what you should know about this area here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005213
text: This is where Commander Byle used to work before he joined the Resistance against the Schaffenstar.{nl}He was always humble and discreet, a very hard-working man.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005214
text: One day, he activated a device that was hidden here and got scolded by his superiors for not reporting it right away.{nl}We didn't understand why he did that at the time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005215
text: But then, on Medzio Diena, among all the chaos, this place was left relatively intact.{nl}It had to do with that device that Byle activated.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005216
text: Byle didn't leave after he got scolded.{nl}He fought hard to protect this place after that, but Ignas' brutality ended up being too much for him to handle, so he left.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005217
text: I was actually really sad about him leaving the Schaffenstar.{nl}We wanted to follow him to the Resistance forces but...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005218
text: We couldn't afford to move that far from own forces.{nl}A single soldier could mean the difference between fending off a strike and taking serious damage.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005219
text: So we did what we could within the space we had.{nl}Gathering information on the enemy and things like that, I mean. That was... the most we could do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005220
text: Huh? So you know who we are?{nl}Then I'm sure you noticed that all we do is for the best, right?{nl}Everything, I mean EVERYTHING the Resistance does is for the good of this lake.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005221
text: Huh? So you know who we are?{nl}Then you must know why we're here, right?{nl}Everything the Resistance does is for the good of this lake, you know.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005222
text: We received reports of a portal around here that was supposedly made to ambush our forces.{nl}Our goal, of course, is to destroy it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005223
text: Somehow the powers of the lake are no longer activated.{nl}Usually the water of the lake would destroy the demons as soon as they touched it...{nl}No doubt this is all happening because of Ignas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005224
text: Kupole Astra

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005225
text: Oh! Revelator, what are you doing here...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005226
text: Oh my, I didn't even introduce myself.{nl}My name is Astra, I serve our Goddess Medeina.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005227
text: Master Medeina has gone into hiding, you see. The other Kupoles and I are searching for her in the forest.{nl}All the traces lead here but... unfortunately, that's as much as we know.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005228
text: Not only that, there seems to be an evil barrier covering Parias Forest.{nl}We worry that Master Medeina has fallen into danger.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005229
text: Revelator! Please help us find Master Medeina!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005230
text: Thank you!{nl}I'm sure we can find her with you on our side! You're the Revelator!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005231
text: This is where the traces end.{nl}We did look around for other clues, but there was nothing we could find...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005232
text: And so the other Kupoles and I decided to split and search for more clues around the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005233
text: Would you be so kind as to help with the search?{nl}Just in case I missed any clues around here... Do look again if you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005234
text: Thank you!{nl}You can start with the Spindintis Lot!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005235
text: Did you look in the Spindintis Lot?{nl}I would like you to check there again, in case I missed anything important.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005236
text: You heard a song coming from a maple tree?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005237
text: [Lost butterflies will always wander towards the flowers.]{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005238
text: What could it mean?{nl}They're only common butterflies...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005239
text: Oh! Come to think of it, there is something odd about those butterflies.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005240
text: Regular butterflies tend to fly around flowers...{nl}But these butterflies are found only in empty lots of land.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005241
text: We should see whether the butterflies react to those flowers you found.{nl}They could be an important clue.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005242
text: The butterflies' colors could also mean something.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005243
text: Did you check the butterflies?{nl}If they react to the flowers you found, that could give us a new clue.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005244
text: Revelator, did you hear the song coming from that tree over there?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005245
text: [Beyond the hill is a place the wings of the butterflies reach only in dreams.]{nl}Oh...! I know where the song is leading us!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005246
text: Down from here is a place called Drugelis Hill.{nl}The name Drugelis comes from the butterflies that live there...{nl}If my intuition is right, I believe we can find another clue there!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005247
text: This is odd.{nl}There isn't a single butterfly on the hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005248
text: All I see is flowers and trees.{nl}Revelator, I think the leaves you found earlier could be the clue we're looking for...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005249
text: {nl}Can you see if those flowers will react to your leaves?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005250
text: The flowers all have different colors.{nl}They must be connected to the colors of the leaves.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005251
text: How did it go?{nl}Did the flowers react to the leaves?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005252
text: Oh, I knew it! Master Medeina must have left us these clues herself!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005253
text: [Those who guide the butterflies will be blessed by the trees in the shelter of life.]{nl}These lyrics seem to point to the Gyvenimas Shelter.{nl}That's the only shelter in this region.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005254
text: Hurry, to the Gyvenimas Shelter!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005255
text: If we let the Tantaliser go like this, we will all be in grave danger.{nl}But there is something we can do!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005256
text: As I told you when we first met, this forest is surrounded by an evil barrier.{nl}I don't know who could have created it but...{nl}I do know there's a Magic Stone in Grazus Cliff that powers the entire barrier.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005257
text: I suggest we use the power of that Magic Stone to tie down the Tantaliser.{nl}That ought to give us time to search for Master Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005258
text: I made sure to leave traces behind.{nl}The Tantaliser should come running any moment now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005259
text: The power of the Magic Stone is perfectly sealed. All we need to do is tie down the Tantaliser when she appears.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005260
text: We did it!{nl}The Tantaliser can't move anymore!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005261
text: This is our chance to look for more clues!{nl}Hurry, to the Gyvenimas Shelter! That's where the song was leading us!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005262
text: Let's go, hurry!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005263
text: Are these... seeds?{nl}Looking at them like this, they do seem to emit a sort of divine energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005264
text: If these seeds were hidden here by Master Medeina, they must be important.{nl}It will be best if you keep hold of the seeds for now.{nl}If we come to find Master Medeina, you should be the one to give them back to her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005265
text: [Where the longing deer are welcome, the one blessed by the trees awaits you.]{nl}I wonder where this will lead us...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005266
text: Oh! The longing deer! It must mean the place where they go to drink!{nl}Beyond the Tesiamas Falls there is a spot called the Mazas Pond!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005267
text: The song must be leading us to the pond!{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005268
text: Uhh... I can't move.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005269
text: I'm going to need some time to recover...{nl}Please, carry on to the Mazas Pond.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005270
text: The pond is in front of the waterfalls.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005271
text: There must be another clue at the Mazas Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005272
text: So Master Medeina was being chased by Kartas.{nl}Oh... I understand now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005273
text: She went into hiding because of us.{nl}To protect us from Kartas...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005274
text: If you get to the center of Parias Forest, find a Kupole by the name of Ilona and alert her.{nl}She is also on the search for Master Medeina, she'll be able to help you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005275
text: I will look for more help as soon as I recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005276
text: Is that true?{nl}If Kartas really is really after Master Medeina like you say, we're in serious trouble!{nl}That must mean Kartas was the one to put this evil barrier all around the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005277
text: Oh! Yes, I saw a Magic Stone like that at the Poilsis Pond!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005278
text: Sealing off the power of the Magic Stone could do something to help Master Medeina.{nl}Would you help me do it?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005279
text: Thank you!{nl}Let me give you this Sealing Scroll.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005280
text: You can use it to seal off the Magic Stone's power, just like you did to the other stone!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005281
text: The Magic Stone's power is all sealed off now!{nl}That was a close call with all the monsters, I can't believe you took them all down!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005282
text: There's a firefly, look!{nl}It must be guiding us to where Master Medeina is! We should follow it!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005283
text: How glad I am to see you arrive safely.{nl}I am Medeina, Goddess of the Forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005284
text: Never did I imagine that you would find these seeds.{nl}They possess immense power, you see. That is why I hid them where no one else could possibly find them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005285
text: My sister Laima once told that the one carrying these seeds would find their way to me in a time of danger.{nl}That day has now arrived.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005286
text: As you know, I am hiding from a vicious demon lord by the name of Kartas.{nl}I could not fight him myself, as I was gravely injured by Medzio Diena, and so I hid from him in this forest...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005287
text: {nl}Alas, he came to know of my whereabouts and produced a barrier to cover the entire region.{nl}These seeds, the ones we call the Seeds of the Divine Tree, have the power to restore my health, allowing me to face Kartas. But that is not possible now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005288
text: {nl}I must recover some of my power for the seeds to heal me completely...{nl}But as it is, I can barely stand on my own two feet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005289
text: I understand it is much to ask of you, but will you aid me in my recovery?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005290
text: Thank you.{nl}The Seed of the Divine Tree possesses regenerative properties.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005291
text: {nl}First take the seed to a dying plant.{nl}If you do so, the plant will regenerate and absorb part of the seed's powers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005292
text: {nl}Collect the revived plant and bring it to me.{nl}I may be unable to use the seeds as they are...{nl}But I believe this plant will help restore some of my health.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005293
text: You may bring some Dying Grass from near the Parias Falls.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005294
text: Thank you.{nl}This will help me restore some of my health.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005295
text: Before I use the Seed of the Divine Tree, there is something I must do.{nl}First, I want to produce a false seed to fool Kartas. Then, I will need to seal away the seed's powers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005296
text: {nl}If I attempt this on my own, Kartas might be able to sense my movements.{nl}Therefore I must ask: are you willing to help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005297
text: Thank you.{nl}You must hurry, there is no time to waste.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005298
text: Please, hurry.{nl}Kartas could find us at any moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005299
text: The preparations are over.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005300
text: The power held by this Seed of the Divine Tree is far greater than I imagined.{nl}Its regenerative properties are astounding.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005301
text: {nl}I will use this power to produce a false seed that will fool Kartas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005302
text: There are a few young maple trees on the path to Syla Forest.{nl}If you bring the seed to those trees, it will grow them instantly.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005303
text: {nl}Using the seed to grow one of those trees is a violation of the laws of Nature.{nl}Therefore, as quickly as it grew, the tree will soon perish.{nl}Before the tree dies, you must collect one of its branches and bring it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005304
text: {nl}Kartas will not know of the Seed of the Divine Tree. Perhaps only vaguely.{nl}If we can disguise the branch, we can fool Kartas into thinking it is important.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005305
text: Take a close look on the path to Syla Forest.{nl}There you will find the young maple trees.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005306
text: You've done it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005307
text: The Seeds of the Divine Tree possess extraordinary powers.{nl}Should they fall in the hands of Kartas or any other demon, the results will be catastrophic.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005308
text: {nl}I would like to seal away the seeds' powers, so that they may be used solely for my restoration.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005309
text: Long ago, I had altars built at the Paslaptis Lot for this purpose.{nl}Activate the altars starting from the lowest, then place the Seed of the Divine Tree on the last altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005310
text: {nl}The energy contained in the altar will surround the seed and begin to seal away its powers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005311
text: There are multiple altars at the Paslaptis Lot.{nl}I did not want their energy to be compromised.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005312
text: {nl}You may activate the altars starting from the bottom.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005313
text: Good, the power of the seeds is sealed safely now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005314
text: We're ready.{nl}It's time to restore my health.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005315
text: {nl}May I have the seeds now?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005316
text: Aahhh... I put us all in danger.{nl}I just saw him take Master Medeina and I... I'm sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005317
text: I don't see Ilona.{nl}I need to see what's happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005318
text: There are more demons here than I imagined.{nl}I think we should look for Ilona together.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005319
text: Let's go look for her!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005320
text: Thank you, Revelator.{nl}All I've done was delay Master Medeina's rescue...{nl}{nl}I am so ashamed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005321
text: But there is something at the center of Parias Forest that Master Medeina left me.{nl}I suppose she wanted me to use it in an emergency like this...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005322
text: She gave me one of her orbs and told me to use it whenever I needed to find her.{nl}It was that very orb that brought me to this forest in the first place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005323
text: I could use Master Medeina's orb again to follow her but...{nl}I'm worried that we might end up falling for one of the demons' traps instead.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005324
text: Would you help me find Master Medeina with this orb?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005325
text: You can use the orb to find Master Medeina's traces.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005326
text: I don't see any more traces.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005327
text: I think we should go further into the courtyard.{nl}This might be dangerous, but we're already at the end of the path...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005328
text: There could be other clues in here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005329
text: Let's go inside!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005330
text: You've come to rescue me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005331
text: Kartas is planning to take me to the demon realm.{nl}He has me confined with this Teleportation Magic Circle. I cannot escape.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005332
text: If only there was a way to disable this magic circle...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005333
text: The Support Magic Circles you see here are supplying power to this Teleportation Magic Circle.{nl}If you destroy them, the Teleportation Magic Circle will grow weaker.{nl}Only then can I destroy this barrier with my own power.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005334
text: I don't believe the Support Magic Circles can be destroyed by force alone, however.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005335
text: I would like you to defeat the Red Banterers and bring me their essence.{nl}Should we overload the magic circles with it, we may just be able to destroy them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005336
text: Defeat the the Red Banterers and bring me their essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005337
text: Have you got the Red Banterer Essence?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005338
text: Yes, this should suffice.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005339
text: You may add the essence to the magic circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005340
text: I was able to destroy the barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005341
text: The seed did restore my condition somewhat...{nl}But I am still trapped inside the forest barrier.{nl}I believe we need to seal away the Magic Stone that's supplying power to the barrier as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005342
text: I sense a concentration of magic energy near the Paprastas Lot.{nl}The Magic Stone is likely to be there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005343
text: Revelator, will you seal away the Magic Stone?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005344
text: Take this Sealing Scroll and place a seal around the Magic Stone.{nl}I will be preparing for my escape in the meantime.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005345
text: Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005346
text: Was there a Magic Stone at the Paprastas Lot?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005347
text: Yes, the barrier feels much weaker.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005348
text: I ought to hurry now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005349
text: But my Kupoles...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005350
text: No. Revelator, you take the seed and abandon the forest immediately.{nl}It's the seed's powers that Kartas covets.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005351
text: I must go back. I worry too much for my Kupoles.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005352
text: I wasted the time that was given to me...{nl}Laima tried to warn me, yet I did not listen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005353
text: She told that Kartas would one day become a threat, that he would seek me.{nl}And that a choice would present itself.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005354
text: My call to Miss Neringa was far too late... and now Master Medeina is...{nl}Oh, what gruesome fate...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005355
text: The Mazas Pond is just after the waterfall.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005356
text: I'm tending to my guns now.{nl}Will you come back later?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005357
text: {nl}Also, would you step back a little?{nl}I'm not too comfortable with you coming so close.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005358
text: Recovery Squad in Danger

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005359
text: I can't ignore this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005360
text: Sorry, I can't help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005361
text: Emergency Measures

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005362
text: Okay, I can help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005363
text: I really need some rest, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005364
text: Call for Help

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005365
text: I'll go get help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005366
text: I don't want to leave you alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005367
text: Circumstances

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005368
text: I'm listening.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005369
text: Sorry, I have a lot to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005370
text: Halloween Demon Hunt (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005371
text: Sure, I can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005372
text: I'll wait.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005373
text: Halloween Demon Hunt (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005374
text: I can help, sure.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005375
text: Take Down the Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005376
text: I'm ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005377
text: I need some time to prepare.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005378
text: Destroy the Portal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005379
text: I'll make sure that portal gets destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005380
text: I need some time to rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005381
text: Finding the Relic

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005382
text: I can help you search.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005383
text: No, I can't do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005384
text: What is the Relic

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005385
text: I'll look around.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005386
text: I don't sense anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005387
text: I'll head to the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005388
text: I'll wait for you to recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005389
text: Guardian of the Lake

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005390
text: I can help with the repairs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005391
text: Sorry, I have a lot to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005392
text: Acquiring Resources

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005393
text: Taking the Lead

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005394
text: I accept.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005395
text: Fearful Heart

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005396
text: I'll talk to them, don't worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005397
text: Oh no, I'm too shy...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005398
text: Worrisome Student

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005399
text: I'll go help your student.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005400
text: Monster Leader Operation (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005401
text: I can take care of some of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005402
text: Monster Leader Operation (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005403
text: I'll help you with the bombs.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005404
text: I really need some rest, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005405
text: Monster Leader Operation (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005406
text: I'll head to the standby location right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005407
text: Let me just check the bombs one more time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005408
text: First Steps to Repossession

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005409
text: Helping the Boy (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005410
text: Helping the Boy (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005411
text: Helping the Boy (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005412
text: Let's wait.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005413
text: Guardian of the Lake (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005414
text: I'm so tired right now, let me rest for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005415
text: Guardian of the Lake (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005416
text: Guardian of the Lake (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005417
text: Guardian of the Lake (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005418
text: For Them

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005419
text: Different Circumstances (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005420
text: Different Circumstances (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005421
text: Alright, but just this one time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005422
text: Nope, I'm not convinced.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005423
text: Different Circumstances (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005424
text: Different Circumstances (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005425
text: Okay, I get it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005426
text: Different Circumstances (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005427
text: We should prepare a little more first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005428
text: Different Circumstances (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005429
text: What happened?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005430
text: Different Circumstances (7)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005431
text: I'm gonna need to prepare first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005432
text: Different Circumstances (8)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005433
text: There's no more time to waste.{nl}Defeat the monsters to collect Cornerstone Pieces!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005434
text: Different Circumstances (9)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005435
text: What does that mean?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005436
text: Why all the fuss?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005437
text: Different Circumstances (10)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005438
text: I got no time for that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005439
text: Obscure Era

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005440
text: You got the wrong person, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005441
text: Use the Time Meter Necklace near Kedora Alliance Ineta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005442
text: Cries and Echoes

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005443
text: Not my problem, you can do it yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005444
text: Use the Time Meter Necklace on the Grave of the Nameless and{nl}find the Lever Pieces.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005445
text: Tragedy and Echoes

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005446
text: Move to the next region and use the Time Meter Necklace,{nl}then find the Broken Statue Pieces.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005447
text: Despair and Echoes

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005448
text: Move to the next region and use the Time Meter Necklace,{nl}then find the Broken Wheel Pieces.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005449
text: Echoes and Cries

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005450
text: More to the next region and use the Time Meter Necklace{nl}on the monsters, then find the Burnt Arrow.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005451
text: Echoes and Tragedy

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005452
text: More to the next region and use the Time Meter Necklace{nl}on the monsters, then find the Broken Arrow.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005453
text: Echoes and Despair

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005454
text: More to the next region and use the Time Meter Necklace{nl}on the monsters, then find the Lost Pendant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005455
text: Time Never Stops

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005456
text: I don't really want to know.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005457
text: Nightmare Seed

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005458
text: I can think of someone, yes.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005459
text: A New Attack (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005460
text: I have to go do something else, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005461
text: A New Attack (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005462
text: I can't really help you, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005463
text: What happened here in the past?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005464
text: Know Your Enemy, Know Yourself (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005465
text: Let me go get ready, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005466
text: Know Your Enemy, Know Yourself (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005467
text: Know Your Enemy, Know Yourself (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005468
text: I'll ask another soldier to do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005469
text: Know Your Enemy, Know Yourself (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005470
text: Delivering Apollonius' message...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005471
text: Know Your Enemy, Know Yourself (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005472
text: The Unfortunate Cursed Land

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005473
text: What's going on?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005474
text: I, uh, gotta go. Bye!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005475
text: A Solution to the Curse

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005476
text: Yeah, yeah. See ya!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005477
text: The Purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005478
text: I'm too scared of that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005479
text: Purification by Holy Water

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005480
text: I'm feeling a little sluggish all of a sudden.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005481
text: Curse, Begone! (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005482
text: Ugh, I can't stand traps.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005483
text: Curse, Begone! (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005484
text: Curse, Begone! (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005485
text: Detached Forces

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005486
text: Just give some time to think.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005487
text: Oh my, would you look at the time!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005488
text: Destroying the Obelisks (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005489
text: I'll have to think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005490
text: [Destroying the Obelisks (1)]{nl}Quest complete!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005491
text: Destroying the Obelisks (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005492
text: Investigate the Training Grounds obelisk as instructed in Antanina's note!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005493
text: Destroying the Obelisks (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005494
text: Destroying the Obelisks (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005495
text: Last Man Standing

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005496
text: Mission Complete

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005497
text: Flowers and Butterflies (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005498
text: I can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005499
text: I can't do that, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005500
text: Flowers and Butterflies (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005501
text: I'll have a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005502
text: No, I don't think I can do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005503
text: Talking about what happened...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005504
text: Flowers and Butterflies (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005505
text: No way, that's insane.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005506
text: Explaining what happened...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005507
text: Flowers and Butterflies (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005508
text: That sounds way too dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005509
text: Flowers and Butterflies (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005510
text: Medeina's Traces (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005511
text: Let's get going.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005512
text: Medeina's Traces (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005513
text: Can you explain a bit more?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005514
text: No, that sounds too difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005515
text: Medeina's Traces (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005516
text: Medeina's Traces (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005517
text: Medeina's Traces (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005518
text: Let's go, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005519
text: Wait, we should think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005520
text: Medeina's Traces (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005521
text: I can't leave you behind.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005522
text: The Goddess' Hideout (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005523
text: The Goddess' Hideout (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005524
text: The Goddess' Hideout (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005525
text: ...Did you say something?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005526
text: The Goddess' Hideout (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005527
text: Power of the Seed

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005528
text: No, I don't think I can do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005529
text: All Kinds of Preparations

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005530
text: I'm afraid I'll have to pass.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005531
text: Kartas Appears (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005532
text: Here, the Seed of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005533
text: I can't give you the seed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005534
text: Kartas Appears (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005535
text: Swore to Protect (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005536
text: Swore to Protect (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005537
text: Removing the barrier...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005538
text: Swore to Protect (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005539
text: Swore to Protect (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005540
text: I don't think so.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005541
text: Swore to Protect (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005542
text: Let's find a way to release it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005543
text: I don't think we can release it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005544
text: Swore to Protect (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005545
text: What do you mean, I don't sense any energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005546
text: Swore to Protect (7)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005547
text: No, you do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005548
text: Okay, hold on.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005549
text: Swore to Protect (8)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005550
text: Okay, I'll be right back.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005551
text: I dunno where to go.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005552
text: Swore to Protect (9)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005553
text: Let's get out of here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005554
text: We should get ready first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005555
text: Swore to Protect (10)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005556
text: I can't just leave you here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005557
text: Swore to Protect (11)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005558
text: Saving Lives

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005559
text: Someone is fallen on the ground. Check their condition.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005560
text: The monsters are attracted to the scent of blood. Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005561
text: Talk to the Injured Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005562
text: You defeated all the monsters. Help the Injured Soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005563
text: Talk to the Injured Soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005564
text: Collect Lake Water

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005565
text: Go to the Old Residential Quarters and collect some detoxifying lake water.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005566
text: You collected the water. Go back to the Injured Soldier and return the Filled Glass Bottle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005567
text: Collect Lake Water

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005568
text: Ask for Help

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005569
text: You received a badge from the Injured Soldier. Alert the Recovery Squad and ask for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005570
text: Talk to the Recovery Squad Adjutant

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005571
text: Explain the Injured Soldier's situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005572
text: Talk to the Recovery Squad Adjutant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005573
text: The Recovery Squad Adjutant looks worried. Listen to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005574
text: Deliver the Return Orders

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005575
text: Tell the soldiers at the Barynwell Hill Road their orders to return.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005576
text: The orders have been delivered. Report back to the Recovery Squad Adjutant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005577
text: Install the Bombs

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005578
text: Go to the Collapsed Square and install the bombs you received from the Recovery Squad Adjutant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005579
text: You finished setting up the bombs. Report back to the Recovery Squad Adjutant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005580
text: Lure the Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005581
text: The Recovery Squad Adjutant left a mark at the Collapsed Square.{nl}Head to the marked spot and wait for the Adjutant to lure the monsters to the bombs. Then, defeat any monsters that survive the explosion.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005582
text: You have defeated all the monsters. Return to the Recovery Squad Temporary Base and report to the Adjutant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005583
text: Destroy the Portal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005584
text: Head to the Collapsed Square and destroy the monster portal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005585
text: You have destroyed the portal. Report back to the Recovery Squad Adjutant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005586
text: Talk to the Recovery Squad Leader

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005587
text: Talk to the Recovery Squad Leader.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005588
text: A giant monster has appeared. Defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005589
text: You have defeated the monster. Talk to Recovery Squad Adjutant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005590
text: Return to the Recovery Squad Temporary Base and talk to the Adjutant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005591
text: Talk to Brockal Himil

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005592
text: Talk to Brockal Himil.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005593
text: Repair the Stockades

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005594
text: Prepare for the monsters' attack by repairing the stockades near the Himil Family Base.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005595
text: The stockades have been repaired. Report back to Brockal Himil.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005596
text: You need to acquire more food supplies. Go to the Reservoir and catch some fish.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005597
text: You have caught a good amount of fish. Report back to Brockal Himil.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005598
text: Go to the Old Training Grounds and defeat the monsters before they start to gather.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005599
text: You have defeated the monsters. Report back to Brockal Himil.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005600
text: Defeat the Concentrating Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005601
text: Morale Boost

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005602
text: Give an encouraging pep talk to the garrisons at the Himil Family Base.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005603
text: You have encouraged the garrisons. Report back to Brockal Himil.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005604
text: Find Brockal Himil's Student

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005605
text: Find Brockal Himil's student, who is observing the monsters at the Collapsed Shelter.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005606
text: Talk to Brockal Himil's Apprentice

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005607
text: Talk to Brockal Himil's Apprentice.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005608
text: In order to defeat their leader, first you need to defeat the monsters near the Maven Intersection.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005609
text: You have defeated the subordinate monsters. Report back to Brockal Himil's Apprentice.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005610
text: Head to the alleyway near the Collapsed Observatory and install a bomb to take down nearby monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005611
text: The bomb has been set up. Repor back to Brockal Himil's Apprentice.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005612
text: Defeat the Monster Leader

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005613
text: Defeat the leader of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005614
text: You have defeated the monster leader. Talk to Brockal Himil's Apprentice.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005615
text: Report Back

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005616
text: Return to the Himil Family Base and tell Brockal about the monster leader.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005617
text: Report to Brockal Himil about the monster leader.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005618
text: Talk to the Laker Boy

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005619
text: A boy is pulling some water plants looks at you. Talk to the boy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005620
text: Remove the Water Plants

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005621
text: Help the Laker Boy remove the Water Plants growing around the Watch Post.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005622
text: You have removed enough Water Plants. Report back to the Laker Boy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005623
text: Talk to the Laker Boy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005624
text: Move the Water Plant Piles

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005625
text: The piles of water plants are too heavy for the boy. Help him move the plants to the Aqueduct Control Room while he starts the shredder.{nl}1. Interact with the Water Plant Piles to pick them up.{nl}- You can carry a maximum of 4 piles at a time.{nl}- The piles can be discarded.{nl}2. Carry the piles to the Aqueduct Control Room.{nl}3. Interact with the device at the aqueduct to drop the piles.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005626
text: You have moved all the piles of water plants. Talk to the Laker Boy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005627
text: Collect Materials

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005628
text: There are too many piles of water plants and the boy doesn't have enough materials to process them. Collect some Magic Sources at the Old Warehouse for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005629
text: You have collected enough Magic Sources. Bring them to the Laker Boy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005630
text: The boy wants you to help the Laker Leader who looks after Maven 32 Waters. Find the leader at the Laker Temporary Base and talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005631
text: Talk to the Laker Leader

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005632
text: Talk to the Laker Leader.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005633
text: Collect Poison Arrow Materials

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005634
text: The Laker Leader wants to craft poison arrows in order to defeat a large monster. Go to the Old Stakeout Box and collect some Plants with Lake Energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005635
text: You have collected all the materials for the arrows. Bring them to the Laker Leader.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005636
text: The Laker Leader wants to make sure the area is clear before handling the giant monster. Defeat monsters near the lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005637
text: You have defeated the monsters. Report back to the Laker Leader.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005638
text: Defeat the Giant Monster

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005639
text: Find the Laker Leader at the Old Laker Training Grounds and defeat the giant monster together.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005640
text: You have defeated the monster. Talk to the Laker Leader.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005641
text: Collect Materials for Self-Defense Weapons

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005642
text: The Laker Leader wants to make new self-defense weapons for her young lakers. Defeat the Frocolis at the Laker Shelter and collect materials for the weapons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005643
text: You have collected enough materials. Bring them to the Laker Leader.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005644
text: Defeat the Frocolis to Obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005645
text: Different Circumstances

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005646
text: Tadas from the Kedora Alliance is looking for help at the Outer Wall District 14.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005647
text: Tadas from the Kedora Alliance is waiting for you at the Barrack Roof of Outer Wall District 14.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005648
text: Collect Topaz Fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005649
text: Tadas has asked you to collect Topaz Fragments from the monsters at the Watchman's Post.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005650
text: Return to Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005651
text: Deliver the Topaz Fragments to Tadas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005652
text: Talk to Barbarian Wolke

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005653
text: Barbarian Wolke is waiting for you at the Barrack Roof in Outer Wall District 14.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005654
text: Wolke wants you to clear out the monsters while he is discussing with Tadas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005655
text: Talk to Barbarian Wolke in Outer Wall District 14.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005656
text: Collect Shiny Glass Shards

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005657
text: Head to the Northern Tournament Hall in Outer Wall District 14 with Wolke and collect Shiny Glass Shards from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005658
text: Deliver the Shiny Glass Shards to Tadas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005659
text: Talk to Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005660
text: Talk to Nergui

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005661
text: Nergui from the Kedora Alliance is waiting for you at the Barrack Roof of Outer Wall District 14.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005662
text: Collect Cornerstone Pieces

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005663
text: Collect Cornerstone Pieces with Nergui at the Weapons Assembly Area in Outer Wall District 14.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005664
text: Defeat Monsters to Collect Cornerstone Pieces

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005665
text: Nergui wants to find more Cornerstone Pieces. Defeat nearby monsters to collect them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005666
text: Deliver the Cornerstone Pieces to Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005667
text: Collect More %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005668
text: Tadas is desperately in need of your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005669
text: Collect Ancient Tree Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005670
text: Tadas wants you to go instead of Wolke and Nergui and collect Ancient Tree Essence from the tree roots.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005671
text: Deliver the Ancient Tree Essence to Tadas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005672
text: Talk to Ineta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005673
text: Kedora Alliance Ineta is waiting for your help at the Outskirts Bridge in Outer Wall District 15.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005674
text: Use the Time Meter

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005675
text: Ineta suggests you use the Time Meter Necklace to see the events of Medzio Diena in your current location.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005676
text: Talk to Kedora Alliance Ineta at the Outskirts Bridge in Outer Wall District 15.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005677
text: Collect Lever Pieces

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005678
text: Ineta wants you to use the Time Meter at the Grave of the Nameless and collect Lever Pieces.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005679
text: Collect Broken Statue Pieces

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005680
text: Ineta wants you to use the Time Meter at the Beacon Mound Entrance and collect Broke Statue Pieces.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005681
text: Collect Broken Wheel Pieces

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005682
text: Ineta wants you to use the Time Meter at the Beacon Mound Entrance and collect Broke Wheel Pieces.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005683
text: Collect Burnt Arrows

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005684
text: Ineta wants you to use the Time Meter at the designated location and defeat the monsters that react to it to collect Burnt Arrows.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005685
text: Broken Arrow

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005686
text: Ineta wants you to use the Time Meter at the designated location and defeat the monsters that react to it to collect Broke Arrows.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005687
text: Acquire the Lost Pendant

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005688
text: Ineta wants you to use the Time Meter at the designated location and defeat the monsters that react to it to collect the Lost Pendant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005689
text: Deliver the objects you collected with the Time Meter at Outer Wall District 15 to Ineta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005690
text: Kedora Alliance Ineta is waiting for you at the Outskirts Bridge in Outer Wall District 15.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005691
text: Ineta has asked you to use the Time Meter on the Lost Pendant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005692
text: Talk to Kedora Alliance Ineta

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005693
text: Kedora Alliance Ineta is at the Outskirts Bridge in Outer Wall District 15 and she wants to tell you something.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005694
text: You know who the owner of the pendant is. Bring the pendant to Pajauta.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005695
text: A New Attack

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005696
text: Talk to Schaffenstar Adjutant Apollonius

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005697
text: Schaffenstar Adjutant Apollonius seems to be in trouble. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005698
text: Defeat the Incoming Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005699
text: The demons are attacking the Schaffenstar members! Talk to Apollonius and defeat the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005700
text: You have defeated all the demons, but you are still in danger. Talk to Apollonius.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005701
text: Ask Apollonius about what is happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005702
text: You have agreed to help Apollonius. Talk to him again when you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005703
text: Know Your Enemy, Know Yourself

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005704
text: Schaffenstar Adjutant Apollonius wants to tell you where to start. Talk to Apollonius.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005705
text: Defeat Nearby Demons to Collect Orders

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005706
text: Apollonius wants you to collect written orders from nearby demons. Defeat the demons and obtain their documents.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005707
text: You have enough written orders now. Bring them to Apollonius.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005708
text: Obtain the Demons' Orders

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005709
text: Schaffenstar Adjutant Apollonius is looking for ways to assess the demons' plans. Talk to Apollonius.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005710
text: Apollonius wants to try turning into a demon in order to spy on them. Find the Druid Master and ask for her opinion.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005711
text: The Druid Master gave you a potion. Take it to Apollonius.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005712
text: Apollonius wants to share the potion and start the investigation. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005713
text: Transform and Spy on the Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005714
text: Apollonius wants you to use the potion to collect information from the monsters. Disguise yourself with the potion and trick the monsters into talking to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005715
text: You have collected enough information. Report back to Apollonius.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005716
text: Apollonius seems worried. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005717
text: Tell the Schaffenstar Soldier to Light the Signal Fire

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005718
text: Apollonius wants you to tell the soldier to light the signal fire and alert the others.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005719
text: Ask Resistance Adjutant Benjaminas in Barynwell 85 Waters

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005720
text: Tell Resistance Adjutant Benjaminas in Barynwell 85 Waters about the information you collected with Apollonius and ask for his assistance.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005721
text: Apollonius is ready to block the enemy's attack. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005722
text: Block the Demons' Attack

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005723
text: The demons are planning a full-scale attack. Resist their attack until the Resistance forces arrive.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005724
text: You have resisted the attack with the help of the Resistance! Talk to Apollonius.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005725
text: Talk to the Wounded Soldier Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005726
text: A painful wail is heard coming from somewhere. Find the source of the noise.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005727
text: Protect the Wounded Soldier Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005728
text: The soldier spirits suddenly turned into demons! Protect the Wounded Soldier Spirit from them to hear the full story.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005729
text: You have defeated all the demons. Talk to the Wounded Soldier Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005730
text: Talk to the Royal Soldier Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005731
text: The Royal Soldier Spirit wants to tell you about what happened here. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005732
text: Seek the Taoist Master's Advice

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005733
text: The Royal Soldier Spirit wants to seek advice on the situation. Visit the Taoist Master and explain what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005734
text: Seek the Exorcist Master's Advice

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005735
text: The Taoist Master believes the Exorcist Master might have a better answer for you. Visit the Exorcist Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005736
text: You have received the help of two Masters. Report back to the Royal Soldier Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005737
text: Stick the Purifiers to the Tombstones

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005738
text: The Royal Soldier Spirit wants you to stick the Purifier sheets to the tombstones emitting evil energy. Place the sheets on nearby tombstones.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005739
text: The Purifiers were effective! Report back to the Royal Soldier Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005740
text: The Royal Soldier Spirit wants to tell you about the next step. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005741
text: Use the Purifying Holy Water on the Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005742
text: Use holy water to purify the spirits that turned into demons! But remember, the spirits need to be weakened first before you can use the Purifying Holy Water.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005743
text: You have purified the spirits and they can now rest in peace. Report back to the Royal Soldier Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005744
text: Curse, Begone!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005745
text: The Royal Soldier Spirit wants to tell you how to get to the source of the curse. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005746
text: Disable the Switchgear Barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005747
text: In order to reach the Switchgear, you need to solve a puzzle! Operate the pillars by the order in which they shine to disable the barrier around the Switchgear.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005748
text: Operate the Switchgear

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005749
text: The barrier is gone! Now, operate the Switchgear to open the gate to the Drill Seargent's Lab.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005750
text: Operate the Switchgear to open the gate to the Drill Seargent's Lab, where the source of the curse is.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005751
text: Defeat the Deranged Vel's Chariot

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005752
text: A Vel's Chariot appeared as you were trying to operate the Switchgear! Defeat the monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005753
text: The coast is finally clear. Operate the Switchgear and open the gate.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005754
text: Defeat the Deranged Vel's Chariot

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005755
text: Install the Sculpture and Defeat the Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005756
text: You're ready to suppress the evil energy coming from the Drill Seargent's Lab. Set up the Goddess Sculpture near the source of the energy and defeat any demons that try to stop you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005757
text: The sculpture is working, but it's not enough to dispell all the evil energy around. This may not be the source of the curse. Report back to the Royal Soldier Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005758
text: Talk to Resistance Adjutant Antanina

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005759
text: Resistance Adjutant Antanina is calling for you. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005760
text: Antanina has "convinced" you to work with her. Talk to Antanina again when you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005761
text: Destroying the Obelisks

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005762
text: Resistance Adjutant Antanina wants to explain her plan. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005763
text: Investigate the Obelisk in the Armory

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005764
text: Antanina is off to destroy the obelisks. According to her notes, you need to destroy the one in the Armory. Go there and investigate the obelisk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005765
text: Place Explosives Around the Obelisk

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005766
text: According to Antanina's notes, you need to get some explosives from the boxes or barrels and place them by the obelisk. Then, find a bomb and throw it at the explosives from a safe spot to destroy the obelisk.{nl}Follow the instructions on Antanina's notes.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005767
text: Destroy the Obelisk in the Armory

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005768
text: The explosives are ready, and you also have the bomb now.{nl}Move to a safe spot and throw the bomb to destroy the obelisk.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005769
text: Investigate the Obelisk in the Training Grounds

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005770
text: After the Armory, Antanina's notes tell you to move to the Training Grounds. Go there and investigate the next obelisk.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005771
text: Defeat Nearby Demons for Clues

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005772
text: The obelisk here can't be destroyed by force alone. Defeat nearby demons to obtain clues on how to destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005773
text: Investigate the Obelisk

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005774
text: The defeated demons dropped fragments of different colors. Investigate the obelisk in the Training Grounds and figure out how to destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005775
text: Place the Fragments on the Platforms

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005776
text: It looks like you need to place the fragments on the platforms in order. But be careful: if you use the wrong order or fall into a trap, the demons might notice and come running.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005777
text: You have destroyed all the obelisks. Report back to Resistance Adjutant Antanina.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005778
text: Defeat Moringponia by the Portal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005779
text: Just as you were trying to destroy the portal, Demon Lord Moringponia appeared! Defeat the demon to get to the portal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005780
text: You have defeated Demon Lord Moringponia. Check Resistance Adjutant Antanina.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005781
text: Antanina looks like she wants to ask you something. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005782
text: Install the Suppressor and Destroy the Portal

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005783
text: Antanina wants to install a suppressor and destroy the portal. Install the Suppressor by the portal.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005784
text: The portal has been destroyed. Report back to Antanina.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005785
text: Talk to Kupole Astra

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005786
text: Find Clues

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005787
text: Kupole Astra is trying to find Goddess Medeina, but she's all out of clues.{nl}Go to Spindintis Lot and look for another possible lead.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005788
text: Check the Butterflies

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005789
text: Kupole Astra finds it strange that a group of butterflies nearby lives away from the flowers.{nl}Go near the butterflies and check whether they react to your flowers.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005790
text: Go to Drugelis Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005791
text: Kupole Astra believes the song is leading you to Drugelis Hill.{nl}Go there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005792
text: Check the Blooming Flowers

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005793
text: Kupole Astra thinks the multi-colored flowers on the hill are your only clue.{nl}Go near the flowers and check whether they react to your leaves.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005794
text: Use the Sealing Scroll on the Magic Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005795
text: Kupole Astra wants to do something about the Magic Stone that's supplying power to the forest's evil barrier.{nl}Go to Grazus Cliff and use the Sealing Scroll on the Magic Stone that's installed there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005796
text: Restrain Demon Lord Tantaliser

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005797
text: Lure Demon Lord Tantaliser to the white circle in front of the Kupole and use the Binding Scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005798
text: Go to the Gyvenimas Shelter

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005799
text: Kupole Astra wants to go to the Gyvenimas Shelter, where the song is leading you. Follow her there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005800
text: Cross the Tesiamas Falls to Mazas Pond

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005801
text: Kupole Astra believes the last part of the song is referring to the Mazas Pond.{nl}Cross the Tesiamas Falls with her into Mazas Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005802
text: Go to Mazas Pond

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005803
text: Kupole Astra is still unable to move, but she wants you to continue on to Mazas Pond to find more clues.{nl}Go to Mazas Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005804
