text: Talk to Kupole Ilona

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005805
text: Kupole Ilona says there is a similar Magic Stone at the Poilsis Pond and she wants to seal it away.{nl}Go to Poilsis Pond and use the Sealing Scroll on the Magic Stone there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005806
text: Follow the Firefly With Kupole Ilona

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005807
text: Ilona believes the firefly is guiding you to the location of Goddess Medeina.{nl}Follow the firefly with Kupole Ilona.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005808
text: Talk to Goddess Medeina

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005809
text: Collect Vivacious Grass

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005810
text: Goddess Medeina needs to restore some of Her health before using the seed, but she is still too weak.{nl}She wants you to use the seed to regenerate a dying plant instead, then bring back the revived plant.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005811
text: Help Goddess Medeina

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005812
text: Goddess Medeina wants you to help Her until She regains Her health.{nl}Do as the Goddess says.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005813
text: Collect Tree Branches

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005814
text: Goddess Medeina wants to create something to trick Demon King Kartas.{nl}Use the seed to instantly grow the young maple trees on the path to Syla Forest, then collect a branch from those trees.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005815
text: Seal the Seed's Energy

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005816
text: Goddess Medeina is still worried that the Seed of the Divine Tree might fall in the hands of someone like Kartas.{nl}In order to use the seed only for healing, the rest of its powers need to be sealed away, the tools for which are located in this region.{nl}Activate the goddess' altar in order to seal away the seed's energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005817
text: Protect Kupole Ilona

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005818
text: Kupole Ilona's call gave away her location to the demons.{nl}Protect Ilona from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005819
text: Talk to Kupole Yulia

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005820
text: Find Kupole Ilona

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005821
text: Kupole Yulia wants to find Kupole Ilona immediately.{nl}Join Yulia and find Kupole Ilona.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005822
text: Talk to Kupole Illina

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005823
text: Talk to Kupole Ilona and Defeat Nearby Demons to Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005824
text: Medeina's TracesParias Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005825
text: Kupole Ilona says that there is an orb in the center of Parias Forest that Goddess Medeina left behind for an emergency.{nl}Use the orb to find traces of Goddess Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005826
text: Go to Ruduo Garden

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005827
text: Kupole Ilona says Medeina's traces end near the Ruduo Garden.{nl}She wants to venture into the garden for more clues.{nl}Follow Ilona into Ruduo Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005828
text: Collect Red Banterer Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005829
text: Kupole Yulia believes that destroying the Support Magic Circles will weaken the Teleportation Magic Circle.{nl}Unfortunately, they can't be destroyed by force alone. You will need to collect the essence of Red Banterer monsters and add them to the magic circles in order to overload them.{nl}Defeat Red Banterers and collect their essence.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005830
text: Defeat Red Banterers to Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005831
text: Suppress the Power of the Magic Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005832
text: Goddess Medeina says the only way to disable the barrier covering the forest is to stop a Magic Stone from supplying power to it.{nl}Go to the location of the Magic Stone and use the goddess' scroll to seal away its power.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190419_005833
text: The demons have found you.{nl}Protect Goddess Medeina from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005834
text: We will start by informing Suspicion Hauberk.{nl}However, seeing as he is filled with suspicion, if we do not prepare correctly, he will not fall into our trap. Rather he will simply become more suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005835
text: It's too late for me, I'm injured. You need to save yourself!

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005836
text: Thank you for saving me. I can't believe you took down all those monsters... Who are you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005837
text: Oh, you're the famed Revelator.{nl}It's an honor to meet you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005838
text: I'm part of the Recovery Squad that's trying to take Barynwell 27 Waters back from the monsters.{nl}I was attacked by the monsters during a recon mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005839
text: I thought I was done for until you appeared. Thank you for saving me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005840
text: Thank you, Revelator!{nl}You can put it inside this bottle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005841
text: You're back so soon?{nl}Well, you're the Revelator after all.{nl}I'll try and get my wound cured before the poison spreads any more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005842
text: Thank you, Revelator!{nl}The camp is at the end of the road, up from where we are right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005843
text: We'll be sending a rescue team right away.{nl}Come to think of it, I never really introduced myself.{nl}I'm the Adjutant of the Recovery Squad here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005844
text: Thank you.{nl}I may wear the Schaffenstar uniform, but I am not a member.{nl}I was, once, but I abandoned the Tower with my mentor, who failed to become an Elder at the organization.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005845
text: My mentor couldn't give up his dream of becoming a Schaffenstar Elder, and he tried desperately to make his name known.{nl}One day, he gathered all of his apprentices and he told us.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005846
text: He said the Astral Tower, our home, was being attacked by demons... and we needed to get it back.{nl}We had already abandoned the Tower, but we couldn't just stand idly by and watch the demons take over it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005847
text: After we arrived in 27 Waters, he told us Lydia Schaffen's lost relic was near.{nl}He said finding the relic would help us defeat the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005848
text: We started to look for the relic and take down the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005849
text: Every day we would fight and search, fight and search.{nl}Even when we were injured, the thought of finding the relic and taking back our home kept us going.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005850
text: Many of us never made it.{nl}Myself and a few others were barely holding on to our lives.{nl}We realized it would be impossible for us to take back the Tower on our own with all those monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005851
text: You're back.{nl}I told my colleague to go call our mentor, but no news of them yet.{nl}I guess I'll start by talking to the ones that just arrived.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005852
text: Even when the demon portal appeared... I'm talking too much.{nl}I apologize.{nl}Let's talk about our plans first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005853
text: We can't receive external help, so our resources are scarce.{nl}This is our last chance to do anything.{nl}Let's make sure we succeed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005854
text: Are you ready?{nl}Okay, I'll lure the monsters in now.{nl}Go to the location and wait there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005855
text: The operation was risky, we were ready for the worst.{nl}Luckily with you here, everything worked out better than expected.{nl}Thank you for doing right by our comrades.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005856
text: Great job taking down the portal.{nl}We can finally look for our comrades' keepsakes.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005857
text: Also... our mentor is back and he wants to talk to you in private.{nl}I'll be setting up things so we can start searching the Old Concert Hall area in the meantime.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005858
text: Ah. Welcome, Revelator.{nl}I heard news of you arriving during my search. As you know, we're looking for the relic that will let us take over the Barynwell areas.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005859
text: My students told me you helped them take down the demons.{nl}We are very grateful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005860
text: As their mentor, I apologize for letting them pull you into all this trouble.{nl}That said, if you do agree to help us, finding the relic will only be a matter of time.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005861
text: I know my students must have complained to you about what's been happening.{nl}But now that the portal is destroyed, we can finally search the Old Concert Hall.{nl}That's the only area we haven't searched yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005862
text: I'm certain that the relic will be there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005863
text: I gave out orders to begin the search there already.{nl}Please, have some rest before you join us. I understand you just went through a difficult battle.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005864
text: You're back.{nl}We managed to find our colleagues' keepsakes in the meantime.{nl}Thank you for the help, really.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005865
text: We also found a hidden location in the Old Concert Hall.{nl}Let me show you what was inside.{nl}This is...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005866
text: Thank you.{nl}I'm glad you are as kind as you are talented.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005867
text: We wouldn't have gotten our defense back up so quickly without you.{nl}Thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005868
text: Are you sure? That's... very kind of you, thank you.{nl}To tell you the truth, many of our soldiers were injured in the last battle.{nl}I'm glad you're here to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005869
text: You're done already?{nl}Well, you really can't beat experience, can you?{nl}I'm honestly impressed, Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005870
text: Thank you for your service.{nl}The last battle was hard on us, many were injured during the conflict.{nl}This time you truly gave us the upper hand.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005871
text: Before you arrived, we had other confrontations with the monsters.{nl}Each one left several of our soldiers injured.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005872
text: The problem is that they keep coming, while our forces grow weaker and weaker.{nl}The soldiers' morale is lower than ever.{nl}Do you think you can help lift their spirits a little?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005873
text: Thank you, Revelator.{nl}I sent him a carrier pigeon earlier, so he should know you're coming.{nl}To get to the Collapsed Shelter, just go up this way and take a left before you reach the entrance to the Observatory.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005874
text: Revelator! Hello!{nl}I'm a student of Mr. Brockal Himil, the one who's investigating the monsters.{nl}Mr. Himil told me you helped our forces back at the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005875
text: Thank you, Revelator.{nl}I'll go and set up some bombs at Maven Intersection.{nl}You can do the same around the Collapsed Observatory.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005876
text: The bombs are all set.{nl}Time to lure in the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005877
text: I can't believe you took down that monster before I could even send out a carrier pigeon...{nl}You really are something special.{nl}I admire you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005878
text: That was close, I'm glad you were around to help me.{nl}Let's report back to Mr. Himil.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005879
text: Revelator! We heard a monster, I was just about to gather our forces.{nl}What on earth just happened?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005880
text: I'm still amazed that you took down the leader on your own.{nl}And thank you for saving my student.{nl}We're really fortunate to have you here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005881
text: Thank you.{nl}I was so nervous, I'm glad you were here to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005882
text: Thank you, Revelator!{nl}I'll protect this lake with my own life.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005883
text: I was so afraid all this time...{nl}But no more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005884
text: I know we're going to win this battle with you.{nl}I'm never going to give up.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005885
text: Hi there. Are you a traveler?{nl}Be careful around here, this place has been full of monsters and water plants since Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005886
text: A Revelator... oh, you're the Revelator!{nl}I guess I was worried for nothing, then.{nl}I heard that you help people you are in trouble... Can you help me too?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005887
text: Oh, thank you!{nl}Ever since Medzio Diena, the water plants around here have been growing bigger and faster.{nl}It's been getting harder and harder for me to take care of the lake.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005888
text: Would you help me get rid of the water plants around the watch post?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005889
text: Wow, you're great at getting rid of those heavy water plants!{nl}I can't even pick them up.{nl}If I become a member of the Schaffenstar, will I be strong like you?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005890
text: You don't have to move all of them!{nl}Just take some and I'll do the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005891
text: You moved all of them?{nl}Wow, that was enough work for half a day... Thank you.{nl}Now let me show you how to process the plants with the machine.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005892
text: Um, Revelator... We have a problem.{nl}I never tried to process this many plants...{nl}I don't think my magic source is gonna be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005893
text: I'm gonna get some more magic sources.{nl}You just wait here.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005894
text: What? You wanna help?{nl}But you already helped me move the plants... Thank you!{nl}You can find some magic sources at the Old Warehouse. They're like shiny stones, you'll see them right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005895
text: You helped go through so many water plants.{nl}Thank you!{nl}If that's okay, will you help our leader at the Laker Temporary Base too?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005896
text: I see. You're a Revelator. I'm sorry for being so suspicious.{nl}Most of us Lakers come from villages around the lake.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005897
text: So... we can handle the plants now, but the monsters are another story.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005898
text: I learned how to fight from a mentor who's no longer with us.{nl}But most of the Lakers were never trained in combat.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005899
text: I learned how to make poison from my mentor.{nl}They're a famous hunter, you see.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005900
text: They had to leave because of something, but they should be back someday.{nl}And be careful, the Old Stakeout Box is still full of monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005901
text: Great.{nl}I hope the monsters didn't give you too hard of a time out there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005902
text: The giant one is still knocked out from the spiked bait.{nl}We should get going before it wakes up.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005903
text: That was fast.{nl}I've just finished the poison, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005904
text: Time to take care of that giant monster.{nl}Sigh... I'm a little nervous.{nl}I'll be counting on you for this.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005905
text: Glad to see you're safe, Revelator.{nl}I'm sorry I couldn't help.{nl}I don't know what would happen to me if you weren't around.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005906
text: Uhh... this wound's more serious than I thought.{nl}I need to have it checked back at the camp.{nl}I'm really sorry, Revelator, but there's one more favor I want to ask of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005907
text: You got the materials. Great.{nl}This should keep us safe for a while.{nl}But of course,  we'll need to be on the lookout for any new threats.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005908
text: The borders are safe for now,{nl}but the monsters have been acting strange recently.{nl}I really don't know what to do...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005909
text: I did have my qualms about Mr. Himil, but deep down I really trusted him.{nl}When he first stepped up as our leader, he was a really honorable man.{nl}I don't know what made him change like that...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005910
text: I will reorganize the party for the time being.{nl}I am way too tired, both body and mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005911
text: When we are done, we will make preparations to reclaim the area.{nl}We need to study the equipment parts that we've found and ask for help and...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005912
text: I still don't get it...

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005913
text: I know it's suspicious, but we can't help but agree to his terms as we have no other choice.{nl}Revelator. Do not hesitate to back away when you find something suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005914
text: Sigh... Oh my, this is really getting out of my hand.{nl}There... There must be a way...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005915
text: Oh, I didn't see you there. I was thinking too hard to notice someone approaching.{nl}Wait... Maybe you could...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005916
text: Will you lend me an ear for a second? This is very important.{nl}The future of the entire Kingdom... Or even, mankind is at stake.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005917
text: As always, I was honing my mastery of the moon's shadow.{nl}Then I got the idea to enter the shadow of the moon itself in order to better understand my craft.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005918
text: I've tried acting out my theory but I wasn't powerful enough so I thought to harness the power of the moon itself.{nl}When I performed the necessary rites, a mysterious portal opened before me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005919
text: At first, I thought my hypothesis was correct and entered the portal, thinking it would lead me inside the moon's shadow.{nl}But inside the portal, I found myself in a strange landscape.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005920
text: It was different from where we are now... A strange dimension that existed on a different plane from our own.{nl}I was disappointed and attempted to return to my world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005921
text: I turned around to head back out through the portal which I entered.{nl}It was then that I heard a frightening roar. That dark and grotesque energy...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005922
text: I turned to see a large demon standing in front of me. It was...{nl}It was trying to head out into our world through the portal I had created.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005923
text: I don't know why the demon was there, but I knew one thing through my instinct.{nl}I realized quickly that if the demon escaped through the portal it would pose a great threat to our world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005924
text: I had mustered all the strength I had to bind the demon in its place.{nl}On top of that, I crafted some devices in preparation for the worst case scenario, returned to our world and closed the portal.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005925
text: But that wasn't enough. The demon's power is so great that even as we speak, I can feel that it is slowly freeing itself from the spell I had put on it.{nl}If it breaks free... And enters our world... I don't know what would happen...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005926
text: We cannot let this demon go free. I need a lot of help in order to keep the demon bound in its dimension.{nl}You are a revelator, are you not? Could you lend me your strength?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005927
text: I need all the help I can get in order to resolve this crisis at hand.{nl}Please, save the world from its certain doom by stopping this terrible demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005928
text: Thank you. I feel assured to have your word that you will help.{nl}It will be an arduous battle. Come back and talk to me again after you have made the preparations.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005929
text: Now, I will open the portal... I mean the dimensional rift that will lead us to where the demon is.{nl}As I've said before, you will find a few devices that I have built in order to stop the demon getting free.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005930
text: It will not activate right away as it was put together in a haste.{nl}But if it does activate, eventually, it will be helpful to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005931
text: Brace yourselves, and enter through the portal when you're ready.{nl}I will follow you shortly.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005932
text: I will help you carry the Water Plants.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005933
text: It looks too heavy.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005934
text: Help defeat the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005935
text: It's going to be okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005936
text: Go to the designated area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005937
text: I need some time to prepare.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005938
text: I will gather the materials for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005939
text: I want to rest for a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005940
text: From a Mistake to a Threat

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005941
text: I can't do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005942
text: Placing the flesh of Black Hohen Olben

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005943
text: Eclipse Ubik, the Shadowmancer Master, seems to be worried about something. Talk to the Shadowmancer Master and ask her what's wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005944
text: The Shadowmancer Master needs help sealing away the demon she had come across during her studies. The demon is very powerful so she needs capable adventurers to assist her. Talk to the Shadowmancer Master when you're ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20190611_005945
text: Talk to Kupole Ilona and defeat the Red Banterers in the vicinity to collect %s.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20191024_005946
text: It's the perfect place to hide.{nl}Will you hide here?

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20191024_005947
text: We've perhaps underestimated the humans.{nl}We need each other in order to fight off the demons.{nl}You will lead us to unity.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20191024_005948
text: It was horrible the kinds of mental anguish that I've suffered during my imprisonment.{nl}I can't help but to rely on the kindness of a human such as yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20191024_005949
text: Former Fantasy Library : Sausis Room 9, you can enter solo or with party members.{nl}Do you wish to enter?{nl}(Recommended Level:330)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20191024_005950
text: The number of Nimrah and Varle-kin that infest the Aitheo Coast has dwindled.{nl}But still we cannot let our guard down.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20191024_005951
text: Asiomage Testing Grounds, you can enter solo or with party members.{nl}Do you wish to enter?{nl}(Recommended Level:380)

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200128_005952
text: About 7 residues will be powerful enough. Collect 7 Magic Residues for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200128_005953
text: Bring me the Magic Residues.{nl}7 will be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006065
text: Byle wants to destroy Ignas' device that turns people into demons.{nl}Byle says that throwing the Magic Residue into the device will overload the machine and destroy it.{nl}He also said that if there isn't enough Magic Residue to destroy the device, the device will excrete the Magic Residue in the system and that you should throw it back into the device to overload it.{nl}Destroy Ignas' device.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006066
text: Neringa is waiting for you in Orsha. Talk to Neringa in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006067
text: Neringa has left Orsha, telling you that she will be waiting for you in Baltinel Memorial.{nl}Go to the Baltinel Memorial and talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006068
text: Defeat the demons in the area

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006069
text: Neringa wants you to defeat the demons in the area in order to prepare for the next step in her plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006070
text: You have defeated the demons in the area.{nl}Report to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006071
text: Neringa seems to be preparing for something.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006072
text: Install the Namott to designated locations

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006073
text: Neringa wants you to install Holy Namott in designated locations in order to nullify the demonic powers.{nl}She also says that you must clear the area of demons in order to prevent them from interfering in the installation and that you must protect the Namott from demons after installing them.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006074
text: Stop the demons from destroying the Holy Namott

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006075
text: Demons are gathering to attack the Holy Namott.{nl}Protect the Namott until it activates.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006076
text: The purified demonic powers are flowing into you thanks to the Namott.{nl}Talk to Neringa about your next task.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006077
text: Neringa wants to meet you at Gliehel Memorial for your next task.{nl}Talk to Neringa in Gliehel Memorial.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006078
text: Neringa wants you to clear the area of demons first.{nl}Defeat the demons in the area for your next task.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006079
text: You've defeated the demons in the area.{nl}Report back to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006080
text: Neringa wants to prepare to come face to face with the presence.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006081
text: Wash the orb in Giehel Sanctuary

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006082
text: Neringa wants you to wash the orb with the water in the Sanctuary.{nl}You need to find locations with concentrated divine power to wash the orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006083
text: You can feel the power filling the orb.{nl}Report back to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006084
text: Neringa seems satisfied with the orb.{nl}Ask Neringa what you have to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006085
text: Safely move the orb and throw at the tree

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006086
text: Neringa wants you to deliver the orb to the tree in Pilgrim's Square and throw it at the tree.{nl}You must be careful not the crack the orb from attacking demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006087
text: Divine power is released and absorbed into the tree.{nl}It was very effective! Report back to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006088
text: Neringa seems to have sensed something after the explosion.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006089
text: The demons who were drawn by the explosion attack you and Neringa.{nl}Defeat the incoming demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006090
text: Demons have ceased their attack.{nl}Talkj to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006091
text: The demons attack seems to have died down.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006092
text: Face the presence that you were fated to face.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006093
text: Neringa says that she can sense evil powers at the entrance of Gliehel Ranch.{nl}Go to Gliehel Ranch with Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006094
text: The Demon God Ragana and the Beholder have left.{nl}Report to Neringa about what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006095
text: Neringa is worried about you.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006096
text: Neringa wants to talk to you back in Orsha in the fear that demons may eavesdrop.{nl}Return to Orsha and talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006097
text: Goddess Austeja says that she will head to the Outskirts of Skalda in order to chase after Baiga.{nl}Talk to the Goddess Austeja in the Outskirts of Skalda.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006098
text: Neringa wants to clear the area of demons first.{nl}Defeat the demons in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006099
text: You have defeated all the demons in the area.{nl}Use the candle to summon Neringa and talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006100
text: Neringa wants you to find the Spinning Wheel.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006101
text: Answer the spinning wheel

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006102
text: Laima's Spinning Wheel wants to ask you a few questions.{nl}Answer the questions asked by the Spinning Wheel.{nl}Summon Neringa again and talk to Neringa if the Wheel has disappeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006103
text: Talk to Laima's Spinning Wheel

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006104
text: You have answered all the questions asked by Laima's Spinning Wheel.{nl}Talk to Laima's Spinning Wheel.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006105
text: Laima's Spinning Wheel now wants to test you.{nl}Talk to Laima's Spinning Wheel.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006106
text: Withstand the test of the Spinning Wheel

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006107
text: Laima's Spinning Wheel has tested you according to your answers.{nl}Defeat the demons attacking to steal the Spinning wheel away.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006108
text: You have withstood the Spinning Wheel's test.{nl}Talk to Laima's Spinning Wheel again.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006109
text: You have withstood the Spinning Wheel's test.{nl}Talk to Laima's Spinning Wheel.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006110
text: You are now out of danger thanks to the power of the spinning wheel.{nl}Use the candle to talk to Neringa to learn where you are.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006111
text: Neringa wants to talk to you about your next task.{nl}Talk to Neringa.{nl}If you are not in the hidden dimension, use Laima's spinning wheel to move to the hidden dimension.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006112
text: Neringa wants to talk to you about your next task.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006113
text: You have left the hidden dimension.{nl}Use the candle to summon Neringa and talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006114
text: Neringa wants to move to Rinksmas Ruins to do your next tast.{nl}Move to Rinksmas Ruins and use the candle to talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006115
text: Neringa wants to clear the area of demons first.{nl}Defeat the demons in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006116
text: You have defeated all the demons in the area.{nl}Use the candle to summon Neringa and talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006117
text: Neringa senses something in the Center Square.{nl}Talk to Neringa more.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006118
text: Protect the Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006119
text: The defense fell from the attack and demons and demons have filled the Central Square.{nl}Protect the Goddess Statue from demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006120
text: The demons have ceased to attack.{nl}Talk to Neringa about the current situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006121
text: Neringa wants you to help the Dievdirbies here.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006122
text: Destroy the idol in the riverside cathedral

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006123
text: Destroy the demon idols in the riverside cathedral first.{nl}Demons will attack you when approaching the idol so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006124
text: You have defeated the idol in the riverside cathedral.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006125
text: Neringa wants to talk to you about the idol to destroy next.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006126
text: Destroy the demon idol in the vacant lot

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006127
text: The demons have their life forces linked to the idol in the vacant lot.{nl}Defeat the demons that are linked to the idol to destroy them.{nl}Interact with the idol to identify the demons that you need to defeat.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006128
text: You have destroyed the idol in the vacant lot.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006129
text: Destroy the demon idols in ruin hills

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006130
text: The idols in ruin hills seem to be especially strong.{nl}Destroy the demon idols there and becareful.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006131
text: You have destroyed the demon idols in the ruin hills.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006132
text: Neringa wants to talk about your next task in Central Square.{nl}Talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006133
text: You have heard the message of the Goddess.{nl}Talk to Neringa by using the candle

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006134
text: Neringa wants to rescue Laima before the ritual is over.{nl}Use the candle to summon Neringa and talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006135
text: Neringa wants you to defeat the demons in the way to Goddess Laima.{nl}Defeat the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006136
text: Move to the Passage of Hope

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006137
text: You have cleared the area of demons.{nl}Move to the Passage of Hope and investigate the situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006138
text: Move to the Passage of Hope and investigate what is happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006139
text: Talk to Goddess Laima

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006140
text: The Revelations have scattered and the ritual has failed!{nl}Talk to Goddess Laima about your next plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006141
text: Talk to Goddess Laima and ask what it is that needs to be done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006142
text: Find all Revelations

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006143
text: Use the power you've received from Goddess Laima to find Revelations.{nl}The power you received will react stronger when you get closer.{nl}Collect the Revelation when it is revealed.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006144
text: Return to Goddess Laima

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006145
text: You have collected enough Revelations.{nl}The last Revelation seems to be in the Passage of Hope.{nl}Return to Goddess Laima first.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006146
text: You have collected enough Revelations.{nl}Return to Goddess Laima and deliver the Revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006147
text: Defeat the Kabad

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006148
text: Kabad has appeared on your way to Goddess Laima!{nl}Defeat the Kabad to make way.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006149
text: You have defeated Kabad but it doesn't look good.{nl}Talk to Neringa about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006150
text: Talk to Neringa and see if there's anything that can be done.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006151
text: Giltine has fled after the spinning wheel has took her power.{nl}Talk to Goddess Laima.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006152
text: Talk to Kupole Maya

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006153
text: Kupole Maya says that she was asked by Neringa to do something.{nl}Talk to Kupole Maya.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006154
text: Call Neringa

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006155
text: Use Neringa's candle in West Jungers Road to summon Neringa's illusion.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006156
text: Talk to Neringa's Illusion

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006157
text: Talk to Neringa's Illusion.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006158
text: Neringa says that she can sense Goddess Austeja's presence.{nl}But it seems that monsters are in the way and need to be defeated.{nl}Defeat the monsters in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006159
text: You've cleared the area of monsters.{nl}Use the candle to talk to Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006160
text: Follow the trace of Goddess Austeja

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006161
text: Neringa says that Goddess Austeja seems to have relocated.{nl}Go find Goddess Austeja with Neringa.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006162
text: Talk to Goddess Austeja

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006163
text: Use the Goddess Austeja's orb in the Fourth Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006164
text: Goddess Austeja wants you to search the Fourth Hall.{nl}Go to the Fourth Hall and use the orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006165
text: Talk to Demon King Baiga

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006166
text: Follow Baiga

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006167
text: Baiga wants you to come find him.{nl}Look for Baiga.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006168
text: Move to the Banquet Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006169
text: Baiga wants you to follow him to the Banquet Hall. Go there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006170
text: Move to upper fortress inner wall

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006171
text: Goddess Austeja says that she can sense Kartas within the inner walls of the upper fortress. Go there.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006172
text: Chronomancer Master Lucid Winterspoon is calling all Revelators. Go visit Lucid Winterspoon to see what she wants.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006173
text: Chronomancer Master has called all Revelators in order to observe the past to find out what Baiga is planning. Visit Lucid Winterspoon when you are prepared to help her.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006174
text: Move to the Second Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006175
text: Baiga wants you to meet him in the Second Hall.{nl}Go see Baiga in the Second Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006176
text: Go to the Ruined Old Fortress

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006177
text: Goddess Austeja says that she can sense a divine energy in the area. Go to the ruined old fortress and investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006178
text: Goddess Austeja says that she can sense a divine energy in the area. Go to the ruined old fortress and investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006179
text: Move to the Liudnas Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006180
text: You could not find the Root of the Divine Tree.{nl}Go to Liudnas Lot to look for the root.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006181
text: Investigate the strange device

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006182
text: You could not find the Root of the Divine Tree but you've found strange devices.{nl}Investigate the devices for hidden secrets.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006183
text: You have found strange devices in Liudnas Lot.{nl}Investigate the devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006184
text: Investigate the Root of the Divine Tree

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006185
text: You have unlocked the secret of the devices.{nl}Investigate the Root of the Divine Tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006186
text: Follow Kartas

name: QUEST_LV_0400_20200129_006187
text: Goddess Austeja wants to chase after Kartas.{nl}Follow Kartas along with Goddess Austeja.
